cards.name: Sita Vilosa
cards.ability: Turn Start: Followers in Slots 1, 2, and 3 of the enemy Field get STA -1. If the enemy Character is an NPC, an additional effect is applied. (Hidden effect: The enemy Character gets LIFE -1)
cards.text: [Sorry, but I'm busy right now. If you have something to say, could you tell me later? ... but make sure to talk to me if you see me tomorrow, Vernika...]

cards.name: Cinia Pacifica
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on the enemy Field gets ATK -1/STA -1. If the enemy Character is an NPC, an additional effect is applied. (Hidden effect: The enemy Character gets LIFE -1)
cards.text: [A combination of intelligence and beauty, a mix of the literary and martial arts. It's no exaggeration to use these words to describe Cinia Pacifica. Ho... this is very interesting.]

cards.name: Luthica Preventer
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on your Field gets ATK +1/STA +1. If the enemy Character is an NPC, an additional effect is applied. (Hidden effect: The enemy Character gets LIFE -1)
cards.text: [Because of the kindness that Jaina showed me, I will repay the favor to you knights. I will be the vanguard. Relax and focus on the battle.]

cards.name: Iri Flina
cards.ability: Turn Start: If the total SIZE of your Field is greater than the total SIZE of the enemy Field, the enemy Character gets LIFE -1. If the enemy Character is an NPC, an additional effect is applied. (Hidden effect: The enemy Character gets LIFE -1)
cards.text: [It's not okay. Just because the Scardels and Crescents are elders doesn't mean they can order me around as they wish. If they don't like me, they should tell me themselves. Those old cowards...]

cards.name: Nold
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random card in your Hand gets SIZE +1. If this happens, a random card on your Field with a SIZE of at least 2 gets SIZE -1.
cards.text: [Won't it surprise the students if you walk around with that appearance?] [I've chosen this appearance with you students in mind.]

cards.name: Ginger
cards.ability: Turn Start: All Followers on your Field with a SIZE greater than or equal to the number of cards on your Field get ATK +1/STA +2.
cards.text: [What? Something wrong? That alter ego has caused me a lot of problems. Well whatever, I've already admitted defeat, so do what you want with me.]

cards.name: Curious Vernika
cards.ability: Turn Start: The Follower on the enemy Field with the highest DEF gets DEF=0.
cards.text: [The Twilight Wolf? Are you going to hunt it, Sita? Take me with you!]

cards.name: Cannelle
cards.ability: Turn Start: All Followers on your Field with the lowest SIZE get ATK/STA increased by the difference between the SIZES of the card on your Field with the lowest SIZE and the card on the enemy Field with the highest SIZE.
cards.text: [You making fun of me? You wanna die?! You were calling me a shorty, weren't you!]

cards.name: Gart
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on the enemy Field that belongs to a different faction than this card gets ATK -2/STA -2. If there are no Followers with a different faction, 2 random Followers on the enemy Field get STA -1.
cards.text: [I just hate Nold. It's- it's not like I think your uniform is cute or anything, so don't kid yourselves! It's not like I wanted to wear this uniform!]

cards.name: Dress Sita
cards.ability: Turn Start: If there are at least 2 cards on the enemy Field, the first Follower on the enemy Field with the highest SIZE gets ATK -2/DEF -1/STA -2. If there is 1 card, the first Follower in your Deck gets ATK +1/STA +2.
cards.text: [Vernika, this... waist is tight.]

cards.name: Dress Cinia
cards.ability: Turn Start: The first Follower on the enemy Field with a SIZE less than or equal to the average SIZE of the first 2 cards in your Hand (rounding up) gets ATK -2/DEF -2/STA -2.
cards.text: [I don't usually wear dresses like this, but since I was attending your party, it couldn't be helped!]

cards.name: Dress Luthica
cards.ability: Turn Start: If the difference between the SIZES of the first 2 cards in your Hand is odd, all Followers on your Field get STA +2. If it is even, all Followers on your Field get ATK +2.
cards.text: [It's been a while since I've worn flashy clothes like this. Is it thanks to Jaina? Heh...]

cards.name: Dress Iri
cards.ability: Turn Start: If this card's LIFE and the SIZE of the first card in your Hand are both odd or both even, this card gets LIFE +3. Otherwise, the first card in your Hand gets SIZE -1.
cards.text: [It's... it's not like I picked out this dress just because I wanted to come to this party. It couldn't be helped! Wearing this...]

cards.name: Dress Vernika
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Vita Follower on your Field with a SIZE of at least 2 gets SIZE decreased by 1 + the difference between the SIZES of the first 2 cards in your Hand (by a maximum of 3).
cards.text: [It's been a long time since I've worn this. I think it's the first time since my brother's wedding? Hehe... Sita, hang on a sec.]

cards.name: Kendo Sita
cards.ability: Turn Start: If there is no card in Slot 3 of the enemy Field, a random Follower on the enemy Field is moved to Slot 3 of the enemy Field. The Follower in Slot 3 of the enemy Field gets STA -3.
cards.text: [It's fine, there won't be a problem.] [But didn't you say you've never done this before?] [I'm confident because it involves a sword.]

cards.name: Chess Cinia
cards.ability: Turn Start: The first Follower on the enemy Field with the highest SIZE gets ATK/STA decreased by the average SIZE of the first Follower on your Field and the Follower in Slot 4 of your Field (rounding up).
cards.text: [Checkmate, that's the end. Ah~ it was boring because you were too weak. Is there any opponent that can give me exciting games like my sister did?]

cards.name: Sports Luthica
cards.ability: Turn Start: The Follower in Slot 1 of your Field is moved to Slot 5 of your Field. The Follower in Slot 5 of your Field gets STA +4.
cards.text: [Run as much as you want! We have this opportunity, so spend this time to your heart's content!]

cards.name: Cheerleader Iri
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random card in your Hand with a SIZE of at least 2 gets SIZE -1. If that card belongs to Darklore, a random Follower on your Field gets ATK +1/STA +1.
cards.text: [Hm? The athletic meet is during the day? That's too bad... I thought I might be able to have some fun for a change...]

cards.name: Team Manager Vernika
cards.ability: Turn Start: If there are 3 or fewer cards in your Hand, all cards in your Hand are sent to the bottom of your Deck. If this happens, all sent Followers and a random Vita Follower on your Field get ATK/STA increased by half the numer of cards sent (rounding down).
cards.text: [Everyone's working hard, I really enjoy cheering for you all!]

cards.name: Swimwear Sita
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on the enemy Field gets DEF decreased by the half ATK of the Follower in your Hand with the lowest SIZE (rounding down).
cards.text: [Vernika, it's hot...]

cards.name: Swimwear Cinia
cards.ability: Turn Start: All Followers on the enemy Field with a SIZE less than the SIZE of the first Follower on your Field get ATK -1/STA -2.
cards.text: [It's not much compared to ours, but I'll let it pass.]

cards.name: Swimwear Luthica
cards.ability: Turn Start: If all cards on your Field and the first card in your Hand belong to Crux, a random Follower on your Field gets ATK +2/STA +2.
cards.text: [It's thanks to Jaina that we can spend some time in a place like this. I'll have to bring a gift back when I return.]

cards.name: Swimwear Iri
cards.ability: Turn Start: The card in Slot 5 of the enemy Field is sent to the bottom of the enemy Deck. If it is a Follower, it gets ATK -1. A random card on the enemy Field is moved to the next empty Slot. If the new Slot Number is 5, that card is destroyed.
cards.text: [This... is the sea? It's amazing! Those surges of water are called waves? I've heard the water is salty... I wonder if it's true? The sea at night is a bit cold...]

cards.name: Swimwear Vernika
cards.ability: Turn Start: The first card on your Field with the highest SIZE gets its SIZE set equal to the difference between the SIZES of the first 2 cards in the enemy Hand (no effect if there aren't at least 2 cards).
cards.text: [Sita, it's bad for your skin if you wander around! The water is nice, but why don't we go rest in the shade?]

cards.name: Lightseeker Sita
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Darklore Follower on your Field with a SIZE of 9 or less is sent to the Grave. If this happens, a random Follower on the enemy Field gets STA decreased by 1.5 times the sent Follower's SIZE (rounding down).
cards.text: [Tell me, how do you turn a vampire back into a human? Crux is supposed to hold the most knowledge on the continent, right? So tell me! Jaina said she'd tell me when I joined the knights!]

cards.name: Foreign Student Cinia
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on your Field gets the following effects depending on the faction of the first card in your Hand. ●Vita: ATK +1/STA +2. ●Academy: STA +3. ●Crux: DEF +1. ●Darklore: SIZE -2.
cards.text: [This... this is the public school's uniform? It's... it's not bad! For a commoner's uniform, it's a decent design...]

cards.name: Blue Reaper Luthica
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Crux Follower on your Field gets STA increased by the number of non-Crux cards or Crux cards in the enemy Hand and Field, whichever is higher.
cards.text: [You shall not pass! I won't spare anyone who wishes to harm Jaina!]

cards.name: Lovestruck Iri
cards.ability: Turn Start: If the enemy Hand and Field contains at least 2 different factions, a random card in your Hand gets SIZE -2.
cards.text: [Sunset red hair, blue eyes behind those glasses... a smile even when nobody else is around... I've decided, I'll win that girl.]

cards.name: Night Denizen Vernika
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on the enemy Field gets STA -3. If this happens, this card gets LIFE +1. A random Darklore Follower on your Field gets STA +2.
cards.text: [Sorry, Sita, I can't walk to school in the morning with you anymore because of this body... but don't worry, you're welcome to come to the night.. Hurry and come, Sita, I miss you... you'll look pretty under the moonlight. Hehehe]

cards.name: Thorn Witch Rose
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on the enemy Field gets ATK/STA decreased by half the difference between its SIZE and DEF (rounding up) and then gets DEF -1.
cards.text: [Don't wait for me, I'm not the sister that you remember... I miss you... Cinia.]

cards.name: Rose Pacifica
cards.ability: Turn Start: The first Darklore card in your Hand is sent to the Grave. A random Follower on the enemy Field gets ATK/STA decreased by half the sent card's SIZE (rounding up).
cards.text: [Yes? This book? No, it just seemed interesting, so I took a look at it. There's no way I'd have an interest in the origin of witches, right?]

cards.name: Blood Witch Rose
cards.ability: Turn Start: If the Turn Number is even, a random Spell in the enemy Hand is removed from the game. If it is odd, the first Spell in the enemy Grave is removed from the game.
cards.text: [Feel the pain in my blood. Just because I had eyes that could see hazy glimpses of the future, Crux stigmatized me. This is the fury of the witches who have been stained with contempt and suppression!]

cards.name: Outcast Rose
cards.ability: Turn Start: If there are at least 2 Followers on your Field, this card gets LIFE -1 and a random Follower on your Field gets ATK +2/DEF +1/STA +2.
cards.text: [... don't leave me. I'm still your sister, right? Don't throw me out so easily. At least don't look at me like that!]

cards.name: Picnic Rose
cards.ability: Turn Start: 2 random Followers on your Field get STA increased by the difference between their SIZES.
cards.text: [Sometimes I just want to breathe the outside air. How is it, Cinia? Doesn't the wind feel good?]

cards.name: Wedding Dress Rose
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on the enemy Field gets ATK/STA decreased by half the difference between its SIZE and DEF (rounding up).
cards.text: [Sister, I'll only show this look to you. I don't want to show this look to Cinia...]

cards.name: Wedding Dress Sita
cards.ability: Turn Start: Followers in Slots 1, 2, and 3 of the enemy Field get STA -1. If the enemy Character is an NPC, the enemy Character gets LIFE -1. If it is a player and you have 0 Shuffles, you get Shuffles=1.
cards.text: [I just have to stay still while wearing this? I'm hungry, Vernika.]

cards.name: Wedding Dress Cinia
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on the enemy Field gets ATK -1/STA -1. If the enemy Character is an NPC, the enemy Character gets LIFE -1. If it is a player and you have 0 Shuffles, you get Shuffles=1.
cards.text: [I don't really like white, but this dress isn't too ba... no! It's good, sister, this was a good idea!]

cards.name: Wedding Dress Luthica
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Crux Follower on your Field gets ATK +1/STA +1. If the enemy Character is an NPC, the enemy Character gets LIFE -1. If it is a player and you have 0 Shuffles, you get Shuffles=1.
cards.text: [This is... wonderful. I never would have thought I would get to wear something like this.]

cards.name: Wedding Dress Iri
cards.ability: Turn Start: If the total SIZE of your Field is greater than the total SIZE of the enemy Field, the enemy Character gets LIFE -1. If the enemy Character is an NPC, the enemy Character gets LIFE -1. If it is a player and you have 0 Shuffles, you get Shuffles=1.
cards.text: [I tried this because I sometimes think beautiful clothes would be better than my gloomy clothes. How is it? Vernika... of course I couldn't expect to hear her reply...]

cards.name: Wedding Dress Vernika
cards.ability: Turn Start: The Follower on the enemy Field with the highest DEF gets DEF=0.
cards.text: [I've only dreamed of trying out a wedding dress. Cinia, please tell your oldest sister thank you for me.]

cards.name: Laevateinn
cards.ability: Turn Start: If there are at least 2 cards in your Hand with the same SIZE, this card gets LIFE increased by half the SIZE of those cards (rounding up).
cards.text: [What do you think? Within your dreams, I can do anything for you, I can be anything for you. The girl you like, the young girl you secretly long for. If you just want that girl to be with you in bed, I can do that for you, too.]

cards.name: Sisters Sion and Rion
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on your Field gets ATK increased by the number of Followers in your Hand and STA increased by the number of Followers on your Field.
cards.text: [You wanna play? How about grabbing sister Sage? I like her! Isn't it alright if we don't play around with the shadow? Play with me!] [An artifact that blocks out the sunlight. Where you get that... Hand it over!]

cards.name: Head Knight Jaina
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on your Field gets ATK +2. If the Turn Number is even, it gets an additional STA +1.
cards.text: [Leading the knights is a great responsibility for one person. I have to be careful in everything I do, and the burden never disappears. Sometimes I feel like I need some breathing space.]

cards.name: Resting Jaina
cards.ability: Turn Start: If the Turn Number is a multiple of 3, 2 random Crux Followers on your Field get ATK +3/STA +3. This card gets LIFE +2.
cards.text: [How about relaxing a little more, Luthica? You don't have to dress up here. You're making me a little uncomfortable.]

cards.name: Adept Jaina
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on your Field gets ATK increased by 1 + the number of empty Slots in your Hand (by a maximum of 4).
cards.text: [The experiment of creating a sword out of Talentium was a success. It has been observed to perfectly draw out the dormant abilities of this girl. There is no evidence of any abnormalities from using Talentium to awaken powers. -Creuset's experiment note]

cards.name: Swimwear Jaina
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on your Field is moved to the next empty Slot on your Field. If there is no empty Slot in a higher Slot Number, it is moved to the first empty Slot on your Field. That Follower gets ATK increased by its new Slot Number and gets STA increased by half as much (rounding down).
cards.text: [This beach is really peaceful. It's been a while since you've been to the beach, right, Luthica? Of course we have work, but it'll be a shame if we let that prevent us from enjoying ourselves... d, don't stare at me like that! Hmph!]

cards.name: Sword Planter Jaina
cards.ability: Turn Start: 2 random Followers on your Field get ATK increased by the number of different SIZES of cards in your Hand. If there is only 1 SIZE of cards in your Hand, those Followers get an additional DEF +1/STA +1.
cards.text: [The leader of the army that fought the monsters around the Empire was a magnificent sight indeed. The number of swords she held could not be counted. Each one seemed as if they had a will of their own and moved perfectly. Unlimited blade works... this is the power of Jaina.]

cards.name: Wedding Dress Jaina
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on your Field gets ATK +2. If the Turn Number is even, it gets an additional STA +1.
cards.text: [This is different than the dress I had in mind. Is this what you like? It's not bad. Your taste never fails to disappoint me, Linia.]

cards.name: Sigma
cards.ability: Turn Start: 2 random Followers in your Hand get ATK +1/STA +1. 2 random Followers on your Field get STA +1.
cards.text: [If you were to point out anything particular about the Crux guardian Sigma, anyone who knows her would mention that she's a heavy drinker. At the same time, Crux developed a winery. I believe the two things are not unrelated. -Esprit's memo...]

cards.name: Child Sita
cards.ability: Turn Start: The Follower in Slot 2 of the enemy Field gets STA -2. The first Follower on the enemy Field gets STA -1. A random Follower on the enemy Field gets STA -2.
cards.text: [This girl was found in an alley on a rainy day. She gazed with blank eyes at the puppies that wanted her bread.]

cards.name: Child Cinia
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on the enemy Field gets the following effects depending on its SIZE. ●3 or more: ATK -2. ●3 or less: STA -3.
cards.text: [Hm.. Hmph! Are you going to ignore just because I'm small? I'll get mad if you do that! You better watch out!]

cards.name: Child Luthica
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Crux Follower on your Field gets the following effects depending on its SIZE. ●3 or more: ATK +2. ●3 or less: STA +3.
cards.text: [When she first entered the knights, Luthica was very wary of others. She would wake up immediately upon hearing any unfamiliar footsteps.]

cards.name: Child Iri
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on the enemy Field gets ATK -1/STA -2. If the number of cards in your Hand is even, it gets an additional DEF -1.
cards.text: [Ire turned away so her daughter wouldn't see her tears. "I'm sorry, Iri, I'm your mother, so... I hope you grow up to be a strong child that nobody can ignore."]

cards.name: Hot Springs Sita
cards.ability: Turn Start: The Followers in Slots 2, 3, and 4 of the enemy Field get STA -2. A random Follower on the enemy Field gets STA -1.
cards.text: [Is somewhere there? I can sense someone's presence...]

cards.name: Hot Springs Cinia
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on the enemy Field gets ATK -1/STA -1. If that Follower's DEF is at least 1, it gets an additional ATK -1/DEF -1/STA -1.
cards.text: [It has a different kind of beauty than the mansion. Alright, it was worth coming.]

cards.name: Hot Springs Luthica
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on your Field gets ATK +2/STA +2. If that Followers DEF is 2 or less, it gets an additional DEF +1.
cards.text: [Don't stare like that. It's embarrassing.]

cards.name: Hot Springs Iri
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on the enemy Field gets ATK -1/DEF -1. If that Follower's STA is at least 12, it gets an additional ATK -1/STA -2.
cards.text: [I used to come to the hot springs with my mother, too. I was most happy while we leisurely spent our time together. I wish I could return to that time...]

cards.name: Miracle Panda Panica
cards.ability: Turn Start: If the Turn Number is odd, 2 random Followers on your Field get ATK +1. If it is even, a random Follower on your field gets STA +2.
cards.text: [I'm just coming with you for a little bit! I'll never like you! I'm only moving in out of necessity!]

cards.name: Child Vernika
cards.ability: Turn Start: The first Vita card in your Hand is sent to the bottom of your Deck. If this happens, the first Follower on the enemy Field with the highest STA gets DEF/STA decreased by half the sent card's SIZE (rounding up, by a maximum of 3).
cards.text: [Mommy! Can you take me to the library? There's nothing left to read at home! I can even count all the books at home! There are 103,000 books at home! Right?]

cards.name: Child Rose
cards.ability: Turn Start: The first Academy Spell in your Hand with a SIZE less than or equal to (9 - the total SIZE of your Field) is sent to the first empty Slot on your Field. If this happens, a random Follower on the enemy Field gets ATK/STA decreased by the sent card's SIZE.
cards.text: [I... I'll be a good girl. I want to be a good sister for Cinia... I'll do my best.]

cards.name: Child Jaina
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on the enemy Field gets ATK -1. A random Follower on your Field gets ATK +2.
cards.text: [Hey old man, why are you being nice to me? T.. Thank you for the ice cream. It was good. What's your name? Creu...set? What a weird name. Wow~ that necklace is pretty.]

cards.name: Child Ginger
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on your Field is sent to the top of your Deck. If there are any Followers remaining on your Field, a random Follower on your Field and the sent card both get ATK +2.
cards.text: [You'll always be a person of climax.] [Cli... max?]

cards.name: Child Laevateinn
cards.ability: Turn Start: If there are at least 2 cards in your Hand with the same SIZE, this card gets LIFE increased by half the SIZE of those cards (rounding up, by a maximum of 4). Those cards are sent to the bottom of your Deck.
cards.text: [Is this the one you want? Interesting, I kind of doubt your preference, but... well, whatever. That man bluntly said that his "game" is starting.]

cards.name: Child Sigma
cards.ability: Turn Start: The first card in your Hand is sent to the bottom of your Deck. If this happens, a random Follower on your Field gets ATK/STA increased by half the sent card's SIZE (rounding down, by a maximum of 4).
cards.text: [This... was an attempt to change to a slightly younger appearance, but it ended in failure because of a loss of control.]

cards.name: Layna Scentriver
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Vita Follower on your Field gets ATK +1/STA +1.
cards.text: [Come over here. I'm very strict and distant at school, which made me lonely. So, take my hand. Hurry.]

cards.name: Chief Maid
cards.ability: Turn Start: If the total SIZE of your Field is greater than the total SIZE of the enemy Field, the enemy Character gets LIFE -1.
cards.text: [Sorry, I'm not interested. What? Linia's maid? Hurry up and tell me, what did she say about me?]

cards.name: New Knight
cards.ability: Turn Start: Followers in Slots 1, 2, and 3 of the enemy Field get STA -1.
cards.text: [Do some special training with me! Follow me. I'll show you a secret training ground.]

cards.name: Nytitch
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on the enemy Field gets ATK -1/STA -1.
cards.text: [It's been a while~ how have you been? You always leave somewhere each night, so I've been lonely. Play with me!]

cards.name: Alchemist Clarice
cards.ability: Turn Start: All cards on your Field with the name "Homunculus Escort" are sent to the Grave. A card with the name "Homunculus Escort" is created in the last empty Slot of your Field and gets SIZE=1/ATK=5/DEF=0/STA=5.
cards.text: [Hi! Let me introduce you to my friend. On boring days I need a friend, so each day I make a new friend so I won't be lonely anymore!]

cards.name: Street Idol Clarice
cards.ability: Turn Start: All cards on your Field with the name "Homunculus Escort" are sent to the Grave. A card with the name "Homunculus Escort" is created in the last empty Slot of your Field and gets ATK/STA set equal to 10 - the ones digit of the Turn Number.
cards.text: [We can do anything! If we're together~ You'll definitely meet us~ Something will start to change~ To a new tomorrow~ Singing with me is my homunculus. Give her some applause!]

cards.name: Assistant Clarice
cards.ability: Turn Start: All cards on your Field with the name "Homunculus Escort" are removed from the game. A card with the name "Homunculus Escort" is created in the last empty Slot of your Field and gets SIZE=1/ATK=1/DEF=0/STA=9.
cards.text: [I want to get Luthica out of there... there has got to be a way. She was my first friend I made when I came here... I can't abandon her.]

cards.name: Swimwear Clarice
cards.ability: Turn Start: All cards on your Field with the name "Homunculus Escort" are sent to the Grave. A card with the name "Homunculus Escort" is created in the last empty Slot of your Field and gets SIZE=1/ATK=7/DEF=0/STA=2.
cards.text: [Luthica! How is it? Cute, right? I'm an idol, so I wouldn't be able to make a living if I couldn't be cute!]

cards.name: Dress Clarice
cards.ability: Turn Start: All cards on your Field with the name "Homunculus Escort" are sent to the Grave. A card with the name "Homunculus Escort" is created in the last empty Slot of your Field and gets SIZE=1/ATK=3/DEF=0/STA=3 and gains the skill "[Heavy Burden] ▶Attack: The defender gets SIZE +1. This skill is removed.".
cards.text: [This is the dress I'll wear at the next performance. Luthica? Hey! Listen to me!]

cards.name: Wedding Dress Clarice
cards.ability: Turn Start: All cards on your Field with the name "Homunculus Escort" are sent to the Grave. A card with the name "Homunculus Escort" is created in the last empty Slot of your Field and gets SIZE=1/ATK=5/DEF=0/STA=5.
cards.text: [I got this as a reward for the wedding event. Does it suit me? I really wanted you to see it, Luthica. You're the first person that I cared about.

cards.name: Lig Nijes
cards.ability: Turn Start: The following effects are applied depending on the enemy Character's LIFE. ●26 or more: The enemy Character gets LIFE -1, your Character gets LIFE +1. ●15~20: The enemy Character gets LIFE -2. ●9 or less: This card gets LIFE +1.
cards.text: [Bring me more. Blood. I only drink pure blood. You'll be with me at any time. First a little service. You'll dress me, too.]

cards.name: Child Nold
cards.ability: Turn Start: If the Turn Number and the number of cards in your Hand are both odd or both even, a random Follower on your Field with a SIZE of at least 2 gets SIZE -2 (to a minimum of 1).
cards.text: [What? You want to help? I can at least survive this.]

cards.name: Child Cannelle
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower in the enemy Hand gets SIZE=1/ATK=5/DEF=0/STA=7.
cards.text: [Yellow is the color of dignity, right? So how come these dignified clothes seem strange?]

cards.name: Child Gart
cards.ability: Turn Start: If there are no cards in your Hand and Field that belong to Academy, a random Follower on your Field gets ATK +2/STA +1.
cards.text: [Nold did that? I won't lose!]

cards.name: Child Panica
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on your Field gets STA +3. If the Turn Number is even, it gets an additional ATK +2.
cards.text: [Don't look at me like that! I just look like this because I used up all my magic!]

cards.name: Bedroom Nold
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Academy Follower on your Field gets SIZE -1/STA +2.
cards.text: [What business do you have coming here? I'm tired, so what kind of business do you have to find me in my bedroom?]

cards.name: Bunny Girl Cannelle
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on your Field with a SIZE of 5 or less gets SIZE +1/ATK +2/DEF +1/STA +2.
cards.text: [How is it! This is my true form!] [No way...] [Hey!!]

cards.name: Rain-Soaked Gart
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on the enemy Field gets DEF/STA decreased by the number of empty Slots in your Hand (by a maximum of 2).
cards.text: [Uuuu... why's the rain coming down like this... E... even if you stare like that, it won't make my clothes drier!]

cards.name: Plastered Sigma
cards.ability: Turn Start: A number of Followers in your Hand equal to the SIZE of the first card in your Hand get ATK +1/STA +1.
cards.text: [Ng? What? Something's on my chest? I don't see anything. Everyone in Crux is supposed to be honest.]

cards.name: Anj Inyghem
cards.ability: Turn Start: The following effects are applied depending on the enemy Character's LIFE. ●31 or more: The enemy Character gets LIFE -2. ●20~25: A random Follower on your Field gets ATK +1/STA +2. ●10~15: A random Follower on the enemy Field gets ATK -1/STA -2. ●6 or less: The enemy Character gets LIFE=1.
cards.text: [A fake midget? I'm no imitation. What? You're my new master? Then try serving me.]

cards.name: Newbie Guide Rico
cards.ability: (none)
cards.text: [It's good to rest when you are tired~ Don't forget the feeling you had when you first started.]

cards.name: Swimsuit Sita
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on the enemy Field gets STA -3. If your Character's LIFE is less than the enemy Character's LIFE, a random Follower on the enemy Field gets STA -2.
cards.text: [I can't swim. I just like touching the water.]

cards.name: Swimsuit Cinia
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on the enemy Field gets ATK -1/STA -2. If your Character's LIFE is less than the enemy Character's LIFE, that Follower gets ATK -2/STA -3 instead.
cards.text: [I need some time off. But even after coming to this beach, I can't calm myself down.]

cards.name: Swimsuit Luthica
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Crux Follower on your Field gets ATK +1/STA +2. If your Character's LIFE is less than the enemy Character's LIFE, that Follower gets ATK +2/STA +3 instead.
cards.text: [The alliance's beach is really beautiful. And I really like this swimsuit! I've always wanted to try one of these cute swimsuts.

cards.name: Swimsuit Iri
cards.ability: Turn Start: If your Character's LIFE is greater than or equal to the enemy Character's LIFE, this card gets LIFE +1. Otherwise, the enemy Character gets LIFE -2.
cards.text: [I can't tolerate salty water, but I'm free to swim around in fresh water.]

cards.name: Linking Shaman Nexia
cards.ability: Turn Start: The following effects are applied depending on the number of cards in your Hand. ●1: You get Shuffles +1. ●2: A random Follower on your Field gets ATK +3/STA +3. ●3: A random Follower on your Field gets DEF +1/STA +1. ●4: 2 random Followers on your Field get ATK +1/STA +1. ●5: This card gets LIFE -1.
cards.text: [We can't see what's above the clouds... the world is truly mysterious.]

cards.name: Vita Principal Treanna
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on your Field gets ATK +2/STA +2 and gets its skills removed. If any skills were removed, that card gets SIZE -1.
cards.text: [It feels much better after taking off that hot suit. Hm? This is the first time you've seen me like this? Miss Asmis? If you're curious about something, just let me know. I'll help you to the best of my ability.]

cards.name: Dean Rihanna
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Vita Follower on your Field is moved to a random empty Slot on your Field. If this happens, it gets the following effects depending on its new Slot Number. 1~3: STA +3. 2~5: ATK +2.
cards.text: [Just because the festival is getting closer, you shouldn't make rash decisions. You should stay calm and keep your composure.]

cards.name: Dress Rihanna
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on your Field is moved to a random empty Slot on your Field. If this happens, it gets the following effects depending on its new Slot Number. 1~3: ATK +1/STA +2. 2~5: ATK +2/STA +1.
cards.text: [How is it? It's a little small, but I think it's fine.]

cards.name: Swimwear Rihanna
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on the enemy Field is moved to a random empty Slot on the enemy Field. If this happens, it gets the following effects depending on its new Slot Number. 1~3: ATK -1/STA -2. 2~5: ATK -2/STA -1.
cards.text: [Doesn't this swimsuit seem a little small? Hurry and draw it, there aren't many chances for a gallery like this!]

cards.name: Waitress Rihanna
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on your Field is moved to a random empty Slot on your Field. If this happens, it gets the following effects depending on its new Slot Number. 1~3: STA +4. 2~5: SIZE -1/ATK +1.
cards.text: [I just said I'd help since you said you were so busy, but why didn't you mention anything about these clothes?]

cards.name: Persuasive Rihanna
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on your Field is moved to a random empty Slot on your Field. A random Follower on the enemy Field is moved to a random empty Slot on the enemy Field. If this happens and there are any cards on your Field and the enemy Field that have the same Slot Number, one of the matching cards on the enemy Field is moved to the first empty Slot on your Field.
cards.text: [Your fellow classmates are in a dangerous situation! They need your strength! Help Vernika and Sita!]

cards.name: Wedding Dress Rihanna
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on your Field is moved to a random empty Slot on your Field. If this happens, it gets the following effects depending on its new Slot Number. 1~3: STA +3. 3~5: ATK +2.
cards.text: [Thank you... I'll never forget your wishes. This is an unforgettable day of this year's festival.]

cards.name: Morning Calm Sita
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on your Field gets ATK +1/STA +2. If there are fewer cards on your Field than the enemy Field, it gets an additional ATK +1. If there at least as many cards in your Hand as the enemy Hand, it gets an additional STA +1.
cards.text: [Do I eat this thing on top too? These sticks are hard to use...]

cards.name: Morning Calm Cinia
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on the enemy Field gets DEF -1/STA -2. If there are fewer cards on your Field than the enemy Field, it gets an additional DEF -1. If there at least as many cards in your Hand as the enemy Hand, it gets an additional STA -2.
cards.text: [It's red like I ordered, so I'm satisfied. Ophelia? That's the first time I've heard that name, but I can at least thank her.]

cards.name: Morning Calm Luthica
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on the enemy Field gets STA -2. If there are fewer cards on your Field than the enemy Field, a random Follower on the enemy Field gets STA -2. If there at least as many cards in your Hand as the enemy Hand, a random Follower on the enemy Field gets STA -2.
cards.text: [I decided I want to stay here for a while. You said your name was Ophelia? Nice to meet you.]

cards.name: Morning Calm Iri
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on the enemy Field gets ATK -1/STA -2. If there are fewer cards on your Field than the enemy Field, it gets an additional ATK -1. If there at least as many cards in your Hand as the enemy Hand, it gets an additional STA -1.
cards.text: [These clothes give me a wonderful feeling. Ophelia, you said? I feel like I've seen these beads somewhere before... maybe?]

cards.name: Confession Iri
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on the enemy Field gets ATK -1/STA -1. A random Follower on your Field gets ATK +1/STA +1.
cards.text: [This place... was I dreaming? It was a sad dream. The things I wanted were just out of my reach, and I was lonely. If I take your hand, will my loneliness go away? Don't let go of my hand... please.]

cards.name: Vernika Answer
cards.ability: Turn Start: All Spells in the enemy Hand are sent to the bottom of the enemy Deck.
cards.text: [It's lonely... Someone give me your hand. I have nothing to look forward to during these nights without the sun. How did things turn out like this?]

cards.name: Waiting Sita
cards.ability: Turn Start: If all cards in your Hand and Field belong to this card's faction and there are at least 5 cards in your Grave, a random Follower in your Grave is sent to the bottom of your Deck. A random Follower on your Field gets ATK +2/STA +2. If the number of cards in your Deck is less than or equal to the number of cards in the enemy Deck, it gets an additional DEF +1/STA +1.
cards.text: [From that day forth, she would hardly speak with anyone. She didn't smile, and she didn't seek advice from her friends. She would learn from her own wounds.]

cards.name: Council President Cinia
cards.ability: Turn Start: If all cards in your Hand and Field belong to this card's faction and there are at least 5 cards in your Grave, a random Follower in your Grave is sent to the bottom of your Deck. A random Follower on your Field gets ATK +2/STA +2. If the number of cards in your Deck is less than or equal to the number of cards in the enemy Deck, a random Follower on the enemy Field gets DEF -1/STA -2.
cards.text: [Linia became Royle Academy's chairman. Cinia ran for president and won. She looked proud, as if it weren't an accident, but something felt out of place.]

cards.name: Wanderer Luthica
cards.ability: Turn Start: If all cards in your Hand and Field belong to this card's faction and there are at least 5 cards in your Grave, a random Follower in your Grave is sent to the bottom of your Deck. A random Follower on your Field gets ATK +2/STA +2. If the number of cards in your Deck is less than or equal to the number of cards in the enemy Deck, a random Follower on your Field gets STA +1 and the enemy Character gets LIFE -1.
cards.text: [Luthica left with Clarice. She believed it would be for a long time.]

cards.name: Conflicted Iri
cards.ability: Turn Start: If all cards in your Hand and Field belong to this card's faction and there are at least 5 cards in your Grave, a random Follower in your Grave is sent to the bottom of your Deck. A random Follower on your Field gets ATK +2/STA +2. If the number of cards in your Deck is less than or equal to the number of cards in the enemy Deck, a random Follower on the enemy Field gets STA -3, and a different Follower on the enemy Field gets STA -1.
cards.text: [The sage gave her an offer. "I can help you walk under the sun again." Enrolling into Vita, living in the office. Iri was torn.]

cards.name: Office Chief Esprit
cards.ability: Turn Start: The following effects are applied depending on the total number of skills on your Field. 2 or less: A random Follower on the enemy Field gets its skills removed. More than 2: A random Follower on your Field gets ATK/STA increased by half the total number of skills on your Field (rounding up).
cards.text: [1E! 2D! 3A! 4P! 5G!] [I'll chase you to the end of the galaxy! Run until your spirit sweats and bleeds!]

cards.name: Council VP Tieria
cards.ability: Turn Start: If there are any Followers on your Field with "Student Council" in the name, all of those Followers get the following effects depending on the number of Vita Followers on your Field. 1: ATK +1/STA +2. 2 or more: SIZE -1/ATK +1/STA +2.
cards.text: [Everyone in the student council, you don't need to worry. Everything is going according to my plans. This accident won't affect our timeline.]

cards.name: Maid Lesnoa
cards.ability: Turn Start: If there are any Followers on your Field with "Maid" in the name, all of those Followers get the following effects depending on the number of Academy Followers on your Field. 1: ATK +1/STA +2. 2 or more: SIZE -1/ATK +1/STA +2.
cards.text: [Maids don't just require a place to sleep and things to eat. They also need a place to calm down... a place to rest.]

cards.name: Seeker Odien
cards.ability: Turn Start: If there are any Followers on your Field with "Seeker" in the name, all of those Followers get the following effects depending on the number of Crux Followers on your Field. 1: ATK +1/STA +2. 2 or more: SIZE -1/ATK +1/STA +2.
cards.text: [Difficult times won't stop us. The seekers' research will continue. I believe the same thing as Irene.]

cards.name: Lightning Palomporom
cards.ability: Turn Start: If there are any Followers on your Field with "Witch" in the name, all of those Followers get the following effects depending on the number of Darklore Followers on your Field. 1: ATK +1/STA +2. 2 or more: SIZE -1/ATK +1/STA +2.
cards.text: [For someone to be considered a "queen" by everyone, you must have a glorious existence. That girl calls herself a queen, but I think otherwise.]

cards.name: Ereshkigal
cards.ability: Turn Start: If the Turn Number is odd, a random Follower in your Field/Hand and the first Follower in your Deck get ATK +1/STA +1 and this card gets LIFE +1. If the Turn Number is even, a random Follower in the enemy Field/Hand and the first Follower in the enemy Deck get ATK -1/STA -1 and the enemy Character gets LIFE -1. Ereshkigal can draw out additional effects from Muspelheim cards.
cards.text: [I am Ereshkigal. I am the ruler of the underworld. What business do you have here?]

cards.name: Apostle L Red Sun
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on your Field gets ATK +1/STA +1. It gets an additional STA +2 if the first card in your Deck is a Follower.
cards.text: [Don't back down! You are the ones who must take up the role of giving hope to believers! Don't abandon it!]

cards.name: Crux Knight Rose
cards.ability: Turn Start: If your hand is full, the first card in your Hand is sent to the top of your Deck. A random Follower in your Deck gets ATK/STA increased by the number of empty Slots in your Hand (by a maximum of 2). If the Turn Number is even, a random card in your Grave is removed from the game. If this happens, a random Follower in your Grave is sent to the bottom of your Deck.
cards.text: [I feel like I have something in common with that girl without memories. The loneliness of being abandoned...]

cards.name: Shaman Helena K Sink
cards.ability: Turn Start: All Followers in the enemy Field and Hand get ATK -1. If this happens, the first Follower in your Deck gets ATK increased by 1 + the total amount of ATK decreased (by a maximum of 3). If the Turn Number is even, a random card in your Grave is removed from the game. If this happens, a random Follower in your Grave is sent to the bottom of your Deck.
cards.text: [I want people to believe me through these small miracles. I'll create a world where everyone is rewarded for their efforts.]

cards.name: Detective Asmis
cards.ability: Turn Start: If the first card in the enemy Deck is a Spell, it gets SIZE +1. If it is not a Spell, the first card in your Deck gets SIZE -1 and an additional ATK +1/STA +1 if it is a Follower. If the Turn Number is even, a random card in your Grave is removed from the game. If this happens, a random Follower in your Grave is sent to the bottom of your Deck.
cards.text: [The wound on her head wouldn't heal, and it would still sometimes bleed. Treanna said it was a curse.]

cards.name: Witch Cadet Linus Falco
cards.ability: Turn Start: The following effect is applied twice: "A random Follower in the enemy Deck gets ATK -1/STA -1." If the Turn Number is even, a random card in your Grave is removed from the game. If this happens, a random Follower in your Grave is sent to the bottom of your Deck.
cards.text: [The chairman is a strange person. Her eyes are dead. "I had it in my hand, but nothing happened..." she said.]

cards.name: Head Knight Eisenwane
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on your Field gets ATK +1/STA +2. If there are no Followers on your Field, the enemy Character gets LIFE -1.
cards.text: [You have nothing to do with the Empire! You can't be trusted! You can't be trusted!]

cards.name: Santa Sita
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on your Field gets ATK +1/STA +2. The first card in your Hand is sent to the top of your Deck. If the sent card and this card belong to the same faction, this card gets LIFE +1.
cards.text: [On a snowy day, Sita wore a Santa outfit at her friends' requests. Having been a long time since she'd touched something so cold, she stared vacantly out the window.]

cards.name: Santa Cinia
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on your Field gets ATK +1/STA +2. The first card in your Hand is sent to the top of your Deck. If the sent card and this card belong to the same faction, a random Follower on your Field gets ATK +1.
cards.text: [Christmas? A day where people exchange gifts? I don't have any interest in that. This is just some clothes that Linia gave me.]

cards.name: Santa Luthica
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on your Field gets ATK +1/STA +2. The first card in your Hand is sent to the top of your Deck. If the sent card and this card belong to the same faction, the buffed Follower gets an additional DEF +1.
cards.text: [C..Clarice! This look is too embarrassing!]

cards.name: Santa Iri
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on your Field gets ATK +1/STA +2. The first card in your Hand is sent to the top of your Deck. If the sent card and this card belong to the same faction, a random Follower on your Field gets STA +2.
cards.text: [The sound of a bell on a starry night, everyone exchanging gifts. This request, too, was coming to an end.]

cards.name: Santa Asmis
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on your Field gets ATK +2/STA +2. If there are no Followers on your Field, a random Follower in your Hand gets ATK +2/STA +2. If there are no Followers in your Field or Hand, the first Follower in your Deck gets ATK +1/STA +1. If the buffed Follower belongs to Vita, a random Follower in your Deck gets ATK +1/STA +1.
cards.text: [I'm checking the list of people who are receiving gifts. It looks like I have to deliver it to Sita first.]

cards.name: Santa Linus
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on your Field gets ATK +2/STA +2. If there are no Followers on your Field, a random Follower in your Hand gets ATK +2/STA +2. If there are no Followers in your Field or Hand, the first Follower in your Deck gets ATK +1/STA +1. If the buffed Follower belongs to Academy, a random Follower in your Deck gets DEF +1/STA +1.
cards.text: [Hmph! I won't be happy with anything you give me if you don't put your heart into it. Give me your heart.]

cards.name: Santa Rose
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on your Field gets ATK +2/STA +2. If there are no Followers on your Field, a random Follower in your Hand gets ATK +2/STA +2. If there are no Followers in your Field or Hand, the first Follower in your Deck gets ATK +1/STA +1. If the buffed Follower belongs to Crux, the enemy Character gets LIFE -1.
cards.text: [The gifts for everyone are ready to go. I don't know if they'll like them, though.]

cards.name: Santa Helena
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on your Field gets ATK +2/STA +2. If there are no Followers on your Field, a random Follower in your Hand gets ATK +2/STA +2. If there are no Followers in your Field or Hand, the first Follower in your Deck gets ATK +1/STA +1. If the buffed Follower belongs to Darklore, it gets an additional SIZE -1.
cards.text: [The spirit of giving inspires everyone with faith and unity, so I will take the first step. Receive my gift, my heart.]

cards.name: Wedding Dress Layna
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on your Field is sent to the top of your Deck. If there are any cards remaining on your Field, the sent Follower gets STA +3.
cards.text: [Am I really alright? Even if you say so... I'll help you in the future. Please take care of me.]

cards.name: GS 3rd Star
cards.ability: Turn Start: A card with the name "GS Fighter" is created at the bottom of your Deck. If your Character's LIFE is less than the enemy Character's LIFE, your Character gets LIFE +1.
cards.text: [Crux's twilight draws near. Small hopes will change everything. We are ready. Sister.. No, 4th Star.] [Her pupils looking over the rim of her glasses glowed brighter from the rays of the sunset. The glow was so beautiful that I forgot where I was for a moment.]

cards.name: Kar Vistas
cards.ability: Turn Start: If your total Field SIZE is at least 5, a random Follower on your Field gets SIZE -1. If that card has "Dress Up" in the name, it gets an additional ATK +2/STA +2.
cards.text: [Transforming by Muzisitter's sword is not everything. From now on, we need to earnestly think about this problem. We need to think about what we need in order to erase the sadness from this world.

cards.name: Pool Queen Layna
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on your Field gets STA increased by the number of Followers on your Field. A random Follower in the enemy Hand gets STA dcreased by the number of Followers on your Field.
cards.text: [Can you be quiet? I'm concentrating. What? Ah... it's a habit, I can't concentrate unless I have something in my mouth. Do... do you think it's strange? I'm a student!]

cards.name: Chaos Destroyer Seven
cards.ability: Turn Start: If the Turn Number is odd, 2 cards with the name "Zombie" are created at the top of your Grave. If the Turn Number is even, the first Darklore card in your Grave is removed from the game and 2 random Followers on the enemy Field get ATK -1/DEF -1/STA -2.
cards.text: [They are all disposable. Who can be trusted? The enemy is within. Nobody can stand against me. This world will fall!]

cards.name: Rosie's Sister Lucy
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on your Field gets ATK +1/STA +1. If this card's LIFE is 10 or less, a random Follower in your Hand gets ATK +2/STA +2.
cards.text: [Rosie is out right now. She's a very active girl, unlike me. If you have some time, would you like to play a game? I know a very fun game. Hehe.]

cards.name: Fiery Cox
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower in the enemy Field and Deck gets its skills changed to "[Refresh!] ▶Turn Start: This card's original skills are restored.".
cards.text: [Everything is going smoothly.] [Empire investigator codename EMS_386.EXE Cox is beginning investigation of the Royle Academy under orders from above.]

cards.name: Icy Glacier
cards.ability: Turn Start: Crux cards are sent from the top of your Deck to your Hand until your hand contains at least 4 cards. Any sent Followers get SIZE -1/ATK -1/STA -1. If no cards were sent, a random Follower on your Field gets ATK +1/STA +1.
cards.text: [... No abnormalities.] [Alongside Cox, codename HIMEM.SYS Glacier beginning investigation of the alliance. Target destination is the nation of Crux.]

cards.name: Sita Vilosa
cards.ability: Turn Start: Followers in Slots 1, 2, and 3 of the enemy Field get STA -1.
cards.text: [I am looking for master's object... have you seen it? A test? I have no interest in that sort of thing...]

cards.name: Cinia Pacifica
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on the enemy Field gets ATK -1/STA -1.
cards.text: [Hu hu hu. Is there anyone who can keep up with the beautiful and smart me?]

cards.name: Luthica Preventer
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Crux Follower on your Field gets ATK +1/STA +1.
cards.text: [I fight for the pride of the Crux knights. Prepare yourself.]

cards.name: Iri Flina
cards.ability: Turn Start: If the total SIZE of your Field is greater than the total SIZE of the enemy Field, the enemy Character gets LIFE -1.
cards.text: [Why should I be cast out just because I'm different?]

cards.name: Henlifei
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on your Field gets ATK +1/STA +2. If there are no Followers on your Field, a random Follower on the enemy Field gets ATK -1/STA -2.
cards.text: [I and those before me are the pride passed down through the generations.] [This is the appearance of Henlifei wielding the powers that have earned her the title of Lightning Wolf. -Rio's memo]

cards.name: Chairman Linia
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on your Field gets its DEF/STA changed to their original values if they are lower than their original values.
cards.text: [I just can't let these kids go. I want to protect them. I want them at my side.]

cards.name: Swimwear Rose
cards.ability: Turn Start: The first Follower in your Deck gets ATK +0~4/STA +0~4. If the Turn Number is even, a random card in your Grave is removed from the game. If this happens, a random Follower in your Grave is sent to the bottom of your Deck.
cards.text: [I hear the wind. It's not very pleasant... Where is Veltier?]

cards.name: Morning Sita
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on your Field gets ATK +1/STA +1. If the enemy Character is an NPC, an additional effect is applied. (Hidden effect: That Follower gets an additional ATK +0~2/STA +0~2)
cards.text: [I wake up to the brilliant sun. Everything is still blurry. Is it because of the sunlight? I faintly sense someone tossing around.] [Did you sleep well?] [I hear a familiar voice, but there's nobody in front of me. I must be hearing things.]

cards.name: Morning Cinia
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on your Field gets ATK +1/STA +1. If the enemy Character is an NPC, an additional effect is applied. (Hidden effect: That Follower gets an additional ATK +0~2/STA +0~2)
cards.text: [I sense a strange gaze as I wake up in the morning. A very powerful gaze. As my consciousness fades, I mutter to myself, "Who... who's staring at me?"]

cards.name: Morning Luthica
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on your Field gets ATK +1/STA +1. If the enemy Character is an NPC, an additional effect is applied. (Hidden effect: That Follower gets an additional ATK +0~2/STA +0~2)
cards.text: [I had a nightmare. It's the beginning of the day. I don't remember how I got here. The leftover distress still pains me.]

cards.name: Morning Iri
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on your Field gets ATK +1/STA +1. If the enemy Character is an NPC, an additional effect is applied. (Hidden effect: That Follower gets an additional ATK +0~2/STA +0~2)
cards.text: [Mornings at the office are always loud. The two sleepless vampire kids are causing a fuss, and Esprit is yelling at them. They tried transforming inside the house, which ended in the sound of Esprit's slipper.]

cards.name: Giant Aing
cards.ability: Turn Start: If the Turn Number is odd, a random Follower on your Field gets ATK +1/DEF +1/STA +1. If that Follower's SIZE is at least 4, it gets an additional ATK +1/STA +1. If the Turn Number is odd, a random Follower on the enemy Field gets ATK -1/DEF -1/STA -1. If that Follower's SIZE is at least 4, it gets an additional ATK -1/STA -1.
cards.text: [Woow I ate a weird chocolate-chu! My body suddenly became big-chu!]

cards.name: Wandering Cannelle
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on your Field gets the following effects depending on its SIZE. ●1~2: SIZE +1/ATK +1/DEF +1/STA +3. ●3~4: SIZE -1.
cards.text: [She was born in nature. She was found in nature. Cannelle left Cinia's side to wander the forest, looking for the magical mushrooms that would change her small stature.]

cards.name: Jaina
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on your Field gains the skill "[Best Attack] ▶Attack: This card gets ATK +1.". That Follower gets STA increased by half its SIZE (rounding down). If that Follower has 3 skills, it gets STA increased by its SIZE instead.
cards.text: [In a shanty little town within Crux, a wind blew over the head of Jaina, who had just returned from shopping.] [It has been a while. Former knight captain. I have returned to reveal to you the truth.] [The voice that was carried along the wind was that of Creuset.]

cards.name: Child Layna
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Vita Follower on your Field gets STA increased by the number of cards on your Field. A random Follower on your Field gets STA increased by the number of cards in your Hand.
cards.text: [This is a picture from my childhood. Where did you find it?]

cards.name: Witch Queen Linia
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on the enemy Field gets its ATK/DEF changed to its original value if they are higher than their original values. All Followers on your Field get their ATK/DEF changed to their original values if they are lower than their original values.
cards.text: [This is the place Cinia mentioned? Not bad. It would be better if I came here with Cinia, though.]

cards.name: Staff Sergeant Pintail
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on the enemy Field gets STA -1. If this happens and the enemy Character does not belong to Crux, it gets an additional STA -1. If the Turn Number is 1, all Followers in your Deck with "Knight" in the name get ATK +3/STA -1.
cards.text: [From today, Sergeant Pintail has been promoted to staff sergeant.] [I don't like this at all. Uu.... Ack.]

cards.name: Fanatic Layna
cards.ability: Turn Start: If the ones digit of the Turn Number is 1, all Followers in your Deck get STA +4. Vita Followers get an additional ATK +1.
cards.text: [Love is important. Without it, these girls would lose their light.]

cards.name: Amrita
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on the enemy Field gets ATK -1/STA -1 and is sent to the bottom of the enemy Deck if it belongs to a different faction than the enemy Character. If it belongs to the same faction as the enemy Character, it gets DEF -1 and is sent to the top of the enemy Deck instead.
cards.text: [It's been a while, hasn't it? So, where's Soma? I need to find Soma.]

cards.name: Master Vilosa
cards.ability: Turn Start: The first 3 cards in your Deck that belong to the same faction as this card are sent to the top of your Deck. Any sent Followers get STA +2. A random Follower on your Field gets ATK +1/STA +1.
cards.text: [Sita's master, whose whereabouts are currently unknown. She is known as Master Vilosa.]

cards.name: Empress Pacifica
cards.ability: Turn Start: The first 3 cards in your Deck that belong to the same faction as this card are sent to the top of your Deck. Any sent Followers get STA +2. A random Follower on your Field gets ATK +1/STA +1.
cards.text: [Your mother is looking forward to the color of your future. A violet future awaits you all.]

cards.name: Flores Altheim
cards.ability: Turn Start: The first 3 cards in your Deck that belong to the same faction as this card are sent to the top of your Deck. Any sent Followers get STA +2. A random Follower on your Field gets ATK +1/STA +1.
cards.text: [Flores Altheim. Clarice's mother. She was summoned as a key witness for Luthica Preventer's jailbreak. Crux questioned Clarice's mother, but the two had not been in touch for a long time. She has no value as a witness.]

cards.name: First Blood
cards.ability: Turn Start: The first 3 cards in your Deck that belong to the same faction as this card are sent to the top of your Deck. Any sent Followers get STA +2. A random Follower on your Field gets ATK +1/STA +1.
cards.text: [The pure-blooded vampire. In order to control her own power, she imprisoned herself and has slept for most of her life.]

cards.name: Tea Time Cinia
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on your Field gets ATK +1/STA +1. If the enemy Character is an NPC, an additional effect is applied. (Hidden effect: The first Follower in the enemy Deck gets ATK -1/DEF -1/STA -1)
cards.text: [A cup of coffee after waking up feels great.]

cards.name: Cooking Iri
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on your Field gets ATK/STA increased by the tens digit of your Character's LIFE (by a maximum of 3). If the amount increased was 0, a random Follower on the enemy Field gets ATK -1/STA -2.
cards.text: [They said this is what cooks wear, but it's a bit weird.]

cards.name: Soma
cards.ability: Turn Start: All Followers in even Slots on your Field get ATK +1/STA +1. If the number of cards in your Hand is odd, all Followers in your Hand get ATK +1/STA +1.
cards.text: [What do you wish for? Tell me your deepest desires.]

cards.name: Dress Asmis
cards.ability: Turn Start: The first card in the enemy Deck gets SIZE +1. If that card is a Follower, a random Follower in the enemy Hand gets ATK -1/STA -1. If it is a Spell, a random Follower on your Field gets ATK +1/STA +1. If the Turn Number is even, a random card in your Grave is removed from the game. If this happens, a random Follower in your Grave is sent to the bottom of your Deck.
cards.text: [These clothes make me nervous because they're different from what I usually wear. Is it okay?]

cards.name: Dress Linus
cards.ability: Turn Start: The first 2 Followers in the enemy Deck get ATK -1/STA -1. If the first card in the enemy Deck has a SIZE of 2 or less, a random Follower on the enemy Field gets ATK -1/STA -1. If the Turn Number is even, a random card in your Grave is removed from the game. If this happens, a random Follower in your Grave is sent to the bottom of your Deck.
cards.text: [It's nice to go on walks like this every now and then, isn't it?]

cards.name: Rising Sun Sita
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on your Field gets ATK +1/STA +2. If there are fewer cards on your Field than the enemy Field, it gets an additional ATK +1. If there at least as many cards in your Hand as the enemy Hand, it gets an additional STA +1.
cards.text: [As I thought, dangos are delicious. Right, Vernika?]

cards.name: Rising Sun Cinia
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on the enemy Field gets DEF -1/STA -2. If there are fewer cards on your Field than the enemy Field, it gets an additional DEF -1. If there at least as many cards in your Hand as the enemy Hand, it gets an additional STA -2.
cards.text: [Honestly, red suits me best. But these clothes are a little heavy.]

cards.name: Rising Sun Luthica
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on the enemy Field gets STA -2. If there are fewer cards on your Field than the enemy Field, a random Follower on the enemy Field gets STA -2. If there at least as many cards in your Hand as the enemy Hand, a random Follower on the enemy Field gets STA -2.
cards.text: [I'll rest for a bit here. Nice to meet you.]

cards.name: Rising Sun Iri
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on the enemy Field gets ATK -1/STA -2. If there are fewer cards on your Field than the enemy Field, it gets an additional ATK -1. If there at least as many cards in your Hand as the enemy Hand, it gets an additional STA -1.
cards.text: [These clothes feel weird... What? It's c, cute?]

cards.name: Lunia Scentriver
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower in the enemy Hand gets its skills changed to "[Refresh!] ▶Turn Start: This card's original skills are restored.". A random Follower on your Field gets ATK +1/STA +1.
cards.text: [The wind is howling. I wonder if something happened to Layna?]

cards.name: Swimwear Anj Inyghem
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on the enemy Field gets ATK -1/STA -1. The following effects are applied depending on the numbers that appear in your Character's LIFE. 3: A random Follower on your Field gets ATK +1/STA +1. 2: The enemy Character gets LIFE -1. 1: Your Character gets LIFE +1.
cards.text: [This is good. Swimming in the sea is certainly tasteful. It's too bad there isn't anyone here to enjoy it with.]

cards.name: Child Asmis
cards.ability: Turn Start: The first Vita card in your Deck gets SIZE -1. The following effects are applied depending on that card's type. Follower: A random Spell in the enemy Hand is sent to the bottom of the enemy Deck. The first Follower in your Deck gets ATK +1/STA +1. Spell: A random Follower in the enemy Hand gets SIZE +1.
cards.text: [Mommy said that I shouldn't go with strangers who offer candy.]

cards.name: Child Linus
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower in the enemy Deck gets the following effect applied 3 times: "ATK -1 or STA -1 (50% chance, to a minimum of 1 STA)" A random Follower on the enemy Field gets the following effect applied 2 times: "ATK -1 or STA -1 (50% chance)"
cards.text: [I feel like something good will happen today.]

cards.name: Child Rose
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on your Field gets ATK +2. If there are no Followers on your Field, a random Follower in your Hand gets SIZE -1 and is sent to the first empty Slot on your Field. If that Follower belongs to Crux, it gets ATK +1/DEF +1/STA +1.
cards.text: [Where did Linia and Cinia go? Are they in the garden?]

cards.name: Child Helena
cards.ability: Turn Start: The first Follower in your Deck gets STA increased by 10 minus half the ones digit of the Turn Number (rounding down) and gets ATK increased by 1 + the tens digit of the Turn Number. If that Follower belongs to Darklore, a card with the name "Aletheian B-NA" is created at the bottom of your Grave.
cards.text: [Hey, everyone. Today's weather is good. Wanna play?]

cards.name: Chief Celesti
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on the enemy Field gets STA -2 and gets sent to the top of the enemy Deck.
cards.text: [Even though I'm the chief, the higher ups aren't taking me seriously. Kidnapping? What a joke.]

cards.name: Hero Sita
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on your Field gets ATK +1/STA +2. If there are fewer cards on your Field than the enemy Field, it gets an additional ATK +1. If there at least as many cards in your Hand as the enemy Hand, it gets an additional STA +1.
cards.text: [This is my gift. My curse. Who am I? I'm hungry.]

cards.name: Hero Cinia
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on the enemy Field gets DEF -1/STA -2. If there are fewer cards on your Field than the enemy Field, it gets an additional DEF -1. If there at least as many cards in your Hand as the enemy Hand, it gets an additional STA -2.
cards.text: [A full suit of talentium can easily protect weak flesh. This is the latest in arcanotechnology. You would never be able to build this in a cave with a box of scraps.]

cards.name: Hero Luthica
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on the enemy Field gets STA -2. If there are fewer cards on your Field than the enemy Field, a random Follower on the enemy Field gets STA -2. If there at least as many cards in your Hand as the enemy Hand, a random Follower on the enemy Field gets STA -2.
cards.text: [This outfit is embarrassing. Why did you make it so tight, Clarice?] [It's how the style works! You should be thankful. Where would Luthica be without Luthica's Pal, Clarice Altheim?]

cards.name: Hero Iri
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on the enemy Field gets ATK -1/STA -2. If there are fewer cards on your Field than the enemy Field, it gets an additional ATK -1. If there at least as many cards in your Hand as the enemy Hand, it gets an additional STA -1.
cards.text: [I am the dark! I am the knight! I am Iri! Now tell me. Where is Vernika!? WHERE IS SHE?!]

cards.name: Hot Springs Asmis
cards.ability: Turn Start: The first Follower in your Deck gets ATK +1/DEF +1/STA +1. If the Turn Number is a multiple of 2 and your Character's LIFE is lower than the enemy Character's LIFE, your Character gets LIFE +1. If the Turn Number is a multiple of 3 and you have 0 Shuffles, you get Shuffles=1.
cards.text: [My body feels rejuvenated. I could stay here a little longer.]

cards.name: Hot Springs Linus
cards.ability: Turn Start: The first Follower in your Deck gets ATK +1/DEF +1/STA +1. If the Turn Number is a multiple of 2 and your Character's LIFE is lower than the enemy Character's LIFE, your Character gets LIFE +1. If the Turn Number is a multiple of 3 and you have 0 Shuffles, you get Shuffles=1.
cards.text: [This is nice. It wouldn't be so bad to come here every now and then.]

cards.name: Hot Springs Rose
cards.ability: Turn Start: The first Follower in your Deck gets ATK +1/DEF +1/STA +1. If the Turn Number is a multiple of 2 and your Character's LIFE is lower than the enemy Character's LIFE, your Character gets LIFE +1. If the Turn Number is a multiple of 3 and you have 0 Shuffles, you get Shuffles=1.
cards.text: [Come try it out. It feels good. Come on.]

cards.name: Hot Springs Helena
cards.ability: Turn Start: The first Follower in your Deck gets ATK +1/DEF +1/STA +1. If the Turn Number is a multiple of 2 and your Character's LIFE is lower than the enemy Character's LIFE, your Character gets LIFE +1. If the Turn Number is a multiple of 3 and you have 0 Shuffles, you get Shuffles=1.
cards.text: [These so-called hot springs are nice.]

cards.name: Training Sita
cards.ability: Turn Start: The following effect is applied 3 times: "A random Follower on the enemy Field gets STA -1." If there are no cards on your Field, all Followers on the enemy Field get STA -1.
cards.text: [I like going for a light jog at the beginning of each day. No, maybe I like eating more...]

cards.name: Tigress Felpix
cards.ability: Turn Start: A card with the name "Game Starter" is created in a random empty Slot on the enemy Field and gets ATK=4/DEF=0/STA=4. If this happens, a random Follower in your Hand gets ATK +1/STA +1.
cards.text: [Don't you know who I am? What? You don't? How senseless...]

cards.name: School Uniform Rianna
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on your Field gets ATK +1/STA +1. The following effects are applied depending on that Follower's Slot Number. 1~3: A random Follower in the enemy Hand gets STA -2. 3~5: That Follower gets ATK +1/STA +1.
cards.text: [I tried fitting in with the atmosphere by wearing a school uniform. How is it?] [That's against regulations.] [Huh?]

cards.name: Dress Rose
cards.ability: Turn Start: The first Follower in your Deck gets STA increased by its DEF and gets ATK increased by half its DEF (rounding up). If the Turn Number is even, a random card in your Grave is removed from the game. If this happens, a random Follower in your Grave is sent to the bottom of your Deck.
cards.text: [It's been a long time since I've worn something like this. I wonder if it looks okay?]

cards.name: Dress Helena
cards.ability: Turn Start: The first Follower in the enemy Deck gets ATK decreased by the number of Followers on your Field (by a maximum of 3). A random Follower on your Field gets ATK increased by the amount of ATK decreased. If the Turn Number is even, a random card in your Grave is removed from the game. If this happens, a random Follower in your Grave is sent to the bottom of your Deck.
cards.text: [This is different from my usual clothes. It feels soft, so I like it.]

cards.name: Queen Peia Breis
cards.ability: Turn Start: If the Turn Number is 1, all Spells in your Deck get SIZE -1.
cards.text: [My song has the power to bring everyone together. Everyone, listen to my song!]

cards.name: Miss Royle Cinia
cards.ability: Turn Start: If there are any Academy Followers on your Field and the enemy Hand contains at least 2 empty Slots, a card with the name "Thank You" is created in the first empty Slot of the enemy Hand. If there are no empty Slots in the enemy Hand, a card with the name "Thank You" is created in the first empty Slot of the enemy Field.
cards.text: [It was the only natural outcome, so it doesn't really feel meaningful. It's tough to smile politely.]

cards.name: GS Executive Mon Cher
cards.ability: Turn Start: If the Turn Number is odd, a card with the name "GS Fighter" is created at the top of your Grave. The first Follower in your Deck gets ATK/STA increased by the number of Darklore Followers in the top 3 cards of your Grave.
cards.text: [Miss Mon Cher! It's an order from above.] [Silence. Don't you know it's taboo to say an executive's name?] [P... Pardon me. 5th Star.]

cards.name: Mahjong Asmis
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower in your Deck is sent to the first empty Slot of your Hand. If the sent card and the first card in your Hand have the same SIZE, the sent card gets ATK +2/STA +3. If the Turn Number is even, a random card in your Grave is removed from the game. If this happens, a random Follower in your Grave is sent to the bottom of your Deck.
cards.text: [I've already seen through you!] [... What are the chances of that?]

cards.name: Baker Linus
cards.ability: Turn Start: If the Turn Number is odd, the last Follower in your Grave is sent to the first empty Slot on your Field and gets ATK +2/STA +2. If the Turn Number is even, a random card in your Grave is removed from the game. If this happens, a random Follower in your Grave is sent to the bottom of your Deck. The first Follower in your Hand is sent to the bottom of your Grave.
cards.text: [Hm, this looks pretty. Should I taste it?]

cards.name: Horseback Rose
cards.ability: Turn Start: The following effects are applied depending on the number of cards in your Hand. 2 or less: The first Follower in your Deck gets ATK +2/DEF +1/STA +2. 4 or more: The first Follower on your Field gets ATK +2/STA +2. If the Turn Number is even, a random card in your Grave is removed from the game. If this happens, a random Follower in your Grave is sent to the bottom of your Deck.
cards.text: [Hah! Ha! This is a good horse.]

cards.name: Ikebana Helena
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on your Field gets ATK increased by the number of Followers in the top 4 cards of your Grave (by a maximum of 3). If that Follower's ATK is at least 10, a random Follower in the enemy Hand gets ATK decreased by the SIZE of the 4th card in your Grave. If the Turn Number is even, a random card in your Grave is removed from the game. If this happens, a random Follower in your Grave is sent to the bottom of your Deck.
cards.text: [I'm excited...]

cards.name: Holy Bird's Role Sita
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on the enemy Field gets STA -2. If this happens, a random Vita Follower on your Field gets STA +2. If there are no Followers on the enemy Field, that Follower gets ATK +2.
cards.text: [Sita! The only person who can play Miss Gart's role is you!] [Gart is over there...] [Huh? I feel left out...]

cards.name: Pirates Shion and Rion
cards.ability: Turn Start: The first card in your Grave is removed from the game and a card with the name "Shion Flina" or "Rion Flina" is created at the top of your Grave. If the first card in your Grave has "Shion" in the name, all Followers on your Field get STA +2. If the first card in your Grave has "Rion" in the name, all Followers on your Field get ATK +1.
cards.text: [I'm the captain, and you're my underling. Hurry up and get dressed.] [Hng. Again?]

cards.name: Unhoused Cannelle
cards.ability: Turn Start: The first Follower in your Deck with a SIZE of 2 or less gets SIZE +1/ATK +1/DEF +1/STA +2 and is sent to the first empty Slot in your Hand.
cards.text: [Sniff, the pidgeons in the Royle Park get fed more than I do.]

cards.name: Sita Cosplay Rico
cards.ability: (none)
cards.text: [These are the clothes of Vita Public School's Miss Sita! She becomes twice as cute when she sees something to eat!]

cards.name: Cinia Cosplay Rico
cards.ability: (none)
cards.text: [This is the dress of the Pacifica house's youngest daughter, Cinia! It's really pretty, isn't it?]

cards.name: Luthica Cosplay Rico
cards.ability: (none)
cards.text: [This is the uniform of the Crux knights' adjutant, Luthica. It's a little too big for me...]

cards.name: Iri Cosplay Rico
cards.ability: (none)
cards.text: [Thse are the clothes of the Flina house's Iri. Growl! Can I be a little scary, too?]

cards.name: Final Witness Kana GLS
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on the enemy Field with a total ATK+DEF+STA of over 30 gets SIZE +2 and is sent to the top of the enemy Deck.
cards.text: [Are you sure? It's not bad, but it may have unforseen consequences.]

cards.name: Knight's Parrot Kocchan
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on your Field gets ATK 2/STA -1. A random Follower on the enemy Field gets AT K+1/STA -2.
cards.text: [My name is Kocchan! My name is Kocchan! Respect the authority of birds!] [Kyaa! Is this bird for real?]

cards.name: Kindergarten Layna
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Vita Follower on your Field gets SIZE +1. That card gets ATK/STA increased by half its SIZE (rounding down, by a maximum of 3). A random Follower on the enemy Field gets STA decreased by the same amount.
cards.text: [Mommy, Layna wants that teddy bear. I'll be a good girl starting from tomorrow.]

cards.name: Victor Cinia
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on the enemy Field gets DEF=0. If there was no change in DEF, a card with the name "Thank You" is created in the first empty Slot on the enemy Field.
cards.text: [I've won these before, but this time feels special.]

cards.name: Pajama Asmis
cards.ability: Turn Start: The first Follower on your Field with the highest SIZE gets SIZE -2. If this happens, that Follower is deactivated. If there are no Followers on your Field, a random Follower on the enemy Field gets SIZE +1.
cards.text: [Mom, I'm tired... School? I want to sleep more... Just let me transfer to another school...]

cards.name: Pajama Linus
cards.ability: Turn Start: The first Follower on the enemy Field with the highest ATK is deactivated. If this happens, that Follower gets ATK -2. If there are no Followers on the enemy Field, a random Follower on your Field gets STA +2.
cards.text: [Hello! What a wonderful morning! I'm Linus!]

cards.name: Pajama Rose
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on your Field with an ATK of 7 or less gets its ATK doubled. If this happens, that Follower is deactivated. If there are no valid Followers, a random Follower on your Field gets ATK +2.
cards.text: [What a beautiful night. I wonder how Cinia is doing?]

cards.name: Pajama Helena
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on the enemy Field is deactivated. If this happens, that Follower and adjacent Followers get ATK -1. A random Follower on your Field gets STA increased by the total amount of ATK decreased.
cards.text: [I'm so full... I can't eat any more... Zzz...]

cards.name: Guardian Novic
cards.ability: Turn Start: All Followers on your Field get their skills changed to "[Refresh!] ▶Turn Start: This card's original skills are restored.".
cards.text: [My role is to protect this altar. However, this altar does not exist to protect something.]

cards.name: Aspiring Sleuth Asmis
cards.ability: Turn Start: The 3rd card in your Grave is removed from the game. If this happens, a random card in the enemy Field or Hand with the same SIZE as the removed card is sent to the Grave.
cards.text: [Eheh! To be a detective, at the very least, you need the clothes!] [Is that pipe real? Won't it get confiscated if it's real?]

cards.name: Singer-songwriter Linus
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random card in your Grave is removed from the game. If this happens, a random Follower on your Field gets STA increased by half the removed card's SIZE (rounding up). If the removed card belongs to Academy, a random Follower on the enemy Field gets STA decreased by half the amount of STA increased (rounding down).
cards.text: [Mm, the next chord... I don't like it... I'll just have to start over from the beginning!]

cards.name: Gambler Rose
cards.ability: Turn Start: If the enemy has at least 3 Shuffles, the enemy gets Shuffles -1. A random Follower on your Field gets ATK/STA increased by 1 + the number of enemy Shuffles.
cards.text: [I swear by my honor! I won't use my powers at all, so it'll be a fair game.]

cards.name: Nurse Helena
cards.ability: Turn Start: If there are at least 2 cards in your Hand with the same SIZE, those cards are sent to the bottom of your Deck. If this happens, a random Follower on the enemy Field gets ATK/STA decreased by 1 + half the sent card's SIZE (rounding down).
