cards.text: [Where does it hurt? Share your pain with God. Your prayer will definitely reach heaven.]

cards.name: Blessed Form Nexia
cards.ability: Turn Start: The following effects are applied depending on the number of cards in your Hand. ●0,1: The first Follower in your Deck is sent to the bottom of your Deck. ●2,3: All cards in your Hand are sent to the bottom of your Deck. You get Shuffles +1. ●4,5: A random Follower on your Field gets ATK +1/STA +2.
cards.text: [I really like this dress. Our faithful have given me a lot of clothes.]

cards.name: Dig Queen Conundrum
cards.ability: Turn Start: If the Turn Number is odd, all Followers in your Deck get ATK +1/DEF +1/STA +1. If it is even, all Followers in your Deck get ATK -1/DEF -1.
cards.text: [Mega! Crescent! Drill! With this drill, I'll pierce not the sky, but the earth!]

cards.name: Lib. Advisor Ethel
cards.ability: Turn Start: The first Follower in your Hand is sent to the bottom of your Deck. All Followers on your Field with "Lib." in the name get ATK/STA increased by half the number of empty Slots in your Hand (rounding down).
cards.text: [Books have magic! It's not the same as the magic that we use, but they have a very beautiful kind of magic!]

cards.name: Fated Lady Seven
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower in your Hand gets SIZE -1. If that card has "Lady" in the name, a random Follower on your Field gets ATK +1/STA +2.
cards.text: [The weather is nice. There's no better day to go for a walk.]

cards.name: Blue Cross Florence
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on your Field gets its skills removed and gains "[Zero] ▶Defend: No effect." and "[Zero] ▶Attack: No effect.". If this happens, that Follower gets ATK +1/STA +1.
cards.text: [We have to be prepared, too. You can't just control things whenever you want.]

cards.name: GS Executive Binch
cards.ability: Turn Start: If the Turn Number is odd, a card with the name "GS Fighter" is created in your Grave, Hand, and at the bottom of your Deck. A random Follower in your Hand gets ATK/STA increased by the number of cards on your Field with "GS" in the name (by a maximum of 3).
cards.text: [What ominous smoke... It's been a long time since I've seen that flare. We have to stop our operation and prepare to retreat.]

cards.name: Wedding Dress Asmis
cards.ability: Turn Start: If the first card in the enemy Deck is a Spell, it gets SIZE +1. If it is not a Spell, the first card in your Deck gets SIZE -1 and an additional ATK +1/STA +1 if it is a Follower. If the Turn Number is even, a random card in your Grave is removed from the game. If this happens, a random Follower in your Grave is sent to the bottom of your Deck.
cards.text: [Oh! Is this... Every girl's dream?! The dream that everyone wants to reach someday!]

cards.name: Wedding Dress Linus
cards.ability: Turn Start: The following effect is applied twice: "A random Follower in the enemy Deck gets ATK -1/STA -1." If the Turn Number is even, a random card in your Grave is removed from the game. If this happens, a random Follower in your Grave is sent to the bottom of your Deck.
cards.text: [Even if you say you'll take care of me... it doesn't make me happy at all... well, I guess I can show a little thanks...]

cards.name: Wedding Dress Rose
cards.ability: Turn Start: If your hand is full, the first card in your Hand is sent to the top of your Deck. A random Follower in your Deck gets ATK/STA increased by the number of empty Slots in your Hand (by a maximum of 2). If the Turn Number is even, a random card in your Grave is removed from the game. If this happens, a random Follower in your Grave is sent to the bottom of your Deck.
cards.text: [I'm wearing these clothes again... I feel happy every time I wear them.]

cards.name: Wedding Dress Helena
cards.ability: Turn Start: All Followers in the enemy Field and Hand get ATK -1. If this happens, the first Follower in your Deck gets ATK increased by 1 + the total amount of ATK decreased (by a maximum of 3). If the Turn Number is even, a random card in your Grave is removed from the game. If this happens, a random Follower in your Grave is sent to the bottom of your Deck.
cards.text: [I have always devoted myself to God's will... Could this also be God's will?]

cards.name: Halloween Sita
cards.ability: Turn Start: If your Character's LIFE is at least 12, Followers in Slots 1, 2, and 3 of the enemy Field get ATK -1/STA -2. If your Character's LIFE is less than 12, you get Shuffles=0. (Hidden effect: If the Turn Number is 1, all Followers in your Deck with "Sita" in the name get STA +1)
cards.text: [If I wear this... people give me candy... Are these clothes magical?]

cards.name: Halloween Cinia
cards.ability: Turn Start: If your Character's LIFE is at least 12, a random Follower on the enemy Field gets ATK -2/STA -3. If your Character's LIFE is less than 12, you get Shuffles=0. (Hidden effect: If the Turn Number is 1, all Followers in your Deck with "Cinia" in the name get STA +1)
cards.text: [You dare to dress me in clothes like this? But I don't mind the red...]

cards.name: Halloween Luthica
cards.ability: Turn Start: If your Character's LIFE is at least 12, a random Follower on your Field gets ATK +2/STA +3. If your Character's LIFE is less than 12, you get Shuffles=0. (Hidden effect: If the Turn Number is 1, all Followers in your Deck with "Luthica" in the name get STA +1)
cards.text: [Huhu~ This concept is a dark witch! Girls like to be naughty sometimes, too!]

cards.name: Halloween Iri
cards.ability: Turn Start: If your Character's LIFE is at least 12, the enemy Character gets LIFE -1 and a random Follower on the enemy Field gets ATK -1/STA -1. If your Character's LIFE is less than 12, you get Shuffles=0. (Hidden effect: If the Turn Number is 1, all Followers in your Deck with "Iri" in the name get STA +1)
cards.text: [Shion and Rion want me to go get candy with them... It's annoying, but I have to go...]

cards.name: Halloween Asmis
cards.ability: Turn Start: If your Character's LIFE is at least 12, the 1st and 3rd cards in your Deck get SIZE -1. If your Character's LIFE is less than 12, you get Shuffles=0. (Hidden effect: If the Turn Number is 1, all Followers in your Deck with "Asmis" in the name get STA +1)
cards.text: [H.. Huh? It won't wrap up this way? What do do? I'm running out of time...]

cards.name: Halloween Linus
cards.ability: Turn Start: If your Character's LIFE is at least 12, the first 2 Followers in the enemy Deck get ATK -1/STA -1. If your Character's LIFE is less than 12, you get Shuffles=0. (Hidden effect: If the Turn Number is 1, all Followers in your Deck with "Linus" in the name get STA +1)
cards.text: [Hey! I'm the moonlight magician! Tonight, I will steal your precious thing!]

cards.name: Halloween Rose
cards.ability: Turn Start: If your Character's LIFE is at least 12, the first 2 Followers in your Deck get ATK +1/STA +1. If your Character's LIFE is less than 12, you get Shuffles=0. (Hidden effect: If the Turn Number is 1, all Followers in your Deck with "Rose" in the name get STA +1)
cards.text: [I heard this is a day where you eat candy. Is there another meaning to it? What a fascinating day.]

cards.name: Halloween Helena
cards.ability: Turn Start: If your Character's LIFE is at least 12, all Followers on the enemy Field get ATK -1 and the first Follower in your Hand gets ATK +2. If your Character's LIFE is less than 12, you get Shuffles=0. (Hidden effect: If the Turn Number is 1, all Followers in your Deck with "Helena" in the name get STA +1)
cards.text: [Are these clothes... really God's will...? They're really embarrassing...]

cards.name: Sleep Club Sita
cards.ability: Turn Start: All Followers on the enemy Field whose ATK, DEF, or STA contain the number 1 get STA -4.
cards.text: [Sita joined the Cook Club because of the rule that each student can only be a member of one club, but she also would have been exceptionally talented in the Sleep Club.]

cards.name: Baker Cinia
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on your Field gets ATK +2/STA +1. A random Follower on the enemy Field gets STA -2. If those Followers have the same Slot Number, the Follower on the enemy Field gets STA +2.
cards.text: [Huhu, I wonder if these cookies will taste good. Shall I try it?] [Yeah yeah! You're amazing, Cini!] [Master, are these for us, too?] [No.] [Eh?] [Huh?]

cards.name: Gardening Maid
cards.ability: Turn Start: All Followers on your Field get ATK +1/STA -1. All Followers on the enemy Field get STA -1.
cards.text: [Walking along the road in the morning, carelessly looking at the flowers. After touching the flowers... I don't remember...]

cards.name: Mother Demon
cards.ability: Turn Start: If the Turn Number is 5 or less, this card gets LIFE +3. The last card in the enemy Deck is sent to the top of the enemy Deck. The following effects are applied depending on the sent card's type. Follower: The sent card gets ATK -1/STA -1. Spell: Your Character gets LIFE +1.
cards.text: [As I thought, this side is full of taint. I'll have to capture it all.]

cards.name: Dispatched Teacher Mother Demon
cards.ability: Turn Start: If the Turn Number is 5 or less, this card gets LIFE +3. A random Vita Follower on your Field gets ATK +1/STA +1. If your Character's LIFE is less than or equal to the enemy Character's LIFE, that card gets an additional DEF +1/STA +2.
cards.text: [If you're curious to learn the truth about this world... Hehe... I'm more than happy to teach you about it. However, the fee will be steep.]

cards.name: Maid Mother Demon
cards.ability: Turn Start: If the Turn Number is 5 or less, this card gets LIFE +3. A random Academy Follower on your Field gets ATK +1/STA +1. If your Character's LIFE is less than or equal to the enemy Character's LIFE, a random Follower on the enemy Field gets DEF -1/STA -2.
cards.text: [So this is a mansion from the old times. The master is nowhere to be found. All that remains is an abandoned cat.]

cards.name: Knight Mother Demon
cards.ability: Turn Start: If the Turn Number is 5 or less, this card gets LIFE +3. A random Crux Follower on your Field gets ATK +1/STA +1. If your Character's LIFE is less than or equal to the enemy Character's LIFE, a random Follower on your Field gets STA +1 and the enemy Character gets LIFE -1.
cards.text: [How contradictory. These people don't realize that they themselves have been tainted the most and instead pursue the taint they see in others. I wonder how ludicrous it will get... hehe.]

cards.name: GS Agent Mother Demon
cards.ability: Turn Start: If the Turn Number is 5 or less, this card gets LIFE +3. A random Darklore Follower on your Field gets ATK +1/STA +1. If your Character's LIFE is less than or equal to the enemy Character's LIFE, a random Follower on the enemy Field gets STA -1, and a different Follower on the enemy Field gets STA -2.
cards.text: [These are my glorious spoils. However, it seems like it's too tight for me.]

cards.name: Wedding Dress Mother Demon
cards.ability: Turn Start: If the Turn Number is 5 or less, this card gets LIFE +3. The last card in the enemy Deck is sent to the top of the enemy Deck. The following effects are applied depending on the sent card's type. Follower: The sent card gets ATK -1/STA -1. Spell: Your Character gets LIFE +1.
cards.text: [Of course, everything must start with small steps. However, vast ripples will be created across this world. How about it? Would you like to witness the end of the world with me?]

cards.name: Tea Time Sita
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on your Field gets DEF +1. If that Follower belongs to Vita, the following effect is applied twice to that Follower. "ATK +1, DEF +1, or STA +1."
cards.text: [This tea is very bitter... and these snacks are very sweet... Is it supposed to be like making you sick, then giving you medicine?]

cards.name: White Whale Crevasse
cards.ability: Turn Start: If there are no Spells on your Field, a card with the name "White Whale Rush" is created in a random empty Slot on your Field.
cards.text: [Everyone, listen to my song! My song will reach the ends of the sky!]

cards.name: Child Celine
cards.ability: Turn Start: If the ones digit of the Turn Number is 1, the following effects are applied depending on the number of Followers in your Deck with "Student Council" in the name. 0~5: All Followers in the enemy Deck get STA -2. 6 or more: All Followers in your Deck get DEF +1/STA +1. 11 or more: All Spells in your Deck get SIZE -1.
cards.text: [Wow, I like how this smells. It makes me feel relaxed for some reason.]

cards.name: Santa Weekly
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on your Field gets ATK or STA, whichever is lower, increased by half the difference between its ATK and STA (rounding down).
cards.text: [Confiscation! ... is not what this is, but a present instead! You want me to return your confiscated items as a gift? If I do that, they'll just get confiscated again.]

cards.name: Santa Seron
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on your Field gets the following effects depending on its Slot Number. Odd: SIZE -1/STA +1. Even: ATK +1/DEF +1. 1: ATK +1/STA +1.
cards.text: [For the sake of the maids who will go through hardships next year as well as Master Linia, I've put all my heart into preparing a present. Doesn't it make you happy?]

cards.name: Santa Pintail
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on your Field gets ATK +2, DEF +2, or STA +2. If that Follower belongs to Crux, it gets an additional ATK +2 or STA +2. If the Turn Number is a multiple of 3, you get Shuffles=0~2.
cards.text: [I'll definitely do something next year to change the atmosphere of our unit. I want everyone to be happy.]

cards.name: Santa Shion Rion
cards.ability: Turn Start: All Followers on the enemy Field whose Slot Numbers match any cards on your Field get SIZE +1/STA -1. If there are no valid Followers, the enemy Character gets LIFE -1.
cards.text: [I saved this cake just for you. You should be grateful and eat it.] [You... you don't have to be so close to feed me...!]

cards.name: Night Life Cinia
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on the enemy Field gets ATK -1, DEF -1, or STA -1. If there are any Academy cards on your Field, that Follower gets an additional ATK -1/DEF -1/STA -1.
cards.text: [It's nice to get out of the stuffy mansion and take in the night air every now and then.]

cards.name: Nether Driver Charon
cards.ability: Turn Start: A number of Followers on your Field equal to 1 + the tens digit of the number of cards in your Grave get ATK +1/STA +2. If there are at least 20 cards in your Grave, a random card on your Field gets SIZE -1.
cards.text: [What? You never seen a car before? What a hillbilly. How about I take you for a ride? You don't have a ticket? You don't need one for this, so hurry up and get on!]

cards.name: Wafuku Asmis
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on your Field gets SIZE set equal to the number of cards in your Hand. If there are 5 cards in your Hand, that Follower gets its SIZE changed to its original value. That Follower gets ATK/STA increased by the change in SIZE.
cards.text: [Wow, what's happening? Everyone was waiting for me. It puts me in a pinch.]

cards.name: Wafuku Linus
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on your Field gets SIZE set equal to the number of cards in your Hand. If there are 5 cards in your Hand, that Follower gets its SIZE changed to its original value. That Follower gets ATK/STA increased by the change in SIZE.
cards.text: [Haven't you been acting differently lately? Why are you so energetic... Wait, what about your bandage?]

cards.name: Wafuku Rose
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on your Field gets SIZE set equal to the number of cards in your Hand. If there are 5 cards in your Hand, that Follower gets its SIZE changed to its original value. That Follower gets ATK/STA increased by the change in SIZE.
cards.text: [Wearing clothes like these makes me think of old times.]

cards.name: Wafuku Helena
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on your Field gets SIZE set equal to the number of cards in your Hand. If there are 5 cards in your Hand, that Follower gets its SIZE changed to its original value. That Follower gets ATK/STA increased by the change in SIZE.
cards.text: [Let's go to the shrine together tomorrow.]

cards.name: Crux Knight Pace
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on your Field gets STA +2. If the Turn Number is even, the last card in your Deck is sent to the top of your Deck. If this happens, a random Follower on your Field gets ATK increased by half the sent card's SIZE (rounding down, by a maximum of 3).
cards.text: [I... I won't forgive you for this blasphemy. It's a big mistake if you judge us too quickly.]

cards.name: Flinte
cards.ability: Turn Start: If the Turn Number is 5 or less, this card gets LIFE decreased by the Turn Number. The enemy Character gets LIFE decreased by the tens digit of the enemy Character's LIFE. This card gets LIFE increased by half the amount of decreased LIFE (rounding down).
cards.text: [Thank you so much for taking care of me, Miss Treanna... I'll definitely repay your kindness...] [I just hope you can return with your sister.]

cards.name: Sleep Club Flinte
cards.ability: Turn Start: If the Turn Number is 5 or less, this card gets LIFE decreased by the Turn Number. The Follower on your Field with the highest STA gets DEF +1/STA -1 and is deactivated. If that Follower belongs to Vita, it gets an additional ATK +2.
cards.text: [Sister... you're safe... I'm so... relieved...] [She looks so peaceful... It's great that she can be at peace in her dreams.]

cards.name: Lady Flinte
cards.ability: Turn Start: If the Turn Number is 5 or less, this card gets LIFE decreased by the Turn Number. All Followers in the enemy Hand get STA decreased by 4 minus their Slot Numbers.
cards.text: [It's late, and sister hasn't shown up... Did something happen to her? If she were to disappear, I...]

cards.name: Apprentice Nun Flinte
cards.ability: Turn Start: If the Turn Number is 5 or less, this card gets LIFE decreased by the Turn Number. All Followers on your Field get ATK/STA increased by half their Slot Numbers (rounding up).
cards.text: [Welcome. Excuse me, sister, but that glove...] [I've had a burn mark since I was young. I hide it so that people don't think of it as an omen.] [Oh my...]

cards.name: Fugitive Flinte
cards.ability: Turn Start: If the Turn Number is 5 or less, this card gets LIFE decreased by the Turn Number. All Followers on both Fields get STA -1. The following effects are applied depending on the total amount of STA decreased. 1,2: All Followers on your Field get ATK increased by the total amount of STA decreased. 3,4: A random Follower on the enemy Field gets STA decreased by 1 + the total amount of STA decreased. 5 or more: A random Follower on the enemy Field is sent to the Grave.
cards.text: [Stigma... please give me a little more power...]

cards.name: Wedding Dress Flinte
cards.ability: Turn Start: If the Turn Number is 5 or less, this card gets LIFE decreased by the Turn Number. The enemy Character gets LIFE decreased by the tens digit of the enemy Character's LIFE. This card gets LIFE increased by half the amount of decreased LIFE (rounding down).
cards.text: [Sister! What do you think? Have you tried dressing up for today? This is the day that we received the blessing...] [Flinte is dreaming. Nobody knows when this would happen...]

cards.name: Snow Fairy Ipple
cards.ability: Turn Start: If there are any Followers on your Field, a random Follower on either Field is deactivated. If this happens, a random Follower on your Field gets DEF +1/STA +2.
cards.text: [The whole world will be dyed white! Let's all play together!]

cards.name: Silent Night Cinia
cards.ability: Turn Start: If the Turn Number is even, a random Follower on the enemy Field is deactivated. If this happens, that Follower gets ATK -1/STA +1. The first card in your Grave is removed from the game, then a random Academy Follower on your Field gets its STA changed to its original value if it is lower than its original value.
cards.text: [Cinia's performance resonated into the silent night. Everyone was bewitched under the night sky by her violin and beauty.]

cards.name: Alliance Visitor Hanobelle
cards.ability: Turn Start: If there are more Spells than Followers in the enemy Hand, a random Spell in the enemy Hand is sent to the Grave. If there are fewer Spells than Followers in the enemy Hand, a random Spell in the enemy Hand gets SIZE +1. You sense an amazing power. (Hidden effect: If there is a card with the name "2nd Princess Hanobelle" in your Deck and the Turn Number is 1, all Followers in your Deck get ATK +1/STA +1)
cards.text: [What a beautiful city. Seeing all of these cities might even change sister's mind.]

cards.name: PH Asmis
cards.ability: Turn Start: If the Turn Number is 1, all Vita Followers in your Deck get STA +2. If the Turn Number is 2, all Vita Followers in your Deck get ATK +1. If the Turn Number is odd, the last Follower in your Grave is sent to the bottom of your Deck. If the Turn Number is even, you get Shuffles=1.
cards.text: [I feel really warm and nostalgic inside. Look, look, if you close your eyes, you can feel it, too.]

cards.name: PH Linus
cards.ability: Turn Start: If the Turn Number is 1, all Academy Followers in your Deck get STA +2. If the Turn Number is 2, all Academy Followers in your Deck get ATK +1. If the Turn Number is odd, the last Follower in your Grave is sent to the bottom of your Deck. If the Turn Number is even, you get Shuffles=1.
cards.text: [It's different from Muzisitter, but... I like these clothes, too. What do you think? It's like I'm an angel descended from heaven, right?]

cards.name: PH Rose
cards.ability: Turn Start: If the Turn Number is 1, all Crux Followers in your Deck get STA +2. If the Turn Number is 2, all Crux Followers in your Deck get ATK +1. If the Turn Number is odd, the last Follower in your Grave is sent to the bottom of your Deck. If the Turn Number is even, you get Shuffles=1.
cards.text: [I feel like I'm the goddess of this world. Stay by my side until the ends of the earth.]

cards.name: PH Helena
cards.ability: Turn Start: If the Turn Number is 1, all Darklore Followers in your Deck get STA +2. If the Turn Number is 2, all Darklore Followers in your Deck get ATK +1. If the Turn Number is odd, the last Follower in your Grave is sent to the bottom of your Deck. If the Turn Number is even, you get Shuffles=1.
cards.text: [I don't know if I have the right to wear these clothes. Please accept this as atonement for my sins.]

cards.name: PH Isfeldt
cards.ability: Turn Start: If the Turn Number is 1, all Neutral Followers in your Deck get STA +2. If the Turn Number is 2, all Neutral Followers in your Deck get ATK +1. If the Turn Number is odd, the last Follower in your Grave is sent to the bottom of your Deck. If the Turn Number is even, you get Shuffles=1.
cards.text: [Understand? "Cacao" means "food for the gods". This place is our utopia.]

cards.name: Seaside Luthica
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on the enemy Field and adjacent Followers get STA decreased by the Turn Number divided by the number of affected Followers (rounding down, by a maximum of 3). If this happens, a random Follower on your Field gets STA increased by 4 minus the number of affected Followers.
cards.text: [I could never have dreamed of a place like this! I'm learning more and more about the greatness of the sea with Miss Tinia.]

cards.name: Seaside Tinia
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on your Field and adjacent Followers get STA increased by the ones digit of the Turn Number divided by the number of affected Followers (rounding up, by a maximum of 3). If this happens, a random Follower on the enemy Field gets STA decreased by 4 minus the number of affected Followers.
cards.text: [This exploration was fun. I even made memories with a friend from another world. I'll never forget it.]

cards.name: GS Leader Schindler
cards.ability: Turn Start: All cards on your Field with the name "Aletheian F-RIVA" are sent to the Grave. A card with the name "Aletheian F-RIVA" is created in the last empty Slot on your Field.
cards.text: [Whew... I was playing with those twin ladies, and before I knew it, I overexerted myself. It's too bad, those ladies were so cute and spunky, hehe...]

cards.name: Bunny Girl Rio
cards.ability: Turn Start: If the Turn Number and the total SIZE of the enemy Field are both odd or both even, your Character gets LIFE -1 and all Followers in your Hand get STA +1. Otherwise, the enemy Character gets LIFE -3, except on Turn 1.
cards.text: [How about playing a card game with me while you wait?]

cards.name: Liberty Cinia
cards.ability: Turn Start: If your Character's LIFE is greater than the enemy Character's LIFE, a card with the name "Thank You" is created in the first empty Slot of the enemy Hand. If it is lower than the enemy Character's LIFE, a card with the name "Thank You" is created at the bottom of the enemy Deck. A random Follower on your Field gets ATK/STA increased by the number of cards in the enemy Deck with the name "Thank You".
cards.text: [The goddess of liberty is a symbol of everyone's freedom and hope. However, I won't give anyone the freedom to disturb the liberty of others.]

cards.name: Twin Gods Shion Rion
cards.ability: Turn Start: If your Character's LIFE is greater than the enemy Character's LIFE, a card with the name "Thank You" is created in the first empty Slot of the enemy Hand. If it is lower than the enemy Character's LIFE, a card with the name "Thank You" is created at the bottom of the enemy Deck. A random Follower on your Field gets ATK/STA increased by the number of cards in the enemy Deck with the name "Thank You".
cards.text: [I've finally created the earth and sky with my powers. Hehehe.] [Rion, you're acting weird.] [How disrespectful, Shion. Do you plan to oppose me?] [... Fine.]

cards.name: Lady Lesnoa
cards.ability: Turn Start: If the Turn Number is 1 and there are at least 27 Followers in your Deck, all Followers in your Deck get ATK +2/DEF +1/STA +2.
cards.text: [It's nice to go on a walk on holidays when there's a cool breeze. Should I get Master Linia a present before going in?]

cards.name: Linia Pacifica
cards.ability: Turn Start: The first card in your Deck that belongs to a different faction than this card is sent to the top of your Deck. A random Follower on your Field gets ATK +1/STA +1. If the first card in your Deck is a Follower, it gets ATK +1/STA +2.
cards.text: [The Pacifica house's star still shines. My story begins now. When the time is right, you will understand.]

cards.name: Cook Club Temporary Advisor Linia
cards.ability: Turn Start: The first 2 cards in your Deck that belong to a different faction than this card are sent to the top of your Deck. A random Follower on the enemy Field gets its skills changed to "[Return] ▶Defend: This card's original skills are restored.". If the first card in your Deck is a Follower, it gets ATK +1/STA +1.
cards.text: [Huu... It's been a while since I've been around students. I can show you a bit of my skill... You want to try a bite?]

cards.name: Noble Songstress Linia
cards.ability: Turn Start: The first 2 cards in your Deck that belong to a different faction than this card are sent to the top of your Deck. A random Follower on the enemy Field gets STA -2. If the first card in your Deck is a Follower, it gets ATK +1/STA +1.
cards.text: [As time passes, you're still the only one I think of. If only you could hear my song...]

cards.name: Time Shaman Linia
cards.ability: Turn Start: The first 2 cards in your Deck that belong to a different faction than this card are sent to the top of your Deck. A random Follower in your Hand gets ATK +1/DEF +1. If the first card in your Deck is a Follower, it gets ATK +1/STA +1.
cards.text: [Living in the present is more important than the past or future. I won't stand by silently if you try to oppress me using the past.]

cards.name: Night Denizen Linia
cards.ability: Turn Start: The first 2 cards in your Deck that belong to a different faction than this card are sent to the top of your Deck. The last Spell in the enemy Deck is copied to the bottom of your Grave. If the first card in your Deck is a Follower, it gets ATK +1/STA +1.
cards.text: [Sorry, but I can't relax with you right now. Please leave. I want to be alone right now.]

cards.name: Wedding Dress Linia
cards.ability: Turn Start: The first card in your Deck that belongs to a different faction than this card is sent to the top of your Deck. A random Follower on your Field gets ATK +1/STA +1. If the first card in your Deck is a Follower, it gets ATK +1/STA +2.
cards.text: [I just wanted to try wearing it for myself, but... It makes me feel really happy. I would be even happier if Cinia were here with me.]

cards.name: Rabbit and Sita
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on the enemy Field gets ATK/STA decreased by 1 + the tens digit of the sum of its ATK+DEF+STA.
cards.text: [It's tough taking care of a rabbit... but I'll get candy if I work hard at it... and the rabbit is cute...]

cards.name: Rider Undertaker
cards.ability: Turn Start: If the ones digit of the Turn Number is 1, 6 cards with the name "Zombie" are created at the top of your Grave. If the Turn Number is 2 or later, the last Darklore card in your Grave is removed from the game, then a random Follower on your Field gets ATK +1/STA +2. A random Follower on the enemy Field gets DEF -1/STA -1.
cards.text: [This thing is in fashion uptown, so I borrowed one. I feel like rushing off somewhere right now!]

cards.name: Onsen Linia
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on your Field gets its ATK/DEF changed to their original values if they are lower than their original values. If this happens, that Follower gets its original skills restored.
cards.text: [It feels good... I should take this chance to relax here.]

cards.name: Black Dragon Incarnation
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on the enemy Field gets ATK -1/DEF -1. That Follower gets an additional STA -2 if there is a card in your Deck or Grave with the name "Black Dragon Incarnation".
cards.text: [She said it was her year, so she put it on. It looks better than I expected, I like it.]

cards.name: 1st Princess Seneal
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on your Field gets ATK +1/STA +2. If that Follower belongs to Empire, this effect is applied again to a different Follower on your Field (this effect can be applied up to 3 times). If this effect is applied 1 or fewer times, the first Empire Follower in your Grave is sent to the bottom of your Deck.
cards.text: [The information they've gathered will be sufficient. All that remains is to confirm it. I'm looking forward to it.]

cards.name: Child Nanai
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on your Field gets DEF +1. All Followers on your Field get their DEF changed to their original values. If this happens, your Shuffles are set equal to the number of Followers whose DEF changed. This card gets LIFE increased by your Shuffles minus 1 (by a minimum of 0).
cards.text: [Why are you laying in a place like that? You have to be ready for anything. I guess it's too tough for people who don't understand the logic of all creation, though, hehe...]

cards.name: Child Linia
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on the enemy Field gets DEF -1. All Followers on the enemy Field get their DEF changed to their original value. All Followers whose DEF changed get STA -3.
cards.text: [Mommy! Is Rose's little sister in your belly? Rose is going to be an older sister, too?] [That's right, but Linia, since you're going to have two little sisters now, you have to listen to me even better, okay?] [Okay!]

cards.name: Child Pintail
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on your Field gets DEF +1. All Followers on your Field get their DEF changed to their original values. All Followers whose DEF changed get ATK +2/STA +1.
cards.text: [Pintail! You dirtied your clothes again.] [No, that girl came over to fight again, so we were just fighting!] [That's not the point!]

cards.name: Child Luna Flina
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on the enemy Field gets DEF -1. All Followers on the enemy Field get their DEF changed to their original value. The enemy Character gets LIFE decreased by the number of Followers whose DEF changed. If this happens, your Character gets LIFE -1.
cards.text: [It said it was ancient magic, so I didn't expect it to be such a cruel prank... I have to turn things backb efore someone sees...]

cards.name: Child Ophelia
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on the enemy Field gets its first skill removed. If this happens, that Follower gets the following effects depending on the type of the removed skill. "Attack": ATK -1. "Defend": STA -1. "Turn Start": ATK -2/STA -1.
cards.text: [Toad, toad, I'll give you an old house, so give me a new house. I heard that if you say this, Mr. Toad will appear and give you a new house... Mr. Toad must be very kind.]

cards.name: Second Blood Sira
cards.ability: Turn Start: All Followers on your Field with ATK greater than their original values get ATK changed to their original values and get STA increased by the amount of ATK decreased.
cards.text: [Aren't these children so cute? It's been so long since I've been around that it surprised me.]

cards.name: Masquerade Gart
cards.ability: Turn Start: The first Follower on your Field gets SIZE decreased by the number of Vita Followers in your Hand. The first Follower in your Deck gets ATK/STA increased by half the change in SIZE (rounding up).
cards.text: [Hmm... These hosts just invited a bunch of distinguished people from across the continent and called it a masquerade... they have some particular tastes.]

cards.name: Masquerade Nold
cards.ability: Turn Start: The first Follower on your Field gets SIZE decreased by the number of Academy Followers in your Hand. A random Follower in the enemy Hand gets ATK/STA decreased by half the change in SIZE (rounding up).
cards.text: [My, I don't particularly dislike this kind of atmosphere, but... As I expected, it's rather uncomfortable. Is there anywhere suitable to dance? How about one song?]

cards.name: Masquerade Sigma
cards.ability: Turn Start: The first Follower on your Field gets SIZE decreased by the number of Crux Followers in your Hand. A random Follower on your Field gets ATK/STA increased by half the change in SIZE (rounding up).
cards.text: [This is unpleasant... I came because I thought they were up to something, but it's a masquerade... I need to find the hosts now.]

cards.name: Masquerade Anj
cards.ability: Turn Start: The first Follower on your Field gets SIZE decreased by the number of Darklore Followers in your Hand. If this happens, the enemy Character gets LIFE -1. If the change in SIZE was at least 3, your Character gets LIFE +1.
cards.text: [Haha... There are nobles everywhere! How fun, inviting all these VIPs and ending with a masquerade. You over there, I'll give you a special opportunity to serve me.]

cards.name: Vinho Flina
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on your Field gets its original skills restored. If the enemy Character belongs to a different faction than this card, a random Follower on your Field gets ATK +1/STA +2.
cards.text: [I can't show any weakness. In order to become a great leader, I have to show them dignity and power. Then they will accept me.]

cards.name: Transfer Student Vinho Flina
cards.ability: Turn Start: If the Turn Number is even, you get Shuffles +1. If the enemy Character belongs to a different faction than this card, a random Follower on your Field gets ATK +1/STA +2.
cards.text: [I've heard that there is no end to learning, but... they teach a lot of strange things here. Cooking, tennis... sleep? Do you need even need to learn how to sleep? Or does it mean they study while sleeping?]

cards.name: Maid Vinho Flina
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on the enemy Field gets ATK/STA decreased by the number of Academy Followers in your Hand (by a maximum of 3). If the enemy Character belongs to a different faction than this card, a random Follower on your Field gets ATK +1/STA +2.
cards.text: [What are these clothes? I like them, but these clothes are definitely not suitable for me. Bring me different clothes now. Before I clean you up first.]

cards.name: Blue Cross Vinho Flina
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on your Field gets ATK/STA increased by 3 minus the number of skills it possesses. If the enemy Character belongs to a different faction than this card, a random Follower on your Field gets ATK +1/STA +2.
cards.text: [Did those kids think they could control us with their silly meetings? Crux isn't just proud; they're arrogant, too. They'll get what they deserve soon enough.]

cards.name: Apostle Vinho Flina
cards.ability: Turn Start: A card with the name "Apostle D-RA" is created at the bottom of your Deck. If the enemy Character belongs to a different faction than this card, a random Follower on your Field gets ATK +1/STA +2.
cards.text: [To turn away the eyes of Crux, we first have to prepare for them a sudden blaze. A small spark or ember is enough.]

cards.name: Wedding Dress Vinho Flina
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on your Field gets its original skills restored. If the enemy Character belongs to a different faction than this card, a random Follower on your Field gets ATK +1/STA +2.
cards.text: [These clothes are too beautiful. These clothes aren't what I usually like, but... if you request it that much... it's... it's not like I wore it for you! Don't delude yourself!]

cards.name: Cook Club Director Jamie
cards.ability: Turn Start: The first Follower on your Field with "Cook" in the name gets the following effects depending on the Turn Number. Odd: SIZE cut in half (rounding down). Even: First skill is restored.
cards.text: [Will you try some? I made it using ingredients we received as a reward for investigating the mysterious criminal in Royle City.]

cards.name: Mysterious Head Occultist Rika
cards.ability: Turn Start: If there are no Followers on your Field, the first 2 Followers in your Deck with "Occult" in the name are sent to the last empty Slots on your Field. Otherwise, the enemy Character gets LIFE -1.
cards.text: [Welcome to the Occult Society. To commemorate this, I'll personally read your future.]

cards.name: Knight Quartermaster
cards.ability: Turn Start: All Followers on your Field get their skills changed to "[Training] ▶Attack: This card gets ATK +1/STA +1.". Those Followers get ATK/STA increased by the number of original skills if they have "Knight" in the name.
cards.text: [There better not be anyone skipping today... give me the attendance report.] [... 2! or more exemptions.] [What? Exemptions? They're probably hiding in one of the warehouses...]

cards.name: Crescent Kris Flina
cards.ability: Turn Start: The first card in your Hand is sent to the top of your Deck. All Followers on your Field with "Crescent" or "Scardel" in the name get STA increased by the number of empty Slots in your Hand and, if their SIZE is at least 4, get SIZE decreased by half as much (rounding down).
cards.text: [I've definitely been to this underground city before a long time ago, yet it still feels unfamiliar to me... What on earth happened here...]

cards.name: One-Winged Edelfelt
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on your Field is moved to a random empty Slot on your Field. The following effects are applied depending on that card's new Slot Number. Odd: That Follower gets STA changed to its original value if it is lower than its original value. If there was no change, it gets ATK +2. Even: That Follower gets SIZE -1. If there was no change, you get Shuffles=1.
cards.text: [I thought it was just a ridiculous myth... This gate still possesses possibilities.]

cards.name: 4th Princess Aine
cards.ability: Turn Start: If the Turn Number is odd, all Followers in odd Slots on your Field get ATK +2/STA +2 and all Followers in even Slots on your Field get ATK -2/STA -2. If the Turn Number is even, all Followers in even Slots on your Field get ATK +2/STA +2 and all Followers in odd Slots on your Field get ATK -2/STA -2.
cards.text: [This is my final form!] [No way!?] [What's that? Of course I have an ultimate attack! It's called the White Strike!] [... tacky.]

cards.name: Dreamy Cinia
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on the enemy Field gets ATK -1/STA -1. If the Turn Number is odd, a random Follower in the enemy Deck gets ATK -1/STA -1. If the Turn Number is even, a random Follower on the enemy Hand gets ATK -1/STA -1.
cards.text: [Good heavens, just look at the time!]

cards.name: Dreamy Iri
cards.ability: Turn Start: All Followers on the enemy Field with the skill "[Refresh!] ▶Turn Start: This card's original skills are restored." get ATK -1/STA -1 and get their skills removed.
cards.text: [I always dream of the same place, desperately searching for someone. Every time, as I catch a glimpse of that person's back, I wake up.] [Just a little more... just a little more...]

cards.name: Onsen Shion Rion
cards.ability: Turn Start: A card with the name "Shion Flina" or "Rion Flina" is created at the top of your Grave and at the top of the enemy Grave. The enemy Character gets LIFE decreased by the tens digit of the number of cards in the enemy Grave. All Followers in your Hand with "Shion" or "Rion" in the name get ATK/STA increased by the tens digit of the total number of cards in both Graves with "Shion Flina" or "Rion Flina" in the name.
cards.text: [My tiredness disappeared. Is this a magic spring!?] [It's not magic, it's a hot spring.]

cards.name: Midsummer Sita
cards.ability: Turn Start: If there are at least 25 total Vita cards in your Deck, Hand, Field, and Grave, the following effects are applied depending on the situation. Turn 1: All Followers in the enemy Deck get STA -2. Turn 2 or later: A random Follower on the enemy Field gets STA -2. Your Character's LIFE is 10 or less: All Followers in the enemy Field and Hand get STA -2.
cards.text: [This cool shade makes me sleepy... Maybe I can take a nap? I have to wake up in time to eat watermelon...]

cards.name: Midsummer Cinia
cards.ability: Turn Start: If there are at least 25 total Academy cards in your Deck, Hand, Field, and Grave, the following effects are applied depending on the situation. Turn 1: All Spells in the enemy Deck get SIZE +1. Turn 2 or later: 2 random Followers on the enemy Field get ATK -1/STA -1. Your Character's LIFE is 10 or less: All cards in your Field and Hand get SIZE -1.
cards.text: [The breeze is cool and the waves are refreshing... This is a nice vacation spot.]

cards.name: Midsummer Luthica
cards.ability: Turn Start: If there are at least 25 total Crux cards in your Deck, Hand, Field, and Grave, the following effects are applied depending on the situation. Turn 1: All Followers in your Deck get ATK +1/STA +1. Turn 2 or later: A random Follower on your Field gets ATK +1/DEF +1/STA +1. Your Character's LIFE is 10 or less: All Followers in your Field and Hand get ATK +2/STA +2.
cards.text: [I always enjoy coming to the beach. I hope I can come with Jaina next time.]

cards.name: Midsummer Iri
cards.ability: Turn Start: If there are at least 25 total Darklore cards in your Deck, Hand, Field, and Grave, the following effects are applied depending on the situation. Turn 1: All Followers in the enemy Deck get STA -1 and all Followers in your Deck get STA +1. Turn 2 or later: A random Follower on the enemy Field gets STA -1 and a random Follower in your Hand gets STA +2. Your Character's LIFE is 10 or less: The enemy Character gets LIFE -2 and your Character gets LIFE +1.
cards.text: [So this is summer.]

cards.name: Midsummer Asmis
cards.ability: Turn Start: If there are at least 25 total Vita cards in your Deck, Hand, Field, and Grave, the following effects are applied depending on the situation. Turn 1: All Spells in your Deck get SIZE -1. Turn 2 or later: A random card in your Hand gets SIZE -1. Your Character's LIFE is 10 or less: All Followers in the enemy Field and Hand get SIZE +1.
cards.text: [If you put them here, then you don't need a refrigerator! This is nature sense.]

cards.name: Midsummer Linus
cards.ability: Turn Start: If there are at least 25 total Academy cards in your Deck, Hand, Field, and Grave, the following effects are applied depending on the situation. Turn 1: All Followers in the enemy Deck get ATK -1. Turn 2 or later: A random Follower in the enemy Hand gets ATK -2. Your Character's LIFE is 10 or less: All Followers in the enemy Field and Hand get ATK -2.
cards.text: [Dipping your feet into a cool stream and eating watermelon. Is there anything I'm missing?]

cards.name: Midsummer Rose
cards.ability: Turn Start: If there are at least 25 total Crux cards in your Deck, Hand, Field, and Grave, the following effects are applied depending on the situation. Turn 1: All Followers in the enemy Deck get DEF -1/STA -1. Turn 2 or later: 2 random Followers on your Field get DEF +1/STA +1. Your Character's LIFE is 10 or less: All Followers in your Field and Hand get ATK +1/DEF +1/STA +1.
cards.text: [Isn't it hot over there? Why don't you come here and have some of this with me?]

cards.name: Midsummer Helena
cards.ability: Turn Start: If there are at least 25 total Darklore cards in your Deck, Hand, Field, and Grave, the following effects are applied depending on the situation. Turn 1: 7 cards with the name "Aletheian F-RIVA" are created in your Grave. Turn 2 or later: 2 random Followers on your Field get ATK/STA increased by the tens digit of the number of cards in your Grave. Your Character's LIFE is 10 or less: A random Follower in your Hand gets ATK/STA increased by the tens digit of the number of cards in your Grave.
cards.text: [The heat is fading.]

cards.name: Yuzu in Wonderland
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on your Field gets the following effects depending on the SIZES present in your Hand. ●SIZE 1: SIZE -1. ●SIZE 2~3: ATK +1/STA +1. ●SIZE 4~5: STA +1. ●SIZE 6 or higher: DEF +1.
cards.text: [Who could it be? Could it be the person who prepared this vacation for me? ... The person who interrupted my work?]

cards.name: 6th Witness Kana. LTD
cards.ability: Turn Start: The card in your Hand with the highest SIZE gets SIZE=2~3.
cards.text: [Do you think you can vanish by remaining still? Of course, I thought of that, too.]

cards.name: Bunny Lady
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on your Field gets STA +1.
cards.text: [The Wind Clan hates meaningless fights.]

cards.name: Wind Shear
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on your Field gets STA +1.
cards.text: [Feel the wind. Concentrate on the petals fluttering in the gentle breeze.]

cards.name: Winged Seeker
cards.ability: Turn Start: Followers on the enemy Field whose Slot number and SIZE are either both odd or both even get ATK -1/STA -1.
cards.text: [How strange. This place contracts all previous theories and thinkers.]

cards.name: Enchantress
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on your Field gets ATK +1.
cards.text: [The Myo Clan has decided to stop cooperating with the Flinas! Everything you say is wrong!]

cards.name: Trickster
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on your Field gets ATK +1.
cards.text: [What's wrong? If you feel something is off about this room, you're already too late.]

cards.name: Myo Observer
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on your Field gets ATK +1.
cards.text: [There, focus, look more closely at the details. The truth can't be seen with just a glance.]

cards.name: Bunny Lady X
cards.ability: Turn Start: All Followers on your Field get STA +1.
cards.text: [The Wind Clan hates meaningless fights.]

cards.name: Wind Shear X
cards.ability: Turn Start: All Followers on your Field get STA +1.
cards.text: [Feel the wind. Concentrate on the petals fluttering in the gentle breeze.]

cards.name: Wind Breaker
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on the enemy Field gets STA -2.
cards.text: [Chaos! Destruction! I will destroy everything!]

cards.name: Wind Sneaker
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random card in your Hand gets SIZE -1.
cards.text: [Faster and lighter than the wind! I accept our family's speed!]

cards.name: Wind Forestier
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on the enemy Field gets STA decreased by half the Turn Number (rounding down).
cards.text: [I am as fast as the wind, as orderly as the forest, as passionate as fire, and as tough as the mountain. Remember this!]

cards.name: Enchantress X
cards.ability: Turn Start: All Followers on your Field get ATK +1.
cards.text: [The Myo Clan has decided to stop cooperating with the Flinas! Everything you say is wrong!]

cards.name: Trickster X
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on your Field gets SIZE -2.
cards.text: [What's wrong? If you feel something is off about this room, you're already too late.]

cards.name: Myo Observer X
cards.ability: Turn Start: All Followers on your Field get ATK +1.
cards.text: [There, focus, look more closely at the details. The truth can't be seen with just a glance.]

cards.name: Wind Breaker X
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on the enemy Field gets STA -2, then a random Follower on the enemy Field gets STA -1.
cards.text: [Chaos! Destruction! I will destroy everything!]

cards.name: Wind Sneaker X
cards.ability: Turn Start: 2 random cards in your Hand get SIZE -1.
cards.text: [Faster and lighter than the wind! I accept our family's speed!]

cards.name: Wind Forestier X
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on the enemy Field gets ATK/STA decreased by half the Turn Number (rounding down).
cards.text: [I am as fast as the wind, as orderly as the forest, as passionate as fire, and as tough as the mountain. Remember this!]

cards.name: Mirror Sita
cards.ability: Turn Start: Followers in Slots 1, 2, and 3 of the enemy Field get STA -1. If the enemy Character is an NPC, an additional effect is applied. (Hidden effect: The enemy Character gets LIFE -1)
cards.text: [It's just like the reflection off a mirror, but something is different. It speaks in the same voice, but it gives off the ill air of someone mimicking someone else. -Esprit's memo...]

cards.name: Mirror Cinia
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on the enemy Field gets ATK -1/STA -1. If the enemy Character is an NPC, an additional effect is applied. (Hidden effect: The enemy Character gets LIFE -1)
cards.text: [It's just like the reflection off a mirror, but something is different. It speaks in the same voice, but it gives off the ill air of someone mimicking someone else. -Esprit's memo...]

cards.name: Mirror Luthica
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Crux Follower on your Field gets ATK +1/STA +1. If the enemy Character is an NPC, an additional effect is applied. (Hidden effect: The enemy Character gets LIFE -1)
cards.text: [It's just like the reflection off a mirror, but something is different. It speaks in the same voice, but it gives off the ill air of someone mimicking someone else. -Esprit's memo...]

cards.name: Mirror Iri
cards.ability: Turn Start: If the total SIZE of your Field is greater than the total SIZE of the enemy Field, the enemy Character gets LIFE -1. If the enemy Character is an NPC, an additional effect is applied. (Hidden effect: The enemy Character gets LIFE -1)
cards.text: [It's just like the reflection off a mirror, but something is different. It speaks in the same voice, but it gives off the ill air of someone mimicking someone else. -Esprit's memo...]

cards.name: Wind Gambler
cards.ability: Turn Start: If your Character's LIFE is odd, you get LIFE -1. If it is even, you get LIFE +2.
cards.text: [This is a simple game. You just need to guess if the dice lands on odd or even. Easy, right?]

cards.name: Wind Girl
cards.ability: Turn Start: Your Character gets LIFE +1.
cards.text: [You have to eat and grow up properly!]

cards.name: Night Witch Nytitch
cards.ability: Turn Start: Your Character gets LIFE -1 and the enemy Character gets LIFE -2.
cards.text: [Everyone receives the same amount of time. The night is fair. Won't you spend some time with me? It's lonely to play by myself.]

cards.name: Night Witch Laetitia
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Spell in the enemy Hand gets SIZE +2.
cards.text: [I don't understand this book no matter how much I read it. I don't know if I'm stupid or if this book is stupid.]

cards.name: N. Witch Magy Shen
cards.ability: Turn Start: 2 random Darklore Followers on your Field get ATK +1/STA +1.
cards.text: [I really don't know. No matter how much I try to read our destiny, I can't see it. This is unsettling. What will happen tomorrow...]

cards.name: Night Witch Seriot
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Spell in the enemy Hand is sent to the Grave.
cards.text: [I'm the fastest on the highway of the night. Even the magical Hairpin Course can't block my drift.]

cards.name: Succubus Cantabile
cards.ability: Turn Start: 2 random Followers on the enemy Field get DEF -1.
cards.text: [Like a song, I will give you joy in your dreams. You don't need to pay me for anything. I already get a lot from your dreams.]

cards.name: Nytitch X
cards.ability: Turn Start: Your Character gets LIFE +1 and the enemy Character gets LIFE -1.
cards.text: [Everyone receives the same amount of time. The night is fair. Won't you spend some time with me? It's lonely to play by myself.]

cards.name: Laetitia Ful X
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Spell in the enemy Hand is sent to the enemy Field and deactivated.
cards.text: [I don't understand this book no matter how much I read it. I don't know if I'm stupid or if this book is stupid.]

cards.name: Magy Shen X
cards.ability: Turn Start: 2 random Darklore Followers on your Field get ATK +1/DEF +1/STA +1.
cards.text: [I really don't know. No matter how much I try to read our destiny, I can't see it. This is unsettling. What will happen tomorrow...]

cards.name: Seriot X
cards.ability: Turn Start: All Spells in the enemy Hand are sent to the Grave.
cards.text: [I'm the fastest on the highway of the night. Even the magical Hairpin Course can't block my drift.]

cards.name: R. Cantabile
cards.ability: Turn Start: 2 random Followers on the enemy Field get DEF -2.
cards.text: [Like a song, I will give you joy in your dreams. You don't need to pay me for anything. I already get a lot from your dreams.]

cards.name: Trickster Sion
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Spell in your Grave is sent to the bottom of your Deck. A Follower called "Scardel Shion Flina" is placed in the first empty Slot of your Field and gets SIZE -2.
cards.text: [It's not unreasonable that Rion likes you. I'm interested in people like you, too. Do you want to serve me tonight? Don't you think the chance to serve me is enough of a reward in itself?]

cards.name: Trickster Rion
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Spell in your Grave is sent to the bottom of your Deck. A Follower called "Scardel Rion Flina" is placed in the first empty Slot of your Field and gets SIZE -2.
cards.text: [How is it? Isn't it interesting? I wanted to show Shion something fun, but unfortunately, I don't have enough materials. Ah, of course! You! Won't you be our plaything?]

cards.name: Mirror Vernika
cards.ability: Turn Start: The first Follower on the enemy Field with the highest DEF gets DEF =0.
cards.text: [Who is it? The brats that played this horrible joke?] [Oh my~ how scary. This is the amusement park that we built ourselves. It's fun for us if you're already like this~]

cards.name: Mirror Rose
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on the enemy Field gets ATK/STA decreased by half of the difference between its SIZE and DEF (rounding up).
cards.text: [I don't have any plan to play with you kids. Why don't you accept my proposal? Stop this now. Rio is already suffering.] [Rio? Who's that? Ah~ the lady with the huge chest?]

cards.name: Shadow Nold
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random card in your Field gets SIZE -1 (to a minimum of 1).
cards.text: [We secretly showed that lady this mirror, but we never thought she'd get so depressed~] [This is a mirror that shows the past? Tch... This is a pointless trick.]

cards.name: Shadow Cannelle
cards.ability: Turn Start: Followers on your Field with the lowest SIZE get ATK/STA increased by the difference between the lowest SIZE in your Field and the highest SIZE in the enemy Field.
cards.text: [Sister Sage, what do you do for fun? I think your preferences must be the same as a little girl since you have short hair and glasses~] [.. It looks like I'll have to do more than just stop you.]

cards.name: Shadow Gart
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on the enemy Field that does not belong to this Character's faction gets ATK -2/DEF -2/STA -2.
cards.text: [Do you know how girls like you turn out when you're older?] [We're already 200.] [Sorry...]

cards.name: Shadow Ginger
cards.ability: Turn Start: Followers on your Field with a SIZE greater than or equal to the number of cards on your Field get ATK +1/STA +1.
cards.text: [You little brats! Stay right there! I'm coming to beat you two up!] [Bo~ring~] [Don't you have something more creative, sister Sage? It's so~~~~~oo stale. You have to come up with a more creative joke!]

cards.name: Shadow Laevateinn
cards.ability: Turn Start: If there are 2 cards in your Hand with the same SIZE, your Character gets LIFE increased by half of their SIZE (rounding up).
cards.text: [The game is over. You're going to pay for your sins now.] [Ahhhh..!! Sister Sage is scary...] [My name is Esprit...]

cards.name: Wind Gambler X
cards.ability: Turn Start: If your Character's LIFE is odd, you get LIFE -1. If it is even, you get LIFE +3.
cards.text: [This is a simple game. You just need to guess if the dice lands on odd or even. Easy, right?]

cards.name: Wind Girl X
cards.ability: Turn Start: Your Character gets LIFE +2.
cards.text: [You have to eat and grow up properly!]

cards.name: Drill Sgt. Pippin
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on your Field gets ATK +2/STA +1.
cards.text: [The start is always the most important part! It's forbidden to relax just because it's the beginning!]

cards.name: Drill Sgt. Rena
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on your Field gets ATK +1/STA +2.
cards.text: [It's not difficult. I am just telling you how to protect people.]

cards.name: New Medic Lina
cards.ability: Turn Start: 2 random Followers on your Field get STA increased by the number of empty Slots in the enemy Hand.
cards.text: [Everyone is like this. You will fail at first, but you will learn from it.]

cards.name: Clerk Cecilia
cards.ability: Turn Start: 2 random Followers on the enemy Field get ATK -1.
cards.text: [You should mind your manners in an official position. Even the most trivial comments will be recorded.]

cards.name: Kenjutsu Karen
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on the enemy Field gets STA decreased by the SIZE of the first Follower on your Field.
cards.text: [All warriors want a good weapon. It seems like Sergeant Pintail doesn't know that she's in a slump.]

cards.name: Strategist Elly
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower in the enemy Hand is sent to the bottom of your Deck.
cards.text: [The fighting power of Crux is concentrated in the knights. It wouldn't be a good choice to divide the military in a situation like this.]

cards.name: Sr. Knight Marian
cards.ability: Turn Start: A number of random Followers on the enemy Field equal to half the number of cards in the enemy Hand belonging to a different faction than the enemy Character (rounding up) are sent to the Grave.
cards.text: [Attention! 100 laps around the training grounds now! Anyone dissatisfied must defeat me before getting the right to speak out!]

cards.name: Drillmaster Pippin
cards.ability: Turn Start: 2 random Followers on your Field get ATK +2/STA +1.
cards.text: [The start is always the most important part! It's forbidden to relax just because it's the beginning!]

cards.name: Drillmaster Rena
cards.ability: Turn Start: 2 random Followers on your Field get ATK +1/STA +2.
cards.text: [Nothing is difficult. I am just telling you how to protect people.]

cards.name: Medic Lina
cards.ability: Turn Start: All Followers on your Field get STA increased by the number of cards in your Hand.
cards.text: [Everyone is like this. You will fail at first, but you will learn from it.]

cards.name: Head Clerk Cecilia
cards.ability: Turn Start: 2 random Followers on the enemy Field get SIZE +1/ATK -1.
cards.text: [You should mind your manners in an official position. Even the most trivial comments will be recorded.]

cards.name: Swordmaster Karen
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on the enemy Field gets STA decreased by the ATK of the first Follower on your Field.
cards.text: [All warriors want a good weapon. It seems like Sergeant Pintail doesn't know that she's in a slump.]

cards.name: Warmaster Elly
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower in the enemy Hand is sent to the first empty Slot of the enemy Field, gets ATK -1/STA -1, and is deactivated.
cards.text: [The fighting power of Crux is concentrated in the knights. It wouldn't be a good choice to divide the military in a situation like this.]

cards.name: General Marian
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower is sent from your Deck to the first empty Slot of your Field and gets ATK +1/DEF +1/STA +1.
cards.text: [Attention! 100 laps around the training grounds now! Anyone dissatisfied must defeat me before getting the right to speak out!]

cards.name: New Knight
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on the enemy Field gets ATK -1/STA -1.
cards.text: [Resting is also an extension of our duties. It's important to do our best in everything, isn't it? Senpai.]

cards.name: Chief Maid
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on your Field gets ATK +2.
cards.text: [As I thought, I needed a break. I need more vacation days in the future.]

cards.name: Frett
cards.ability: Turn Start: All Followers on your Field with a SIZE of 3 get ATK +1/STA +1.
cards.text: [How about bamboo as a material for a new flagpole? If it's processed well, it will be lighter and stronger.]

cards.name: Mop Maid
cards.ability: Turn Start: All Followers on your Field with a neighboring Follower get ATK +2.
cards.text: [I need materials for a new mop. Right now, the equipment is too heavy. It needs to be lighter...]

cards.name: Layna Scentriver
cards.ability: Turn Start: All Followers on your Field get STA increased by the number of cards in your Hand.
cards.text: [Are you surprised because I'm different than normal? I need a place to ease my mind, too.]

cards.name: Accident Maid
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on your Field or the enemy Field gets STA -3 (50% chance).
cards.text: [I broke a teacup today, too. Master Linia always laughs about it, but it makes me nervous.]

cards.name: Kitchen Maid
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on your Field gets SIZE +1/ATK +1/DEF +1/STA +2.
cards.text: [Master Linia doesn't really care about what she eats. Even so, that attitude makes us work even harder.]

cards.name: Cleaning Maid
cards.ability: Turn Start: The first card in the enemy Hand is sent to the first empty Slot of your Field or the enemy Field (50% chance).
cards.text: [Master Linia scolds us if we don't clean something. However, she gets even madder if we touch her things. Sometimes I don't even know what I should do.]

cards.name: Tea Time Maid
cards.ability: Turn Start: Either your Character gets LIFE -1 or the enemy Character gets LIFE -2 (50% chance).
cards.text: [Is something wrong? We should at least be able to drink tea during our break time, right?]

cards.name: Linia's Head Maid
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random card from either your Field or the enemy Field is sent to the bottom of the owner's Deck (50% chance).
cards.text: [The most important thing here is to not make Master Linia angry.]

cards.name: Disaster Maid
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on your Field or the enemy Field gets STA -5 (50% chance).
cards.text: [I broke a teacup today, too. Master Linia called me out separately, and I...]

cards.name: Gourmet Maid
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on your Field gets ATK +1/DEF +1/STA +2.
cards.text: [Usually, it's just the maids that eat what we make. Sometimes Master Linia comes to have something, and it makes me happy to receive her awkward compliments.]

cards.name: Head Cleaning Maid
cards.ability: Turn Start: The first 2 cards in the enemy Hand are sent to the first empty Slots of your Field or the enemy Field (50% chance).
cards.text: [I understand now. I just have to make it look like I didn't touch anything when I clean.]

cards.name: Tea Maid
cards.ability: Turn Start: Either your Character gets LIFE -1 or the enemy Character gets LIFE -3 (50% chance).
cards.text: [Sorry... This is Master Linia's...]

cards.name: Head Maid Lise
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random card on your Field or the enemy Field is destroyed.
cards.text: [W, who touched Master Linia's teacup?]

cards.name: R. Chief Maid
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on your Field gets ATK +3.
cards.text: [Linia's maids are all so carefree. I would like to be sent there, too.]

cards.name: R. Mop Maid
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on your Field gets ATK +2/STA +2.
cards.text: [But wiping that place by hand... is scary...]

cards.name: Scardel Merlot
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on the enemy Field gets STA -2.
cards.text: [We won't lose our land!]

cards.name: Scardel Chardonnay
cards.ability: Turn Start: Your Character gets LIFE +2.
cards.text: [I won't let you pass!]

cards.name: Scardel Sangiovese
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random card in your Hand gets SIZE -1.
cards.text: [You must leave. We can't easily abandon a place we've grown so fond of.]

cards.name: Scardel Viognier
cards.ability: Turn Start: 2 random Followers on the enemy Field get DEF -1.
cards.text: [Crux's power was greater than expected. Regardless, no matter what they do, it will be difficult to steal from us.]

cards.name: Scardel Shiraz
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Spell in the enemy Hand gets SIZE +2.
cards.text: [There is nothing to do but to fight in order to protect ourselves.]

cards.name: Scardel Pinot Noir
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on the enemy Field gets STA decreased by the SIZE of the first Follower on your Field.
cards.text: [I'm taking a break. Why don't you rest for a bit? This is the blood from a Crux human I just fought.]

cards.name: Moonlight Vampire
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on the enemy Field gets ATK/STA decreased by half of the difference between its SIZE and DEF (rounding up).
cards.text: [See this... The world of the night is filled with the corrupted.]

cards.name: R. Merlot
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on the enemy Field gets STA -2, then a random Follower on the enemy Field gets STA -1.
cards.text: [Step back! Your goddess cannot step into the night.]

cards.name: R. Chardonnay
cards.ability: Turn Start: Your Character gets LIFE +1 and the enemy Character gets LIFE -1.
cards.text: [Your goddess cannot pass here. Your light is too bright, so disappear.]

cards.name: R. Sangiovese
cards.ability: Turn Start: 2 random cards in your Hand get SIZE -1.
cards.text: [The Crux knights are here! I'm leaving!]

cards.name: R. Viognier
cards.ability: Turn Start: 2 random Followers on the enemy Field get SIZE +1/ATK -1.
cards.text: [We're going to lose. I'm leaving.]

cards.name: R. Shiraz
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower in the enemy Hand is sent to the bottom of your Deck.
cards.text: [I will fight until the end. If you're going to leave, then leave now.]

cards.name: R. Pinot Noir
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on the enemy Field gets STA decreased by the ATK of the first Follower on your Field.
cards.text: [I will not move until I have taken the blood from every one of you. This is our land.]

cards.name: R. Moonlight Vamp.
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on the enemy Field gets ATK/STA decreased by half the Turn Number (rounding down).
cards.text: [See... Our thirst will be quenched by the blood of the corrupted.]

cards.name: Child Panica
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on your Field gets STA +3. If the Turn Number is even, that Follower also gets ATK +1.
cards.text: [Who are you? I like people who give me yummy bamboo. Give it to me. I'll go with you if you give me bamboo.]

cards.name: Child Ginger
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on your Field gets ATK +2, and then is sent to the top of your Deck. If this happens, a random Follower on your Field gets ATK +2.
cards.text: [Climax... I still don't understand. Do you get it?]

cards.name: Child Nold
cards.ability: Turn Start: If the Turn Number and number of cards in your Hand are both odd or both even, a random Follower on your Field with a SIZE of at least 2 gets SIZE -2 (to a minimum of 1).
cards.text: [I like the people of this Royle Kingdom. I like the children of this country's future. I will protect them.]

cards.name: Child Cannelle
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower in the enemy Hand gets SIZE =1/ATK =5/DEF = 0/STA =5.
cards.text: [Stronger, more dignified. I need the power to rule. To become the leader of the Wind Clan.]

cards.name: Child Vernika
cards.ability: Turn Start: The first card in your Hand is sent to the bottom of your Deck. If this happens, the first Follower on the enemy Field with the highest STA gets DEF decreased by half of the sent card's SIZE (by a maximum of 3, rounding up).
cards.text: [The world of books is mysterious. The things in the world - how much more mysterious is the real world?]

cards.name: Child Jaina
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on the enemy Field gets ATK -1 and a random Follower on your Field gets ATK +2 .
cards.text: [I don't really know the future. But I want to become a cool person. Like that girl over there?]

cards.name: Child Rose
cards.ability: Turn Start: The first Academy Spell in your Hand with a SIZE less than or equal to the difference between 9 and your Field SIZE is sent to the first empty Slot in your Field. If this happens, a random Follower on the enemy Field gets ATK/STA decreased by the sent card's SIZE.
cards.text: [I have one, I have one. I have a sister now. Her name is Cinia. I want to see her now. I want to become a good sister for her.]

cards.name: Defender
cards.ability: Turn Start: Your Character gets LIFE -1. If this happens, a random Follower on your Field gains gets ATK +2/DEF +2/STA +2.
cards.text: [You came all the way here... You have a strong will. How was it? Was it hard? You can rest... It's alright.]

cards.name: Child Gart
cards.ability: Turn Start: If there are no Academy cards in your Hand and Field, a random Follower on your Field gets ATK +2/STA +1.
cards.text: [Th... That Nold. She likes humans more than playing with me? All humans are boring! Hmph! Idiot!]

cards.name: Child Laevateinn
cards.ability: Turn Start: If there are at least 2 cards in your Hand with the same SIZE, those cards are sent to the bottom of your Deck. Your Character gets LIFE increased by half of the SIZE of the sent cards (by a maximum of 4, rounding up).
cards.text: [I tempt humans, but I also rely on them to live. Humans... what are they?]

cards.name: Child Sigma
cards.ability: Turn Start: The first card in your Hand is sent to the bottom of your Deck. A random Follower on your Field gets ATK/STA increased by half of the sent card's SIZE (by a maximum of 4, rounding down).
cards.text: [Hm? Alcohol? Ew! Humans drink that? It's weird.]

cards.name: Embracing Shaman
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on your Field gains gets ATK +2/DEF +2/STA +2.
cards.text: [This is the world where humans and non-humans live together. That kind of division is unnecessary here. What are you looking for?]

cards.name: Sleep Club Advisor
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on your Field is deactivated and gets ATK +1/STA +1.
cards.text: [I end up waking up every day and I have to stay alive by breathing and I'm used to always waking up by myself and breathing to live and I don't remember anymore.]

cards.name: Angry Lady
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on the enemy Field gets ATK/STA decreased by its DEF.
cards.text: [Who's the student who beat Seven?]

cards.name: Geography Teacher
cards.ability: Turn Start: The enemy card in Slot 3 is sent to the Grave.
cards.text: [I take the road less traveled! It's my stage!]

cards.name: Cook Club Advisor
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on your Field gets SIZE +1/ATK +1/DEF +1/STA +2.
cards.text: [The most important thing when cooking is your heart. Don't forget that.]

cards.name: Health Teacher
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on your Field gets STA +4.
cards.text: [You have to protect your health~ So concentrate and listen in my class.]

cards.name: Night Teacher
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on the enemy Field is moved to the next empty Slot on the enemy Field and gets STA decreased by its new Slot number. (If it is in Slot 5, it is moved to Slot 1.)
cards.text: [She volunteered because she wanted something to do during her sleepless nights. The night is long.]

cards.name: Lady Philia
cards.ability: Turn Start: The following effect is applied twice: "A random Follower on the enemy Field gets ATK/STA decreased by its DEF."
cards.text: [I heard from Seven. You're supposed to be amazing? We'll see about that!]

cards.name: Hannah Pathfinder
cards.ability: Turn Start: The enemy card in Slot 2 is sent to the Grave.
cards.text: [I never look back, so please watch my back.]

cards.name: Anyte Einoth
cards.ability: Turn Start: 2 random Followers on your Field get SIZE +1/ATK +1/DEF +1/STA +2.
cards.text: [After eating, cleaning up is also part of cooking! Clean up before leaving!]

cards.name: Teacher Riano
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on your Field gets STA +4, then a random Follower on your Field gets STA +4.
cards.text: [To live properly, you should always be prepared to handle anything that might happen to your bodies. As they say, it's better safe than sorry <3]

cards.name: Rui Flett
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on your Field is deactivated and gets ATK +3/STA +3.
cards.text: [If I could only have that feeling of losing so much time after closing my eyes for a moment, I would cheer.]

cards.name: Night Teacher Rui
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on the enemy Field is moved to the next empty Slot on the enemy Field and gets ATK/STA decreased by its new Slot number.
cards.text: [Unlike teaching during the day, this work doesn't require me to care about other people. The principal knows me well.]

cards.name: Sita Vilosa
cards.ability: Turn Start: Followers on the enemy Field in Slots 2, 3, and 4 get STA -2, and a random Follower on the enemy Field gets STA -2.
cards.text: [I will protect you, Vernika. Don't leave my side, Vernika.] [She spoke, but there was no response. It was a phenomenon of the closed picturesque world. -DTD]

cards.name: Cinia Pacifica
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on the enemy Field gets ATK -2/STA -2 if it has 0 or less DEF. Otherwise, it gets DEF -1/STA -2.
cards.text: [I hate it. I can't trust anyone.] [Defense mechanisms were installed to elimnate trespassers. She couldn't speak, but she saw me and attacked. -DTD]

cards.name: Luthica Preventer
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on your Field gets ATK +2/STA +2 if it has at least 1 DEF. Otherwise, it gets DEF +1/STA +2.
cards.text: [I was betrayed...] [They weren't connected to the original world. These girls were just mirrored and fragmented existences. -DTD]

cards.name: Iri Flina
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on the enemy Field gets STA -5 if it has at least 10 STA. Otherwise, it gets ATK -1/DEF -1/STA -2.
cards.text: [Vernika... Come back.] [I wasn't able to confirm any special link. I decided to begin destroying everything. -DTD]

cards.name: Treanna
cards.ability: Turn Start: All Followers on the enemy Field lose their skills.
cards.text: [What is this thing... -DTD]

cards.name: Panica
cards.ability: Turn Start: If the Turn Number is odd, a random Follower on the enemy Field's ATK/STA are halved (rounding up).
cards.text: [Is this the result of the chaos phenomenon in the picturesque world? -DTD]

cards.name: Sigma
cards.ability: Turn Start: The first card in your Hand is sent to the bottom of the Deck. A random Follower on your Field gets ATK/STA increased by the sent card's SIZE (by a maximum of 5).
cards.text: [I was stunned to see existences like these. -DTD]

cards.name: Aka Flina
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on your Field gets ATK/STA increased by half the difference between your Character's LIFE and the enemy Character's LIFE (rounding up, by a maximum of 5).
cards.text: [... I don't even know what to say. -DTD]

cards.name: 3rd Witness DTD
cards.ability: Turn Start: All cards on the enemy Field are sent to the bottom of the enemy Deck.
cards.text: [This is a warning. According to the guidelines that we, the space time police, have set, this world must be destroyed.]

cards.name: World Destroyer DTD
cards.ability: Turn Start: All cards in the enemy Hand/Field are sent to the bottom of the enemy Deck. A random Follower on your Field gets ATK/STA increased by the number of sent cards.
cards.text: [This world is melancholic. It would be nice if no harm came to the world's creator, but there's no other way.]

cards.name: Winged Seeker
cards.ability: Turn Start: Followers on the enemy Field whose Slot number and SIZE are either both odd or both even get ATK -1/STA -1.
cards.text: [How dull... Nothing is happening, so this place is boring, too.]

cards.name: Nytitch
cards.ability: Turn Start: Your Character gets LIFE -1 and the enemy Character gets LIFE -2.
cards.text: [It's the SUN! It's SUMMER! It's the SEA!]

cards.name: Strategist Elly
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower in the enemy Hand is sent to the bottom of your Deck.
cards.text: [When I see the sea, I get a fresh feeling in my heart.]

cards.name: Head Cleaning Maid
cards.ability: Turn Start: The first 2 cards in the enemy Hand are moved to the first empty Slots of your Field or the enemy Field (50% chance).
cards.text: [Everyone has those times when you suddenly can't take another step through your everyday life.]

cards.name: Scardel Pinot Noir
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on the enemy Field gets STA decreased by the SIZE of the first Follower on your Field.
cards.text: [I'm taking a break. It doesn't matter how you do it, but rest is important.]

cards.name: Night Teacher
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on the enemy Field is moved to the next empty Slot on the enemy Field and gets STA decreased by its new Slot number. (If it is in Slot 5, it is moved to Slot 1.)
cards.text: [The darkness of night hides the truth. History is made during the night.]

cards.name: Kana.DTD
cards.ability: Turn Start: All cards on the enemy Field are sent to the bottom of the enemy Deck.
cards.text: [I still haven't determined what kind of influence this world has, so I'm postponing my operations for now.]

cards.name: Mop Maid
cards.ability: Turn Start: All Followers on your Field with a neighboring Follower get ATK +2.
