cards.text: [Did you wait long? I prepared a refreshing drink.]

cards.name: Embracing Shaman
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on your Field gets ATK +2/DEF +2/STA +2.
cards.text: [It feels like the warm sunlight embraces everything.]

cards.name: Rio
cards.ability: Turn Start: All Followers on your Field get ATK +3/STA +3. The first card in your Grave is sent to the bottom of your Deck. (HINT: You should take the initiative before the enemy's Followers become powerful.)
cards.text: [Ereshkigal knows everything. You should seek her out.] [Location: Muspelheim 1F]

cards.name: Nanai
cards.ability: Turn Start: All Spells in the enemy Hand are sent to the Grave. All Followers on the enemy Field get ATK/STA decreased by twice the number of sent cards. The first card in your Grave is sent to the bottom of your Deck. (HINT: The use of Spells is risky. Be careful.)
cards.text: [I desire to understand the rules of the world. They can be found near the origins of the world. The place where everything started. Isn't it exciting?] [Location: Muspelheim 2F]

cards.name: Seven
cards.ability: Turn Start: All Followers on the enemy Field get STA=1 and get ATK increased by their STA reduction. The first card in your Grave is sent to the bottom of your Deck. (HINT: The enemy will help you in an unhelpful way. You need to keep your STA up.)
cards.text: [It's fine if you win. If you win. I don't care what Nanai is or what she is looking for. She is devoted to it.] [Location: Muspelheim 3F]

cards.name: New Knight
cards.ability: Turn Start: All Followers on the enemy Field get DEF -2. All Followers in your Hand/Field get DEF +2. The first card in your Grave is sent to the bottom of your Deck. (HINT: You should maintain your own DEF while making use of the enemy's DEF.)
cards.text: [It's time for me to use the sword that my master left to me. I've known from the beginning that there's no turning back.] [Location: Muspelheim 4F]

cards.name: Origin Disciple
cards.ability: Turn Start: Your Character gets LIFE +8. (HINT: The enemy has a lot of LIFE. Look for another way to win. Certain cards will give you an advantage.)
cards.text: [The beginning and now are forever eternal. Welcome to Muspelheim!] [Location: Muspelheim 5F]

cards.name: Sion Flina
cards.ability: Turn Start: If the enemy Field contains a card with "Rion" in the name, your Character gets LIFE -7. The first card in your Grave is sent to the bottom of your Deck. (HINT: She hates Rion.)
cards.text: [I've come because I was summoned, tada~! The two of us who make up one detective group have made our appearance! This case... It smells hard-boiled, doesn't it?] [Location: Muspelheim 6F]

cards.name: Rion Flina
cards.ability: Turn Start: All Followers on the enemy Field without "Shion" in the name get ATK -2/DEF -2/STA -2. If the enemy Field contains a card with "Shion" in the name, your Character gets LIFE -7. The first 2 cards in your Grave are sent to the bottom of your Deck. (HINT: She hates Shion.)
cards.text: [What do you need? This city is so crowded that it makes me dizzy.] [Location: Muspelheim 7F]

cards.name: Frett
cards.ability: Turn Start: All cards on the enemy Field that do not have a SIZE of 3 are destroyed. The first card in your Grave is sent to the bottom of your Deck. (HINT: 3?)
cards.text: [I was in the forest looking for materials for a new flagpole when I ended up here. What is this place?] [Location: Muspelheim 8F]

cards.name: Odien
cards.ability: Turn Start: All cards on the enemy Field possessing a skill are destroyed. The first card in your Grave is sent to the bottom of your Deck. (HINT: Skill-users will be suppressed.)
cards.text: [Is there a new artifact anywhere? This place is a new discovery. The people of this place have a fascinating dialect.] [Location: Muspelheim 9F]

cards.name: Lyrica
cards.ability: Turn Start: All cards on the enemy Field that do not possess a skill are destroyed. The first card in your Grave is sent to the bottom of your Deck. (HINT: Those without skills will be forsaken.)
cards.text: [HI~ Are you having trouble? Lyrica is having a hard time figuring out what this place is, too!] [Location: Muspelheim 10F]

cards.name: Apostle Six
cards.ability: Turn Start: The first card in your Grave with "Aletheian" in the name is sent to the first empty Slot of your Field.
cards.text: [The most important part of manipulating the public is information. First is the information that they have already heard. Then, the information that you tell them.]

cards.name: Apostle Isena
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower in the enemy Field with a SIZE of 3 or less is deactivated and sent to the first empty Slot in your Field. That Follower gets the following skill: "[Mind Control] ▶Turn Start: If this card is not deactivated, this card is sent to the first empty Slot on the enemy Field. This skill is removed."
cards.text: [You have to inspire dreams within the weary.]

cards.name: Apostle Euler
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower in the enemy Field gets STA decreased by the number of Followers in the enemy Field.
cards.text: [In the end, the thing flowing beneath everything is money. We must get it.]

cards.name: Info Manager Six
cards.ability: Turn Start: The first card in your Grave with "Aletheian" in the name is sent to the first empty Slot in your Field and gets ATK +3/STA +3.
cards.text: [We will get what we want. Don't worry.]

cards.name: Obsessed Isena
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower in the enemy Field with a SIZE of 3 or less is deactivated and sent to the first empty Slot in your Field. If this happens, that Follower gets the following skill: "[Mind Control] ▶Turn Start: If this card is not deactivated, this card is sent to the first empty Slot on the enemy Field. This skill is removed." A random Follower in the enemy Field gets ATK -2/STA -2.
cards.text: [It was a success. We are making progress.]

cards.name: Item Manager Euler
cards.ability: Turn Start: The following effect is applied three times: "A random Follower in the enemy Field gets STA decreased by the number of Followers in the enemy Field."
cards.text: [The hearts of people are complex. We must protect their faith in us.]

cards.name: Sarah
cards.ability: Turn Start: All Followers on the enemy Field with a neighboring card are destroyed. Followers on the enemy Field with 1 STA are destroyed. The first card in your Grave is sent to the bottom of your Deck. (HINT: Friends who enjoy skinship are a must.)
cards.text: [The tranquil suburbs are nice. But why is it always nighttime in the city? It's a mystery I can't unravel.] [Location: Muspelheim 11F]

cards.name: Gart
cards.ability: Turn Start: If the Turn Number is 14, you win the game. The first card in your Grave is sent to the bottom of your Deck. (HINT: The game starts now. Let's count to 14.)
cards.text: [Ack! Stop that! It'll spill! These stupid pigeons!] [Location: Muspelheim 12F]

cards.name: Messenger Knight
cards.ability: Turn Start: All cards in your Grave are sent to the bottom of your Deck. (HINT: Cheap tricks won't work this time.)
cards.text: [Just say the word, and I'll deliver your message anywhere you want! But this place has phones everywhere.] [Location: Muspelheim 13F]

cards.name: GS 1st Star
cards.ability: Turn Start: All Followers on the enemy Field get STA -1. All Followers on the enemy Field with skills lose all skills and gain the following skill: "[Ack!] ▶Attack: This card gets STA=1." The first card in your Grave is sent to the bottom of your Deck. (HINT: The second time will definitely be the killing blow.)
cards.text: [This place is unsuitable for our goals. There's no place without people.] [Location: Muspelheim 14F]

cards.name: Kana.DTD
cards.ability: Turn Start: Your Character gets LIFE +4. All cards in your Hand and Grave are sent to the bottom of your Deck. (HINT: She's powerful!)
cards.text: [This place, ruled by Ereshkigal, has a lot of complaints to the top. You need to take care of yourself.] [Location: Muspelheim 15F]

cards.name: Lotte
cards.ability: Turn Start: If the Turn Number is not 1, if your Field contains no cards, the enemy Character gets LIFE -10. (HINT: The have-nots are sad.)
cards.text: [This place has a lot of new books waiting for me. It's amazing!] [Location: Muspelheim 16F]

cards.name: Conundrum
cards.ability: Turn Start: If your Character has 7 or less LIFE, the enemy Character gets LIFE=0. (HINT: Final desperation.)
cards.text: [Life is a series of questions. It's like a quiz bowl. Isn't it exciting?] [Location: Muspelheim 17F]

cards.name: Vanguard Knight
cards.ability: Turn Start: If the Turn Number is not 1, the enemy Character gets LIFE decreased by 3 times the number of empty Slots in the enemy Hand. (HINT: You will be defeated through the gap.)
cards.text: [Always move forward. Hesitation dulls the blade.] [Location: Muspelheim 18F]

cards.name: Serie
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on the enemy Field is deactivated. All Followers on your Field get ATK/DEF/STA increased by twice the absolute value of their own DEF. The first card in your Grave is sent to the bottom of your Deck. (HINT: The rich get richer, the poor get poorer.)
cards.text: [New material, new perspective, new sentences. I can't miss a single thing. I don't understand the details, but I'm getting immersed in everything.] [Location: Muspelheim 19F]

cards.name: Envy Lady
cards.ability: Turn Start: All Followers on the enemy Field with stats higher than their original values have their stats changed to their original values. All Followers on your Field with stats lower than their original values have their stats changed to their original values. The first card in your Grave is sent to the bottom of your Deck. (HINT: Mole hunting.)
cards.text: [... Destroy me. If, by my sacrifice, I can give consolation to all the lonely people in the world, I will gladly do it.] [Location: Muspelheim 20F]

cards.name: Sleep Club Pres.
cards.ability: Turn Start: The first card in your Hand and the enemy Hand are switched. (HINT: Change.)
cards.text: [I'm sleepy.] [Location: Muspelheim 22F]

cards.name: Fourteen
cards.ability: Turn Start: The first 3 cards in the enemy Deck are sent to the Grave. The first card in your Grave is sent to the bottom of your Deck. (HINT: L.O)
cards.text: [My principle is to fulfill every request to the very end. But I forgot.] [Location: Muspelheim 21F]

cards.name: Maid Luna
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on your Field gets ATK/STA increased by the number of cards in your Grave, and a random Follower on the enemy Field gets ATK/STA decreased by the number of cards in the enemy Grave. (HINT: The culprit is G.Y)
cards.text: [When there are a lot of maids, laundry is a big deal. There's more laundry than the master's. Who will be our maid...] [Location: Muspelheim 23F]

cards.name: Youngest Knight
cards.ability: Turn Start: All cards on the enemy Field with a SIZE of 5 or less are sent to the Grave. (HINT: You must be the appropriate age.)
cards.text: [I won't miss any of my duties, and I'll continue my training! I'm waiting for the future that the devoted receive.] [Location: Muspelheim 24F]

cards.name: Chirushi
cards.ability: Turn Start: 3 cards named "Sacrifice" are created on your Field. (HINT: BURN)
cards.text: [This is the revival of the magical warrior! Magical!!!!! Shoot!!!!!] [Location: Muspelheim 25F]

cards.name: Lagerfeld
cards.ability: Turn Start: All Followers in the enemy Deck get ATK -2/DEF -2/STA -2. 5 random Followers in the enemy Deck are sent to the top of the enemy Deck. (HINT: L.C)
cards.text: [I have to continue my research. For a loo~ng time.] [Location: Muspelheim 26F]

cards.name: Winfield
cards.ability: Turn Start: All enemy cards are deactivated. All Followers on your Field get ATK/STA increased by 5 times their own DEF. Every other Spell in the enemy Hand is sent to the Grave. (HINT: Defense is the greatest offense.)
cards.text: [I'm the press member Winfield. Today, I'm shooting some photos outside.] [Location: Muspelheim 27F]

cards.name: Kris Flina
cards.ability: Turn Start: A Follower called "Crescent Conundrum" is created in the first empty Slot of your Field and gets SIZE=1/ATK=13/DEF=2/STA=13. A Follower called "Crescent Conundrum" is created in the first empty Slot of the enemy Field and gets SIZE=9 and gains the following skill: "[Destruction!] ▶Turn Start: This card is destroyed." (HINT: Destruction.)
cards.text: [Conundrum? Don't get so excited. You should watch out for the light.] [Location: Muspelheim 28F]

cards.name: Natura
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower in the enemy Hand gets ATK -2/STA -2.
cards.text: [Master Luver? What kind of place is the alliance?]

cards.name: Ignis
cards.ability: Turn Start: If the Turn Number is even, your Character gets LIFE +2. If the Turn Number is odd, both Characters get LIFE -2.
cards.text: [News of Master Luver's poor results reached us.]

cards.name: Cherum
cards.ability: Turn Start: All Followers in the enemy Field get STA decreased by the number of empty Slots in the enemy Field minus 1.
cards.text: [It's okay, Luver. There are wings hidden here? It would make it easier if you could fly... UFO?]

cards.name: Axis Wing Natura
cards.ability: Turn Start: The following effect is applied twice: "A random Follower in the enemy Hand gets ATK -2/STA -2."
cards.text: [I see something below. That midget is the new captain of the Crux knights?]

cards.name: Axis Wing Ignis
cards.ability: Turn Start: If the Turn Number is even, your Character gets LIFE +2. If the Turn Number is odd, the enemy Character gets LIFE -2.
cards.text: [Natura. Don't say that with a calm face. That midget doesn't get mad.]

cards.name: Axis Wing Cherum
cards.ability: Turn Start: All Followers in the enemy Field get ATK/STA decreased by the number of empty Slots in the enemy Field minus 1.
cards.text: [These ruins are the Empire's now. We can do whatever we want. Where is the key?]

cards.name: Amethystar
cards.ability: Turn Start: One of the following effects is applied randomly. 1: All Followers on the enemy Field get ATK -3/STA -3. 2: All Followers on your Field get ATK +3/STA +3. 3: The enemy Character gets LIFE -2. 4: Your Character gets LIFE +2. 5: All cards in your Grave are sent to the bottom of your Deck. (HINT: Good or bad.)
cards.text: [I've found what I've been looking for. There's nothing more exciting than roaming around. My inquisitive mind has been sparked. Even if it rains...] [Location: Muspelheim 29F]

cards.name: Zislana
cards.ability: Turn Start: All cards in your Grave are sent to the bottom of your Deck. (HINT: Variety show.)
cards.text: [Where am I? Who am I? I have no idea which way is which...] [Location: Muspelheim 30F]

cards.name: Magision
cards.ability: Turn Start: If there is an enemy card with a Slot number equal to the Turn Number, the enemy Character gets LIFE -8. If the Turn Number is 5, the Turn Number returns to turn 1. All cards in your Grave are sent to the bottom of your Deck. (HINT: TICK TICK TICK TICK TICK)
cards.text: [The time is different... Time flows differently here than it does in the real world.] [Location: Muspelheim 31F]

cards.name: Jaina Preventer
cards.ability: Turn Start: All Followers on the enemy Field whose stats are higher than their original values are destroyed. All cards in your Grave are sent to the bottom of your Deck. (HINT: A cornered stone meets the mason's chisel.)
cards.text: [This sword... it feels like it possesses mystical powers.] [Location: Muspelheim 32F]

cards.name: Disciple Johanna
cards.ability: Turn Start: All cards in the enemy Hand are sent to the Grave. The enemy Character gets LIFE decreased by the number of sent cards, and your Character gets LIFE increased by the number of sent cards. All cards in your Grave are sent to the bottom of your Deck. (HINT: Throw them out.)
cards.text: [Truthfully, it's impossible to explain with words alone...] [Location: Muspelheim 33F]

cards.name: Disciple Josefina
cards.ability: Turn Start: If you have fewer Followers on your Field than the enemy, then all Followers on the enemy Field are moved to the first empty Slots on your Field and get SIZE=1. If the total SIZE of your Field is 2 or more, all Followers on your Field that do not have a SIZE of 1 are moved to the first empty Slots on the enemy Field and get SIZE=5. All cards in your Grave are sent to the bottom of your Deck. (HINT: I will use your Followers. You will use my Followers.)
cards.text: [... Stationmaster? Where did she go?] [Location: Muspelheim 34F]

cards.name: Fulle
cards.ability: Turn Start: One enemy card without "Knight" in the name gets SIZE=1 and is sent to the first empty Slot in your Field. All other enemy cards without "Knight" in the name are sent to the Grave. All cards in your Grave are sent to the bottom of your Deck. (HINT: If you are not a knight, you will suffer unavoidable agony.)
cards.text: [What's up? Are you a knight? Ah... Stationmaster? Who's that?] [Location: Muspelheim 35F]

cards.name: Chenin Blanc
cards.ability: Turn Start: Both Characters get LIFE=10. A card called "Sacrifice" is created in all Slots of both players' Fields. (HINT: Instant defeat.)
cards.text: [Interesting... This place isn't bad. Since I've been here, nobody has called us freaks or anything. Shall we stick around for a while?] [Location: Muspelheim 36F]

cards.name: Disc. of Abundance
cards.ability: Turn Start: If the Turn Number is 1, the first 20 cards in the enemy Deck are removed from the game, the enemy gets Shuffles=0, and both Characters get LIFE=20. If the Turn Number is 3 and your Character has less LIFE than the enemy Character, your Character gets LIFE=0. Otherwise, the enemy Character gets LIFE=0. (HINT: The best only need 3 seconds to win!)
cards.text: [Cooking is living! Cooking is being! I will do my best to bring the stationmaster the best food possible!] [Location: Muspelheim 37F]

cards.name: Disc. of Eminence
cards.ability: Turn Start: All enemy cards with an even SIZE are destroyed. All cards in the enemy Hand and Field get SIZE=4. (HINT: Everything I dislike will be thrown out or changed to fit my tastes.)
cards.text: [The culprit... is you.] [Location: Muspelheim 38F]

cards.name: Disciple Shur
cards.ability: Turn Start: If the Turn Number is 1, the enemy Deck is changed to the starter Deck of the enemy Character's faction. If the enemy Character's faction is Neutral, all cards in the enemy Deck are removed from the game. (HINT: You want to use your former strength? Really?)
cards.text: [Please wait. The stationmaster will be arriving shortly.] [Location: Muspelheim 39F]

cards.name: 2S Clerk
cards.ability: Turn Start: If the Turn Number is 1, your Deck becomes an identical copy of the enemy Deck, then all Followers in your Deck get ATK -1/STA -1.
cards.text: [Take this receipt, send the contents of the request to the written address.]

cards.name: 2S Intimidator
cards.ability: Turn Start: If the total SIZE of your Hand and the enemy Hand are both odd or both even, your Character gets LIFE +1. Otherwise, the enemy Character gets LIFE -2.
cards.text: [Do you remember what kind of person you met? It seems like an acquaintance.]

cards.name: 2S Twenty
cards.ability: Turn Start: If your Character has more LIFE than the enemy Character, your Character's LIFE and the enemy Character's LIFE are swapped.
cards.text: [The assignment of the red house. Infiltrate as a maid.]

cards.name: 2S Spy
cards.ability: Turn Start: The cards in Slots 4,5 of the enemy Hand are sent to the Grave.
cards.text: [I am disguised as a teacher to ensure the client's protection.]

cards.name: 2S Agent
cards.ability: (none)
cards.text: [An ice user. At a client's request, she iced over a certain classroom at the Vita high school.]

cards.name: 2S Clerk Jasmine
cards.ability: Turn Start: If the Turn Number is 1, your Deck becomes an identical copy of the enemy Deck.
cards.text: [Don't take two slips! Don't cut in line! Go by your number! This place isn't a bank, miss!]

cards.name: 2S Casey
cards.ability: Turn Start: If the total SIZE of your Hand and the enemy Hand are both odd or both even, your Character gets LIFE +2. Otherwise, the enemy Character gets LIFE -3.
cards.text: [No matter who I meet, my work always feels fresh.]

cards.name: 2S Infiltrator Twenty
cards.ability: Turn Start: Your Character's LIFE and the enemy Character's LIFE are swapped.
cards.text: [This household is strange. Something is different. What are the identities of this house's residents?]

cards.name: 2S Spy Forty
cards.ability: Turn Start: The cards in Slots 3,4,5 of the enemy Hand are sent to the Grave.
cards.text: [By passing as a teacher, I've discovered my talent at teaching.]

cards.name: 2S Agent Ice
cards.ability: (none)
cards.text: [The client was anonymous, and because of this request, the Vita student Weekly was harmed.]

cards.name: Proctor Margaret
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on your Field gets ATK +1.
cards.text: [In order to use Talentium effectively, you need a flexible mind.]

cards.name: Proctor Coy
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on the enemy Field gets STA -1.
cards.text: [Those who have skill with Talentium should not be lazy in improving their abilities.]

cards.name: Proctor Iris
cards.ability: Turn Start: Your Character gets LIFE +1.
cards.text: [Concentrate. Concentration is the key to controlling Talentium.]

cards.name: Proctor R. Margaret
cards.ability: Turn Start: 2 random Followers on your Field get ATK +1.
cards.text: [Can you follow my movements? My movements have a fixed pattern to them.]

cards.name: Proctor P. Coy
cards.ability: Turn Start: 2 random Followers on the enemy Field get STA -1.
cards.text: [Try using your maximum power. I will measure that power.]

cards.name: Proctor G. Iris
cards.ability: Turn Start: Your Character gets LIFE +1 and the enemy Character gets LIFE -1.
cards.text: [You can train to improve your concentration. It's important to never give up.]

cards.name: Henlifei
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on your Field gets ATK +1/STA +1, and a random Follower on the enemy Field gets ATK -1/STA -1.
cards.text: [I will be your opponent. Be honored. I am the Lightning Wolf Henlifei.]

cards.name: Brown-haired Chupachupa
cards.ability: Turn Start: If the Turn Number is odd, a random Follower on your Field gets ATK +1/STA +1.
cards.text: [The best things are made from the best ingredients-chu!]

cards.name: Red-haired Chupachupa
cards.ability: Turn Start: If the Turn Number is even, a random Follower on the enemy Field gets ATK -1/STA -1.
cards.text: [Accident-free for 365 days! Just one day left-chu! Wooooow~]

cards.name: White-haired Chupachupa
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on your Field gets STA +1. A random Follower on the enemy Field with a SIZE of at least 4 gets STA -1.
cards.text: [Got it-chu! The dark product line will change to white-chu!]

cards.name: Chupachupa Aing
cards.ability: Turn Start: If the Turn Number is odd, 2 random Followers on your Field get ATK +1/STA +1.
cards.text: [Quality control is fundamental-chu!]

cards.name: Chupachupa Paing
cards.ability: Turn Start: If the Turn Number is even, 2 random Followers on the enemy Field get ATK -1/STA -1.
cards.text: [Woow~ Pass-chu!]

cards.name: Chupachupa Boing
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on your Field gets ATK +1/STA +1. A random Follower on the enemy Field with a SIZE of at least 4 gets ATK -1/STA -1.
cards.text: [Ahhh~ Line 1's base is overflowing-chu! It's an emergency-chu!]

cards.name: Quickitty
cards.ability: Turn Start: If the Turn Number is 1, all Followers in your Deck get ATK +2/STA +2. (As soon as you meet this cat, you sense that something is different about it.)
cards.text: [Meow~] [The animals called cats seem to have some kind of power that stirs the instincts of girls. Particularly their paws... It's like a powerful spell.]

cards.name: Council Rumi
cards.ability: Turn Start: Any Followers on the enemy Field with at least 23 STA are moved to your Field.
cards.text: [Please participate in the Student Council activities. It is mandatory.]

cards.name: Council Press
cards.ability: Turn Start: Any Followers on the enemy Field with at least 18 Sta are moved to your Field.
cards.text: [Capture complete! I've recorded everything now.]

cards.name: Campus Delinquent
cards.ability: Turn Start: All Followers on the enemy Field get DEF=0.
cards.text: [Listen. If you want to live peacefully, you won't get any help. Why is that?]

cards.name: Delinquent Leader
cards.ability: Turn Start: All Followers on the enemy Field with at least 1 DEF get DEF decreased by twice their DEF.
cards.text: [I have no interest in people weaker than me, but it's a different story if you touch my friends.]

cards.name: Latecomer
cards.ability: Turn Start: The last card in the enemy Hand is sent to the bottom of the enemy Deck. The first Follower in your Hand gets ATK/STA increased by the sent card's SIZE.
cards.text: [It's a latecomer. Why are there people relaxing here!]

cards.name: Prefect Layna
cards.ability: Turn Start: The first card on the enemy Field is sent to the bottom of the enemy Deck. The first Follower in your Hand gets ATK/STA increased by the sent card's SIZE.
cards.text: [The Morals Committee must always set a good example for others. Because of that, it is always lacking in members.]

cards.name: Linia's Steward
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random card in the enemy Hand/Field is changed into "New Maid".
cards.text: [Lady Linia, how are you feeling today? I will prepare some warm tea for you.]

cards.name: Wedding Sita
cards.ability: Turn Start: Followers on the enemy Field in Slots 1, 2, and 3 get STA -1. Your Character gets LIFE +1.
cards.text: [I just have to stay still while wearing this? I'm hungry, Vernika.]

cards.name: Wedding Luthica
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Crux Follower on your Field gets ATK +1/STA +1. Your Character gets LIFE +1.
cards.text: [This is... wonderful. I never would have thought I would get to wear something like this.]

cards.name: Wedding Iri
cards.ability: Turn Start: If your Field SIZE is greater than the enemy Field SIZE, the enemy Character gets LIFE -1. Your Character gets LIFE +1.
cards.text: [I tried this because I sometimes think beautiful clothes would be better than my gloomy clothes. How is it? Vernika... of course I couldn't expect to hear her reply...]

cards.name: Wedding Vernika
cards.ability: Turn Start: The first Follower on the enemy Field with the highest DEF gets DEF =0. Your Character gets LIFE +1.
cards.text: [I've only dreamed of trying out a wedding dress. Cinia, please tell your oldest sister thank you for me.]

cards.name: Wedding Rose
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on the enemy Field gets ATK/STA decreased by half of the difference between its SIZE and DEF (rounding up). Your Character gets LIFE +1.
cards.text: [Sister, I'll only show this look to you. I don't want to show this look to Cinia...]

cards.name: Wedding Jaina
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on your Field gets ATK +2. If the Turn Number is even, that Follower gets an additional STA +1. Your Character gets LIFE +1.
cards.text: [This is different than the dress I had in mind. Is this your preference? It's not bad. I'm never disappointed by your opinion, Linia.]

cards.name: Wedding Clarice
cards.ability: Turn Start: Cards on your Field with the name "Homunculus Escort" are sent to the Grave. A Follower named "Homunculus Escort" is created in the last empty Slot in your Field and gets SIZE =1/ATK =5/DEF =0/STA =5. Your Character gets LIFE +1.
cards.text: [I got this as a reward for the wedding event. Does it suit me? I really wanted you to see it, Luthica. You're the first person that I cared about.

cards.name: Wedding Rihanna
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on your Field is moved to a random empty Slot in your Field. The Follower gets the following effects applied depending on its new Slot number. 1~3: STA +3. 3~5: ATK +2. Your Character gets LIFE +1.
cards.text: [Thank you... I'll never forget your wishes. This is an unforgettable day of this year's festival.]

cards.name: Wedding Layna
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower in your Field gets STA +3 and is sent to the top of your Deck. Your Character gets LIFE +1.
cards.text: [Am I really alright? Even if you say so... I'll help you in the future.]

cards.name: Linia's Tailor
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random card in your Hand is sent to the first empty Slot of the enemy Field and deactivated. A random card in the enemy Hand is sent to the first empty Slot of your Field and deactivated.
cards.text: [I designed some new clothes. Will you try them on?]

cards.name: Child Cinia
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on the enemy Field gets one of the following effects applied depending on its SIZE. ●3 or more: ATK -2, ●Less than 3: STA -3
cards.text: [Hm.. Hmph! Are you going to ignore just because I'm small? I'll get mad if you do that! You better watch out!]

cards.name: Dress Cinia
cards.ability: Turn Start: The first Follower on the enemy Field with a SIZE that is less than or equal to half (rounding up) of the total SIZE of the first 2 cards in your Hand gets ATK -2/DEF -2/STA -2.
cards.text: [I don't usually wear dresses like this, but since I was attending your party, it couldn't be helped!]

cards.name: Chess Cinia
cards.ability: Turn Start: The first Follower on the enemy Field with the highest SIZE gets ATK/STA decreased by half (rounding up) of the combined SIZE of the first Follower on your Field and a Follower in Slot 4 in your Field.
cards.text: [Checkmate, that's the end. Ah~ it was boring because you were too weak. Is there any opponent that can give me exciting games like my sister did?]

cards.name: Swimwear Cinia
cards.ability: Turn Start: Followers on the enemy Field with a SIZE less than the SIZE of the first Follower on your Field get ATK -1/STA -2
cards.text: [It's not much compared to ours, but I'll let it pass.]

cards.name: Visitor Cinia
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on your Field gets one of the following effects applied depending on the faction of the first card in your Hand: ●Vita: ATK +1/STA +2, ●Academy: STA +3, ●Crux: DEF +1, ●Darklore: SIZE -2 (to a minimum of 1).
cards.text: [This... this is the public school's uniform? It's... it's not bad! For a commoner's uniform, it's a decent design...]

cards.name: Wedding Cinia
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on the enemy Field gets ATK -1/STA -1. Your Character gets LIFE +2.
cards.text: [I don't really like white, but this dress isn't too ba... no! It's good, sister, this was a good idea!]

cards.name: Hot Springs Cinia
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on the enemy Field gets ATK -2/STA -2 if it has 0 or less DEF. Otherwise, it gets DEF -1/STA -1.
cards.text: [It has a different kind of beauty than the mansion. Alright, it was worth coming.]

cards.name: Santa Cinia
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower in your Field gets ATK +1/STA +2 and the first card in your Hand is sent to the top of your Deck. If the sent card belongs to your Character's faction, a random Follower in your Field gets ATK +1.
cards.text: [Christmas? A day where people exchange gifts? I don't have any interest in that. This is just some clothes that Linia gave me.]

cards.name: President Cinia
cards.ability: Turn Start: If all cards in your Hand and Field belong to this card's faction and there are at least 5 cards in your Grave, a random Follower in your Grave is sent to the bottom of your Deck. A random Follower on your Field gets ATK +2/STA +2. If the number of cards in your Deck is less than or equal to the number of cards in the enemy Deck, a random Follower on the enemy Field gets DEF -1/STA -2.
cards.text: [Linia became Royle Academy's chairman. Cinia ran for president and won. She looked proud, as if it weren't an accident, but something felt out of place.]

cards.name: Witch Cadet Fade
cards.ability: Turn Start: Your Character gets LIFE +1 and the enemy Character gets LIFE -1. A random Spell in the enemy Hand is sent to the Grave. A random Follower in the enemy Hand gets SIZE +1. A random Follower on your Field gets ATK +1/STA +1.
cards.text: [I'm number 2? I resent that. I won't acknowledge Falco. I'm number 1.]

cards.name: Palomporom
cards.ability: Turn Start: If you have a Follower on the Field with "Witch" in the name, a random Follower on your Field with "Witch" in the name gets the following effects depending on how many Darklore Followers are on your Field. 1: ATK +1/STA +2. 2 or more: SIZE -1/ATK +1/STA +2.
cards.text: [For someone to be considered a "queen" by everyone, you must have a glorious existence. That girl calls herself a queen, but I will oppose her.]

cards.name: Lib. Explorer Jier
cards.ability: Turn Start: The first Follower on the enemy Field and the first Spell in the enemy Hand swap places. The swapped Follower gets ATK -1/STA -1.
cards.text: [Who are you? Not just anyone can come here.]

cards.name: Jier Pris
cards.ability: Turn Start: The first Follower on the enemy Field and the first Spell in the enemy Hand swap places. The swapped Follower gets ATK -1/STA -1 and the swapped Spell gets SIZE +1.
cards.text: [You want to force your way in? I'll call the librarian.]

cards.name: Lib. Explorer Sia
cards.ability: Turn Start: Up to 2 Spells are sent from the enemy Hand to the bottom of the enemy Deck. A random Follower on the enemy Field gets ATK/STA decreased by the number of sent cards.
cards.text: [My job is to explore this place. If you have nothing to do here, please return to the entrance.]

cards.name: Sia Aka
cards.ability: Turn Start: Up to 2 Followers are sent from the enemy Hand to the bottom of the enemy Deck. A random Follower on the enemy Field gets ATK/STA decreased by the number of sent cards.
cards.text: [Did you receive permission from the librarian? If you're not looking for books, then what are you looking for?]

cards.name: Lib. Explorer Kanei
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on the enemy Field gets ATK/STA decreased by 2 minus the number of enemy Shuffles. A random Follower on your Field gets ATK/STA increased by 1 plus the number of enemy Shuffles.
cards.text: [I ended up very deep in this place looking for rare books. Do you know the way out?]

cards.name: Shawn Kanei
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on the enemy Field gets ATK/DEF/STA decreased by 2 minus the number of enemy Shuffles. A random Follower on your Field gets ATK/DEF/STA increased by 1 plus the number of enemy Shuffles.
cards.text: [Sometimes I get lost, but I feel better when the librarian is around. You know?]

cards.name: Lib. Explorer
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on the enemy Field gets ATK/STA decreased by the number of Followers in the bottom 2 cards of your Deck.
cards.text: [If you aren't an explorer, then leave! This isn't a place for you to come and go as you wish.]

cards.name: Lib. Explorer Ritana
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on the enemy Field gets ATK/STA decreased by the number of Followers in the bottom 3 cards of your Deck.
cards.text: [I see that warning you wasn't enough. I don't care who you are. I'll make you leave!]

cards.name: Tactician Knight
cards.ability: Turn Start: The last Follower in your Deck gets ATK +4/STA +4. All cards in your Hand are sent to the bottom of your Deck.
cards.text: [Didn't you hear from our leader? The Crux knights are investigating this place.]

cards.name: Tactician Bermin
cards.ability: Turn Start: The last Follower in your Deck gets ATK +4/STA +4. All cards in your Hand are sent to the bottom of your Deck. A random Follower on the enemy Field gets ATK/STA decreased by half (rounding down) the number of sent cards.
cards.text: [Anyone who doesn't belong to the knights should return to the entrance. If you refuse, then I will force you to go.]

cards.name: Witch Cadet
cards.ability: Turn Start: If the enemy Deck contains 20 or less cards, the enemy Character gets LIFE -2.
cards.text: [I wonder what the knights are looking for here. I have to find out.]

cards.name: Witch Cadet Zislana
cards.ability: Turn Start: If the enemy Deck contains 18 or less cards, the enemy Character gets LIFE -3.
cards.text: [I don't care if you're not with the knights. You're disturbing my investigation.]

cards.name: GS 5th Star
cards.ability: Turn Start: If the enemy Grave contains at least 12 cards, a random card in the enemy Hand is sent to the Grave.
cards.text: [The Crux knights are here? Well, whatever. It'll be fun.]

cards.name: GS 5th Star
cards.ability: Turn Start: If the enemy Grave contains at least 15 cards, 2 random cards in the enemy Hand are sent to the Grave.
cards.text: [Hehe. Ahaha. Am I coming close to obtaining the thing that our leader desires? Hm? There were still some underlings left?]

cards.name: RPD Constable
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on the enemy Field gets STA decreased by half its SIZE (rounding up).
cards.text: [I am the constable of the Royle Police Force, E-ROMA. Please cooperate for a moment.]

cards.name: Constable E-ROMA
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on the enemy Field gets DEF/STA decreased by half its SIZE (rounding up).
cards.text: [The kidnapping suspect and the kidnapped child... Is this the same person that A-GA is looking for? I need to investigate more.]

cards.name: RPD Corporal
cards.ability: Turn Start: The first Follower on the enemy Field with the highest STA is sent to the top of the enemy Deck. The last Follower in your Hand gets STA increased by half the sent Follower's SIZE (rounding down).
cards.text: [I am the corporal of the Royle Police Force, Vedia. I will do this peacefully. Take out whatever you're hiding. Hurry up.]

cards.name: Corporal Vedia
cards.ability: Turn Start: The first Follower on the enemy Field with the highest STA is sent to the top of the enemy Deck. The last Follower in your Hand gets ATK/STA increased by half the sent Follower's SIZE (rounding down).
cards.text: [This kidnapping affair suddenly came up, and now we're carrying out a huge manhunt. What's going on?]

cards.name: RPD Sergeant
cards.ability: Turn Start: The first Follower in your Deck is sent to the first empty Slot of your Field and gets its SIZE cut in half (rounding up).
cards.text: [I am the corporal... no, the sergeant of the Royle Police Force, Sisela. Please cooperate. I'm still not used to this position.]

cards.name: Sergeant Cisela
cards.ability: Turn Start: The first Follower in your Deck is sent to the first empty Slot of your Field, gets its SIZE cut in half (rounding up), and gets ATK +2.
cards.text: [What are E-ROMA and Vedia so curious about? If you just do as you're told, it'll be alright...]

cards.name: Dean Rianna
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on your Field is moved to a random empty Slot in your Field. The Follower gets the following effects applied depending on its new Slot number. 1~3: STA +3. 3~5: ATK +2/STA +2.
cards.text: [Just because the festival is getting closer, you shouldn't make rash decisions. You should stay calm and keep your composure.]

cards.name: Lieutenant Kay
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on the enemy Field with at least 20 ATK is moved to the first empty Slot of your Field.
cards.text: [You can't be careless during a festival. This is when incidents are more likely to occur.]

cards.name: Treanna
cards.ability: Turn Start: The first card in your Grave is sent to the bottom of your Deck. All Followers on the enemy Field with skills lose their skills and get ATK -2/STA -2.
cards.text: [You can really feel the boys' passion during the festival.] [Are you doing that on purpose?]

cards.name: Penguin Suit Sita
cards.ability: Turn Start: If your Field contains a card with "Sita" in the name, all cards on your Field get SIZE -1 and all Followers on your Field get ATK +2/STA +2. Otherwise, 2 random Followers on the enemy Field get ATK -2/STA -2.
cards.text: [Sita, that suit is cute!] [Cute Sita!] [Cute penguin suit~] [Uuu...]

cards.name: Wet Gart
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on the enemy Field gets DEF/STA decreased by the number of Followers in your Hand. A random Follower in your Hand gets DEF/STA increased by the number of Followers in your Hand.
cards.text: [Uuuu... why's the rain coming down like this... E... even if you stare like that, it won't make my clothes drier!]

cards.name: Bunny Girl Cannelle
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on your Field with a SIZE of 6 or less gets SIZE +1/ATK +2/DEF +2/STA +2.
cards.text: [How is it! This is my true form!] [No way...] [Hey!!]

cards.name: Hammered Sigma
cards.ability: Turn Start: A number of Followers in your Hand equal to the SIZE of the first card in your Hand get ATK +2/STA +2. (The Followers are selected from left to right.)
cards.text: [Ng? What? Something's on my chest? I don't see anything. Everyone in Crux is supposed to be honest.]

cards.name: Street Idol Clarice
cards.ability: Turn Start: Cards on your Field with the name "Homunculus Escort" in the name are sent to the Grave. If the ones digit of the Turn Number is at least 1, a Follower named "Homunculus Escort" is created in the last empty Slot in your Field and gets SIZE =1/DEF =1. That Follower gets ATK/STA changed to equal 15 minus the ones digit of the Turn Number.
cards.text: [We can do anything! If we're together~ You'll definitely meet us~ Something will start to change~ To a new tomorrow~ Singing with me is my homunculus. Give her some applause!]

cards.name: Transfer Student Cinia
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on your Field gets one of the following effects applied depending on the faction of the first card in your Hand: ●Vita: ATK +2/STA +2, Academy: ●STA +4, ●Crux: DEF +2, ●Darklore: SIZE -2 (to a minimum of 1).
cards.text: [This... this is the public school's uniform? It's... it's not bad! For a commoner's uniform, it's a decent design...]

cards.name: Team Manager Vernika
cards.ability: Turn Start: If there are 3 or fewer cards in your Hand, all cards in your Hand are sent to the bottom of your Deck. If this happens, a random Follower on your Field gets ATK/STA increased by the number of sent cards.
cards.text: [Everyone's working hard, I really enjoy cheering for you all!]

cards.name: Cheerleader Iri
cards.ability: Turn Start: The following effect is applied twice: "A random card in your Hand with a SIZE of at least 2 gets SIZE -1."
cards.text: [Hm? The athletic meet, it's during the day? That's too bad... I thought I might be able to have some fun for a change...]

cards.name: Sports Luthica
cards.ability: Turn Start: If Slot 5 in your Field is empty, a Follower in Slot 1 in your Field is moved to Slot 5 and gets STA +5. If Slot 1 in your Field is empty, a Follower in Slot 5 in your Field is moved to Slot 1 and gets ATK +4/STA +4.
cards.text: [Run as much as you want! We have this opportunity, so spend this time to your heart's content!]

cards.name: Waitress Rianna
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on your Field is moved to a random empty Slot in your Field. The Follower gets the following effects applied depending on its new Slot number. 1~3: ATK +2/STA +2. 3~5: SIZE -2/ATK +2.
cards.text: [I just said I'd help since you said you were so busy, but why didn't you mention anything about these clothes?]

cards.name: Dress Up Maron
cards.ability: Turn Start: If the Turn Number is 1, all Followers in your Deck get STA +2.
cards.text: [I'll catch your heart!]

cards.name: Musiciter Maron
cards.ability: Turn Start: If the Turn Number is 1, all Followers in your Deck get STA +2. All cards in your Deck with a SIZE of at least 5 are sent to the bottom of your Deck.
cards.text: [This thing is the power of Muzisitter?]

cards.name: Dress Up Smartylane
cards.ability: Turn Start: If the Turn Number is 1, all Followers in your Deck get SIZE -1.
cards.text: [I will show you the report of punishment!]

cards.name: Musiciter Smartylane
cards.ability: Turn Start: If the Turn Number is 1, all Followers in your Deck get SIZE -1. All cards in your Deck with a SIZE of at least 5 are sent to the bottom of your Deck.
cards.text: [Huh? I look younger? I was young in the first place!]

cards.name: Dress Up Lucerrie
cards.ability: Turn Start: If your Field contains 1 or less Followers, the first Follower in your Deck with "Dress Up" in the name is sent to the first empty Slot of your Field and gets SIZE=5/ATK +2/STA +2.
cards.text: [I still need more power to protect my friends.]

cards.name: Musiciter Lucerrie
cards.ability: Turn Start: If your Field contains 1 or less Followers, the first Follower in your Deck with "Dress Up" in the name is sent to the first empty Slot of your Field and gets SIZE=3/ATK +4/STA +4.
cards.text: [With this power, I can protect my friends!]

cards.name: Student Council Monthly
cards.ability: Turn Start: If the Turn Number is 1, all Followers in your Deck get ATK -2/DEF +2. 2 random Followers on the enemy Field get ATK -1.
cards.text: [Wonderful Weekly Helpers! I'm the Chilling Brain Monthly.]

cards.name: Cook Club Iri
cards.ability: Turn Start: If the Turn Number is 1, all Followers in your Deck get ATK +1/DEF +1. The enemy Character gets LIFE -1.
cards.text: [The whipped cream is done, so now... Hm?]

cards.name: Student Council Celine
cards.ability: Turn Start: The first Follower in your Deck with "Student Council" in the name gets ATK +1/STA +2 and is moved to the top of your Deck.
cards.text: [It's better to drink the tea without the tea leaves left in. Isn't that right?]

cards.name: Student Council Visitor Esprit
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on your Field gets ATK +1/STA +1. A random Follower on the enemy Field has its skills removed. If this happens, that Follower gets ATK +1/STA +1.
cards.text: [I came to visit because I was worried about Iri. I'm relieved that there weren't any problems.]

cards.name: Frett
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on the enemy Field gets ATK/STA decreased by the number of Crux Followers in your Hand with "Knight" in the name.
cards.text: [Sergeant, you're not supposed to throw the flag.]

cards.name: Charon
cards.ability: Turn Start: The following effects are applied depending on the total number of cards in both Graves. ●10 or less: All Followers in the enemy Hand get ATK -1. ●11~20: All Followers in your Hand get ATK +1/STA +1. ●21 or more: All Followers in your Deck get ATK +2/STA +2.
cards.text: [Well! I don’t know about any 30x fine for taking a free ride, so your fine will be to get some gimbap for Minac!]

cards.name: Conundrum
cards.ability: Turn Start: If the Turn Number is 1, all Followers in your Deck get ATK +1/DEF +1.
cards.text: [How logical!]

cards.name: Weekly, the Legend
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on the enemy Field and the first Follower in your Hand with "Student Council" in the name have their ATK swapped.
cards.text: [I am the Student Council's secret guardian... Weekly, the Legend!]

cards.name: 1st Witness Kana DKD
cards.ability: Turn Start: The first card in your Deck that belongs to your Character's faction is sent to the first empty Slot in your Field. If your Character's LIFE is 9 or less, your Character gets LIFE=15.
cards.text: [Have you finally come to die? Would you like to die? Or do you not wish to die? Even though Kana leads to death.]

cards.name: 2nd Witness Kana DND
cards.ability: Turn Start: 2 random cards chosen from the enemy Field, Hand, or Grave are removed from the game. A random Follower on your Field has its stats changed to their original values if they are lower than their original values.
cards.text: [Don't mind DKD. How much is your fate worth? Try not to waste my time.]

cards.name: 3rd Witness Kana DTD
cards.ability: Turn Start: If the Turn Number is 1, all Followers in your Deck get ATK +2/STA +2. A random Follower on the enemy Field has its skills removed.
cards.text: [Your very existence has already thrown this place into disarray. In other words, I don't like you.]

cards.name: 4th Witness Kana DDT
cards.ability: Turn Start: If the Turn Number is odd, all Followers on your Field get ATK +1/STA +2. If the Turn Number is even, all Followers on the enemy Field get STA -5.
cards.text: [Unfortunately, this is a place of nothingness. Everything is 0. I'm no longer undefeated, but that doesn't mean I'm weak.]

cards.name: 5th Witness Kana DDD
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on the enemy Field is sent to the bottom of the enemy Deck. Your Character gets LIFE increased by half the SIZE of the sent Follower (rounding down).
cards.text: [From our observations here, where we can see everything, it looks like we'll have to clean up after them... It'll be hard work...]

cards.name: Lamia of the Water
cards.ability: Turn Start: A Spell in the enemy Hand is sent to your Field.
cards.text: [Be captivated by my beautiful scales.]

cards.name: Medusa of the Earth
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on the enemy Field is deactivated.
cards.text: [Don't be scared of my cute snakes. I am more frightening.]

cards.name: Devil Carrie
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on the enemy Field has its ATK/DEF/STA/SIZE changed to their original values.
cards.text: [Hm? Your soul smells like strawberries.]

cards.name: G Lamia
cards.ability: Turn Start: If the Turn Number is odd, one Spell and one Follower in the enemy Hand are each moved to your Field.
cards.text: [Won't you come to me to the endless ocean?]

cards.name: G Medusa
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on the enemy Field is deactivated. If this happens, that Follower gets ATK -1/DEF -1/STA -1.
cards.text: [When you feel my beauty and terror, you will turn to stone.]

cards.name: G Devil
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on the enemy Field has its ATK/DEF/STA/SIZE changed to their original values. A random Follower on your Field gets ATK +2/STA +2.
cards.text: [If you give your soul to me, I'll turn you into something quite nice...]

cards.name: Jaina Preventer
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on your Field gets ATK +3/STA +3. If the Turn Number is 1, all Followers in your Deck get DEF +1/STA +1.
cards.text: [The knights have the strongest souls. It is the greatest position. Do you still doubt me?]

cards.name: Cinia Pacifica
cards.ability: Turn Start: If the Turn Number is odd, a random Follower on the enemy Field is changed to "Delinquent Witch Cadet". If the Turn Number is even, a random Follower on your Field gets ATK +1/DEF +1/STA +1.
cards.text: [I understand what you're worried about, but isn't this different from "that thing" you talked about before?]

cards.name: Rose Pacifca
cards.ability: Turn Start: If there are 5 cards in your Hand, the first card in your Hand is sent to the top of your Deck. The first Follower in your Deck gets ATK/STA increased by the number of empty Slots in your Hand. If the Turn Number is even, a random card in the enemy Grave is removed from the game. If this happens, a random Follower in your Grave is sent to the bottom of your Deck.
cards.text: [Even if you say that...]

cards.name: Rue. K. Artend
cards.ability: Turn Start: The following effects are applied depending on the total number of cards in both Graves. ●10 or less: All Followers in the enemy Hand get ATK -1. ●11~20: All Followers in your Hand get ATK +1/STA +1. ●21 or more: All Followers in your Deck get ATK +2/STA +2.
cards.text: [Are you here to serve the Mother Demon? Or are you here to oppose her? Depending on your answer, my role also changes~]

cards.name: Lib. Advisor Ethel
cards.ability: Turn Start: The first Follower in your Hand is sent to the bottom of your Deck. All Followers on your Field with "Lib." in the name get ATK/STA increased by half the number of empty Slots in your Hand (rounding down).
cards.text: [Books have magic! It's not the same as the magic that we use, but they have a very beautiful kind of magic!]

cards.name: Fated Lady Seven
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower in your Hand gets SIZE -1. If that Follower has "Lady" in the name, a random Follower on your Field gets ATK +1/STA +2.
cards.text: [The weather is nice. There's no better day to go for a walk.]

cards.name: Blue Cross Florence
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on your Field gets its skills removed and gains "[Zero] ▶Defend: No effect." and "[Zero] ▶Attack: No effect.". If this happens, that Follower gets ATK +1/STA +1.
cards.text: [We have to be prepared, too. You can't just control things whenever you want.]

cards.name: GS Executive Binch
cards.ability: Turn Start: If the Turn Number is odd, a card with the name "GS Fighter" is created in your Grave, Hand, and at the bottom of your Deck. A random Follower in your Hand gets ATK/STA increased by the number of cards on your Field with "GS" in the name (by a maximum of 3).
cards.text: [What ominous smoke... It's been a long time since I've seen that flare. We have to stop our operation and prepare to retreat.]

cards.name: Sergeant Sisela
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on the enemy Field gets ATK -1, DEF -1, or STA -1.
cards.text: [We're investigating the recent attack on Royle City. Please cooperate with us.]

cards.name: Cook Club Jamie
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on the enemy Field gets its skills changed to "[Refresh!] ▶Turn Start: This card's original skills are restored."
cards.text: [Ack, as I thought... Sita's snacks cost more than everything else...]

cards.name: Lady Cox
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on your Field gets STA increased by the tens digit of the enemy Character's LIFE.
cards.text: [Hm~ over here? Eh? Eisenwane left a new message... It's been a while.]

cards.name: Sergeant Sisela
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on the enemy Field gets ATK -2, DEF -2, or STA -2.
cards.text: [Please come with me peacefully. I would like to avoid troubling any visitors.]

cards.name: Cook Club Jamie
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on the enemy Field gets its skills changed to "[Refresh!] ▶Turn Start: This card's original skills are restored." and gets ATK -1/STA-1.
cards.text: [Ah... The expenses got too high... The teacher will get mad... I wish you'd stop eating, Sita!]

cards.name: Lady Cox
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on your Field gets ATK/STA increased by the tens digit of the enemy Character's LIFE.
cards.text: [Hmm... Is that so? Mother Demon? The data she gave me doesn't match anything around here... Should I find something similar?]

cards.name: Office Chief Esprit
cards.ability: Turn Start: All Followers in the enemy Hand get their skills removed. If the Turn Number is 1, a random Spell in the enemy Hand is sent to the Grave.
cards.text: [Oh. That story is really interesting...]

cards.name: Star Bird Gart
cards.ability: Turn Start: All Followers on both Fields get STA -3. If the Turn Number is 1, a random Spell in the enemy Hand is sent to the Grave.
cards.text: [I won't forgive anyone who disturbs my girls.]

cards.name: Treanna
cards.ability: Turn Start: All Followers on the enemy Field with a SIZE less than or equal to 3 are sent to the first empty Slots on your Field and gain the skill "[To the Grave] ▶Defend: This card is sent to the Grave."
cards.text: [The world is about give and take.]

cards.name: Sita Vilosa
cards.ability: Turn Start: The Followers in Slots 1, 2, and 3 of the enemy Field get STA -3, STA -2, and STA -1 respectively. If the Turn Number is 1, a random Spell in the enemy Hand is sent to the Grave.
cards.text: [The lonely part of not having a master is not having anyone to give you bread.]

cards.name: Asmis Hara
cards.ability: Turn Start: All Followers on both Fields get their STA changed to their original values. If the Turn Number is 1, a random Spell in the enemy Hand is sent to the Grave.
cards.text: [It's another case that excites my senses! There's no case I can't solve!]

cards.name: Layna Scentriver
cards.ability: Turn Start: All Followers on your Field get STA increased by the number of cards in your Hand and get ATK increased by the number of empty Slots in your Hand. If the Turn Number is 1, a random Spell in the enemy Hand is sent to the Grave.
cards.text: [I smell a wicked scheme. As the head of the morals committee, I won't show any mercy!]

cards.name: Prinny
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on your Field and a random Follower on the enemy Field get DEF +1/STA +1 and are deactivated. If the Turn Number is 1, a random Spell in the enemy Hand is sent to the Grave.
cards.text: [Why is such a crude person like you in this sacred place...]

cards.name: Nanai Highcastle
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on the enemy Field gets STA decreased by the number of cards in your Grave (by a maximum of 5). If the Turn Number is 1, a random Spell in the enemy Hand is sent to the Grave.
cards.text: [So, what game shall we play?]

cards.name: Weekly Daily
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on the enemy Field gets ATK cut in half (rounding up). If this happens, that Follower gets STA increased by half the amount of ATK decreased (rounding down). If the Turn Number is 1, a random Spell in the enemy Hand is sent to the Grave.
cards.text: [I won't hand president Celine over! If you have no business here, then leave quietly.]

cards.name: Knight Sinclair
cards.ability: Turn Start: If the Turn Number is even, cards in Slots 3, 4, and 5 of the enemy Field are sent to the Grave. A random Follower on the enemy Field gets ATK -1/STA -1 and is sent to the bottom of the enemy Deck if it belongs to the same faction as the enemy Character. If it does not belong to the same faction as the enemy Character, it gets its skills removed instead.
cards.text: [We're just serving justice and punishing evil. This sword will exterminate all crime and punish heresy.]

cards.name: Curse's Victim
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on the enemy Field is changed to "Zombie" while retaining its current ATK/DEF/STA/SIZE and skills. If the Turn Number is 1, all Followers in your Deck get DEF +1/STA +1.
cards.text: [For some reason... I feel empty, and something is weighing on my chest... It's really painful...]

cards.name: Dark Sword's Victim
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on the enemy Field gains the following skill: "[Lethargy] ▶Attack: This card gets ATK -1." If the Turn Number is 1, all Followers in your Deck get ATK +1.
cards.text: [Come in... Is this your first experience with the knights? I'm looking for the bastard who did this to me... Why do I feel like I've seen you before?]

cards.name: Snowball Fight Bunny Lady
cards.ability: Turn Start: 2 random cards in your Grave are sent to the bottom of your Deck. If the Turn Number is 1, all Followers in your Deck get ATK=0/DEF=0/STA=15.
cards.text: [I hate meaningless battles, but if it's a snowball fight, I'm confident in myself.]

cards.name: Snowball Fight Wind Shear
cards.ability: Turn Start: 2 random cards in your Grave are sent to the bottom of your Deck. If the Turn Number is 1, all Followers in your Deck get ATK=0/DEF=5/STA=7.
cards.text: [It's important to have the help of the wind. Feel the flow of the wind.]

cards.name: Snowball Fight Wind Girl
cards.ability: Turn Start: 2 random cards in your Grave are sent to the bottom of your Deck. If the Turn Number is 1, all Followers in your Deck get ATK=0/DEF=3/STA=9.
cards.text: [If you stay inside when it's cold, you'll catch a cold! The colder it is, the harder you have to play!]

cards.name: Schindler
cards.ability: Turn Start: If there are at least 2 cards on the enemy Field, all cards on the enemy Field except one (random) are sent to the bottom of the enemy Deck.
cards.text: [If you call yourself a lady, then you have to conduct yourself with more dignity. Come in.]

cards.name: GS Captain Z
cards.ability: Turn Start: All cards on your Field/Hand with "GS" in the name are sent to the bottom of your Deck. If this happens, your Character gets LIFE increased by half the number of sent cards (rounding down).
cards.text: [These days, new recruits have all been too relaxed. We need to fix that attitude.]

cards.name: GS 1st Star
cards.ability: Turn Start: If the Turn Number is 1, all Followers in the enemy Deck get ATK -1/STA -1 and all Followers in your Deck get ATK +1/STA +1.
cards.text: [It seems like you're looking down on me. This isn't a place that midgets like you can enter so easily.]

cards.name: GS 7th Star
cards.ability: Turn Start: All Followers on your Field whose ATK is 5 or less get ATK +3/STA +1 and are sent to the top of your Deck. If the Turn Number is 1, all Followers in your Deck get STA +2.
cards.text: [This place is very dangerous. Hurry and leave. It'll be bad if you're caught by one of the other executives.]

cards.name: GS 5th Star
cards.ability: Turn Start: All Followers on your Field get their "Attack" skills changed to "[Training] ▶Attack: This card gets ATK +1/STA +1." Any Followers on your Field without any "Attack" skills get ATK +2/STA +2.
cards.text: [For some reason, everyone is giving me a funny look... You're really lucky. I'm in a "low" mood right now. If I were in a "high" mood, I'd make you play with me.]

cards.name: GS 3rd Star
cards.ability: Turn Start: A card with the name "GS Fighter" is created at the bottom of your Deck. If the Turn Number is a multiple of 3, all cards in your Deck with the name "GS Fighter" are sent to the Grave. Your Character gets LIFE increased by the number of sent cards.
cards.text: [For... no, to achieve my goals, sorry about this, but I need you to come here quietly. If you do, I'll make it as painless as possible.]

cards.name: GS 6th Star
cards.ability: Turn Start: If there are at least 21 cards in your Grave and the Turn Number is at least 7, the enemy Character gets LIFE -7.
cards.text: [If you don't have a pass from the leader, you can't go past these doors. If you want to live much longer, turn away.]

cards.name: Schindler
cards.ability: Turn Start: If there are at least 2 Followers on the enemy Field, all cards on the enemy Field except one (random) are sent to the enemy Grave. If there is only 1 Follower on the enemy Field, that Follower gets ATK -1/STA -1.
cards.text: [You little ladies are so spirited. I really like it. Come here. I'll tell you anything you want to know.]

cards.name: Rio
cards.ability: Turn Start: All Followers in your Hand get ATK +2/STA +2.
cards.text: [Come in. Are you here to hear the Sage's story?]

cards.name: Esprit
cards.ability: Turn Start: All Followers in the enemy Hand get their skills removed. If the Turn Number is 1, a random Spell in the enemy Hand is sent to the Grave.
cards.text: [Um, did you come here after that lump of fat explained things to you? Well, I'll talk about people in the order of appearance.]

cards.name: Isfeldt
cards.ability: Turn Start: All cards on the enemy Field with a SIZE of 2 or less are sent to the bottom of the enemy Deck, and a random Follower on your Field gets ATK/STA increased by the number of sent cards. 2 random cards in your Grave are sent to the bottom of your Deck.
cards.text: [Oh, how disrespectful of you to buy the bread I already picked. Mass Recall!]

cards.name: Ginger
cards.ability: Turn Start: Followers on your Field with a SIZE greater than or equal to the number of cards on your Field get ATK +1/STA +1.
cards.text: [You beat me with that amount of skill? It's not the climax yet!?]

cards.name: Undertaker
cards.ability: Turn Start: The following effects are applied depending on the total number of cards in both Graves. ●10 or less: All Followers in the enemy Hand get ATK -1. ●11~20: All Followers in your Hand get ATK +1/STA +1. ●21 or more: All Followers in your Deck get ATK +2/STA +2.
cards.text: [Grandma called me, Undertaker, to take that magic stone!]

cards.name: Laevateinn
cards.ability: Turn Start: If your Character's LIFE is 7 or less, it gets LIFE +5.
cards.text: [Hm? Why are you still unscathed?] [Me? It's because I'm like you. So, please disappear.]

cards.name: Sigma
cards.ability: Turn Start: If the enemy Hand has an even number of cards, a random card in an even-numbered Slot on the enemy Field is sent to the Grave. If the enemy Hand has an odd number of cards, a random card in an odd-numbered Slot on the enemy Field is sent to the Grave.
cards.text: [I can't overlook your actions any longer. What do you want to know? Eldest daughter of the Pacificas...]

cards.name: Jaina
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on your Field gets ATK +2/STA +2. If the Turn Number is 1, all Followers in your Deck get DEF +1/STA +1.
cards.text: [How about it? If you become a knight, you can research using all of our resources.]

cards.name: Disaster Maid
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on your Field gets STA -2. A random Follower on the enemy Field gets STA -4.
cards.text: [Why does everyone look happy... Because of all the mistakes I make every day, I can't face Master Linia...]

cards.name: Master Cleaning Maid
cards.ability: Turn Start: All cards on the enemy Field are sent to the bottom of the enemy Deck.
cards.text: [It's great to have tea time after all the cleaning's finished. This is one of the precious times in this world.]

cards.name: Parlor Maid Rise
cards.ability: Turn Start: If the Turn Number is 1, all Spells in the enemy Deck get SIZE +1. If the Turn Number is 10, all Followers in the enemy Deck get SIZE=10.
cards.text: [We're all very happy. This place makes you feel that way. The sweet perfume makes you feel at peace...]

cards.name: Gourmet Maid
cards.ability: Turn Start: If the Turn Number is 1, all Followers in your Deck get ATK +1/STA +1. If the Turn Number is 3, all Followers in your Deck get DEF +1. If the Turn Number is 7, all Followers in your Deck get ATK +1/DEF +1/STA +1.
cards.text: [This is a special sauce that Master Linia picked... The sweet smell excites the senses.]

cards.name: Head Maid Seron
cards.ability: Turn Start: Your Character gets LIFE increased by the number of cards in your Hand. If the Turn Number is 1, all Followers in your Deck get STA +3. If the Turn Number is 8, all Followers in your Deck get ATK +1/DEF +1/STA +1.
cards.text: [Oh my, this place is off limits to outsiders. I don't know how you got in here, but please leave.]

cards.name: M10 Bulletta
cards.ability: Turn Start: If the Turn Number is 1, all Followers in your Deck get ATK +1/STA +1.
cards.text: [We're starting my game. "Lazion Roulette"]

cards.name: RPG-7 Arat
cards.ability: Turn Start: If the Turn Number is 1, all Followers in the enemy Deck get DEF -1.
cards.text: [My sisters call me the magician. You're lucky that I won't tell you why!]

cards.name: IS-2 Merca
cards.ability: Turn Start: All Followers on your Field get ATK/STA increased by their own DEF.
cards.text: [Mission complete! My artillery is perfect!]

cards.name: FFR-31 Eiry
cards.ability: Turn Start: If the Turn Number is 1, all cards in your Deck get SIZE -1.
cards.text: [Clear. One-Winged Witch is returning.]

cards.name: GP03S Mara
cards.ability: Turn Start: All Followers on your Field get ATK/STA increased by the difference between their current SIZE and original SIZE.
cards.text: [Yay~ Happy! Thank you, trespasser! I finally get to ride it!]

cards.name: M1917 Bulletta
cards.ability: Turn Start: All Followers on the enemy Field without "Attack" skills get ATK decreased by half their own ATK (rounding down).
cards.text: [The first time has a 17% chance. I wonder how long your mind will last?]

cards.name: RPG-32 Arat
cards.ability: Turn Start: If the Turn Number is 1, all Followers in the enemy Deck get ATK -1/STA -1, and all Followers in your Deck get ATK +1/DEF +1/STA +1.
cards.text: [The most important things to the magician are rhythm, power, and concentration.]

cards.name: IS-3 Merca
cards.ability: Turn Start: All Followers on your Field get ATK +2/STA +2. A random Follower on your Field gets its SIZE changed to its original value.
cards.text: [The best part is when the air gets sliced by the reverberation.]

cards.name: GP03D Mara
cards.ability: Turn Start: All Followers on the enemy Field get ATK -3.
cards.text: [Oh! This feeling! Walker power!]

cards.name: Mysterious Organism X
cards.ability: Turn Start: The first card in your Grave is removed from the game. A random Follower on the enemy Field gets ATK/STA decreased by half the number of cards in your Grave (rounding up).
cards.text: [Kris, look! They're so cute!] [Oh! With a customer?] [Come in.]

cards.name: Mysterious Organism Y
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on the enemy Field whose STA is at least 10 gets STA cut in half (rounding up).
cards.text: [Yes! I desire darkness!]

cards.name: Aka Flina
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on the enemy Field whose ATK is at least 10 gets ATK cut in half (rounding up).
cards.text: [Here's the fresh RH blood. I hurried so the ice wouldn't melt.]

cards.name: Mysterious Organism Z
cards.ability: Turn Start: Your Character gets LIFE decreased by the number of cards on your Field and the enemy Character gets LIFE decreased by the number of cards on the enemy Field.
cards.text: [It's so cool. Don't you want to come moonbathe, too?]

cards.name: Crescent Woodbridge
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on the enemy Field gets ATK/STA decreased by twice the number of enemy Shuffles. If the enemy has 0 Shuffles, a random Follower on the enemy Field is destroyed, then the enemy gets Shuffles=2.
cards.text: [Why is it always so loud right when I'm about to succeed.]

cards.name: Rion Flina
cards.ability: Turn Start: All Followers on the enemy Field get ATK/STA decreased by the amount that their original SIZE exceeds their current SIZE.
cards.text: [I'm invincible! Immortal! This is the artifact's power! There's nobody who can surpass Rion, now! This detective agency is mine!]

cards.name: Cinia
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random card on the enemy Field is sent to the first Slot in the enemy Grave, Hand, or Deck (chosen randomly).
cards.text: [I don't really want to, but I'll leave it to you. You little ladies are pretty famous as detectives, so I'll put your skill to the test.]

cards.name: Shion Flina
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random card on your Field is sent to the top of your Deck. The enemy Character gets LIFE decreased by the sent card's SIZE.
cards.text: [I've gotten some inspiration! The thing you're looking for is up ahead!] [Shion, your eyes are scary...] [Sh... shut up!]

cards.name: Wind Sneaker
cards.ability: Turn Start: The enemy Character gets LIFE decreased by the tens digit of the number of cards in the enemy Deck. 2 random Followers on the enemy Field get ATK/STA decreased by 1 + the tens digit of the number of cards in the enemy Grave.
cards.text: [What do you want with me? You'll never catch me with that speed! I can run faster! Jump higher! Bring it on!]

cards.name: Esprit
cards.ability: Turn Start: If there are at least 3 cards on the enemy Field, a random card on the enemy Field is destroyed. Your Character gets LIFE increased by half the destroyed card's SIZE (rounding down).
cards.text: [Hey, midgets! What the hell have you been doing while I was gone?]

cards.name: Rio
cards.ability: Turn Start: Your Character gets LIFE decreased by the number of cards in the enemy Deck. 2 random Followers on your Field get ATK/STA increased by the tens digit of the number of cards in the enemy Deck.
cards.text: [Those two have turned into respectable detectives. So, will you listen to my request?]

cards.name: Angler Yushin
cards.ability: Turn Start: If Slot 1 of the enemy Field is empty, the card in Slot 3 of the enemy Field is sent to the Grave. A random card on the enemy Field is moved to the next empty Slot.
cards.text: [Where am I? Who am I? Somebody help me~]

cards.name: Mephisto Elizabeth
cards.ability: Turn Start: The last Follower on your Field is moved to the next Slot. If the new Slot number is 5, the enemy Character gets LIFE -5.
cards.text: [Huhuhu. I wonder how your blood tastes. Will you let me have a taste?]

cards.name: Linus
cards.ability: Turn Start: If the first card in the enemy Hand is a Spell, the first Follower on the enemy Field gets STA -3.
cards.text: [D... Don't treat me like a fool! Get ready! I'll bet my pride as a detective that I'll be victorious!]

cards.name: First Empress Xiaomei
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on the enemy Field gets ATK decreased by the difference in SIZE of the first 2 cards in the enemy Hand.
cards.text: [I am the 108th Lee, Lee Xiaomei. I will demonstrate the power of Lee exorcism.]

cards.name: Frankenstein Simon
cards.ability: Turn Start: The first Follower on your Field with a SIZE of 3 gets STA changed to its original value.
cards.text: [Mygazette Series! Huhuhu, nobody can stand before Simon Austin's parascience!]

cards.name: Mugi, Master of Arts
cards.ability: Turn Start: The first Follower on the enemy Field with a SIZE of 3 is sent to the bottom of the enemy Deck.
cards.text: [Innocent and pure Mugimugi is here! ... Um, why are you running away? H, hello?]

cards.name: Surt Grace
cards.ability: Turn Start: All Followers on the enemy Field whose Slot numbers and DEF are both odd or both even get ATK -1/STA -1.
cards.text: [Battles are the specialty of Valkyrie Grace Euphoria! Now, who will be my opponent?]

cards.name: Heavenly Sage Iring
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on your Field is sent to the Grave. The enemy Character gets LIFE decreased by half the sent card's SIZE (rounding down).
cards.text: [How annoying... let's finish quickly.]

cards.name: Shiva Ain
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on your Field gets SIZE +1/ATK +1/DEF +1/STA +1.
cards.text: [Yahoo~! I call myself Ain Rubylight! I'm the only crimson one. So, want to play?]

cards.name: Gold Lion Nold
cards.ability: Turn Start: All Followers on your Field get SIZE -1.
cards.text: [You stand at the crossroads, traveler. What is your purpose?]

cards.name: Queen Cannelle
cards.ability: Turn Start: All Followers on your Field with a SIZE of 3 or less get ATK +2/STA +2.
cards.text: [Foolish humans, I will show you the difference between us.]

cards.name: Star Bird Gart
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on the enemy Field is deactivated.
cards.text: [The stars reveal the dreams of their watchers. My duty is to watch over your dreams.]

cards.name: Twilight Wolf Ginger
cards.ability: Turn Start: All Followers on your Field get ATK +3.
cards.text: [Do you plan to stand on the stage of destiny with that kind of ability? It is not the climax yet!!]

cards.name: Flame Laevateinn
cards.ability: Turn Start: If your Character's LIFE is 9 or less, it gets LIFE +5.
cards.text: [Ha... I'm not interested in real fights. Well, I'll definitely receive my payment, so I'll do this much for you. Who is the target?]

cards.name: Trickster Twins
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Spell in your Grave is sent to the bottom of your Deck. A Follower named "Scardel Shion Flina" or a Follower named "Scardel Rion Flina" is created in the first empty Slot in your Field, and then those Followers get SIZE -1.
cards.text: [Satisfy us! We want an even more interesting trick! Well? We'll give you one last chance to change your mind. Now~ Final answer!]

cards.name: Pegasus Sigma
cards.ability: Turn Start: If the enemy Hand has an even number of cards, a random card in an even-numbered Slot on the enemy Field is sent to the Grave. If the enemy Hand has an odd number of cards, a random card in an odd-numbered Slot on the enemy Field is sent to the Grave. All Followers on your Field get ATK +1/STA +1.
cards.text: [I cannot overlook your activities any longer. What do you wish to know, eldest daughter of the Pacificas...] [I have everything I want. I'm just waiting for the right time.]

cards.name: Cinia's Pet Panica
cards.ability: Turn Start: If the Turn Number is odd, a random Follower on the enemy Field's ATK is halved (rounding up). If the Turn Number is even, a random Follower on the enemy Field's STA is halved (rounding up).
cards.text: [Take me for a walk! Stupid humans! Don't you know where I came from?]

cards.name: Artificial Vampire
cards.ability: Turn Start: The first card in your Grave is sent to the bottom of your Deck. If the enemy Character has 10 or less LIFE, the enemy Character gets LIFE -10.
cards.text: [Okay~ Let's start the game. It's my turn. What? That's boring... Give me some excitement! Cry more! Bark! And... Die.]

cards.name: True Vampire God
cards.ability: Turn Start: The first card in your Grave is sent to the bottom of your Deck. If the enemy Character has 15 or more LIFE, the enemy Character gets LIFE -1. If the enemy Character has 8 or less LIFE, the enemy Character gets LIFE -8.
cards.text: [Don't compare me to that puny imitation. Well whatever. I'm curious what your blood tastes like.]

cards.name: Shining Form Nexia
cards.ability: Turn Start: The first card in your Grave is sent to the bottom of your Deck. All Followers on your Field get ATK +3/STA +3.
cards.text: [Did you see... the past? The path that you came on... the past of those that you know... I will see if you are worthy... to continue to the future!]

cards.name: Vita Principal
cards.ability: Turn Start: The first card in your Grave is sent to the bottom of your Deck. All Followers on the enemy Field get their skills removed. Your Character gets LIFE increased by the number of Followers whose skills were removed.
cards.text: [Boys, be ambitious!] [This... is a girl's school.]

cards.name: Vernika's Sorrow
cards.ability: Turn Start: All Spells in the enemy Hand are sent to the Grave. A random card in your Grave is sent to the bottom of your Deck. If your Character's LIFE is 5 or less, both Characters' LIFE becomes the average between the two (rounding up), and all cards on both players' Fields are sent to the Grave.
cards.text: [It's depressing. Why can't I receive love? I just want someone by my side. I would give everything just to be with someone. I can't be saved from my loneliness.]

cards.name: Rio
cards.ability: Turn Start: All Followers in your Hand get ATK +2/STA +2.
cards.text: [I hope that you achieve what you wish for one day. How are you lately?]

cards.name: Queen Ereshkigal
cards.ability: Turn Start: If the Turn Number is not 1, the enemy Character gets LIFE -2 for each empty Slot in the enemy Hand. All Followers on the enemy Field with stats that are higher than their original values are sent to the bottom of the enemy Deck. (HINT: Dead or Alive)
cards.text: [Welcome to the nether train station. There are 30 seconds left before the train departs.] [Have you seen a girl named Vernika?] [A girl named Vernika. She didn't have a ticket, so she couldn't board.] [What?] [Location: Muspelheim 40F]

cards.name: Apostle L Red Sun
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower in your Grave is sent to the first empty Slot of your Field. If this happens, that Follower gets SIZE=1 and ATK +3/STA +3. A random card in your Grave is sent to the bottom of your Deck.
cards.text: [Guard your faith. I will protect your faith. God is watching over us.]

cards.name: Eisenwane
cards.ability: Turn Start: All cards in your Grave are sent to the bottom of your Deck. All Followers in your Deck get ATK +1/STA +1.
cards.text: [The aloof knight captain stands alone. Her appearance seems odd, and the parrot on her shoulder speaks instead of her.]

cards.name: 2S Tracer Four
cards.ability: Turn Start: If your Character has 7 or less LIFE, your Character gets LIFE=7. If the Turn Number is 10, your Character gets LIFE=0.
