cards.text: [Won't you play with me? Cute detective girl? If you beat me, I'll tell you something. I know something you don't know.]

cards.name: Leilang Henlifei
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on your Field gets ATK +1/STA +2 and a random Follower on the enemy Field gets ATK -1/STA -2.
cards.text: [Not bad. Playtime is over. I will show you why I am called the Lightning Wolf.]

cards.name: Isfeldt
cards.ability: Turn Start: All cards on the enemy Field with a SIZE of 2 or less are sent to the bottom of the enemy Deck, and a random Follower on your Field gets ATK/STA increased by the number of sent cards. 2 random cards in your Grave are sent to the bottom of your Deck. An additional effect is applied depending on the location of the battle.
cards.text: [Welcome to our chocolate factory. Is this your first time? Huhu, I hope you have a good time.]

cards.name: Magicat
cards.ability: Turn Start: If the Turn Number is 1, all Followers in your Deck get ATK +2/STA +2 and the enemy gets Shuffles -1. All Spells in the enemy Hand get SIZE +1. All Followers on the enemy Field get ATK -1/STA -1. The enemy Character gets LIFE -1. (The power of Talentium radiates from its necklace. Your energy is completely drained the moment you touch it.)
cards.text: [Meow~] [As soon as you thought about touching the cat, its necklace began to shine.]

cards.name: Witch Queen Linia
cards.ability: Turn Start: All Followers on the enemy Field with stats higher than their original values have their stats changed to their original values. All Followers on your Field with stats lower than their original values have their stats changed to their original values. If the Turn Number is even, your Character gets LIFE +3. 3 cards in your Grave are sent to the bottom of your Deck.(Everything within this world moves according to my wishes. I will quickly get the upper Hand.)
cards.text: [How rude of you to come here uninvited. Why don't you disappear from my paradise?]

cards.name: Spirit Amrita
cards.ability: Turn Start: If the Turn Number is 1, all Followers in your Deck get ATK +1/STA +1. If there are no Followers on the enemy Field, your Character gets LIFE +1, a random Follower on your Field gets ATK +0~3/STA +0~3, a random Spell in the enemy Hand is sent to the bottom of the enemy Deck, and 3 cards in your Grave are sent to the bottom of your Deck. (I will show you something beyond what you can see or hear.)
cards.text: [Who is knocking at the altar's door? The ritual requires a key.]

cards.name: Soma
cards.ability: Turn Start: If the Turn Number is 1, all Followers in your Deck get ATK +2/DEF +1/STA +2. 2 random Followers on the enemy Field get ATK/STA decreased by the number of Followers in the bottom 3 cards of your Deck. If your Deck has 5 or less cards, all cards in the enemy Hand are sent to the Grave. (I will test your willpower.)
cards.text: [Amrita? Who are you? Did you awaken me? My name is... Soma. I am the key to reach the door.]

cards.name: Royle Police Chief
cards.ability: Turn Start: The first Follower in your Deck is sent to the first empty Slot in your Field gets its SIZE halved (rounding up). A random Follower on the enemy Field gets STA decreased by half its SIZE (rounding up) and is sent to the top of the enemy Deck. (Hm? You plan to interfere with my duties? You're bold, aren't you?)
cards.text: [I am the chief of the Royle Police Force, Seresty. I need your cooperation for my current task... What? Hurry and start.]

cards.name: Penguin Suit Rianna
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on the enemy Field is moved to a random empty Slot on the enemy Field. The following effects are applied depending on the Followers new Slot number. 1: The moved Follower is destroyed. 2~4: All cards on the enemy Field are sent to the bottom of the enemy Deck. 5: The moved Follower's skills are removed. If this happens, your Character gets LIFE +3. (The penguin suit holds some secrets. What could they be?)
cards.text: [Isn't this suit cute?]

cards.name: Black Lion
cards.ability: Turn Start: If the Turn Number is 1, all Followers in your Deck get ATK +3/STA +3. If the Turn Number is odd, all Spells in the enemy Hand are sent to the Grave. If the Turn Number is even, all Followers in the enemy Field are sent to the Grave. If the Turn Number is at least 10, the enemy Character may get LIFE=0. (Dark soul unleashed!)
cards.text: [One day, a tremendous evil that nobody had ever seen before appeared. Everyone called it the Black Lion, and it resembled Nold for some reason.]

cards.name: Codename Q.B.
cards.ability: Turn Start: All cards in your Deck, Hand, and Field get SIZE -1. If the Turn Number is odd, all Followers in your Deck get ATK +1/STA +1. (Don't underestimate the power of Muzisitter.)
cards.text: [Welcome to the Land of Muzisitter. However, the person you are looking for is not here.]

cards.name: Badminton Sita
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on the enemy Field gets ATK -1/STA -1. If the Turn Number is 1, all cards in your Deck get SIZE -1 and all Followers in your Deck get ATK +1/STA +2.
cards.text: [This is a racket...?] [That's right, Sita. You just take it and "bounce" the ball back.] [... Do I have to bounce it...?]

cards.name: Archery Cinia
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on the enemy Field gets ATK -1/STA -1. If the Turn Number is 1, all cards in your Deck get SIZE -1 and all Followers in your Deck get ATK +1/STA +2.
cards.text: [I was slightly worried that I would miss if the wind blew. However, I focused everything into my own hands and shot with confidence.]

cards.name: Judo Luthica
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on the enemy Field gets ATK -1/STA -1. If the Turn Number is 1, all cards in your Deck get SIZE -1 and all Followers in your Deck get ATK +1/STA +2.
cards.text: [I will end this in in a single match.]

cards.name: Ping Pong Iri
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on the enemy Field gets ATK -1/STA -1. If the Turn Number is 1, all cards in your Deck get SIZE -1 and all Followers in your Deck get ATK +1/STA +2.
cards.text: [That ball. It will return to me.] [Th-that's! That's the "Flina Zone"!]

cards.name: Homeless Cannelle
cards.ability: Turn Start: 2 random Followers in your Hand get SIZE +1/ATK +1/DEF +1/STA +1. A random Follower in your hand gets STA increased by its SIZE. A random Follower on the enemy Field gets SIZE -1/ATK -1/DEF -1/STA -1.
cards.text: [Leave me alone. I'm just a poor homeless girl.]

cards.name: Final Witness Kana GLS
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on the enemy Field with a total ATK/DEF/STA of at least 20 gets ATK +2/STA +2. If that Follower has a total ATK/DEF/STA of at least 30, it is destroyed.
cards.text: [This is place is the end space. It will become one with your world soon. Of course, this place isn't really the end, but it is for me.]

cards.name: Altar Guardian Novic
cards.ability: Turn Start: All Followers on the enemy Field get their stats changed to their original values minus 2 if their stats are higher than their original values. All Followers on your Field get their stats changed to their original values plus 2 if their stats are lower than their original values. All cards in your Grave are sent to the bottom of your deck.
cards.text: [The altar is the place where the door may be opened. That's all it is. There is no significance behind it.]

cards.name: Madness Maid
cards.ability: Turn Start: All Followers on your Field get ATK +2/STA -2. All Followers on the enemy Field get STA -1.

cards.name: Celine Hastur
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on the enemy Field is deactivated. If this happens, that Follower gets ATK -2/STA +2. 2 random Followers on your Field get ATK +1/DEF +1. If the Turn Number is 1, all Followers in your Deck get ATK +1/DEF +1/STA +1 and a random Spell in the enemy Hand is sent to the Grave.
cards.text: [Tada, improv special stage! Of course, isn't it expected that I'll be the one to finish things off?]

cards.name: Elleon and Sita
cards.ability: Turn Start: All Followers on the enemy Field get ATK/STA decreased by the number of skills they each possess. If the Turn Number is 1, all Spells in your Deck get SIZE -1 and all Followers in your Deck get ATK +1/DEF +1/STA +1.
cards.text: [What an amazing move! Then I won't hold anything back!]

cards.name: May and Cinia
cards.ability: Turn Start: All Followers on the enemy Field get ATK/STA decreased by the number of skills they each possess. If the Turn Number is 1, all Spells in your Deck get SIZE -1 and all Followers in your Deck get ATK +1/DEF +1/STA +1.
cards.text: [I'll just burn everything down!]

cards.name: Tinia and Luthica
cards.ability: Turn Start: All Followers on the enemy Field get ATK/STA decreased by the number of skills they each possess. If the Turn Number is 1, all Spells in your Deck get SIZE -1 and all Followers in your Deck get ATK +1/DEF +1/STA +1.
cards.text: [The sea is mysterious and beautiful... But, you shouldn't overlook the fact that the endless depths are also quite frightening.]

cards.name: Audry and Iri
cards.ability: Turn Start: All Followers on the enemy Field get ATK/STA decreased by the number of skills they each possess. If the Turn Number is 1, all Spells in your Deck get SIZE -1 and all Followers in your Deck get ATK +1/DEF +1/STA +1.
cards.text: [This world is really amazing... You're also lonely and sad, like me...]

cards.name: Drillmaster Pace
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower in your Hand gets ATK/STA increased by half the number of cards in the enemy Hand (rounding up). If the Turn Number is odd, all cards in the enemy Hand are sent to the bottom of the enemy Deck. If the Turn Number is even, cards in Slots 3, 4, and 5 of the enemy Field are sent to the Grave.
cards.text: [You can never break a knight's determination! If you're not afraid of my light shield, then come at me!]

cards.name: Snow Fairy
cards.ability: Turn Start: 3 random cards in your Grave are sent to the bottom of your Deck. If the Turn Number is 1, all Followers in your Deck get ATK=0/DEF=3/STA=15 and all Followers in the enemy Deck get ATK=0.
cards.text: [You people over there, will you play with me? The rules are simple!]

cards.name: GS Leader Schindler
cards.ability: Turn Start: If there are at least 2 Followers on the enemy Field, all cards on the enemy Field except one (random) are sent to your Grave. Your Character gets LIFE increased by twice the number of sent Followers. If there are at least 7 cards in your Grave, the enemy Character gets LIFE -3. The last card in your Grave is sent to the bottom of your Deck.
cards.text: [What did you think of our GS City? Did you have enough fun?]

cards.name: Rio
cards.ability: Turn Start: All Followers on both Fields get their ATK/DEF/STA changed to their original values.
cards.text: [We're still at the beginning, but the things we'll tell you next time will surprise you. Please prepare your heart when you come next time.]

cards.name: Maid Lesnoa
cards.ability: Turn Start: The first Spell in the enemy Grave is sent to the first empty Slot on your Field. The enemy Character gets LIFE decreased by half the sent card's SIZE (rounding up).
cards.text: [This place is where Master Linia is. She said she is tired right now, so please leave.]

cards.name: Mecha Gart
cards.ability: Turn Start: If the Turn Number is 1, all Followers in the enemy Deck get DEF +1.
cards.text: [Different! Pidgeon! From a pidgeon!] [Stop messing around, professor!]

cards.name: Mecha Nold
cards.ability: Turn Start: Your entire Deck is restored to its original state. All Followers on the enemy Field whose current SIZE and original SIZE differ by at least 2 are sent to the Grave.
cards.text: [Roar! If you give me a piece of rice cake, I won't eat you.] [Professor, what's with this sample voice?]

cards.name: Mecha Sigma
cards.ability: Turn Start: The first card in the enemy Hand that is not called "Game Starter" is changed into "Game Starter".
cards.text: [Albatross! Light of life!] [In the end, the professor is always like this!]

cards.name: Ancient Vampire God Sira
cards.ability: Turn Start: All Followers on your Field whose current ATK is greater than their original ATK get STA increased by twice the amount that their ATK exceeds their original ATK.
cards.text: [She is the younger sister of the so-called pure blooded vampire, First Blood. In contrast to her sister, who has slept for most of her life, she enjoys traveling around the world.]

cards.name: Shionrion Extreme
cards.ability: Turn Start: All Followers on the enemy Field get SIZE -1. A random Follower on the enemy Field whose current SIZE and original SIZE differ by at least 3 is destroyed. If this happens, a random Follower in the enemy Hand gets SIZE -1.
cards.text: [Shion! Rion! The two of us are one detective group! We know your worries and requests before you even tell us!]

cards.name: Yuzu
cards.ability: Turn Start: A random Follower on the enemy Field gets the following effects depending on the SIZES present in the enemy Hand. ●SIZE 1: SIZE +1. ●SIZE 2: ATK -1. ●SIZE 3: STA -1. ●SIZE 4: DEF -1. ●SIZE 5: ATK -1/STA -1.
cards.text: [Tada! The final boss is Yuzu. Huhu, do I live up to your expectations?]

cards.name: Judge Kana. LTD
cards.ability: Turn Start: If the Turn Number is 1, all cards in your Deck get SIZE=2.
cards.text: [Everything that has been tainted will be eliminated, be it now or later. Who shall be the next one to disappear?]

cards.name: Heartless Blow
cards.ability: A random Follower on the enemy Field gets STA -4. If your Character has "Sita" in the name, a random Follower on the enemy Field gets STA -2. If the number of cards on your Field is less than or equal to the number of cards on the enemy Field, the previous effects become STA -5 and STA -3 respectively.
cards.text: [... Sita's merciless. How can she look the fish in the eyes and still calmly cut off its head?] [Just because...]

cards.name: Student Orientation
cards.ability: 2 random Vita Followers on your Field get ATK +2/STA +2.
cards.text: [Congratulations on enrolling! Sita!] [... yeah.]

cards.name: Cooking Failure
cards.ability: If there are any Followers on your Field with "Cook Club" in the name, 2 random Vita Followers on your Field get SIZE +1/ATK +1/DEF +1/STA +2. If both of those Followers have "Cook Club" in the name, they get an additional ATK +1/STA +1.
cards.text: [This time was a failure, too...] [How do you even make it explode like that?]

cards.name: Ward Rupture
cards.ability: If there is a Vita Follower in Slot 3 of your Field and a card in Slot 3 of the enemy Field, the Vita Follower in Slot 3 of your Field gets ATK/DEF/STA increased by the difference in SIZES of that Follower and the card in Slot 3 of the enemy Field.
cards.text: [The moment Sita's hand touched it, the mage's barrier shattered into pieces like glass.]

cards.name: New Recipe
cards.ability: Your Character gets LIFE increased by 8 - the total SIZE of your Field (by a maximum of 5).
cards.text: [Everyone only makes sweets... I'll figure something out by myself!]

cards.name: Shrink
cards.ability: The Follower on the enemy Field with the highest SIZE gets SIZE/ATK/DEF/STA cut in half (rounding down).
cards.text: [Have you ever felt uncomfortable because something was too big? How about making it smaller? Hm? An object? No, just you.]

cards.name: Balance
cards.ability: If the difference between your Character's LIFE and the enemy Character's LIFE is 20 or less, both Characters get LIFE changed to equal the average of the two (rounding up). If this happens, starting from Slot 1, cards are sent to the Grave from the Field that has the most cards until there are an equal number of cards in both Fields. If you have a Vita Character, all Followers in your Hand are sent to the Grave. Otherwise, all cards in your Hand are sent to the Grave.
cards.text: [Everything will lose meaning and become the same. You, me, everything.]

cards.name: Rumored Order
cards.ability: The Vita Follower on your Field with the highest SIZE gets SIZE -2/STA +2.
cards.text: [The alliance sent out an order for the Scarlet Mage! What do you think? Don't you think something interesting is going to happen? Sita?]

cards.name: Omnivore
cards.ability: 2 random Followers on your Field get STA increased by 1 + the number of different SIZES of cards in your Hand.
cards.text: [It's edible...] [Th, that's!! Animal... food...]

cards.name: Volcano
cards.ability: A random Follower on the enemy Field gets ATK/DEF/STA decreased by the number of Vita Followers in your Hand.
cards.text: [Spicy!!!!!!] [Aw, I'm glad you like it.]

cards.name: Accident
cards.ability: 2 random Followers on the enemy Field get ATK/STA decreased by the number of Followers on your Field with "Maid" in the name. If the amount decreased was 2, they get an additional DEF -1.
cards.text: [Ah! Cinia's cherished tea set!]

cards.name: New Maid Training
cards.ability: 2 random Academy Followers on your Field get ATK +2/STA +2.
cards.text: [Learn the way things work at this mansion, okay?] [Yes!]

cards.name: She Did It
cards.ability: If there are any Followers on your Field with "Maid" in the name, all Followers on your Field get SIZE=1 and a random Follower on your Field gets SIZE increased by the total amount of SIZE decreased. That Follower gets STA increased by half the amount of SIZE increased (rounding down). If that card has "Maid" in the name, it gets ATK increased by the same amount.
cards.text: [It... it wasn't me, it was her! I swear by my master's name that I would never break it!] [I'm your master...]

cards.name: Noble Sacrifice
cards.ability: The Academy Follower on your Field with the highest SIZE is sent to the grave. Your Character gets LIFe increased by twice the sent Follower's SIZE (by a maximum of 9).
cards.text: [It's like putting the bell on the cat. To the maids, putting her shoes on is an important task.]

cards.name: Tighten Security
cards.ability: The first Academy Follower on your Field gets DEF set equal to the number of Academy cards in your Hand and ATK/STA increased by half the change in DEF (rounding up).
cards.text: [I have to bring Rose to the meeting place safely. This meeting is very important.]

cards.name: Bondage
cards.ability: 3 random Followers on the enemy Field get SIZE +1.
cards.text: [You've been caught! Once you've been shackled, you can't escape!]

cards.name: Curse
cards.ability: If you have an Academy Character, 2 random Followers on the enemy Field get ATK -2/STA -2.
cards.text: [The foundation of curses is to believe the enemy is weaker than you. Because of that, Cinia is excellent at curses. She believes there is nobody stronger than her.]

cards.name: Swap Spell
cards.ability: The first Follower on the enemy Field and the Follower in Slot 3 of your Field get their SIZE/ATK/DEF/STA swapped.
cards.text: [The basic principle of a fight is to find out where the opponent is stronger than you. Hm? It should be where the opponent is weaker? I don't need that. I just take their strengths, anyway.]

cards.name: Mass Recall
cards.ability: All cards on the enemy Field with a SIZE of 3 or less and all non-Academy cards on your Field are sent to the Grave.
cards.text: [Go back, warm tea and sweets have been prepared. Let's tea time!]

cards.name: Forced Entry
cards.ability: The SIZES of the cards in Slot 3 of your Field and Slot 3 of the enemy Field are compared. The card with the lower SIZE is destroyed. If both cards have the same SIZE, the card in Slot 3 of the enemy Field is sent to the Grave.
cards.text: [When the Scarlet Mage stepped off the final step of the stairs, we saw him. Beyond here was the entrance to the ruins. Everyone, including myself, was struck to the ground. After the flash of light came a peal of thunder, leaving us in agony.]

cards.name: Saint's Blessing
cards.ability: All Crux Followers on your Field get STA +3. If your Character has "Luthica" in the name, those Followers get an additional ATK +3.
cards.text: [No matter what, your determination to protect must remain strong. Strengthen your heart!]

cards.name: Close Encounter
cards.ability: 2 random Crux Followers on your Field get ATK +2/STA +2.
cards.text: [Kyaa!! The vampire called from behind. "Are you looking for the master of the Flinas? I can guide you. Of course, I don't know if I can hold out until we get there. Heehee."]

cards.name: Entry Denied
cards.ability: The first Follower on your Field gets ATK +3 and is deactivated. If this happens, the Follower on the enemy Field with the highest SIZE is deactivated.
cards.text: [Ehh? Why? Why can't I come in?] [We've been ordered by Crux to not let anyone in.]

cards.name: Healing Magic
cards.ability: Your Character gets LIFE increased by the number of cards in your Hand.
cards.text: [The foundation of healing magic is a strong wish. Think of something you want to protect. The magic part comes later.]

cards.name: Sky Surprise
cards.ability: The first Follower on your Field is sent to the enemy Field and deactivated. The enemy Character gets LIFE decreased by half the sent card's SIZE (rounding up), then that Follower gets SIZE=1.
cards.text: [The thing that fell from the sky was a girl. Luthica examined the girl for a necklace, but there was nothing like a necklace that allowed flight.]

cards.name: Meadow Leisure
cards.ability: A random Follower on your Field gets ATK increased by the number of cards on your Field minus 1 and gets STA increased by the number of cards on your Field plus 1.
cards.text: [It's thanks to the efforts of you knights that we have this time to relax. Never forget the efforts that brought about this peace.]

cards.name: Knight's Letter
cards.ability: If there are an equal number of cards on your Field and the enemy Field, 2 random cards on the enemy Field are sent to the bottom of the enemy Deck.
cards.text: [All the countries have been closing their borders lately. It feels strange... like someone is trying to concentrate the flow of water towards one place... Please deliver this letter to the Empire.]

cards.name: Shield Break
cards.ability: The Follower on the enemy Field with the highest DEF greater than 0 gets DEF decreased by twice its own DEF.
cards.text: [My sword couldn't possibly be blunt!] [Kyaa! Senpai! The equipment!!]

cards.name: Sentry's Testimony
cards.ability: A random Follower on your Field gets ATK/STA increased by the number of Followers in your Grave with "Knight" in the name. All cards in your Grave are removed from the game.
cards.text: [Please tell me more, what kind of monster exactly did the Scarlet Mage summon?]

cards.name: Pacifism
cards.ability: All Followers on your Field and all cards on the enemy Field are deactivated. All Crux Followers on your Field get SIZE -1/ATK +2/STA +2.
cards.text: [Isn't peace the best answer? Right?]

cards.name: Flina's Command
cards.ability: 2 random Darklore Followers on your Field get STA +3. 2 random Followers on your Field get ATK +1.
cards.text: [To the members of the Flina family, head Luna Flina's words are absolute. Her words have the same power as a spell.]

cards.name: Blood Reversal
cards.ability: 2 random Darklore Followers on your Field get ATK +2/STA +2.
cards.text: [Blood reversal, that's how we describe it. A state of extreme fury... it's a difficult thing to explain.]

cards.name: Vampiric Rites
cards.ability: All Followers on your Field get SIZE=1/ATK=1/STA=1, then the Darklore Follower on your Field with the lowest SIZE gets SIZE/ATK/STA increased by the total SIZE/ATK/STA reductions respectively.
cards.text: [What? What did you expect vampiric rites to look like? I'm not like those savage vampires.]

cards.name: Blood Target
cards.ability: The first Darklore Follower on your Field gets STA=1. Your Character gets LIFE increased by the amount of STA decreased (by a maximum of 10). That Follower gets ATK increased by half the amount of LIFE increased (rounding down, by a maximum of 3).
cards.text: [Don't think that drinking blood is such a simple thing. We know the value of blood better than anyone else.]

cards.name: Sacrifice
cards.ability: Your Character gets LIFE -1 and the enemy Character gets LIFE -4.
cards.text: [This is the greatest sacrifice of all... just by offering something to a formless god, you can obtain immense power... How about it? Do you want to try? Devouring your own blood...]

cards.name: Full Moon Power
cards.ability: All Followers on your Field with "Crescent", "Scardel", or "Flina" in the name get ATK +3.
cards.text: [When the full moon rises, the power of darkness will be at its peak.]

cards.name: Pass the Blood
cards.ability: The Darklore Follower in Slot 3 of your Field gets ATK/STA increased by the total DEF of all Followers on your Field (by a maximum of 5).
cards.text: [Hehe... a drink... how about it?]

cards.name: Overwhelm
cards.ability: Any Followers on the enemy Field with a total DEF+STA greater than the enemy Character's LIFE get DEF decreased by half the enemy Character's LIFE (rounding down).
cards.text: [Get out of here... you have no right to stand in my path. Stop dripping that rotten blood and disappear.]

cards.name: Forced Confinement
cards.ability: If you have a Darklore Character, the Follower on the enemy Field with the highest STA is sent to the bottom of the enemy Deck. Your Character gets LIFE decreased by half the sent card's SIZE (rounding up).
cards.text: [Didn't we decide to band together and protect each other because we could never coexist with the light? Why are you afraid of existences different than yourselves?]

cards.name: Evil Eye
cards.ability: If you have a Darklore Character, all Followers on the enemy Field get ATK -2/DEF -2/STA -2. If you do not have a Darklore Character, all Followers on the enemy Field get ATK -2/DEF -2. If there are 2 or fewer Followers on the enemy Field, those Followers get ATK -1/DEF -1.
cards.text: [Everything will be drained... everything will lose its life before my eye... there's no difference between friend or foe... it will show mercy for no one... Ugh... g.. Get away!!]

cards.name: Council Justice
cards.ability: If there are any Followers on your Field with "Student Council" in the name, 2 random Followers on the enemy Field get the following effects depending on the number of Vita Followers on your Field. ●1: ATK -2, ●2: STA -3, ●3 or more: ATK -2/DEF -1/STA -2.
cards.text: [The heavens call! The earth calls! The people call! They call upon me to strike down delinquents! I am the righteous student council! Inspector!]

cards.name: Student Council Kick
cards.ability: The first active Follower on your Field with "Student Council" in the name is deactivated. If this happens, the Follower on the enemy Field with the highest SIZE gets STA decreased by 1 + the ATK of the deactivated Follower.
cards.text: [Righteous! Student council! Kick!]

cards.name: Book Thief
cards.ability: If your Field contains at least as many Followers with "Lib." in the name as the enemy Field has Spells, then one random Spell on the enemy Field is moved to the first empty Slot on your Field.
cards.text: [Hey! You need to check that out!]

cards.name: Tower of Books
cards.ability: The first Spell in the enemy Hand with a SIZE of 3 or less gets its SIZE increased by the number of Vita Followers on your Field.
cards.text: [There are still so many left... I came to the library to read books, not organize them...]

cards.name: Empowering Chant
cards.ability: The Follower in Slot 2 of your Field gets ATK +2/STA +5. If you do not have a Vita Character, then that Follower loses its skills.
cards.text: [Sita! You can do it!]

cards.name: Feast
cards.ability: If your Character has "Sita" in the name, it gets LIFE +4.
cards.text: [Vernika, Vernika. This... I can eat it all?]

cards.name: Reunion
cards.ability: A random Follower on the enemy Field with a SIZE less than or equal to the number of cards in your Hand (or Hand plus 1 if you have a Vita Character) is sent to the first empty Slot in your Field, and then gets SIZE -1 (to a minimum of 1).
cards.text: [Vernika... I'm back.]

cards.name: Unwilling Sacrifice
cards.ability: The first Academy Follower on your Field with the lowest STA is sent to the Grave. The first Follower on the enemy Field whose ATK is greater than the sent card's STA gets ATK decreased by the sent card's STA.
cards.text: [M... master Cinia! Spare me!] [I'm just turning you into a frog for a little bit. I'll turn you back right away.] [No!!!]

cards.name: Shoddy Magic
cards.ability: 2 random Followers on the enemy Field get STA -4 or STA -2 (50% chance).
cards.text: [Kya... what happened? Wait... huh?!]

cards.name: Lineage Maintenance
cards.ability: All Academy Followers on your Field with a Slot Number equal to their SIZE get ATK +3/STA +3.
cards.text: [They worried about how to preserve their superior bloodline... they decided on this method... but the results were disastrous, no more boys were born.]

cards.name: Magic Stone Found
cards.ability: The first Academy card in your Hand is sent to the Grave. If this happens, 2 random Followers on the enemy Field get ATK -1/DEF -2.
cards.text: [The mother demon stone was found.]

cards.name: Magic Society Invite
cards.ability: The second Academy Follower on your Field gets DEF/STA set equal to the DEF/STA of the Follower in Slot 1 of your Field.
cards.text: [The Academy invited us to go to their magic summit, Sita, Vernika. If you're interested, why don't you come along? You two are pretty famous.]

cards.name: Sister's Letter
cards.ability: All Followers on the enemy Field with the highest SIZE get ATK/DEF/STA decreased by their Slot Number.
cards.text: [Dear Cinia Pacifica. How are you? I'll be attending the magic summit, too.]

cards.name: Dark Secret
cards.ability: If you have an Academy Character, the card on the enemy Field with the higher SIZE in Slots 2 and 4 is destroyed and the card with the lower SIZE is sent to the Grave. If you do not have an Academy Character, the card on the enemy Field with the higher SIZE in Slots 2 and 4 is sent to the Grave and the card with the lower SIZE is sent to the bottom of the enemy Deck. (An empty Slot is considered to have a SIZE of 0. No effect if both Slots contain cards with the same SIZE.)
cards.text: [Sister...] [Please don't say anything else. I'm sorry for hiding this from my precious sister... please forgive me.]

cards.name: No Turning Back
cards.ability: If there are any Followers on your Field and the total SIZE of the enemy Field is odd, a random Follower on the enemy Field is destroyed. If the total SIZE of the enemy Field is even, a random Follower on your Field is sent to the Grave.
cards.text: [Hold your swords! Crux knights are always ready for an honorable death!]

cards.name: Sense of Belonging
cards.ability: A random Follower on the enemy Field that does not belong to the enemy Character's faction is moved to the first empty Slot on your Field and deactivated.
cards.text: [I finally became a Crux knight!]

cards.name: Study of Miracles
cards.ability: All Followers on your Field with "Seeker" in the name get ATK +2/STA +1.
cards.text: [At least you can drink tea. It's not good for your body to constantly sit like that. You should go out and get some fresh air sometimes.]

cards.name: Proof of Miracles
cards.ability: Your Character gets LIFE decreased by half the number of cards in your Hand (rounding down). If this happens, a random Crux Follower on your Field gets ATK/STA increased by the number of cards in your Hand.
cards.text: [This is something that even cuts the link between cause and effect. Isn't this sickle proof of the ancient visitors' victory?]

cards.name: Quick Service
cards.ability: All Followers on your Field are sent to the Grave. A Crux Follower in your Hand with a SIZE less than or equal to 2 + the number of sent cards is sent to Slot 4 on your Field. That Follower gets ATK/STA increased by half the number of Crux cards in your Grave (rounding up).
cards.text: [I just need to deliver this? It must not be late? I understand, Jaina. For the honor of the knights!]

cards.name: Mother Demon Rumor
cards.ability: If the total SIZE of the cards in Slots 1 and 2 of the enemy Field is at least 6, the card in Slot 2 of the enemy Field is destroyed.
cards.text: [Hello, future friends! The era of the mother of corruption, the mother demon, is drawing near. Aren't you curious? Why do I call you friends? You haven't died? Everyone dies eventually, right?]

cards.name: Luthica's Ward
cards.ability: Up to 4 cards in your Grave are removed from the game. If this happens, 2 random Followers on your Field get ATK/STA increased by 2 + the number of removed cards. Crux Followers get ATK/STA increased by twice the number of removed cards instead.
cards.text: [I will use my power to create an opening! Attack the monster through that gap!]

cards.name: Spell Change
cards.ability: The first Spell in your Hand and the first Spell in the enemy Hand swap places.
cards.text: [Hm~ it's a little tight around the chest, and the waist is loose.] [Sh.. Shut up! Give it back!]

cards.name: Prank's Price
cards.ability: If there are at least 2 cards in your Hand and the enemy Hand, the first 2 cards in your Hand and the enemy Hand are sent to the Grave.
cards.text: [Really... I told you not to drag me into your tasteless pranks.]

cards.name: Strega Blood
cards.ability: All Followers on your Field with "Witch" in the name get ATK +1/STA +3. Your Character gets LIFE -1.
cards.text: [Witches are born in the garden of witches. People who possess the blood of witches have the right to become witches.]

cards.name: Strega Blade
cards.ability: The first Follower on your Field with "Witch" in the name with the lowest SIZE gets ATK=1/STA=1. The first Follower on the enemy Field gets STA decreased by half the total decrease in ATK and STA (rounding up).
cards.text: [In the end, all witches wish for the same thing... a place of light, a place where we can all gather. Warm tea and a cool breeze... but...]

cards.name: Tower Visitor
cards.ability: All Followers on the enemy Field with a SIZE lower than the SIZE of the Darklore Follower on your Field with the highest SIZE get DEF -2/STA -2.
cards.text: [It's called the witch's tower... it's just a house...]

cards.name: Vampiric Education
cards.ability: 2 random Darklore Followers on your Field get STA increased by half the total SIZE of the cards in your Hand (rounding up).
cards.text: [I have the duty to teach you the proper behavior of a vampire.]

cards.name: Fatal Blow
cards.ability: All cards on your Field and the enemy Field with a SIZE less than or equal to the number of cards in your Hand+Field are sent to their owner's Grave. Your Character gets LIFE decreased by the number of sent cards on the enemy Field.
cards.text: [Be ready to pay this debt later.]

cards.name: Good Job
cards.ability: All Followers get ATK +1.
cards.text: [Sita, we have to compliment everyone who worked hard. Repeat after me! Good! Job!]

cards.name: Thank You
cards.ability: All Followers get DEF +1.
cards.text: [Cinia, come a little closer! It won't get both of us.] [Lu... Luthica. If you hold me like that, your chest... aaa...]

cards.name: Pleased to Meet You
cards.ability: All Followers get STA +1.
cards.text: [I wasn't hoping for you to acknowledge the effort I went through to sneak in here, but pleased to meet you.]

cards.name: Cord Ball
cards.ability: If there are at least 6 cards in your Grave, all cards in your Hand are sent to the bottom of your Deck. If at least three cards were sent, including at least one Follower, a random card in your Grave is sent to the bottom of your Deck, and then this card is removed from the game.
cards.text: [You send your magic through your racket. Isn't it bad if your magic doesn't reach your racket?]

cards.name: Troubleshooting
cards.ability: All Vita Followers on your Field get STA +3. If there are 10 or fewer cards in your Deck, Vita Followers on your Field get an additional STA +2.
cards.text: [Just leave everything to me! Even if you think I'm just looking for something to do, you're wrong! You came from the Academy, miss? You saw a place called Kana in your dreams, and you want to know about it? The mysterious land Kana. I've heard about it before, too. I'll investigate right away.]

cards.name: Court Jester
cards.ability: If there are Vita Followers on your Field with "Student Council" in the name and Vita Followers on your Field without "Student Council" in the name, 2 random Vita Followers on your Field get ATK +3/STA +3.
cards.text: [We just have to use the racket to put the ball in the opponent's court, right? I haven't heard of any rules about how you send the ball over.]

cards.name: Sage's Sermon
cards.ability: A random Follower on the enemy Field with skills has its skills removed.
cards.text: [So! If you're able to understand something that Rio explained, why aren't you able to understand something that I explain! Agh! Seriously!! Why don't you get it!! Ophelia, are you being serious, or are you just making fun of me?]

cards.name: Shameless Ambition
cards.ability: The first three cards in your Deck are sent to the Grave. For every Vita Follower that was sent, your Character gets LIFE +3. This Spell is removed from the game.
cards.text: [Just watch... I wonder how long you'll be able to sit there drinking your tea. Hehe..]

cards.name: Night's Beckoning
cards.ability: If your Grave contains at least 1 Vita and 1 non-Vita Follower, then all Spells on the enemy Field are sent to the Grave. If there are no Spells on the enemy Field, then this Spell is not sent to the Grave and is instead deactivated.
cards.text: [Sita, hurry over... I can't sleep anymore... come be with me. I'll mark your golden eyes. Ha... it looks delicious, I want all of Sita... let me have it.]

cards.name: Visitor
cards.ability: The first Vita Follower in your Hand is sent to the first empty Slot in your Field. That Follower gets SIZE=1~2 and ATK +3~5/STA +3~5 (random).
cards.text: [A gate appeared. It had a different appearance from the cracks that monsters appeared from. Those cracks appeared very quickly, but this gate was very formal. From the gate appeared a girl in white clothes. -Esprit's memo]

cards.name: Black Magic Plot
cards.ability: Two random Academy Followers on your Field get ATK +4/STA -1.
cards.text: [A flash that pierces the heavens! I've finally done it! With this power, I'll be able to reclaim my freedom!]

cards.name: Unmasked Lie
cards.ability: Two random Followers on the enemy Field get DEF decreased by the number of Spells in the enemy Hand.
cards.text: [No, no way... Jaina did that to me? No way. I must have misheard.]

cards.name: Bargaining Table
cards.ability: Two random Followers on your Field get STA increased by their SIZE.
cards.text: [Cinia, you shouldn't be so strict. Can't you hear our demands first? If we don't work, you'll be inconvenienced as well.] [A strike? Maids? I don't believe it.]

cards.name: Maid Revolution
cards.ability: If there are Academy Followers on your Field with "Maid" in the name and Academy Followers on your Field without "Maid" in the name, 2 random Academy Followers on your Field get ATK +3/STA +3.
cards.text: [Better hours! Higher wages! More than one day off per month!]

cards.name: Suicide Mission
cards.ability: If there are any Spells on the enemy Field, the first Academy Follower in your Hand is sent to the bottom of your Deck. If this happens, a random Spell on the enemy Field is sent to the Grave.
cards.text: [Go put out the fire quickly!] [Ack! I never learned any magic to extinguish fires, master Ciniaaaaa!!!]

cards.name: Linia's Tastes
cards.ability: If your Field contains at least one Follower, a random Follower on the enemy Field is sent to the Grave. If this happens, if this card's SIZE is at least 2, this card gets SIZE=1 and is sent to the top of the enemy Deck. Otherwise, this card is removed from the game.
cards.text: [I'm sorry, master Linia...] [It's alright. Will you spend some time with me right now? I miss people.]

cards.name: Say No Evil
cards.ability: All Academy cards in your Hand get SIZE -1 and are sent to the bottom of your Deck. If at least 2 cards were sent, all cards on the enemy Field are deactivated. The first Spell in the enemy Hand is sent to the first empty Slot in your Hand.
cards.text: [Be careful of what you say and do. You shouldn't trouble Cinia.]

cards.name: Chrono Clock
cards.ability: A random Crux Follower on your Field gets ATK +1~3 and SIZE -1~3 (random).
cards.text: [A communication artifact for HQ and members to stay in contact that takes the form of a clock. Under certain conditions, a new ability will appear, but... so far, there is nobody who has that ability.]

cards.name: Power Control
cards.ability: If there are Crux Followers on your Field with "Seeker" in the name and Crux Followers on your Field without "Seeker" in the name, 2 random Crux Followers on your Field get ATK +3/STA +3.
cards.text: [The final artifact that the leader holds. It possesses power beyond all others. The ability to control this power is the leader's greatest strength.

cards.name: Undercover Work
cards.ability: If there are at least six Crux cards in your Grave, a random Follower on your Field gets STA +6.
cards.text: [Did anyone notice me? Uu.. I'm nervous. Please lend me your strength today, too, Jaina.]

cards.name: Conversion
cards.ability: A random Follower on the enemy Field with a SIZE less than the first Follower on your Field's SIZE is deactivated and sent to the first empty Slot in your Field. That Follower gets the skill "[Change Position] ▶Turn Start: This card is moved to the first empty Slot on the enemy Field. This skill is removed.".
cards.text: [Did something lead you to come here? Hero of Vita, I guarantee that the answer you seek is within Crux.]

cards.name: Recluse
cards.ability: If there is one Follower on your Field, that Follower gets ATK =0/DEF =0, and then 2 Followers on the enemy Field get ATK decreased by half of the total ATK/DEF reduction (rounding down).
cards.text: [This... joke is a little too much, don't you think. Those damn shorties, I need to scold them later. Even so, Rio believed that Crux would protect her, but you were too lax and let those pranksters in. I'm disappointed, Jaina.]

cards.name: Arrest
cards.ability: All cards in your Hand are sent to the bottom of your Deck. If at least 2 cards were sent, a random Follower on the enemy Field with a SIZE of at least 4 is sent to the bottom of the enemy Deck.
cards.text: [For being in contact with vampires, and under the suspicion of planning to harm civilians, I place you under arrest.] [I can't believe it. Jaina!!!]

cards.name: Crux Command
cards.ability: The following effects are applied depending on the number of cards in your Deck. ●10 or more: 2 random Followers on your Field get DEF +2/STA +2. If those Followers belong to Crux, they get an additional ATK +2. ●Less than 10: 2 random Followers on your Field get SIZE +1 and ATK +6/STA +6.
cards.text: [You don't need to worry. I will drive out all foreigners from this land. I am determined. Summon the knights immediately. I will personally remove the witches and vampires from this land.]

cards.name: Dollmaster
cards.ability: A Follower in Slot 3 of the enemy Field gets ATK/STA decreased by its SIZE.
cards.text: [The dolls are gradually increasing in number... Kya! The strings are tangled again. F.. friends! Please help me!]

cards.name: Bad Apple
cards.ability: If there are Darklore Followers on your Field with "Witch" in the name and Darklore Followers on your Field without "Witch" in the name, 2 random Darklore Followers on your Field get ATK +3/STA +3.
cards.text: [Which one is tastier? This apple is a gift for an important person, so I put my heart into making it.]

cards.name: Midnight Doll Show
cards.ability: If there are at least 7 Darklore Followers in your Grave, all Followers on the enemy Field get DEF -2/STA -2.
cards.text: [None of my dolls are failures. They are all reflections of myself.]

cards.name: Misfortune
cards.ability: 6 Spells in your Grave are removed from the game. If this happens, a random Follower on the enemy Field gets SIZE +3.
cards.text: [Ka... Kana is... not a place...] [You have discovered too much. Kana is an existence that I must guard. Do not be so hasty in approaching it.]

cards.name: Alluring Whisper
cards.ability: The bottom 3 cards in your Deck are sent to the Grave. The following effect is applied a number of times equal to the number of sent Darklore Followers: "A random Follower on the enemy Field gets ATK -1/DEF -1/STA -1."
cards.text: [I, too, understand how you feel. You feel lonely. You wish for warmth and a lasting feeling. Don't regret anything. You have the right to take that girl.]

cards.name: Impulse
cards.ability: If you have a Darklore Character, your Character gets LIFE -1 and a random Follower on the enemy Field gets STA -5. If your Grave contains at least 8 cards, a random Follower on the enemy Field gets STA -5. 2 random Spells in your Grave are removed from the game.
cards.text: [In that moment, my mind was painted white. Even though I had the strength to stand before the elders, my will crumbled away. What remained was another me, driven by intense loneliness and thirst.]

cards.name: Vernika's World
cards.ability: All Followers on the enemy Field get ATK/STA decreased by the total number of Spells in your Hand and the enemy Hand. If you have a Darklore Character, the first Spell in your Hand, the enemy Hand, and all Spells on the enemy Field are all sent to the Grave.
cards.text: [The Vernika who had become a vampire possessed a surprising amount of power. Vernika's magic tore down the boundary between reality and fantasy. The realization of a picturesque world became a possibility. Vernika endlessly waited in the withered garden for Sita.]

cards.name: Uniform Tweak
cards.ability: 2 random Vita Followers on your Field get ATK increased by twice their DEF and STA decreased by half of their DEF (rounding down).
cards.text: [This school's uniform has no sense to it! I'll modify it real quick!]

cards.name: Dress Up Change
cards.ability: The first Follower on your Field with "Student Council Maron" or "Seeker Smartyrain" in the name is sent to your Grave, and then a corresponding card in your Deck with "Dress Up Maron" or "Dress Up Smartylane" in the name is sent to your first empty Slot. That Follower gets SIZE =5/ATK +2/STA +4.
cards.text: [2634-4855..! Change! Dress up! Release the chains of destiny!]

cards.name: Over the Wall
cards.ability: The first Vita Follower on your Field is moved to Slot 5 in your Field and gets ATK/STA increased by the total SIZE of cards in Slots 2 and 4 in your Field (by a maximum of 8).
cards.text: [A world is waiting for me beyond this wall! I'll be back, Asmis!]

cards.name: Unionize
cards.ability: The first card on the enemy Field with a SIZE equal to the sum of this card's SIZE and the number of empty Slots in your Hand is sent to the bottom of the enemy Deck.
cards.text: [We will struggle to achieve our goals! I will fight! This place is the hell of the Pacifica estate.]

cards.name: Tea Time
cards.ability: 2 random Academy Followers on your Field get ATK/STA increased by their difference in SIZE (by a maximum of 4).
cards.text: [Are the cookies baked? Is the fruit ready? She's too whimsical, suddenly deciding to go on a picnic... Ahh! This kitchen is hell right now! After this is over, will we be able to enjoy some juice?]

cards.name: Adjustment
cards.ability: If there are any Followers on your Field, the first card in your Hand is sent to the Grave, and then for each remaining card in your Hand, a random card in the enemy Hand is sent to the Grave. If this happens, a random Follower on the enemy Field gets ATK decreased by the number of cards in your Hand, and then this card is removed from the game.
cards.text: [Hm~ Your target is a little unreasonable. I'll adjust it for you.]

cards.name: Education Results
cards.ability: The first Crux card in your Hand is sent to your Grave. If this happens, a random Crux Follower on your Field gets ATK +4/STA +4.
cards.text: [I'm no newbie, girl! No newbie!]

cards.name: Brilliant Brain
cards.ability: If you have a Crux Character, a random Spell on the enemy Field is sent to the bottom of the enemy Deck. If this happens, the first Follower in your Hand gets ATK/STA increased by the sent card's SIZE.
cards.text: [Endless research... when this work is over, is there any hope of getting a good rest?]

cards.name: Vivid World of Kana
cards.ability: If the first two cards in your Deck belong to the same faction as your Character, they are placed in the first empty Slots of your Field (each card is checked separately). If they do not belong to the same faction as your Character, they are sent to the Grave. The sent cards get SIZE set equal to this card's SIZE. This card is removed from the game.
cards.text: [It was a captivating world. A land without lies. This was the place that I had been pursuing.]

cards.name: The Crescent Enigmas
cards.ability: 2 random Darklore cards in your Hand are sent to the Grave. If this happens, a random Follower on your Field gets ATK increased by the difference between its ATK and STA.
cards.text: [... It's really hard. Is this really possible?]

cards.name: Scardel Rite
cards.ability: The first Darklore Follower in your Grave is removed from the game. If this happens, all Followers on your Field with "Scardel," "Crescent," or "Flina" in the name get SIZE=1. If this happens, a copy of the removed Follower is created in the first empty Slot of your Field. That Follower gets SIZE, ATK, and STA increased by the total SIZE reduction of the other followers.
cards.text: [It's a ritual to become a true vampire. Endure it.]

cards.name: Final Answer
cards.ability: If you have a Darklore Character, the first Follower on the enemy Field with the highest total ATK/STA gets SIZE/ATK/STA decreased by the total number of cards in both Hands (to a minimum SIZE of 1).
cards.text: [The long-awaited final question hasn't been solved by the Crescents for three generations! Can Conundrum answer it?]

cards.name: Seize
cards.ability: The first card on your Field other than this one is sent to the first empty Slot in the enemy Hand. If this happens, the first card on the enemy Field is sent to the first empty Slot in your Hand.
cards.text: [I need this sword.. I don't want to see Vernika like this.] [Si, Sita!?]

cards.name: Medusa Glasses
cards.ability: All Followers on the enemy Field get ATK -1. A random Vita Follower on your Field gets STA increased by the total amount of ATK decreased.
cards.text: [The Medusa Glasses give the wearer an incredible sense of sight. They can even catch an arrow in midair with their bare hands. The quality of visual perception is greatly changed.]

cards.name: Comparison
cards.ability: The first Vita Follower on your Field with the lowest SIZE gets ATK/DEF/STA swapped with the ATK/DEF/STA of the first Follower on the enemy Field with an equal SIZE.
cards.text: [I can't bring this kind of score home. Let me take it again!]

cards.name: Breakdown
cards.ability: The first skill of the first Follower on the enemy Field with a skill is added to the first Follower on your Field that does not have a skill.
cards.text: [Miss... Nanai? Stop hurting me like this. For goodness sake. Sniff sniff... My world is coming apart.]

cards.name: Spring Fever
cards.ability: 2 random Followers on your Field get DEF=0 and get STA increased by twice their changes in DEF.
cards.text: [I have to make plans for the election... I can't fall asleep here... zzZ]

cards.name: Absolute Control
cards.ability: If you have a Vita Character and there are any Followers on your Field, a random Follower on the enemy Field is sent to the Grave. If this happens, a random Spell on the enemy Field is sent to the bottom of the enemy Deck.
cards.text: [Tying up Celine's strongest supporters is bit fun and solves a problem.]

cards.name: One Way Trip
cards.ability: All Followers on your Field get the following effects for each Follower satisfying each condition. ●"Cook Club": SIZE -1/STA +2. ●"Lib.": ATK +1/STA +1. ●"Student Council": DEF +1/STA +1. ●Vita Followers not belonging to the previous groups: ATK +1/DEF +1.
cards.text: [I can't ignore this anymore. I will crush your determination, Miss Nanai.]

cards.name: Shift Change
cards.ability: The first Follower on your Field with "Maid" in the name gets ATK +2/STA +2 and is sent to the top of your Deck. If this happens, the first Academy Follower in your Hand is sent to the first empty Slot in your Field and gets ATK +2/STA +2.
cards.text: [When working, the best moment is the end of work.]

cards.name: Dress Up Rise
cards.ability: If there are any Followers on your Field with "Dress Up" in the name, a random card on the enemy Field is sent to the bottom of the enemy Deck.
cards.text: [I refuse! Dress. Rise. Up!]

cards.name: Refreshments
cards.ability: All Academy Followers in your Hand are sent to the bottom of your Deck. For each sent Follower, a Spell in the enemy Hand gets SIZE +1 and is sent to the bottom of the enemy Deck.
cards.text: [It's been a long time since Cinia came! Make sure the preparations are going according to plan!]

cards.name: Obedience
cards.ability: If you have an Academy Character, a random Follower on the enemy Field with a SIZE of 4 or less gets SIZE +2. If the Follower's new SIZE is at least 5, it gets STA -3.
cards.text: [I, I'm not an easy girl! I'm just going to your house so I can take over... whatever. Let's go.]

cards.name: Meteor Call
cards.ability: All Followers on the enemy Field get STA decreased by the number of Followers in both Fields, and all Followers on your Field get STA decreased by the number of Followers on the enemy Field.
cards.text: [Stars. Fire. The time of ruin is upon this land. Now, heavens... fall!]

cards.name: Servant's Ward
cards.ability: If you have an Academy Character, the first Follower on the enemy Field with the highest SIZE other than 1 gets SIZE =1, and then 2 random Followers on the enemy Field get ATK/STA decreased by that Follower's former SIZE.
cards.text: [In the name of all maids, I will protect master Cinia!]

cards.name: Doubt
cards.ability: If you have an Academy Character, the first Academy Follower on your Field is sent to the Grave. If this happens, a random Follower on the enemy Field gets ATK =1/STA =1. Next, if your Character has "Cinia" in the name, a random Follower on the enemy Field that has a STA of at least 2 and possesses a skill gets ATK =1/STA =1.
cards.text: [Is this true? I can't trust anyone anymore... I'm disgusted by the blood running through my veins.]

cards.name: Fast Forward
cards.ability: Crux Followers in your Hand are sent to the Grave. If this happens, the last Follower on your Field gets ATK/STA increased by twice the number of sent cards.
cards.text: [The Chrono Clock's true power is to accelerate the body. For 10 seconds, a person can exceed the normal limitations of speed. We call this ability "Clock Up".]

cards.name: Cross Cut
cards.ability: The last two Crux cards in your Hand are sent to the bottom of your Deck. If this happens, two random Followers on the enemy Field are deactivated. If there are any cards on your Field with "Knight" or "Blue Cross" in the name, the deactivated Followers also get STA -2.
cards.text: [Those who can cut are simply those with the determination to cut.]

cards.name: Planned Misfortune
cards.ability: Followers on your Field with a SIZE greater than or equal to the SIZE of the Follower on the enemy Field with the lowest SIZE get ATK +1/DEF +1/STA +1.
cards.text: [Linia, I feel a little strange these days. When I have to make a decision, it often feels like my will is not my own. Something is eating away at me. Like something is coming out from deep within my consciousness.

cards.name: Azure Cross Meeting
cards.ability: 2 random non-Crux Followers on the enemy Field get ATK -2/STA -2. Cards are sent from the top of your Deck to your Hand until there are at least 4 cards in your Hand.
cards.text: [You think there's a new group of vigilantes created to defeat the night? If you buy me another drink, I think I might be able to tell you a bit more... What do you think? Hehe...]

cards.name: Escape
cards.ability: If there are any Followers on your Field, all cards in your Hand are sent to the top of your Deck. If this happens, your Character gets LIFE increased by 1.5 times the number of sent cards (rounding down).
cards.text: [Clarice! You're amazing! How did you get me out of there?] [There's nothing I can't do with my creations. Once I put my mind to it, I can do anything. Did I do a good job? Luthica!]

cards.name: False Delivery
cards.ability: Cards in both Hands that do not belong to the corresponding Character's faction are sent to the Grave.
cards.text: [There are 3 swords passed down in the Pacifica house. One of them is owned by Cinia. It has the power to bring the past to the present. What do you think? This is something not even Jaina knows.]

cards.name: Comeback
cards.ability: If you have a Crux Character, cards in your Hand are sent to empty Slots in your Field in sequential order until your Field is full or your Hand runs out of cards. If this happens, those cards get SIZE=2~3 (at random). Any sent Spells are deactivated.
cards.text: [I'm fond of it... Crux. Today, too, a good wind rises. Jaina, no... that woman doesn't belong in this place.]

cards.name: Dark Meeting
cards.ability: All cards in your Hand are sent to the Grave. If this happens, all Followers on the enemy Field with the highest total ATK/STA gets ATK/STA decreased by 1.5 times the number of cards sent (rounding up).
cards.text: [Today, you will receive the responsibilities you wished for when you became soldiers of the great GS!] [Yes!]

cards.name: Dark Convocation
cards.ability: A random active Darklore Follower on your Field is deactivated and gets ATK +3/STA +1. If the Follower has "GS" in the name, it gets an additional STA +2.
cards.text: [Gather! In the name of world domination! The great leader has expressed favor. Bring squid and beer!]

cards.name: Pupil Becomes Master
cards.ability: All Followers on the enemy Field get STA decreased by the Turn Number divided by the number of cards on the enemy Field (rounding down).
cards.text: [I see now. This is blood? It's delicious. Sweet, kuhihi...]

cards.name: Agent Visit
cards.ability: If there are any Followers on your Field and any cards with a SIZE of 3 in your Hand, the first card on the enemy Field with a SIZE of 3 is sent to the Grave.
cards.text: [When doing "this work" she always wears white. She thinks the blood-stained appearance is unbearably lovely. Just like that collapsed person on the ground over there. Look for the 10th SS member. That's me.]

cards.name: Dress Up Ride
cards.ability: If there are any Followers on your Field with "Dress Up" in the name, the first card in your Deck with "Dress Up" in the name is sent to the first empty Slot in your Field and gets SIZE =5/ATK +3/STA +3.
cards.text: [Who are we? We are two who have become one vampire detective! Dress Up Ride! Tension Fortissimo!]

cards.name: Tranquility
cards.ability: If there are any Followers on your Field and there are any Spells on the enemy Field, all Spells on the enemy Field are sent to the bottom of the enemy Deck. If there are no Spells on the enemy Field, all Spells on your Field except this one are sent to the bottom of your Deck. If any Spells were sent, your Character gets LIFE decreased by the number of Spells sent.
cards.text: [The reason for my neutrality is to maintain the balance of power.]

cards.name: Night Conqueror
cards.ability: If you have a Darklore Character, cards on the enemy Field with a SIZE of 3~5, as well as non-Darklore Followers on your Field, are sent to the owners' Graves.
cards.text: [Tell me where the leader of the Flina house is. While you're at it, give me all the blood you're drinking. Hehehe...]

cards.name: Summer Machine Gun
cards.ability: If your Field/Hand contain cards with "Lucca," "Milka," and "Serie" in the names (at least 1 of each), those cards get ATK +3/STA +3.
cards.text: [The girls' first challenge. An album of their songs, filled with sincerity. Listen to it! Summer Machinegun!]

cards.name: Detection
cards.ability: A random Follower on the enemy Field gets STA decreased by its SIZE and DEF -1.
cards.text: [Even with that speed, it can't pass the perception of the Medusa Glasses.]

cards.name: Golden Pair
cards.ability: If you have at least 2 Followers on the Field with the same name, those Followers all get ATK +3/STA +3.
cards.text: [We'll be the Golden Duo to lead Vita to the nationals! Let's go to the national meet!]

cards.name: Fault
cards.ability: If you have at least 2 Followers on the Field with "Tennis Club" in the name, the enemy Character gets LIFE -3.
cards.text: [Fault! Rona's serve failed! The nationals are on the very edge with this! Rona is in a crisis!]

cards.name: Infighting
cards.ability: If there are any Followers on your Field, Followers on your Field that belong to the same faction as the first Follower on your Field are sent to the Grave. If this happens, Followers on the enemy Field that belong to the faction of the first Follower on the enemy Field, except for the first Follower on the enemy Field, are sent to the Grave. This card is removed from the game.
cards.text: [You're always like this, president! You only think about what you want! Your opinion isn't the only one that matters!]

cards.name: Minds in Conflict
cards.ability: The first Follower on your Field with a skill and the first Follower on the enemy Field with a skill have their SIZE, ATK/DEF/STA, and skills swapped.
cards.text: [Nanai!!] [You don't belong in the position of president, Celine. That position will be mine.]

cards.name: Secret Art: Gale Flash
cards.ability: If your Character has "Sita" in the name, all cards on the enemy Field are deactivated and all Followers on the enemy Field get DEF decreased by the number of cards on the enemy Field. If your Character does not have "Sita" in the name, 2 random cards on the enemy Field are deactivated and all Followers on the enemy Field get STA decreased by the number of cards deactivated.
cards.text: [Step aside. I don't have time, I have to get to Vernika... to make it in time, I'll have to cut you down, first... instant... slash!!!]

cards.name: Home Study
cards.ability: All Followers in your Hand get ATK/STA increased by 1 plus the number of cards in your Hand and Grave with the same name as this Spell.
cards.text: [Cinia, it's important to think about others' positions. How would you feel if you were in your employees' shoes?]

cards.name: Maid Experience
cards.ability: All cards in your Hand and Grave with the name "Home Study" are removed from the game. 2 random Followers on the enemy Field get STA decreased by twice the number of removed cards.
cards.text: [Master Cinia! You need to react faster!] [I... I won't forgive this for you tomorrow!]

cards.name: Defeat
cards.ability: A random Academy Follower on your Field gets DEF increased by the number of Followers on the enemy Field with skills (by a maximum of 3).
cards.text: [Everything has burned away. A clean slate...]

cards.name: Meeting Master
cards.ability: The first Follower on your Field with "Maid" in the name is deactivated. The first Follower on your Field with "Lady" in the name gets ATK/STA increased by the deactivated Follower's SIZE.
cards.text: [From today, I am your master. What kind of exciting life awaits us?]

cards.name: Comfort
cards.ability: The first Follower on your Field is deactivated. If this happens, your Character gets LIFE +3.
cards.text: [Ahh... Cinia. Hold me...] [How interesting, while you're in my arms, you call out for another girl?]

cards.name: Curse of Distrust
cards.ability: The first Follower on your Field is sent to the bottom of the enemy Deck. If this happens, the first Follower on the enemy Field with the highest SIZE and a different faction than the sent Follower is sent to the bottom of your Deck.
cards.text: [I can't trust anyone anymore. Get away from me, or I'll kill you.]

cards.name: El Mundo
cards.ability: If you have an Academy Character, a random Follower on the enemy Field gets STA decreased by 8 minus this card's SIZE and gets deactivated. If this card has a SIZE of less than 3, it gets SIZE +1 and is sent to the first empty Slot in your Hand. If this card has a SIZE of at least 3, it is removed from the game.
cards.text: [I don't have anything to hope for. There is nobody and nothing that I can believe in. Time will stop... Die.]

cards.name: Unity March
cards.ability: If there are at least 2 Crux Followers on your Field, the first Follower on your Field gets STA +6.
cards.text: [All for one and one for all. With the bond of trust, our combined strength is great!]

cards.name: A Single Flower
cards.ability: All cards in your Hand and the enemy Hand are sent to the bottom of the owners' Decks. Your Character gets LIFE increased by the difference in the number of sent cards between you and the enemy minus 1.
cards.text: [We didn't know her name, but that single flower had the beauty of a small beginning.]

cards.name: Protective Chant
cards.ability: All Followers on your Field with a SIZE equal to the number of Followers on your Field get ATK +3/STA +3.
cards.text: [The protective flash of a shield to protect the will of the knights!]

cards.name: Blossoming Skill
cards.ability: A random Follower on your Field gets ATK increased the amount of LIFE by which the enemy Character exceeds your Character (by a maximum of 9).
cards.text: [For a moment, one thing crossed Pintail's mind. "... breathe. Everything... has its own unique vibration."]

cards.name: Degradation
cards.ability: 2 random Followers on your Field without skills get ATK +3/STA +3.
cards.text: [The side effects of Talentium were seen for the first time. In Jaina's letter, she described the true appearance of Talentium. -Creuset's experiment note.]

cards.name: Pilgrimage of Proof
cards.ability: If you have a Follower on the Field, 2 random Followers on the enemy Field get DEF decreased by 4 minus this card's SIZE. If this card's SIZE is 1, this card is removed from the game. If this card's SIZE is not 1, it gets SIZE -1 and is deactivated.
cards.text: [I've found myself, said Sergeant Pintail. In order to find her own path, Pintail took some time off. Her destination was H.K for 14 nights and 15 days.]

cards.name: Sword That Cleaves Evil
cards.ability: If you have a Crux Character, there are Followers on your Field, and the Turn Number is odd, cards on the enemy Field with a SIZE and Slot number that are both odd or both even are sent to the Grave. If the Turn Number is even, then cards on the enemy Field with a SIZE and Slot number that are not both odd or both even are sent to the Grave. Your Character gets LIFE decreased by the number of cards sent.
cards.text: [Our forces are no longer here. I will humiliate those who have stained our honor. Clarice, help me.]

cards.name: Doctor Play
cards.ability: If your Field contains a Follower, the first Follower on the enemy Field gets STA decreased by the ones digit of the difference between the number of cards in your Deck and the enemy Deck.
cards.text: [Where does it hurt? Hm... here? Okay. Ah! How's that? Does it hurt anymore?]

cards.name: Tick Time
cards.ability: 2 random Followers on your Field get ATK/STA increased by half the ones digit of the Turn Number (rounding down).
cards.text: [The time to restructure the balance of the night draws near. Who is the true master of the night? We'll ask the stars.]

cards.name: Maximum Drive
cards.ability: The card on the enemy Field with a Slot number equal to the first Follower on your Field's SIZE is sent to the Grave, and the first Follower on your Field is sent to the Grave.
cards.text: [The time to resolve today's incident is 2 hours, 37 minutes, and 35 seconds. Your goal is futile.]

cards.name: Intrusion
cards.ability: 2 random Followers on your Field get STA +3. If this happens, cards are sent from the top of the enemy Deck to the enemy Hand until the enemy Hand is full.
cards.text: [At the moment the vampire Conundrum selected an answer! "Wait!!"]

cards.name: Absolute Power
cards.ability: All Followers on your Field get the following effects depending on the type of the first card in the enemy Hand. ●Spell: DEF -1/STA +5. ●Follower: ATK +3/DEF -1.
cards.text: [Ho... you're Iri's slave? How interesting... go fetch your master. You are inadequate.] [Haha... me, a slave? Don't run your mouth as you please. I am the master... understand?]

cards.name: Misfit
cards.ability: The first Follower on the enemy Field whose original SIZE is 5 or less with a total ATK/STA of at least 22 or whose original SIZE is 6 or more with a total ATK/STA of at least 32 gets its ATK/STA changed to the total SIZE of your Field if you don't have a Darklore Character, or half the total SIZE of your Field (rounding down) if you have a Darklore Character.
cards.text: [She was born in nature. Cannelle. Being born in nature, she was not able to adjust to the shut-in life of the mansion. "I want to go back..."]

cards.name: Lago de Cisnes
cards.ability: All Followers on the enemy Field with the highest total ATK/STA get their ATK/STA cut in half (rounding up). If your Character has "Iri" in the name, those Followers get an additional ATK -2/DEF -2/STA -2.
cards.text: [An act that would overturn the moment at once.]

cards.name: Dream Conversation
cards.ability: The first Follower on your Field with the highest SIZE gets SIZE=1, gets ATK/STA increased by the decrease in SIZE, and gets DEF increased by half the decrease in SIZE (rounding down). Your Character gets LIFE increased by half the decrease in SIZE (rounding down). You get Shuffles +1.
cards.text: [It was a wish for everyone to laugh together when everything was over, but Vernika's dream would never come true.]

cards.name: Event Preparation
cards.ability: If your Field contains a Follower in the same faction as your Character and a Follower in a different faction, then 2 random Followers on your Field get ATK +3/STA +3.
cards.text: [We can expect the event to be very crowded~ Please follow the directions! Will the younger sisters be good?]

cards.name: Victory Proclamation
cards.ability: If you and the enemy both have at least one card in your Hand, then the first card of each of your Hands swap places.
cards.text: [It will be over within the next 7 serves. Long games are bad for stamina.]

cards.name: Topsy Turvy
cards.ability: One random Follower on your Field gets ATK/STA increased by 1 plus the number of factions in your Hand.
cards.text: [A competition was held to determine the menu for the Cook Club's festival event. Their techniques would be put to the test, with the winner making the decision.]

cards.name: Inhuman Creature
cards.ability: If you and the enemy both have at least one Follower on the Field, then one random Follower on your Field and one random Follower on the enemy Field are sent to the Grave.
cards.text: [It moved!] [Vernika, stay still.]

cards.name: Preserver of Rules
cards.ability: A random Vita Follower on your Field gets ATK increased by 1 plus the number of cards in your Hand and gets STA increased by the number of cards in your Hand minus 1.
cards.text: [This inspector loves peace, believes in friendship, and wishes to protect the lives of others, so she stands against rule breakers as an extracurricular activity.]

cards.name: Morals Crackdown
cards.ability: If you have a Follower on the Field, then all Followers on your Field and the enemy Field get DEF=0. For every Follower, all Followers get STA decreased by that Follower's change in DEF.
cards.text: [The lives of people are deeper than the ocean. Their love is higher than the mountains. To those who don't know this, look at tomorrow and see! Emergency! Target point 4 8 5! Geo Scud Launch Go!]

cards.name: Encounter
cards.ability: 2 random Followers on your Field get ATK/STA increased by 2 plus the number of Spells on the enemy Field. If you have a Vita Character, all Spells on the enemy Field are removed from the game.
cards.text: [Vernika. Why do you have that appearance?] [Sita... come closer.] [I'll return you to the way you once were. My eyes, my arms... take everything.]

cards.name: Pursuit of Perfection
cards.ability: Academy Followers on your Field that have a SIZE of 2 or less get ATK=1/STA=1. The first Academy Follower in your Hand gets ATK increased by half of the total ATK reduction (rounding up) and STA increased by half of the total STA reduction (rounding up).
cards.text: [I won't tolerate a speck of dirt in my house.]

cards.name: Black Magic Preparation
cards.ability: All Spells in your Hand get SIZE -1 (to a minimum of 1).
cards.text: [The influence of witches is gradually spreading underground. The day when they spring upon the continent under the witch queen's name is not far.]

cards.name: Lady's Wrath
cards.ability: The last Academy card in your Hand is sent to the Grave. If this happens, a random Follower on the enemy Field gets ATK -4/STA -4.
cards.text: [For the love of... Hey! Why is it like this!!]

cards.name: Shoot
cards.ability: The last card in your Hand is removed from the game. If this happens, a copy of the first card in the enemy Hand is created in the first empty Slot in your Hand.
cards.text: [The lady spiked the ball into the opponent's court. A hit! She scored a point.]

cards.name: Servant of Clarice
cards.ability: The first card in your Deck is sent to the Grave, and the second card is sent to the bottom of your Deck. If this happens, a random card on the enemy Field is sent to the bottom of the enemy Deck.
cards.text: [It's been a while. Master Clarice. I have prepared the ingredients you requested. How is the next experiment progressing?]

cards.name: Lady's Attendant
cards.ability: 2 random Academy Followers on your Field get ATK increased by the number of cards in your Hand and get STA increased by 1 plus the number of cards in the enemy Hand.
cards.text: [Keeping the wrinkles out of the skirt, making sure the lace doesn't flutter. Calmly maintaining the lady's appearance is the basic job of the attendant.]

cards.name: Push Forward
cards.ability: 2 random Followers on the enemy Field get ATK -4/STA -4. If this card's SIZE is 1, it is removed from the game. Otherwise, this card gets SIZE=1 and is deactivated.
cards.text: [I will find Linia and ask her myself!]

cards.name: Supply Request
cards.ability: An Follower on your Field with the highest SIZE gets SIZE decreased by the difference between its SIZE and the SIZE of the first card in your Hand.
cards.text: [I have to do it later. Today's work put off until tomorrow. If you put off work every other day, it grows like a snowball, and you won't have time to sleep at night.]

cards.name: Miscalculation
cards.ability: If your Hand contains 3 or fewer cards, Followers are sent from the top of your Deck to your Hand until there are 4 cards in your Hand.
cards.text: [Why on earth does this mistake keep repeating? What will we do if the predecessor's mistakes keep getting passed down?]

cards.name: Passcode
cards.ability: If there are at least 3 cards in your Field with the same SIZE, Followers in your Field with that SIZE get ATK +3/STA +3.
cards.text: [Oh, come in. If you tell me the number, I'll send you the correct way.]

cards.name: Vacation
cards.ability: The first Crux Follower on your Field with the highest STA gets STA halved (rounding up) and gets DEF increased by half of the STA reduction (rounding up).
cards.text: [I think wherever Pintail goes is a good choice! This place is great!]

cards.name: Warrior's Resolve
cards.ability: The number of cards in your Hand and the number of empty Slots in your Hand are compared. 2 random Crux Followers on your Field get ATK increased by the larger number and get STA increased by the smaller number - 1 (by a minimum of 0).
cards.text: [I will defend this land! I swear on my life!]

cards.name: Beach Research
cards.ability: 2 random Followers on your Field get SIZE -1/ATK +1/DEF +1/STA +1.
cards.text: [Who knows if there's an artifact here! Give it your all and find out!]

cards.name: Shock
cards.ability: All Followers on your Field get STA +5. If you have a Crux Character, all Followers on your Field get an additional ATK +2. All Followers on the enemy Field get ATK -2.
cards.text: [Who are you?] [I am the GS 1st Star, and I've come to reveal the lies of Crux's goddess.] [Lies?] [The goddess twists time and resorts to tricks. The continent's time is out of place.]

cards.name: Crux Underground
cards.ability: All Followers on the enemy Field with the same SIZE as the first card on the enemy Field get ATK/STA decreased by the number of cards on the enemy Field with the same SIZE as the first card on the enemy Field.
cards.text: [The preparations of the GS are thorough. At the moment the leader orders it, they will move as one throughout the nation. Nobody knows the labyrinthine underground as well as them.]

cards.name: Recruitment Ad
cards.ability: A random Follower on your Field is sent to the Grave. If this happens, the enemy Character gets LIFE -1 and Shuffles -1. Your Character gets LIFE +1.
cards.text: [Recruiting GS members! We have no interest in ordinary people. Among those people who have skill with Talentium, if you wish to change the world with your own powers, come now!]

cards.name: Marionette
cards.ability: The first Follower on your Field gets ATK/STA changed to equal half of its total ATK/STA (rounding up).
cards.text: [You may make me move any way you wish. However, do not come near. Use your eyes only.]

cards.name: Mischief
cards.ability: All Followers on the enemy Field get STA decreased by 3 times the number of cards in your Grave named "Mischief".
cards.text: [Th, this prank is too much!] [Isn't it fine? Even this one can just be laughed off.]

cards.name: Night is Coming
cards.ability: The first 2 Followers in your Grave with "GS" in the name are removed from the game. 3 random Followers in your Grave with "GS" in the name are sent to the bottom of your Deck.
cards.text: [Orders. Night comes! 1st Star will lead, and Captain Z will command! All GS within the alliance will immediately head toward Crux.]

cards.name: Query
cards.ability: If this card's SIZE is greater than 3, it gets SIZE=3. The enemy Character gets LIFE decreased by this card's SIZE. This card gets SIZE -1 and moves to the enemy Field. If this card has a SIZE of 1, this card is removed from the game.
cards.text: [Why do I drink blood? To be honest, nothing will really happen if I don't, and I have other ways of recovering my magic. So I guess I don't really know.]

cards.name: Showdown
cards.ability: If you have a Darklore Character and you have a Darklore Follower on your Field, all Followers on the enemy Field get SIZE=1 and ATK=6/DEF=0/STA=6, then all Followers on your Field get SIZE=1 and ATK=6/STA=6.
cards.text: [I am Jaina Preventer, leader of the Crux knights. I have come to cleanse this land of all outsiders.] [... Step aside. I have to find Vernika.]

cards.name: Moldy Chocolate
cards.ability: (none)
cards.text: [A food made by Ophelia. Seems like a special food made to celebrate some sort of commemorative day, but there's no record of this food in any library. -Esprit's memo..]

cards.name: Hot Item
cards.ability: All Followers on your Field get ATK +2/STA +3.
cards.text: [Vita High's official goods! A cute keychain featuring the principal.]
