cards.name: Principal's Story
cards.ability: The first card in the enemy Hand that does not belong to the enemy Character's faction is sent to the first empty Slot in your Hand.
cards.text: [A man dressed in red came once. I don't know what this "Kana" is, but he seemed to be seeking the same thing as you. That man, he seemed restless. He was carrying another "key".]

cards.name: Low Turnout
cards.ability: The Vita Follower on your Field with the highest DEF gets STA increased by twice its DEF. The first Vita card in your Hand is sent to the bottom of your Deck.
cards.text: [The vote to impeach Celine coincided with the festival, resulting in a low turnout. Nanai. She missed the opportunity of a lifetime.]

cards.name: Shattered Land
cards.ability: 2 random Vita Followers on your Field get the following skill: "[Sword's Shield] ▶Defend: This card gets STA increased by the attacker's ATK. This skill is removed."
cards.text: [The power of Cinia's sword carried a price to use: a part of your body. It had the power to return everything to how it was in the very beginning. When Sita realized this, she tried to stop it, but everything around her had already been destroyed.]

cards.name: Keepsake
cards.ability: The second Follower on your Field gets ATK/DEF/STA increased by the first Follower on your Field's SIZE. If this happens, and if you have a Vita Character, the first Follower on your Field is sent to the bottom of your Deck. If you do not have a Vita Character, the first Follower on your Field is sent to the Grave.
cards.text: [Vernika could not be seen anywhere around the crumbled buildings. After a long time of searching, the only thing Sita found was her glasses.]

cards.name: Everyday Discovery
cards.ability: A number of Followers (equal to the number of Followers on your Field) on both players' Fields whose Slot numbers are odd (if the ones digit of the Turn Number is odd) or even (if the ones digit of the Turn Number is even) are sent to the bottom of their owners' Decks.
cards.text: [Some practical wisdom. For furniture that smells like coating agents or dehumidifying agents, you can use leftover alcohol to wash and clean it. It will get rid of the smell.]

cards.name: Negotiation Breakdown
cards.ability: The first Academy card in your Hand with "Maid' in the name is removed from the game. A random Academy Follower on your Field gets ATK/STA increased by the removed card's SIZE.
cards.text: [Is this some kind of joke? This is a breakdown in negotiations! I can't work here any longer.]

cards.name: Inevitable Choice
cards.ability: If you have an Academy Character, the first Academy Follower on your Field gets ATK/STA increased by the number of allied Academy cards and gets SIZE decreased by the number of allied cards with "Lady" in the name.
cards.text: [Through hatred, Cinia's power grew immensely. Finally, Linia made a decision. She took control of Cinia's mind.]

cards.name: Table Manners
cards.ability: The first card on the enemy Field with a SIZE equal to this card's Slot number plus this card's SIZE is sent to the Grave. If this happens, this card is deactivated.
cards.text: [The ladies of the Royle Academy do not just partake in their studies. They also learn about the proper conduct and behavior of nobles.]

cards.name: Royle Academy
cards.ability: The first Follower on your Field that belongs to your Character's faction gets ATK/DEF/STA doubled. That card gets the following skill: "[Turning Back Time] ▶Turn Start: This card's ATK/DEF/STA are changed to their original values. This skill is removed."
cards.text: [The private Royle Academy, the garden of ladies.]

cards.name: Crux Conference
cards.ability: 2 random Followers on the enemy Field get ATK -1/STA -3.
cards.text: [Even within, the opinions on how to deal with the land of vampires varied greatly. However, among those present, the will of the knights was the greatest.]

cards.name: Enemy Within
cards.ability: Crux Followers on your Field with skills have their skills removed. Those Followers get ATK/STA increased by the total number of removed skills.
cards.text: [The most important thing is always on the inside. There is darkness on the bottom of a lamp.]

cards.name: Commissioned Research
cards.ability: All Spells on the enemy Field with a SIZE equal or less than the SIZE of the first Crux Follower on your Field are sent to the bottom of the enemy Deck.
cards.text: [What do you want to know?]

cards.name: Supply Transfer
cards.ability: The first Follower on your Field that belongs to your Character's faction gets ATK/STA increased by 2 plus the total SIZE of Followers on your Field except that one (by a maximum of 8).
cards.text: [Senpai, this is too heavy.] [I have a burden outside of these things...] [What?] [Tch...]

cards.name: Relieve Post
cards.ability: 2 random Followers on your Field get ATK +4/STA +4. If this card has a SIZE of 1, it is removed from the game. This card gets SIZE=1 and is deactivated.
cards.text: [Jaina Preventer. To the leader of the Crux Knights. A new leader will be arriving as a replacement. Within are the proper documents to ensure that change is smooth.]

cards.name: Stakeout
cards.ability: The Follower on the enemy Field that has a Slot Number equal to this card's Slot Number gets DEF =0/STA -2.
cards.text: [Isn't this really interesting?] [What a weird name, isn't it? 9th Star?] [We don't know much about the things at the outskirts of the alliance.]

cards.name: Heart Barrier
cards.ability: The first Follower on your Field that does not belong to the first Follower on your Field's faction is deactivated and gets STA +6.
cards.text: [The two have a very strong love for each other. It's a kind of barrier magic. It appears between two people with bottomless love, called a "Heart Barrier". I will destroy that illusion of yours! -Esprit's memo...]

cards.name: Flare
cards.ability: A random Darklore Follower on your Field gets DEF +1/STA +4.
cards.text: [The agent fired a flare into the air. A red flare signified the successful elimination of Crux, but the failure to find the desired object. The place the GS leader spoke of was not within Crux territory.]

cards.name: Crux in Flames
cards.ability: If there are no Followers on your Field, a new copy of the first Follower on the enemy Field with the highest total ATK/DEF/STA is created in the first empty Slot in your Field and gets SIZE/ATK/DEF/STA changed to equal those of the original Follower. The new Follower gets this skill: "[Death] ▶Turn Start: This card is sent to the Grave."
cards.text: [No witnesses will be left behind. Everything will burn down.]

cards.name: Devastation
cards.ability: The first Follower on your Field that belongs to your Character's faction gets ATK/DEF/STA changed to equal the highest ATK/DEF/STA values in both Fields.
cards.text: [Iri sank to the ground before the destroyed place. Her legs lost all strength. The gap in her heart felt cold. The loss of Vernika swept over her.]

cards.name: Ruin's End
cards.ability: All cards in your Hand get SIZE -1. All cards in the enemy Field get SIZE +1. All cards on your Field and the enemy Field except this one are sent to the bottom of the owner's Deck. All cards in your Hand and the enemy Hand are moved to the bottom of the owner's Deck. The enemy gets Shuffles -1.
cards.text: [This world has been interfered with, as well. That feeling is very strong. Is this the work of DTD? This kind of destruction isn't like DND, but I'm still a bit worried.]

cards.name: Talentium Ingot
cards.ability: (none)
cards.text: [Because refined Talentium ingots stiffen when heat is applied, great care must be taken when processing Talentium for magical purposes. At the highest levels of processing, even coarse Talentium can be given powerful spiritual abilities. This means you can use it to create the most powerful cards. -Esprit's memo...]

cards.name: Vernika's Nightmare
cards.ability: Your Character gets LIFE +1 and you get Shuffles +1. A random Follower on your Field gets ATK +1/STA +1. If your Grave contains at least 5 cards, a random card in your Grave is sent to the bottom of your Deck.
cards.text: [Within her dreams, the victimized Vernika discovered her own heart. She herself was the cause of her sadness. In the end, those who can't cannot, and those who can, can. -Esprit's memo...]

cards.name: Ominous Sky
cards.ability: 2 random Followers in your Field get DEF +1. If this happens, two random Followers in the enemy Field get ATK -2.
cards.text: [It felt as if the night sky within Vernika was becoming blacker.]

cards.name: Nightmare
cards.ability: A random Follower on your Field gets ATK +1. That Follower's ATK and a random Follower on the enemy Field's STA are swapped.
cards.text: [The butterfly effect. Trivial things can result in enormous changes. If Sita were able to stab Vernika, I wonder what kind of ending would have awaited us?]

cards.name: One Afternoon
cards.ability: All Followers on your Field get DEF -3. The first Vita Follower on your Field with the highest SIZE gets DEF increased by 1 plus half the total DEF reduction (rounding up).
cards.text: [Sita, eat slowly. You'll get a stomachache.] [I'm hungry...]

cards.name: Beginning of a Lady
cards.ability: Any of the first Academy Follower on your Field's ATK/DEF/STA that are lower than their original values are changed to their original values.
cards.text: [New beginnings are always exciting. I wonder what kind of exciting things await me at this academy. I'll be able to make new friends.]

cards.name: Everyday Life
cards.ability: Your Character gets LIFE decreased by half the SIZE (rounding down) of a random Follower in your Hand. All Followers on your Field get ATK/STA increased by the amount of lost LIFE.
cards.text: [Cinia's habit. She likes to lie on the sofa. But if the maids caught her like that, she'd be embarrassed.]

cards.name: Meeting
cards.ability: A random Follower on the enemy Field that belongs to the same faction as your Character is sent to the first empty Slot in your Field and deactivated.
cards.text: [A "door" was crossed. Somewhere within the Pacifica estate's woods, Panica and Cinia met for the first time.]

cards.name: Summer Day Memory
cards.ability: 3 random Followers on your Field get ATK/STA increased by the difference between 4 and their own SIZE.
cards.text: [The girl with an eyepatch approached Jaina.] [Do you want... some ice cream?]

cards.name: String of Emotion
cards.ability: The first Follower on your Field with the lowest SIZE gets SIZE +2/ATK +2/DEF +2/STA +2.
cards.text: [The string of emotion. An artifact whose two ends are given to two different people. Each person feels the emotion they want the most. As the users reflect on their emotion, the enemy is influenced as well.]

cards.name: Fellowship
cards.ability: If your Field contains at least one Follower, all non-Crux Followers on both players' Fields get STA -3.
cards.text: [I could never leave my injured comrade! I will never leave this place alone!]

cards.name: Summoning Ritual
cards.ability: The first card in the enemy Grave is removed from the game. If the removed card's SIZE was 3 or less, a Follower called "Zombie" with the skill "[Death] ▶Turn Start: This card is sent to the Grave." is created in the first empty Slot of your Field. If the removed card's SIZE was 4 or more, a Follower called "Devil Lady" is created in the first empty Slot of your Field.
cards.text: [You called? You can summon us as you wish, but it isn't easy to get rid of us~]

cards.name: Sisters
cards.ability: Up to 3 cards in your Grave are removed from the game, starting from the first. 2 random Followers on your Field get ATK/STA increased by the number of removed Darklore Followers.
cards.text: [It was something Irin knew, but Iri did not. The two sisters' destined encounter felt distant.]

cards.name: Master of the Night
cards.ability: All Darklore Followers in your Grave are removed from the game. A random Follower on the enemy Field gets STA decreased by the number of removed cards.
cards.text: [The absolute ruler of the night, unapproachable by anyone. The glass of Vernika's insatiable desires was quickly emptying.]

cards.name: Born in Nature
cards.ability: A number of cards equal to the total number of cards on both players' Fields are sent from both players' Hands to the bottom of the owner's Deck. If this happens, a random Follower on your Field gets STA increased by the total number of cards sent.
cards.text: [Born in nature. Cannelle. Found in nature. Cannelle.] [I'm not a shorty!!!]

cards.name: True Vampire God
cards.ability: Your Character gets LIFE increased by the number of Neutral cards in your Hand/Field minus 1, and all Followers on your Field gain an equal amount of STA.
cards.text: [Erase it from your memory. You cannot see me like this. Turn away. I want to stay like this a little longer...]

cards.name: Red and White
cards.ability: A random Follower on your Field gets the following effects depending on the factions present in your Hand. Vita: ATK +2. Academy: STA +2. Crux: ATK +1/STA +1. Darklore: SIZE -1. Neutral: ATK +2/STA +2.
cards.text: [I want you.] [What...?] [I want you to only look at me, I want you to only scold me, I want you to only love me. Your anger, your love, I want it all.]

cards.name: Sita's Suit
cards.ability: 2 random Vita Followers on your Field get ATK +2/STA +2. Two random Followers on your Field with "Sita" in the name get ATK +1/STA +1.
cards.text: [The sought after suit that brings out Sita's smarty look! The road to fashion king is not far!] [Vernika, I'm hungry...] [Just endure it a little longer, you have to become a boy... I mean a girl who can endure a little hunger for the sake of style.]

cards.name: Perky Girl
cards.ability: The first two cards in your Deck with "Sita" in the name are sent to the first two empty Slots in your Hand. If this happens, those cards get SIZE -2.
cards.text: [The effects of the artifact that Esprit found were amazing. While the target was under its effects, her personality was reversed. Sita became cheerful.]

cards.name: Halloween Minidevil
cards.ability: A random Follower on the enemy Field gets STA decreased by half the ATK of the first Follower in your Hand (rounding up). If this happens, the first Spell in the enemy Hand without "Halloween" in the name is copied to the first empty Slot in your Field.
cards.text: [Okay, look over here! Good, raise your eyes a bit secretly. B-E-A~utiful! Perfect! Let's go! Fashion king!] [Vernika! I want to eat this! Hurry up and finish.]

cards.name: Cinia's Suit
cards.ability: 2 random Academy Followers on your Field get ATK +2/STA +2. Two random Followers on your Field with "Cinia" in the name get ATK +1/STA +1.
cards.text: [Even a suit works! You're definitely surpassing my expectations, Cinia.] [Sis, sister? What are you saying?] [The road to fashion king isn't far.]

cards.name: Diligent Girl
cards.ability: The first two cards in your Deck with "Cinia" in the name are sent to the first two empty Slots in your Hand. If this happens, the first Follower on the enemy Field with a STA less than or equal to the total SIZE of the sent cards is sent to the Grave.
cards.text: [Amazing. It even has the power to make the work-hating Cinia do the dishes. -Esprit's memo...]

cards.name: Halloween Countess
cards.ability: If you have at least one Follower on the Field, a random Follower on the enemy Field gets its first skill changed to one of the following skills randomly. "[Lethargy] ▶Attack: This card gets ATK -1." "[My Liver...] ▶Defend: This card gets STA -3." If this happens, the first Spell in the enemy Hand without "Halloween" in the name is copied to the first empty Slot of your Field.
cards.text: [Good! Okay... stick your tongue out like you're licking blood!!]

cards.name: Luthica's Suit
cards.ability: 2 random Crux Followers on your Field get ATK +2/STA +2. Two random Followers on your Field with "Luthica" in the name get ATK +1/STA +1.
cards.text: [As expected, Luthica's proportions are excellent. This should be enough to compete. Even the fashion king...] [What?]

cards.name: The Hazing
cards.ability: Two random Followers on your Field get DEF increased by half of the number of empty Slots in your Hand (rounding up). The first two cards in your Deck with "Luthica" in the name are sent to the first two empty Slots in your Hand.
cards.text: [You got a problem?] [No!] [Is this inside or outside? Go gather everyone below me and above you. You think I'm playing around when I hit people? Pintail, you think you're excluded just because you're a sergeant? -Witnessed by Esprit]

cards.name: Halloween Witch
cards.ability: A random Follower on your Field gets one of the following skills randomly. "[Attack Charge] ▶Attack: This card gets ATK +1/STA +1." "[Tough Defense] ▶Defend: This card gets STA +3." "[Enhance Defense] ▶Turn Start: This card gets DEF +2." If this happens, the first Spell in the enemy Hand without "Halloween" in the name is copied to the first Slot of your Field.
cards.text: [Amazing, just by adding a broom.] [Jaina?]

cards.name: Iri's Suit
cards.ability: 2 random Darklore Followers on your Field get ATK +2/STA +2. Two random Followers on your Field with "Iri" in the name get ATK +1/STA +1.
cards.text: [To give the appearance of a rough and unpolished beauty, the lower buttons are deliberately left undone, while the curves of the waistline show the magic of a woman. A gap that shows toughness and girlishness at the same time. Through these socks, the true magic of Janus!]

cards.name: Carefree Heart
cards.ability: If there are any Followers on your Field, a random Follower on the enemy Field gets STA decreased by 1 plus the number of empty Slots in your Hand. The first two cards in your Deck with "Iri" in the name are sent to the first two empty Slots in your Hand.
cards.text: ["SPACE ON YOUR HAND!! Take the universe with your hand." The first act of Iri, who had become tolerant to sunlight. Checking the showing of the special effects hero show.]

cards.name: Halloween Wolf
cards.ability: The first card in your Hand is sent to the first empty Slot of your Field and has its SIZE halved (rounding down). If this happens, the first Spell in the enemy Hand without "Halloween" in the name is copied to the first empty Slot of your Field.
cards.text: [This... Sage, why are you dressing me like this?] [We'll take the throne. We have to win fashion king.] [... huh?]

cards.name: Double Council Kick
cards.ability: Up to 2 random Followers on your Field with "Student Council" in the name are deactivated. The first Follower on the enemy Field with the highest STA gets STA decreased by the total ATK of the deactivated Followers.
cards.text: [Love!] [Friendship!] [Double! Student Council!!! Kick!!]

cards.name: Comfort Room
cards.ability: The first Follower on your Field with "Maid" in the name and the lowest SIZE is sent to the first empty Slot in your Hand. Academy Followers in your Hand and Field get ATK +2/STA +2.
cards.text: [A fragrance to comfort the maids who have been tired out by work. A rather strange sight. What is the identity of this scent that Linia brought in?]

cards.name: Flash Shield
cards.ability: All Followers on your Field on your Field with "Seeker" in the name get the following skill: "[Flash Shield] ▶Defend: If there are any Crux cards on your Field other than this one, this card gets STA increased by half the attacker's ATK (rounding up). This skill is removed."
cards.text: [With the flash of a shield, the seekers' research will never be stopped.]

cards.name: Strega Think Tank
cards.ability: All Followers on the enemy Field get ATK decreased by 1 plus the number of Followers on your Field with "Witch" in the name. Followers on your Field with "Witch" in the name get ATK increased by the same amount. (Note: This card isn't considered to have "Witch" in the name for the purposes of other cards' skills because it uses a different word in Korean.)
cards.text: [Unlike vampires, who cannot live outside the world of the night, witches have chosen to live in the dark side of the world. There is a group of witches trying to acquire all the world's knowledge, money, and information. This is the Witch's Thinktank.]

cards.name: Rio's Ward
cards.ability: All Followers on your Field get ATK +4/STA +4.
cards.text: [First, I'll test you. Try breaking through my ward.]

cards.name: Origin Reader
cards.ability: For each empty Slot in the enemy Hand, the first Spell in the enemy Deck is sent to the enemy Hand.
cards.text: [I can unlock some power now, too. Ho... The keyword is important.]

cards.name: Awakened Lady
cards.ability: All Followers on the enemy Field get STA -4.
cards.text: [Suddenly, unfamiliar things she had never experienced before flashed across Seven's memory. "I've seen it!"]

cards.name: Meltdown
cards.ability: All Followers on the enemy Field get DEF -5.
cards.text: [This is master's teachings, the sword. I will melt away all of your defense.]

cards.name: Restored Origin
cards.ability: All cards in both Fields get SIZE = 1.
cards.text: [It's different from healing. This is restoration. It's best expressed as returning things to their origins.]

cards.name: Sage's Slipper
cards.ability: All cards on the enemy Field with "Shion" or "Rion" in the name are destroyed.
cards.text: [What are you doing!] [Sister Sage! Why are you suddenly hitting us!] [Ouch! Ouch!]

cards.name: Third Impact
cards.ability: All Followers on the enemy Field get SIZE=1~10 (random).
cards.text: [The first was a failure. The second was also a failure. The third was a crisis. The flagpole she was supplied had broken. There were no spares, and they had to march...]

cards.name: Arc Light
cards.ability: All Followers on the enemy Field get the following skill: "[Best Attack] ▶Attack: This card gets ATK +1."
cards.text: [The righteous power of the light!]

cards.name: Charming Aura
cards.ability: All Followers on the enemy Field have their skills removed.
cards.text: [You there, honey~ Do you want to play with me for a while? If it's okay, come with me.]

cards.name: Trap Book
cards.ability: If there are no empty Slots in the enemy Field, all cards in the enemy Field are sent to the Grave.
cards.text: [The energy of a curse attacked Nanai as she touched the book.] [Se... Seven?]

cards.name: Council Grand Opening
cards.ability: If you have a Follower on your Field with "Student Council" in the name, the first card in your Hand is sent to the bottom of your Deck. The first card on the enemy Field with the same SIZE as that card is sent to the Grave.
cards.text: [As the start of a new student council, Celine moved the student council room to a new building outside the school.] [You have to put new wine in a new bottle, right?] [This is outside of budget.]

cards.name: Freezing Room
cards.ability: All Followers in the enemy Field get ATK/STA decreased by 1 plus half of the Turn Number (rounding down, by a maximum of 5). You get Shuffles +1 and the opponent gets Shuffles -1.
cards.text: [As... mis...] [When Asmis, who received a note from Weekly, arrived after class, Weekly had already been frozen.]

cards.name: Witch Cadet
cards.ability: 2 random Followers in your Field get ATK +1/STA +1. 2 random Followers in your Field with "Witch" in the name get ATK +2/STA +2.
cards.text: [The symbolic hat of witches and a letter were both left in the girls' new lockers.]

cards.name: Lady's Selection
cards.ability: If there are any Followers in your Field with "Lady" in the name, a random Spell in the enemy Field is sent to the bottom of the enemy Deck. If this happens, all Followers in your Field with "Lady" in the name get STA increased by the sent card's SIZE.
cards.text: [This sword is magnificent, too, but something is missing. I want to hold a sharper and more beautiful sword.]

cards.name: Elberto Impact
cards.ability: If you have an Academy Character, all Spells on the enemy Field are sent to the bottom of the enemy Deck. A number of Spells called "Pleased to meet you" equal to the number of sent Spells are created in the last Slots on the enemy Field and deactivated (at least 1 card is created). This card is removed from the game.
cards.text: [Elbert Albershaw. Her artificial eye was a heart stone, and she was a witch. She took the nobles' hands and asked, why do you hide? That place has witches that I do not know.]

cards.name: Artificer
cards.ability: 2 random Followers in your Field with "Seeker" in the name get ATK/STA increased by 1 plus the number of skills they have.
cards.text: [Her ability to handle artifacts is the highest. Her title of Artificer is not for show.]

cards.name: Joining the Knights
cards.ability: The first Follower in your Field with the highest STA gets ATK and STA swapped, and then gets STA +2.
cards.text: [To hide a tree, go to the forest... after seeing Veltier, who had abandoned her own appearance, Rose made a decision to avoid the eyes of Crux.]

cards.name: Sanctuary Pillar
cards.ability: All Crux Followers on your Field get STA +3. If they have "Seeker" in the name, they get an additional ATK +2. If the Turn Number is even, a random Spell in the enemy Field is deactivated. This card is deactivated.
cards.text: [This place, where the pinwheel turns, is the place of a god. Which god, I do not know, but at the very least, I know that it is not the goddess of Crux.]

cards.name: Pointless Research
cards.ability: If there are any Followers in your Field, the following effect is applied 3 times: "A random Follower in either Field gets ATK -1/STA -3."
cards.text: [I'm putting everything on this research. I'll show my true self to those scientists who have been ignoring me.]

cards.name: Nether Deal
cards.ability: The first Follower in your Field and a Follower in Slot 3 in the enemy Field get DEF/STA swapped with each other. If this happens, your Character gets LIFE -1.
cards.text: [A ticket? Is this a joke? What are you talking about, you don't have money? Business is business! You have to give me something if you want something!]

cards.name: Cursed Totem
cards.ability: 2 random Followers on the enemy Field get the following effects depending on the number of cards on your Field, then this card is deactivated and remains on the Field. 1: STA -2. 2: ATK -1/STA -1. 3: ATK -1/STA -2. 4: ATK -2/STA -2. 5: ATK -2/STA -3. If the Turn Number is odd, a random Spell on the enemy Field is deactivated.
cards.text: [Put it in the basement of the cathedral. It will alter the fate of the unstoppable Crux.]

cards.name: Sacred Tutor
cards.ability: A random Follower in the enemy Hand is sent to the first empty Slot in the enemy Field. (HINT: There aren't enough.)
cards.text: [I found it. It's here, too. As I thought, it was scattered throughout the world!]

cards.name: Rainy Day
cards.ability: The Turn Number is increased by 2. All Followers on the enemy Field get ATK -2/STA -2. (HINT: I'm going to take a break...)
cards.text: [It's raining. I have a strange feeling. I somewhat remember getting soaked by the rain before, too, but I must have tried to erase it from my memory...]

cards.name: Flee
cards.ability: The following effect is applied five times: "A random Follower on the enemy Field gets STA -5." (HINT: Back away...)
cards.text: [The messenger ran through the alleys of the burning city looking for her comrades. She tried speaking to her fallen comrades in the street. No response. They were just corpses.]

cards.name: Burning Crusade
cards.ability: All Followers on the enemy Field get the following skill: "[Ack!] ▶Attack: This card gets STA=1."
cards.text: [The 1st Star's heart wavered as she looked upon the burning city. What would be waiting for her at the end of this?]

cards.name: Library Explorer
cards.ability: All Followers in your Hand with "Lib." in the name are sent to the bottom of your Deck. If this happens, an equal number of random cards in the enemy Field are deactivated.
cards.text: [There are still many books who have never seen light. Until I graduate, I will never stop exploring. Who knows if I'll ever be able to graduate properly?]

cards.name: Rookie's Debut
cards.ability: Followers in your Field with an ATK equal to their STA get ATK +4/STA +4.
cards.text: [I wish to cook with this knife that I have inherited from my parents! I wish to join the Cook Club!] [Do you like... sweets?] [The girl who had always dreamed of being in the Cook Club was disappointed from the very beginning. The members only baked sweets.]

cards.name: Back from Below
cards.ability: The first Follower in your Grave that belongs to your Character's faction is sent to the first empty Slot in your Field, gets ATK +2/STA +2, and is deactivated. That Follower's skills are changed to "[Refresh!] ▶Turn Start: This card's original skills are restored."
cards.text: [I saw it. It was large, black, and smooth, even though it was stiff. It was an unexpectedly quick organism... scary.]

cards.name: Lady Radar
cards.ability: All Academy Followers on your Field without "Defend" skills get DEF +1/STA +3. The first card in your Deck with "Lady" in your name is moved to the first empty Slot of your Hand.
cards.text: [Her power of perception was transcendental. Even without seeing anything, her intuition was able to alert her to the presence of others.]

cards.name: Strega's Memory
cards.ability: 2 random Followers in the enemy Field get ATK/DEF decreased by half of the total SIZE of Followers in your Field with "Witch" in the name (rounding down). (Note: This card isn't considered to have "Witch" in the name for the purposes of other cards' skills because it uses a different word in Korean.)
cards.text: [Cinia dreamt. It was a recollection of happier days. The days when Cinia and Panica were together.]

cards.name: 14th Request
cards.ability: If you have a Follower on your Field and if any of the following conditions are met, 4 random cards on either player's Fields are sent to the Grave and this card is removed from the game. Conditions: "The total number of Followers on your Field and the enemy Field is 4." "The Turn Number is a multiple of 4." "The total number of empty Slots in your Hand and the enemy Hand is 4."
cards.text: [My personal feelings don't matter. This is just work. This is the 14th one... it seems like it has some significance.]

cards.name: Artificial Sanctuary Test
cards.ability: If there are Followers in your Field with "Seeker" in the name and this card has a SIZE of 1, all Followers in the enemy Field get STA -4, the enemy player gets Shuffles -1, and a random card in the enemy Hand is sent to the Grave. If this card does not have a SIZE of 1, it gets SIZE -1 and is deactivated.
cards.text: [The seekers tested the newly found artifact in this region. During the week of testing, they all went crazy.]

cards.name: Really Quick Service
cards.ability: Up to 2 random Followers in the enemy Hand swap places with up to 2 random Followers in the enemy Field.
cards.text: [To counter the disadvantages of using a bike, Crux outfitted all of their bike messengers with protective equipment. With this equipment, the messengers became pros.]

cards.name: Girl Discovered
cards.ability: If you have a Crux Character, the first 10 cards in the enemy Grave are removed from the game. All Followers in the enemy Field get STA decreased by the number of removed cards divided by 1 plus the number of Followers in the enemy Field (rounding down).
cards.text: [While looking for a place to rest in the forest, Rose stumbled upon a girl.]

cards.name: Third Laboratory
cards.ability: If there are at least 3 Followers in the enemy Field with the same SIZE, the first of those Followers is destroyed.
cards.text: [In order to increase their own power, the GS looked into methods of physical remodeling. This was the preparation process for physical remodeling.]

cards.name: Dream
cards.ability: If there are at least 3 Followers in your Field, the first Follower in the enemy Field with the highest ATK gets ATK changed to equal its original value.
cards.text: [It is natural for people who have been sitting and listening to others speak for a long time to feel the desire to sleep.]

cards.name: Forming the Resistance
cards.ability: 2 cards named "GS Scout" and "Aletheian B-NA" are created in your Grave, the enemy Grave, and the bottom of your Deck.
cards.text: [The Aletheian ace, Schindler K Eru, joined forces with the GS in the name of a resistance. Their common goal was the destruction of the Crux.]

cards.name: Suggested Reading
cards.ability: All Followers in your Field get STA -5.
cards.text: [This book is very interesting. If you start reading it, you'll never want to leave this place!]

cards.name: Last One
cards.ability: Your Character gets LIFE -5~+5.
cards.text: [Was the answer that Conundrum picked the correct one!?! We'll find out in 60 seconds!]

cards.name: Spearhead
cards.ability: All Followers in the enemy Field get ATK/STA halved (rounding up). (HINT: Critical)
cards.text: [To be righteous means to have no openings.]

cards.name: Book Meets Girl
cards.ability: All Followers in your Field get DEF doubled. All Followers in the enemy Hand and Field lose all skills.
cards.text: [These books are truly the world's treasures. These precious words mean everything to me!]

cards.name: Wrathful Reversal
cards.ability: All Followers in your Field get ATK +2/STA +2. All Followers in the enemy Field get ATK -2/STA -2. (HINT: Don't be cheap!)
cards.text: [I've been by myself every since I was born! How could a person who has never mingled with others and always remained alone ever hope for another person's warmth!]

cards.name: Perfect Sleep
cards.ability: All cards in your Hand and Field are sent to the top of your Deck. All cards in the enemy Field are deactivated. (HINT: Peacefully...)
cards.text: [zzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzz...!!!]

cards.name: Destroy Evidence
cards.ability: All cards in the enemy Grave are removed from the game.
cards.text: [When handling work, the most important point is to never leave any evidence.]

cards.name: Producing
cards.ability: Spells named "Good Job" are created in all empty Slots in both Fields and deactivated. (HINT: Me too!)
cards.text: [The job of managing all the maids' schedules. This shouldn't be a maid's job, so she feels doubtful about it.]

cards.name: Youngest Knight's Day
cards.ability: All Followers on the enemy Field get SIZE decreased by the number of empty Slots on the enemy Field. All Followers on the enemy Field get ATK/DEF/STA decreased by their reduction in SIZE.
cards.text: [The youngest's day begins with chores. She doesn't know when this will end.]

cards.name: Cobalt Book
cards.ability: The Follower in your Field with the lowest DEF gets DEF changed to equal the highest DEF in the enemy Field.
cards.text: [This is a book recommendation for my treasured friend. Please treat it with care...]

cards.name: Hiking Lesson
cards.ability: All Followers on the enemy Field get STA decreased by the total SIZE of your Field divided by the number of cards on your Field (rounding down).
cards.text: [You can't learn everything just from books! You have to learn from experience, too!]

cards.name: Nostalgia
cards.ability: The first 5 Vita Followers in your Deck get ATK/STA increased by 5,4,3,2,1 starting from the top. You get Shuffles +1.
cards.text: [These are the books I first read when I was a new student... I've been stuck in the storage lately, but these are still my precious books.]

cards.name: Protection
cards.ability: If there are any Spells in the enemy Field, a random Follower in the enemy Field gets DEF -4.
cards.text: [To protect the ladies no matter what... this is my determination.]

cards.name: Lady's Rest
cards.ability: For each Follower in your Field with "Lady" in the name, the first Spell in the enemy Deck is sent to the bottom of the enemy Deck.
cards.text: [For the sake of beauty, of course I must rest right now. 11 o' clock?]

cards.name: Crossroads of Chaos
cards.ability: If you have an Academy Character and your Field SIZE is at least 3, all cards in both Fields are randomly rearranged. The number of movements will not exceed the total number of cards in both Fields.
cards.text: [The mystery of the witch is a mystery. The birdcage is used to lock up birds.]

cards.name: Sanctuary Exploration
cards.ability: The first card in your Deck with "Sanctuary" in the name is sent to the top of your Deck. If this happens, your Character gets LIFE increased by half of the sent card's SIZE (rounding up).
cards.text: [What's that! Why is something like that here? It's regrettable, but I'll use this disposable artifact...]

cards.name: Quick as the Wind
cards.ability: 2 random Followers in your Field get SIZE decreased by the number of Spells in your Field and get STA increased by the SIZE reduction.
cards.text: [Yes? A delivery? Where would you like it delivered?]

cards.name: Towards Sanctuary
cards.ability: If you have a Crux Character, all Spells in both Fields are sent to the owners' Graves. If this happens, the first Spell in your Hand is sent to the first empty Slot in your Field. A card with the name "Artificial Sanctuary Experiment" is created in the first empty Slot on the enemy Field and gets SIZE=2.
cards.text: [Upon hearing about a special power hidden within the ancient sanctuary, the knight captain sent the orders to advance. Of course, the parrot sent them instead...]

cards.name: Protective Instinct
cards.ability: The first Follower on your Field is sent to the top of your Deck. If this happens, the next Follower on your Field gets ATK +4 and gets STA increased by the sent card's DEF. That Follower also gets SIZE -1 if the sent card has "Aletheian" in the name.
cards.text: [I will protect you. Remember these teachings.]

cards.name: GS Attack Formation
cards.ability: The first Follower on your Field with "GS" in the name is sent to the first empty Slot of the enemy Field, gets ATK=0, and gets STA increased by half the ATK reduction (rounding down). Its skills become the following: "[Break] ▶Defend: All Followers on your Field get DEF -1." "[Death] ▶Turn Start: This card is sent to the Grave."
cards.text: [I will be the leader.] [The scariest part of GS aggression is their lack of fear.]

cards.name: Phantasmal Image
cards.ability: If you have a Darklore Character, the skills of the second Follower on your Field are copied to the first Follower on your Field. The first Follower on your Field gets ATK/DEF/STA increased by the number of copied skills.
cards.text: [The seen world isn't everything. The important things can't be seen.]

cards.name: Forbidden Research
cards.ability: All cards on the enemy Field are deactivated. All Spells on the enemy Field get SIZE +1. All Followers on the enemy Field get their skills removed. The enemy player gets Shuffles -1.
cards.text: [The project wasn't suspended. I just forgot about it...]

cards.name: Shutter Chance
cards.ability: All Followers on your Field gain the following skill: "[Absolute Shield] ▶Attack: If this card's DEF is less than 0, this card's DEF becomes the absolute value of its DEF."
cards.text: [I'm completely prepared, so I won't miss the perfect chance.]

cards.name: Try Being Me
cards.ability: All Followers in your Hand get stats changed to equal the stats of the first card in your Field with "Conundrum" in the name. All Followers in the enemy Hand get stats changed to equal the first card in the enemy Field with "Conundrum" in the name.
cards.text: [Conundrum? Conundrum?]

cards.name: Gift Box
cards.ability: (none)
cards.text: [A packaged box to give as a gift to another person. It gets you excited when wondering what's inside, and you can feel the spirit of giving. -Esprit's memo...]

cards.name: Disciple's Box
cards.ability: A random high-level card is created in the first empty Slot of your Field. (HINT: A random powerful spell will appear.)
cards.text: [You'll never guess what will come out from this box.]

cards.name: Infinite Thanks
cards.ability: A Spell called "Thank You" is created in all empty Slots of the enemy Field and deactivated. (HINT: Thank you.)
cards.text: [No matter how many times I emphasize having a thankful heart, it's still an important virtue.]

cards.name: Curse of Decay
cards.ability: All Followers on the enemy Field get ATK -2/DEF -2/STA -2, then this card is deactivated and remains on the Field. (HINT: Endless decay.)
cards.text: [The effects of the curse are still incomplete, but if you are too slow to stop it, it will become impossible to undo.]

cards.name: Worries
cards.ability: Cards in Slots 1 and 5 in the enemy Field are swapped. Cards in Slots 2 and 4 in the enemy Field are swapped. Followers in Slots 1 and 2 in the enemy Field get STA -2.
cards.text: [Is this really the right choice? I can still be confident in front of her?]

cards.name: Event
cards.ability: The first card in the enemy Field with a SIZE equal to the difference between 10 and your Field SIZE gets ATK -2/STA -2 and is sent to the top of the enemy Deck.
cards.text: [This is a time to pay attention to everything. It is an even more special occasion because I am here.]

cards.name: Enrollment
cards.ability: A random Follower on your Field gets ATK +1/STA +1. If there are any active cards on the enemy Field and no cards on the enemy Field with the name "Going to School", this card remains active on your Field.
cards.text: [Dazzling. This is sunlight? She walked along the glimmering road, with the sunlight reflecting off her eyes. This is a completely new school life... I can do whatever I want. Is this the place I've been waiting for?]

cards.name: Meeting the Chair
cards.ability: 2 random Followers in the enemy Field get ATK -1/STA -1. If their remaining STA is even, they get an additional ATK -2/STA -2.
cards.text: [This is the current chairman of the Royle Academy. She still doesn't know how she will change everything.] [Yes, in the end, you are still one flower of many in a garden.]

cards.name: Personal Investigation
cards.ability: For each Follower in your Field with "Lady" in the name, a Follower on top of the enemy Deck is sent to the enemy Hand. If at least 3 cards are sent, a random card in the enemy Field is sent to the top of the enemy Deck.
cards.text: [The changed student council president, the disappearing students. Something is strange... I wonder if it has something to do with the increase in restricted areas?]

cards.name: Warning
cards.ability: All Followers in the enemy Field get ATK/STA decreased by the number of empty Slots in your Hand. All cards in both Hands are sent to the bottom of the owners' Decks.
cards.text: [Linia.. Why are you in a hurry? I think you are hurrying toward the end too quickly?] [You say that, but isn't that breaking the rules? Huhu. I'd be sad if I couldn't see your face, but at any rate, Cinia can't be stopped.]

cards.name: Crossing the Sanctuary
cards.ability: If you have a Crux Character and this card's SIZE is 1, this card gets SIZE=2 and is sent to the enemy Field and deactivated. If this card's SIZE is 2, it gets SIZE=1 and is sent to the enemy Field.
cards.text: [Faster, higher, farther! I can go anywhere!]

cards.name: Holy Researcher
cards.ability: The first Follower in your Hand is sent to the Grave. The Follower in your Field with the lowest STA gets STA changed equal to the sent Follower's STA.
cards.text: [The thing at the source of the whirlpool. That thing is...]

cards.name: Back from Sanctuary
cards.ability: 2 random Crux Followers in your Field get STA increased by the ATK of the first Follower in the enemy Field.
cards.text: [What is... I feel like I've been dreaming for a long time. I can't remember anything. Who are you? Who... am I?]

cards.name: Mystic Tutor
cards.ability: All cards in both Fields except for this card and the first Follower in your Field get SIZE -1. The first Follower in your Field gets ATK/STA increased by the total SIZE reduction.
cards.text: [Endlessly research and endlessly investigate. If there is light, there is shadow. Believe and take in god's teachings.]

cards.name: Comrades
cards.ability: If the total SIZE of all Followers in your Field is greater than the total SIZE of all Followers in the enemy Field, a random Follower in the enemy Field gets ATK/DEF/SIZE halved (rounding up).
cards.text: [We are being overwhelmed. But no matter what anyone says, we will overcome it.]

cards.name: Forgotten God's Ritual
cards.ability: If there are any Spells in the enemy Field, the first Follower in your Deck is sent to the first empty Slot in your Field and gets ATK +4/STA +4. If the sent Follower does not belong to your Character's faction, it gets an additional SIZE -1.
cards.text: [Come. Come. The ritual went smoothly. Now...]

cards.name: Musiciter Mentor
cards.ability: All cards in your Hand and Deck with a SIZE of 10 are sent to the bottom of your Deck. For each card sent, a random card in the enemy Field is sent to the top of the enemy Deck and all Followers in your Field get STA +1. All Followers in your Field are deactivated.
cards.text: [The gathering of girls who have the power to transform. They stand against those who wish to disrupt the world, and they advocate justice. That group is Muzisitter.]

cards.name: Forbidden Book
cards.ability: If the enemy Hand contains a card, the first 2 cards in the enemy Deck get SIZE +1 and are sent to the enemy Hand. (HINT: Even if you offer something, it might not be enough.)
cards.text: [It will give you infinite knowledge. Are you ready to receive it?]

cards.name: Endless Appetite
cards.ability: All cards on both players' Fields that do not have a SIZE of 1 are deactivated. All Followers on both players' Fields with a SIZE of 5 are destroyed. (HINT: You need to go on a diet... but it's already too late.)
cards.text: [No matter how much I eat, I'm hungry, no matter how much I sleep, I'm tired! That place is... a school!]

cards.name: Knight Selection
cards.ability: All cards without "Knight" in the name get SIZE +3. (HINT: Are you a knight?)
cards.text: [You are not qualified.]

cards.name: Nom Nom Nom
cards.ability: The first Spell in your Deck is sent to the first empty Slot of your Field. If the sent card's SIZE is odd, it is sent to the Grave. The first Spell in the enemy Deck is sent to the first empty Slot of the enemy Field. If the sent card's SIZE is odd, it is sent to the Grave.
cards.text: [Oh where did you come from? Hello there nom nom]

cards.name: Final Decision
cards.ability: The first Follower on your Field and a random Follower on the enemy Field with a SIZE less than or equal to twice the SIZE of the first Follower on your Field both have their ATK/STA set equal to half (rounding down) the sum of both Followers' ATK/STA.
cards.text: [This won't do. Do I have to become a Level 6 in order to be the strongest in the Lib.?]

cards.name: Petrifying Curse
cards.ability: If you have a Vita Character, all Followers on both Fields with a SIZE less than this card's SIZE are removed from the game. If this card's SIZE is at least 6, this card is removed from the game. Otherwise, this card gets SIZE +2 and is sent to the top of your Deck.
cards.text: [The medusa's curse spread quickly.]

cards.name: Mass Polymorph
cards.ability: All cards on both players' Fields have their SIZE randomly redistributed.
cards.text: [It was Linia's magic. She turned everyone small. Linia watched them contently.]

cards.name: Appointment
cards.ability: 2 random Followers on your Field get STA increased by the number of Spells in the top 5 cards of your Deck and get ATK increased by the number of Followers in the top 5 cards of your Deck.
cards.text: [Seron was appointed as the new head maid. Al the maids started leaving one by one. Some strange rumors about Linia were spreading around. After being called out, some strange magic would be used, and they would undergo some kind of examination...]

cards.name: Chair's Conspiracy
cards.ability: If you have an Academy Character and the number of Spells on the enemy Field is greater than or equal to the number of Followers on the enemy Field, a random Follower on the enemy Field is sent to the Grave. The enemy Character gets LIFE decreased by twice the sent Follower's SIZE (by a maximum of 10).
cards.text: [Seven was not excluded from Linia's plans of turning people into witches. Seven's distrust and spirit of revenge would turn her into a burning witch. Can Linia also turn ordinary girls into witches?]

cards.name: Excavation
cards.ability: If your Field contains a Follower, the following effect is applied a number of times equal to the difference in the number of cards on your Field and the enemy Field: "A random Follower on the enemy Field gets SIZE +1/ATK -1."
cards.text: [Don't rest your hands, even for a little bit! We must quickly find it! If you find an artifact, shout loudly!]

cards.name: Armor Break
cards.ability: The Follower on your Field with the lowest STA is destroyed. If your Character's LIFE is less than the enemy Character's LIFE, a number of random Followers on the enemy Field equal to half the destroyed Follower's SIZE (rounding down) are sent to the Grave.
cards.text: [Kyaa! Wha, what was that? A sneeze?!]

cards.name: Understanding
cards.ability: All cards on the enemy Field with an odd SIZE and all non-Crux cards on your Field are sent to the Grave.
cards.text: [Even though they didn't know each other, the two understood that they were similar. It was the most natural feeling in the world.]

cards.name: Scout's Attitude
cards.ability: The first Follower on your Field regains its original skills and gets ATK +1/STA +1.
cards.text: [This is the enemy's base... my hands are shaking, but I'm not afraid.] [You might think that since you might be caught, you have to be in the best condition. That's not true. The fright is enough.]

cards.name: Shaman's Prayer
cards.ability: 2 random Darklore Followers on your Field get ATK increased by the total DEF of all Followers on the enemy Field and get STA decreased by half (rounding up) the total DEF of all Followers on the enemy Field minus 1.
cards.text: [Helena looks very devout with her hands clasped together in prayer.] [Mommy, what's that thing behind her?] [Shh, be quiet. Miss Helena is praying.]

cards.name: Dark Sword Refinement
cards.ability: If you have a Darklore Character, you get Shuffles +5 and one random Follower on your Field gets ATK/DEF/STA decreased by the number of enemy Shuffles, then the enemy gets Shuffles -1. This card is removed from the game.
cards.text: [It will be finished soon.] [A-GA is pouring a red liquid over the sword with unfocused eyes.] [The liquid creates evil vibrations in the sword. The echoes sound like laughter.]

cards.name: Sage's Advice
cards.ability: 2 random Followers on your Field get ATK +3/STA +3.
cards.text: [Remember. Do not call her Rio. Right now, within Rio lies the mother demon. If Rio is awakened too quickly, everything will fall into the whirlpool of chaos.]

cards.name: Lucky Coin
cards.ability: (created by Coin Child)
cards.text: [It feels like you'll be able to take the initiative next turn.]

cards.name: Obstinance
cards.ability: All cards on the enemy Field get SIZE=4. (HINT: Odd? Even!)
cards.text: [According to my wishes~]

cards.name: Nether Visitor
cards.ability: All Followers on your Field/Hand/Deck get ATK +1/STA +1. Your Character gets LIFE +1. You get Shuffles +1. All Followers on the enemy Field/Hand/Deck get ATK -1/STA -1. This card is removed from the game.
cards.text: [So Vernika was not in the underworld. But if she hadn't gone to the underworld, then where was she? Iri felt powerless as she headed toward the train to return to the land of the living.]

cards.name: Message
cards.ability: All cards in your Grave with the same name as the first card on your Field other than this one are sent to the top of your Deck. This card is removed from the game.
cards.text: [Principal Treanna said this. Now is not the time to cross that river. Wait until the fourth agent is dealt with.]

cards.name: Four Messages
cards.ability: 2 random Followers on your Field get SIZE=4. All Followers whose SIZE increased get ATK/DEF/STA increased by their increase in SIZE.
cards.text: [Here.] [The Myo postgirl delivered a letter to Asmis. Within the letter were 4 beautifully written numbers.] [Asmis recalled Treanna's words. "The game is starting..."]

cards.name: Organization Failure
cards.ability: All cards on the enemy Field except the first and last cards are sent to the Grave.
cards.text: [Aah... It was stupid to carry so many books like that...]

cards.name: Take A Break
cards.ability: The first card on the enemy Field with a SIZE of at least 6 is moved to the first empty Slot of your Field and deactivated. This card is removed from the game.
cards.text: [Aren't you tired? Come over here. How about having a cup of coffee with me?]

cards.name: Fairy Borrowers
cards.ability: The first card on the enemy Field with a total DEF+SIZE of 5 is destroyed, then your Character gets LIFE decreased by half the destroyed card's DEF (rounding up).
cards.text: [Oh my! Thank you, fairies! Thank you for helping me, but you can't take my stuff away!]

cards.name: Musiciter Appears!
cards.ability: The first 10 cards of both players' Decks are sent to the Grave. If this happens, 10 random cards with a different name than this card are sent from your Grave to the bottom of your Deck. 10 random cards are sent from the enemy Grave to the bottom of the enemy Deck. This card is removed from the game.
cards.text: [The group of transforming girls that fight for the sake of justice. This group is called Muzisitter. In order to fix the chaos within Crux, these girls have surfaced.]

cards.name: Sanctuary Trip
cards.ability: If this card's SIZE is greater than 2, it gets SIZE=3. Your Character gets LIFE increased by this card's SIZE. If this card's SIZE is 1, it is sent to the Grave. Otherwise, this card gets SIZE=1 and is deactivated.
cards.text: [This place is really amazing. There are so many things that you can't experience anywhere else.]

cards.name: Kinship
cards.ability: If all cards in your Hand/Field other than this one belong to your Character's faction, 2 random Followers on the enemy Field get ATK/DEF decreased by half the number of cards in your Hand/Field (rounding down).
cards.text: [Wouldn't it be great if you were my sister, Rotori?] [Shh! We'll get in trouble.]

cards.name: Sudden News
cards.ability: If the enemy Hand contains a Spell, all Followers on the enemy Field get ATK -4/STA -4. Otherwise, all Followers on your Field get ATK -2/STA -2.
cards.text: [What do you mean, quartermaster? A state of emergency? Extended service?!]

cards.name: Lonely Operation
cards.ability: All Followers on your Field with "GS," "Aletheian," or "Apostle" in the name get ATK +3.
cards.text: [She'll gradually lose her footing like this. The moment she feels lonely, she will let her guard down.]

cards.name: Dream Curse
cards.ability: All Darklore Followers on your Field are deactivated. A random card on the enemy Field with a SIZE less than or equal to the number of deactivated Followers is sent to the bottom of the enemy Deck (if it is a Follower) or sent to the Grave (if it is a Spell).
cards.text: [Eisenwane had a nightmare. She saw herself being gripped for the first time by the terrible curse.]

cards.name: Ritual's Final Step
cards.ability: The last Follower in your Deck is sent to the Grave. If this happens, a random Follower on your Field gets SIZE -1/ATK +4/STA +4.
cards.text: [To complete the ritual to summon the forgotten ancient god, you must prepare a vessel for the god to descend into.] [You are not a sacrifice. This is a sacred ritual to bring prosperity to this land, and you are the heroine.]

cards.name: Nether Cafe
cards.ability: The first card in your Hand is removed from the game. If this happens, a random Follower on the enemy Field is destroyed.
cards.text: [Before you go, why don't you have something to eat? After all, it's something you'll never get to taste before dying. Have one bowl, then you can go. Ah, can vampires eat human food?]

cards.name: Think Twice Seal
cards.ability: 2 random Followers on the enemy Field have their ATK/DEF/STA changed to their original values for any stat greater than its original value.
cards.text: [I already know what to do now that Rio is in this state. Even if I didn't, I would find out soon enough.]

cards.name: Time Spiral
cards.ability: All Followers on the enemy Field with ATK/DEF/STA higher than their original values get ATK/DEF/STA decreased by twice the amount that each stat exceeds its original value.
cards.text: [Wow~ Sister Sage! How do you do this?] [It's simple, but it's impossible for you.] [Wow, look at this, my hand! My hand!]

cards.name: Vacation Plans
cards.ability: The first Follower in the enemy Hand is changed into "Game Starter".
cards.text: [Since summer is approaching, what do you want to do? The sea? Mountains? River? Wherever you go, make sure to enjoy yourself.]

cards.name: Inspiration
cards.ability: All cards in your Hand are sent to the bottom of your Deck, then the first 2 Followers and Spells are sent from the top of your Deck to your Hand.
cards.text: [The result of thinking has to be inspiration. If you're just thinking vacantly, then it isn't really thinking.]

cards.ability: 2 random Vita Followers on your Field without "Student Council" or "Lib." in the name get the following effects depending on who wins the coin flip. You win: ATK +3/DEF+1/STA+1. Opponent wins: ATK +1/DEF +1/STA +3.
cards.text: [!!!! It spilled.]

cards.name: Preference
cards.ability: The first 3 cards other than this card on your Field, in your Hand, and in your Deck that belong to your Character's faction and do not have a SIZE of 1 get SIZE -1.
cards.text: [Ah... Sita...]

cards.name: Lady's Dinner
cards.ability: 2 random Followers on the enemy Field get ATK -1/STA -2. If your Field contains a card with a SIZE of at least 6, those Followers instead get ATK -2/STA -4.
cards.text: [She's not a picky eater, but Cinia's nitpicking during meals really bothers the maids.]

cards.name: Eldest Sister's Hobby
cards.ability: 2 random Academy Followers on your Field without "Maid" or "Lady" in the name get the following effects depending on who wins the coin flip. You win: ATK +3/DEF+1/STA+1. Opponent wins: ATK +1/DEF +1/STA +3.
cards.text: [Cinia is yours~ (frown)] [This is the chairman's strange hobby. She wears the student council president's clothes and says weird things in front of the mirror...] [* This is a work of fiction.]

cards.name: Triforce Ready
cards.ability: All Followers on your Field that belong to your Character's faction regain their original skills, and any of their ATK/DEF/STA that are lower than their original values are changed to their original values.
cards.text: [I have decided the fate of this battle.] [Triforce! Ready?] [A mechanical voice echoed from somewhere.]

cards.name: Strength of Determination
cards.ability: 2 random Crux Followers on your Field with at least 1 DEF get DEF decreased by twice their own Def. If this happens, those Followers get ATK increased by twice the decrease in their respective DEF.
cards.text: [Those who are prepared for death show great strength.]

cards.name: Rumor
cards.ability: 2 random Crux Followers on your Field without "Knight" or "Seeker" in the name get the following effects depending on who wins the coin flip. You win: ATK +3/DEF+1/STA+1. Opponent wins: ATK +1/DEF +1/STA +3.
cards.text: [There is a legend among the knights. If you receive a certain type of acupuncture, then you will reach a higher level... But there's nothing like that.]

cards.name: Dignity
cards.ability: A number of Followers on the enemy Field equal to the number of Crux Followers on your Field have their ATK/DEF/STA divided by 1 + the number of Crux Followers on your Field (rounding down).
cards.text: [By using a certain hand signal, birds' talons erupt from the ground, binding the feet of all of her foes. This is the ability to control large swarms of people. This is Eisenwane's power.]

cards.name: She who stands at the top
cards.ability: You get Shuffles -1 (minimum 0). If this happens, all Followers in your Hand/Field get ATK +2/STA +2.
cards.text: [Her power was immense. She, who knew the meaning of balance more than anyone else, had become an existence that destroyed the balance of everything.]

cards.name: Iri's Nursing
cards.ability: 2 random Darklore Followers on your Field without "Witch" or "GS" in the name get the following effects depending on who wins the coin flip. You win: ATK +3/DEF+1/STA+1. Opponent wins: ATK +1/DEF +1/STA +3.
cards.text: [She found life at the office to be fresher than she had imagined, day after day. Suddenly, she had to provide medical care...] [I don't know...]

cards.name: Phone Chance
cards.ability: A card named "Good Job" is created at the top and bottom of the enemy Deck. If you have a Darklore Character, a card named "Good Job" is created in the first empty Slot on the enemy Field, and a card named "Good Job" is created in the next empty Slot on the enemy Field and deactivated.
cards.text: [Now! There are 60 seconds left! Conundrum's phone chance starts now!]

cards.name: Blissful Moment
cards.ability: 2 random Followers on your Field get ATK +2/STA +2.
cards.text: [Clarice, come here. I'll tie your hair for you.]

cards.name: Twisted Memory
cards.ability: The first Follower in the enemy Hand gets its skills removed, then that Follower and a random Follower on the enemy Field swap skills.
cards.text: [Is it hard to remember? Does it feel like yesterday's events were a dream after waking up in the morning?]

cards.name: Curse of Atrophy
cards.ability: All Spells in the enemy Hand/Field are changed to the following cards depending on their factions and get SIZE=2. Vita: "New Student Orientation", Academy: "New Maid Training", Crux: "Close Encounter", Darklore: "Blood Reversal", Neutral: "Blissful Moment".
cards.text: [Time stopped for her. It was an unintentional result of the experiment to turn girls into witches. A spell that froze your memories...]

cards.name: Asmis's Insight
cards.ability: The enemy gets Shuffles -1 and LIFE -1. A random Follower on the enemy Field gets ATK -1/STA -1. If your Grave contains at least 5 cards, a random card is sent from your Grave to the bottom of your Deck.
cards.text: [It's cold. It's as if a dagger struck my mind. But don't worry. My mind is faster than light. Treanna's words. Four's actions. A fragment of my memory. Now, I will put these chaotic pieces back together.]

cards.name: Messy Business
cards.ability: A random Follower on your Field is moved to this card's Slot and gets ATK/STA increased by its new Slot number.
cards.text: [Milka senpai... This is my limit... I can't endure it any longer... Can't you stop your investigation?]

cards.name: Personal Relationship
cards.ability: 2 random Vita Followers on your Field get ATK +2/STA +2. Another effect is applied to the enemy in dungeons. (Bonus effect: 2 random Followers on the enemy Field get ATK -2/STA -2.)
cards.text: [The Lib. advisor is especially popular with the Lib. members. She doesn't seem to mind it, either.]

cards.name: Chance Meeting
cards.ability: 2 random Followers on your Field gain the following skill: "[Reorganization] ▶Attack: This card's ATK/DEF are changed to their original values if they are lower than their original values."
cards.text: ["Could... you possibly be?" Iri was startled at suddenly running into Sita, but it seemed like Sita didn't recognize her.]

cards.name: Secret Room
cards.ability: If you have a Vita Character, all Followers in the enemy Hand, Field, and Deck get ATK -1/DEF -1/STA -1. A random Follower on the enemy Field is sent to the bottom of the enemy Deck. This card is removed from the game.
cards.text: ["A clue to finding Kana... Could it be in the underground library?"]

cards.name: Linus's Wrath
cards.ability: A random card on the enemy Field is deactivated. If you have an Academy Character, a random card on the enemy Field is deactivated.
cards.text: [I swear by my grandfather's honor that I, Linus Falco, will catch the underwear thief!]

cards.name: Myo Clan's Aid
cards.ability: 2 random Academy Followers on your Field get ATK +2/STA +2. Another effect is applied to the enemy in dungeons. (Bonus effect: 2 random Followers on the enemy Field get ATK -2/STA -2.)
cards.text: [Shh! Don't say anything. I know what you need~]

cards.name: Messenger
cards.ability: The first 2 cards in the enemy Deck are copied to the first 2 empty Slots in your Hand.
cards.text: [What message do you want delivered? I will keep it a secret.]

cards.name: The Maybe Garden
cards.ability: If you have an Academy Character, all Spells in the enemy Grave are removed from the game. All Spells and one random Follower on the enemy Field are deactivated. All Spells in the enemy Hand and Deck get SIZE +1. This card is removed from the game.
cards.text: [I need a place just for myself. If I don't have one, I'll make one~]

cards.name: Sword of Future Sight
cards.ability: 2 random Followers on your Field get ATK/STA increased by 2 plus the number of Spells on the enemy Field.
cards.text: [This sword has the power to see the future. By choosing the best future out of all possible futures, Rose was able to infiltrate the knights.]

cards.name: No Gain
cards.ability: 2 random Crux Followers on your Field get ATK +2/STA +2. Another effect is applied to the enemy in dungeons. (Bonus effect: 2 random Followers on the enemy Field get ATK -2/STA -2.)
cards.text: [They didn't get anything. They were in more despair than trying to get the dragon plate to drop.]

cards.name: Nevermove
cards.ability: If you have a Crux Character and the Turn Number is even, a random Follower on your Field gets ATK +5/STA +5. If the Turn Number is a multiple of 3, a random Follower on the enemy Field gets ATK -5/STA -5.
cards.text: [Birds' talons erupted from the ground to bind everyone's feet. They would be humiliated for doubting the knight captain's power.]

cards.name: Sanctuary Door
cards.ability: If you have a Crux Character, all Followers on the enemy Field get STA -9. All Followers in the enemy Hand get STA -3. All Followers in the enemy Deck get STA -1. This card is removed from the game.
cards.text: [I can feel extraordinary energy from beyond this massive door. Have we... finally found it?]

cards.name: Iri and Vernika
cards.ability: All cards in your Hand/Deck with the same name as the first Follower on your Field are sent to the Grave. The first Follower on your Field gets ATK/STA increased by the number of sent cards and gets DEF increased by half (rounding up) the number of sent cards.
cards.text: [Vernika...] [Sita...] [The hearts of these two girls, who longed for different people, wavered.]

cards.name: Iri's Enjoyment
cards.ability: 2 random Darklore Followers on your Field get ATK +2/STA +2. Another effect is applied to the enemy in dungeons. (Bonus effect: 2 random Followers on the enemy Field get ATK -2/STA -2.)
cards.text: [This is the story of the G Sisters, the girls who do battle after school!] [This story was more interesting than expected.]

cards.name: Water Play
cards.ability: All Followers on the enemy Field with at least 2 DEF get DEF decreased by twice their DEF.
cards.text: [If we're twins, then why is there such a difference here~] [Hyak! What, what are you doing!!]

cards.name: Shaman's Message
cards.ability: If you have a Darklore Character, all cards in the enemy Grave are sent to your Grave. The first Followers in your Hand and Deck get STA increased by the tens digit of the number of cards in your Grave and get ATK increased by the ones digit of the number of cards in your Grave. This card is removed from the game.
cards.text: [The God of Truth will deliver us all!] [The Aletheian believe that their god will bring them to paradise.]

cards.name: Veltier's Dream
cards.ability: If this card's SIZE is 2 or less, it is removed from the game. If your Character's LIFE is less than or equal to the enemy Character's LIFE, this card gets SIZE -1, swaps places with a random Follower on the enemy Field, and gets deactivated.
cards.text: [Veltier was holding a girl in her dream.] [Who was that in my dream? My head hurts.]

cards.name: Lib. Assistant
cards.ability: A Follower called "Lib. Serie" is created in this card's Slot. That Follower has its SIZE set equal to its Slot number and its ATK/STA set equal to twice its new SIZE. This card is removed from the game.
cards.text: [Milka senpai is too inflexible. I don't have authority, but I can give a few tips.]

cards.name: Accompaniment
cards.ability: The first 2 cards in your Hand get their SIZE changed equal to this card's SIZE. If this card has a SIZE of 2 or less, it is sent to the Grave. Otherwise, this card gets SIZE=1~5 and is sent to the first empty Slot in your Hand.
cards.text: [The rumors about the underground library have already reached Crux? Well, I don't really know what's hidden there, but I will allow you to enter under the condition that I come with you.]

cards.name: Spirit Encounter
cards.ability: If you have a Vita Character, 2 random Followers on the enemy Field get ATK -2, and their skills become "[Death] ▶Turn Start: This card is sent to the Grave."
cards.text: [With a flashlight in hand, she arrived at a place beyond the fallen books. There, she found that "thing", which had the appearance of a girl.]

cards.name: Anywhere Service
cards.ability: The following effects are applied depending on who wins the coin flip. You win: "The first card in the enemy Hand is removed from the game." Opponent wins: "The first 5 cards in your Grave are removed from the game."
cards.text: [Whenever the customer calls, we will immediately rush there. You want some out-of-season ice cream? Of course! We will prepare it right away!]

cards.name: Lady on the Water
cards.ability: 2 random Followers on your Field gain the following skill: "[Restorative Infusion!] ▶Attack: If this card's STA is lower than its original value, this card's STA is changed to its original value. This skill is removed."
cards.text: [We all came out to T // On the Lake Vita shoreline // To eat food at a mobile restaurant // We didn't have much time // But the other ladies // Were at the best hotel around // But some stupid with a lamp // Burned the place to the ground.]

cards.name: Limit Break
cards.ability: If you have an Academy Character, the 8th card in your Deck is sent to the first empty Slot on your Field, then the following effects are applied depending on the sent card's type. Follower: "2 random Followers on the enemy Field get ATK -4/STA -4." Spell: "All Spells on the enemy Field are sent to the Grave."
cards.text: [Ceres! Eres! Sedna!! Ready? With these three blades, my power becomes a million! You can't beat me!]

cards.name: Relaxation
cards.ability: The first Follower on your Field and the last Follower on the enemy Field get their SIZE/ATK/DEF/STA swapped.
cards.text: [This place is as nice as I heard. Yes? This isn't the changing room?]

cards.name: Smallification
cards.ability: If your Field contains a Follower with "Blue Cross" in the name, a random Follower on your Field and a random Follower on the enemy Field get STA=1.
cards.text: [The world looks really different from this height. How about it? Don't you want to experience it?]

cards.name: Blu E Rosso
cards.ability: If you have a Crux Character, a random Follower in the enemy Field/Hand/Deck that belongs to a different faction than the enemy Character gets its skills changed to "[Submission!] ▶Defend: This card is moved to the first empty Slot on the enemy Field. This skill is changed to "[Refresh!] ▶Turn Start: This card's original skills are restored."."
cards.text: [I will unlock the future.] [All of the members felt strange. They felt as if they had to follow Rose.]

cards.name: Underground City
cards.ability: All Followers on your Field with "Crescent," "Scardel," or "Flina" in the name get STA increased by the number of cards in your Hand/Field with "Crescent," "Scardel," or "Flina" in the name and gain half as much (rounding up) ATK.
cards.text: [This underground place is amazing. Kris.] [This place is clearly...]

cards.name: Divine Clue
cards.ability: If your Field/Grave contains a Follower, 2 random Followers on the enemy Field get STA decreased by the difference between the number of Followers in your Grave and the number of Followers in the enemy Grave (by a maximum of 6).
cards.text: [How about I give you a reward? I will tell you about the God of Truth you have been looking for. Come closer.]

cards.name: Butterfly Brand
cards.ability: If you have a Darklore Character, all Followers on the enemy Field have their "Attack" and "Turn Start" skills changed to the following skill: "[Lethargy] ▶Attack: This card gets ATK -1." All Followers in your Hand/Field gain the following skill: "[Best Attack] ▶Attack: This card gets ATK +1."
cards.text: [This is a trance. This is how you can communicate with your God of Truth.] [Butterfly-shaped tattoos appeared on Helena's body.]

cards.name: Eternal Witness
cards.ability: All Followers on your Field get ATK/STA increased by 1 plus your Shuffles. You get Shuffles +2. If this card's SIZE is 3 or more, it is removed from the game. Otherwise, this card gets SIZE +1 and is sent to the second Slot in your Deck.
cards.text: [Is the police displeased about something, coming to this world? ... Crevasse is still here. It's a bit difficult right now. Please wait for a bit.]

cards.name: Welcome!
cards.ability: 2 Followers on your Field get ATK +2/STA +2.
cards.text: [Pleased to meet you! Okay? Sita, say something, too.] [... Hi.]

cards.name: Disappearance
cards.ability: 2 random Followers on your Field get ATK +3/STA +3. 2 random Followers on the enemy Field get ATK -1/STA -1.
cards.text: [A large ventilation fan. She remembered that something used to be here. She couldn't remember what it was exactly, but she was certain that something was missing.]

cards.name: Finding the Library
cards.ability: All active Followers in your Hand/Field with "Library" in the name are sent to the bottom of your Deck. A number of cards with "Library" in the name equal to 1 plus half the number of sent cards (rounding down) are sent from the top of your Deck to the first empty Slots of your Field. Those Followers get ATK/STA increased by half the number of cards (rounding down) that were sent to the bottom of your Deck. (Note: This card isn't considered to have "Library" in the name for the purposes of other cards' abilities because it uses a different word in Korean.)
cards.text: [I'm looking for a book about this library's history. To find that is to find the library itself.]

cards.name: Library Elusion
cards.ability: The second Follower on the enemy Field gets its STA set equal to the Slot Number of the last card on the enemy Field and gets ATK increased by half (rounding down) the amount of STA decreased.
cards.text: [Why are we avoiding those weaklings? Shall I dispose of them for you?] [Now is a difficult time. Just wait a little longer.]

cards.name: Surprise Attack
cards.ability: A random Follower on your Field gets ATK or STA (25%/75% chance) increased by the ones digit of the Turn Number.
cards.text: [Seron discovered a strange object in the Pacifica household's storage basement. This metal hammer shines brilliantly, as if it turns everything it touches into light.]

cards.name: Cosmo Drive
cards.ability: If you have an Academy Character, all Followers on the enemy Field with the highest SIZE get ATK/STA decreased by the difference between the SIZE of the Follower on your Field with the lowest SIZE and the Follower on the enemy Field with the highest SIZE.
cards.text: [Is this... the same kind of dagger as the one Lucerrie has? If so... Hm? What's this belt?] [Triforce! Ready?] [Is... the dagger reacting?]

cards.name: Strega in Exile
cards.ability: The first card on your Field other than this one is destroyed. If this happens, the first card on the enemy Field with a SIZE of 10 or less is destroyed.
cards.text: [A witch was sighted in the underground library. With her long, dark hair fluttering behind her, she took a girl by the hand and ran. From behind, she looked familiar, said a Vita student.]

cards.name: Head Knight's Rest
cards.ability: All Followers on both Fields get SIZE decreased by the number of cards on each respective player's Field with "Knight" in the name and get STA decreased by the number of cards on each respective player's Field without "Knight" in the name.
cards.text: [Eisenwane's personal life is a secret. Only the parrot knows what the awkward girl is like when she is alone.]

cards.name: Clairvoyance
cards.ability: All Followers in your Hand/Field have all of their skills replaced with the following skill: "[Best Attack] ▶Attack: This card gets ATK +1."
cards.text: [Wait! If you go that way... You shouldn't meet them! Veltier!]

cards.name: Elusion
cards.ability: If you have a Crux Character, the first card in the enemy Deck is sent to the first empty Slot of the enemy Field. If this happens, all Spells on the enemy Field (if there are at least 2 Spells on the enemy Field) or all Followers on the enemy Field (if there are at least 3 Followers on the enemy Field) are sent to the bottom of the enemy Deck. This card is removed from the game.
cards.text: [V... Vernika senpai?] [One page of the missing story unfolded before Veltier's eyes.]

cards.name: Ritual of Unity
cards.ability: 2 random Followers on your Field get ATK increased by the number of cards in your Grave with "Crescent", "Scardel", "Flina", or "Ritual of Harmony" in the name (by a maximum of 9).
cards.text: [They hated the head, but they agreed that in order to recover the vampires' land, they would have to work together.]

cards.name: Mediation
cards.ability: A random card on the enemy Field is deactivated. If the deactivated card is a Spell, a random Follower on your Field gets ATK increased by the deactivated card's SIZE. If the deactivated card is a Follower, a random Follower on your Field gets STA increased by the deactivated card's SIZE.
cards.text: [Please bear in mind that we must put the safety of the family first.]

cards.name: Intervention
cards.ability: If this card's SIZE is at least 5, it is sent to your Grave. The first card in the enemy Hand is changed into a copy of this card and gets SIZE +1. This card is removed from the game.
cards.text: [I will sacrifice myself for my comrades.] [The unity between the Aletheian and the GS is steadfast.]

cards.name: Panel Rise
cards.ability: The first Follower on your Field gets DEF=1. If there was no change in DEF, 2 random Followers on the enemy Field get DEF -1/STA -3.
cards.text: [Book of Light, unfold! Field domain, expand! Access to each panel has been approved!]

cards.name: Friendship after the Rain
cards.ability: All Followers on your Field with "Lib." in the name get SIZE -1. The first Follower in your Hand with "Lib." in the name gets SIZE decreased by the total SIZE reduction.
cards.text: [The ground becomes more firm after the rain, right?] [But there's sand all around here. Everything will get washed away.]

cards.name: Window Shopping
cards.ability: The first 5 Spells in the enemy Deck are sent to the bottom of the enemy Deck. All cards in the enemy Hand are sent to the bottom of the enemy Deck. If you have a Vita Character, the enemy Character gets Shuffles -1.
cards.text: [How is it, Iri? You don't like this one? Sita, you should pick something out, too.] [There hasn't been a chance to talk...]

cards.name: Witchification Plans
