cards.ability: Up to 3 cards in the enemy Grave that belong to a different faction than the enemy Character are removed from the game. Your Character gets LIFE increased by the number of removed cards.
cards.text: [Linus confirmed with her own eyes what Linia's plans were.] [I can't leave this alone...]

cards.name: Down with the Queen
cards.ability: 2 random Followers on the enemy Field get ATK/STA increased by the difference between 3 and this card's SIZE. If this card's SIZE is 1, it is removed from the game. This card gets SIZE -2, is sent to the last empty Slot on the enemy Field, and is deactivated. (Note: This card isn't considered to have "Witch" in the name for the purposes of other cards' skills because it uses a different word in Korean.)
cards.text: [I have no choice but to stand in your way.] [So, you are the witches who oppose me... What can you do?]

cards.name: Dress Up Extreme
cards.ability: The following effects are applied depending on the sum of the original SIZE of the cards on your Field except this one. 5 or less: A random Spell on the enemy Field is sent to the Grave. 6~9: 2 random Followers on the enemy Field get ATK -3/STA -3. 10 or more: All previous effects are applied, and a random card on the enemy Field is deactivated. If you have an Academy Character, then this card's SIZE is included.
cards.text: [I wish upon the stars, and the glimmering of my stars will form a fierce tempest! Fated to become a witch... No, I decide my own destiny!]

cards.name: Opposition
cards.ability: 2 random Crux Followers on your Field get DEF=0. Those Followers get ATK increased by the average of their SIZES (rounding up).
cards.text: [Now, hand it over quietly.] [That's impossible.] [I'm fine with that, too.]

cards.name: Witch Hunt
cards.ability: If you have a Crux Character, a random Follower on the enemy Field gets SIZE +1. If that Follower's SIZE is at least 4, it gains the following skill: "[So tired...] ▶Defend: This card gets STA -1."
cards.text: [When this artifact, which can analyze the target's magical composition, is completed, the true witch hunt will begin.]

cards.name: Trace of Kana
cards.ability: A random Follower on your Field gets ATK +2/STA +2 and gains the following skill: "[Absorb Power] ▶Attack: This skill is changed to the defender's first skill. The defender's first skill is removed." If you have a Crux Character, this skill is applied a second time.
cards.text: [This is what we've been looking for. We have to bring this back to research it properly.]

cards.name: Apostle's Scheme
cards.ability: 2 random Followers on the enemy Field get ATK -1~3. This card gets SIZE +1 and is sent to the first empty Slot in your Hand. If this card's SIZE is at least 2, it is sent to the Grave instead.
cards.text: [The one who can do this job is you, A-GA. Only you. We must find that thing for the sake of our sisterhood.]

cards.name: Trance
cards.ability: The first Follower on your Field with the lowest STA is removed from the game. A random Follower in your Grave is sent to the first empty Slot of your Field. This card is removed from the game.
cards.text: [This body is suitable. I'm not used to it, so I can't move as freely, but I like it better than Rio's body. Aletheian, they said... heh heh.]

cards.name: Dark Sword Menelgart
cards.ability: All Followers in your Hand/Field have their ATK and STA swapped. If you have a Darklore Character, all Followers in your Hand/Field with 10 or less ATK get STA +4, and all Followers in your Hand/Field with 10 or less STA get ATK +3.
cards.text: [In order to maintain the strength of our sisterhood, the forbidden ritual to obtain this dark sword was completed. The eye on the sword looks around as if it were alive.]

cards.name: Land and Sea
cards.ability: Your Character gets LIFE +4. The opponent gets Shuffles -1. The following effects are applied depending on your Character's LIFE. 31 or more: 2 random cards in the enemy Hand are sent to the Grave. 12~27: A random Follower on the enemy Field is sent to the Grave. 5~8: 2 random cards on the enemy Field are sent to the Grave.
cards.text: [Crevasse's purpose is to improve the lives of the creatures of the sea by transforming the land into the ocean.]

cards.name: Steparu
cards.ability: A random Follower on the enemy Field is deactivated. Next, the deactivated Follower gets the following skills: "[Death] ▶Turn Start: This card is sent to the Grave." "[Resistance!] ▶Before this card is attacked, it gets its STA increased by half of the attacker's ATK (rounding down). This skill is removed."
cards.text: [I am just an observer... My actions may lead to your demise... Is my assistance really necessary?]

cards.name: Student Council
cards.ability: The first Follower on your Field with "Student Council" in the name gets ATK +3, then the first Follower on the enemy Field whose ATK is lower than that Follower's ATK is deactivated.
cards.text: [Today's agenda is about our tea...] [Huh? Is that what we were supposed to talk about today?] [President, today's agenda is the demerit list.] [Do we have any snacks besides these?]

cards.name: Faltering
cards.ability: 2 random Followers on your Field get STA +3 or STA +5 (50% chance).
cards.text: [Does she not remember who I am? Maybe she forgot? Or maybe...] [The girl's worries deepened within the bustling Republic.]

cards.name: Satisfaction
cards.ability: The first Follower on your Field that belongs to your Character's faction is removed from the game, then the first card in your Deck with the highest SIZE is sent to the removed Follower's Slot. That Follower has its SIZE set equal to the removed Follower's SIZE.
cards.text: [Huhu! Nothing is more fitting for Vita's representative mural than a portrait of myself!]

cards.name: Garden Lady
cards.ability: If you have an Academy Character, your Character gets LIFE +1. If your Deck contains 15 or fewer cards, your Character gets an additional LIFE +3. This card is removed from the game.
cards.text: [Nothing sets my mind at ease better than the smell of flowers and the chirping of the birds in the morning. Are you at ease? It's a good morning.]

cards.name: Everyone's Enemy
cards.ability: The following effect is applied 4 times to one random Follower on the enemy Field: ATK -1, DEF -1, or STA -1.
cards.text: [Layna Scentriver leads the anti-witch queen group. She is at the center of the current situation. Crux and the rest of the Alliance need the key that she has. They've formed a silent agreement. The witch queen has decided to eliminate Layna Scentriver.]

cards.name: Lady Maid Dream
cards.ability: A random card on the enemy Field is sent to the bottom of the enemy Grave, then this card gets SIZE=1, is sent to the first empty Slot on the enemy Field and deactivated. If this card's SIZE is 1, the last card in your Grave is sent to the first empty Slot of your Field, then this card is removed from the game.
cards.text: [Miss...] [Use my name when it's just the two of us.] [Yes...] [And drop the honorifics!]

cards.name: Discovery
cards.ability: Cards are sent from the top of your deck to your Hand until you have at least 4 cards. All Followers on your Field get STA increased by the number of cards in your Hand with "Blue Cross" in the name.
cards.text: [Fortune had it that the book that fell before Eisenwane contained information about the key to open the door.]

cards.name: Experience
cards.ability: A random Spell on the enemy Field that is not called "Experience" is copied to the first empty Slot of your Field.
cards.text: [You've really done it now. Dammit, how the hell am I going to fix this? What a goddamn idiot.]

cards.name: Relapse
cards.ability: The first Follower on your Field with the highest SIZE has its SIZE/ATK/DEF/STA halved (rounding down). If this happens, a copy of that Follower with half its previous SIZE (rounding up) is created in the first empty Slot of your Field.
cards.text: [What am I doing? This sensation... feels familiar.]

cards.name: GS 5th Star's Strength
cards.ability: 2 random Followers on the enemy Field get ATK/STA decreased by the number of cards in the top 3 cards of your Grave that belong to your Character's faction. A random Follower on your Field gets SIZE decreased by the number of cards in the top 3 cards of your Grave with "GS" in the name.
cards.text: [It seems like these pathetic insects are trying to stand in my way. Well, whatever, I like taking the fun route, anyway.]

cards.name: The Battle Begins
cards.ability: All Followers on both players' Fields get all their skills removed and gain the following skill: "[Refresh!] ▶Turn Start: This card's original skills are restored."
cards.text: [Among the groups that sought to confront the mysterious witches, a new person wielding a strange sword appeared. She had taken the opportunity to start a battle.]

cards.name: Clash
cards.ability: If you have a Darklore Character, a random Follower on the enemy Field gets STA decreased by the difference between its ATK and DEF.
cards.text: [What the..! You bastard!] [We'll talk after I defeat everyone here. Starting with you!]

cards.name: Following Memory
cards.ability: A random Follower on the enemy Field whose DEF is equal to (10-the total SIZE of your Field) is sent to the bottom of the enemy Deck.
cards.text: [What? I thought I was the only one who could enter this imaginary sector.] [It was a simple deduction. Sorry, but in order for us to escape, I'll need your cooperation.]

cards.name: Minority Report
cards.ability: All Followers on your Field with "Cook Club" in the name have their SIZE and first skill changed to the SIZE and first skill of the second Follower on your Field with "Cook Club" in the name.
cards.text: [That white hair... I know I've seen her somewhere before...]

cards.name: Talentium Veritas
cards.ability: Your Character gets LIFE +2. If you have a Vita Character, 2 of the following effects are applied (randomly chosen): ●The last 3 cards in your Grave are sent to the bottom of your Deck. ●All Followers on your Field get ATK +3/STA +3. ●The enemy Character gets LIFE -2. ●All Followers on the enemy Field get ATK -3/STA -3. ●The first card on the enemy Field is removed from the game.
cards.text: [Talentium? I don't know anything about that weird imitation that you're referring to. The only thing I know as Talentium is in this place.]

cards.name: Altar of Kana
cards.ability: All Followers with an odd STA get STA -3 and all Followers with an even STA get ATK +3.
cards.text: [In order to obtain the mystical ore, you perform a ritual for the Creator at this place. In order to unlock it, three things are needed. A key, a shaman, and a sacrifice...]

cards.name: Rift
cards.ability: If this card's SIZE is at least 3, 2 random Followers on your Field get ATK -2/STA -2 and the enemy Character gets LIFE +2. Otherwise, this card gets SIZE +1~2 and is sent to the last empty Slot of the enemy Field and deactivated.
cards.text: [Haha. Magnificent. Soon, I will be able to send people as well. Who shall I use as a test subject?]

cards.name: Covert Operation
cards.ability: A random Follower on the enemy Field is changed into "Delinquent Witch Cadet" and gets SIZE=1. If you have an Academy Character, 2 random Followers on your Field get ATK/STA increased by the total number of Academy Followers on both Fields (by a maximum of 4).
cards.text: [I will do as my sister says... Yes, Linia.]

cards.name: Summon
cards.ability: If your Field contains a Follower with "Knight" in the name and a Follower with "Seeker" in the name, all Followers on your Field get ATK +4.
cards.text: [Where the hell did everyone else run off to!]

cards.name: Manhunt
cards.ability: All Spells in your Hand are sent in order from your Hand to the empty Slots of your Field. Your Character gets LIFE increased by the number of sent cards.
cards.text: [Knight Captain Eisenwane. Name and rank. Are you looking for this girl? Have you seen this girl?]

cards.name: Backup
cards.ability: If you have a Crux Character, all Spells on the enemy Field/Hand are sent to the top of the enemy Deck. All Followers on the enemy Field/Hand get DEF decreased by the number of sent cards
cards.text: [Rose arrived as backup during the battle between A-GA and Eisenwane.] [Captain! Use this opening!]

cards.name: GS Network
cards.ability: The first Follower in your Deck that belongs to the same faction as the first Follower on your Field is sent to the first empty Slot of your Field and gets SIZE -1.
cards.text: [There were more people in the way than I expected. I don't really feel like it, but I have to contact HQ. Who the hell was that bastard with the weird sword?]

cards.name: Gossip
cards.ability: All Followers on your Field except the first Follower on your Field are sent to the top of your Deck. A number of Followers on the enemy Field equal to 1 plus the number of sent Followers, with the exception of the first Follower on the enemy Field, are sent to the top of the enemy Deck.
cards.text: [Ren? What's up?] [Have you heard? There's a shaman that can miraculously heal injuries.] [Yes, why?] [Do you want to go check it out?]

cards.name: Miracle
cards.ability: If you have a Darklore Character, all Followers on the enemy Field have their ATK/DEF/STA changed to the ATK/DEF/STA of the first Follower on your Field.
cards.text: [Glowing butterflies danced about as Helena lay her hands upon Red Sun's wounded leg.] [Oh... Look. Miss Red Sun's wounds are healing.]

cards.name: Graphic Novel
cards.ability: (none)
cards.text: [Greetings, Faithful Followers! Everyone wants to be a hero! This book holds marvelous stories of super-powered heroes and crime-fighting detectives; comics are full of incredible tales that anyone can enjoy, including you!]

cards.name: Hot Springs Ticket
cards.ability: (none)
cards.text: [This ticket is required to enter the hot spring baths.] [Isn't this place heaven on earth?]

cards.name: Event Flag
cards.ability: (none)
cards.text: [A flag with the Sword Girls logo. It can be exchanged for rare cards.]

cards.name: Discover Evidence
cards.ability: The Follower on your Field in Slot 5 of your Field gets ATK +4/STA +4.
cards.text: [There was only a single flower left on the ground, but Asmis saw it as a clue.]

cards.name: World is Cake
cards.ability: The first 2 Followers in your Deck are sent to the top of your Deck and get ATK/STA increased by half (rounding up) the number of empty Slots in your Hand.
cards.text: [The finest cake in the world. Since I served it to you this way, you'll have to be eaten by me.]

cards.name: Investigation Progress
cards.ability: If the enemy Field contains at least 2 cards with the same name, all of those cards are sent to the Grave.
cards.text: [First, we have to find this person. Do you know what Soma looks like?] [Let's see... she's shorter than me, and she looks dumb, too.]

cards.name: Maid Vacancy
cards.ability: All Spells in the top 5 cards of the enemy Grave are removed from the game, then the enemy Character gets LIFE decreased by the number of removed cards.
cards.text: [The maids left the mansion, one by one. The bustling life that the maids had filled the mansion with was replaced by a lonely vacancy.]

cards.name: Parliament
cards.ability: A random Follower on the enemy Field is sent to a random Slot on the enemy Field. That Follower gets ATK/STA decreased by the difference between its old and new Slot Numbers. If you have an Academy Character, this effect is applied a second time.
cards.text: [Linia considered any witches who would not turn to her side to be traitors. By pulling some strings, she was able to get a bill passed before the Alliance Council that allowed her to arrest them.]

cards.name: Linia's Counterattack
cards.ability: If there are any Followers on your Field, a random Follower on the enemy Field with at least 2 skills is sent to the bottom of the enemy Deck. If this happens, your Character gets LIFE -1.
cards.text: [Linia, who had always operated from the shadows, extended her hand to Eisenwane out in public. It was a rare sight indeed.]

cards.name: Crisis Averted
cards.ability: A random Crux Follower on your Field gains the following skill: "[Attack Reversal] ▶Defend: The attacker gets STA decreased by half the attacker's ATK (rounding up). This skill is removed."
cards.text: [Everyone, retreat! ... Do you have something to say? Rose Pacifica.] [It finally happened.] [The Witch Queen is our enemy. This has not changed. However, I never heard anything about this.]

cards.name: Sudden Turn
cards.ability: The first Follower on your Field with 5 or less ATK gets its ATK doubled.
cards.text: [Stop. What you seek is not here.]

cards.name: Party Time!
cards.ability: Cards are sent from the top of your Deck to your Hand until you have at least 4 cards in your Hand. A random Follower on your Field gets DEF/STA increased by 1 plus the number of sent cards.
cards.text: [Oh? I thought you were just a nerd, but it smells like you might be on the same level as me.] [If that's what you think, then why don't you just leave?]

cards.name: Growing Congregation
cards.ability: If there are any Followers on your Field, a random Follower on the enemy Field gets DEF +1. If that Follower has at least 5 DEF, it is moved to the first empty Slot of your Field and deactivated.
cards.text: [I ran tirelessly in order to find you.] [... What is your name?] [Rue. K. Artend.]

cards.name: Witness of Miracles
cards.ability: If your Field contains a Follower and a Spell other than this one and the enemy Field contains a Spell, a random Spell in your Hand that is not called "Witness of Miracles" is copied to the first empty Slot of your Field.
cards.text: [The God of Truth exists. This leg is proof of that.] [In order to spread the teachings of God, even a scar can be overcome.]

cards.name: Agent of God
cards.ability: If the top Follower in the enemy Grave and the first Follower on your Field have the same SIZE, the top Follower in the enemy Grave is moved to the first empty Slot of your Field.
cards.text: [Just as we believe in God, God believes in us. We must rise up to repay that belief.]

cards.name: Lib. Member's Rest
cards.ability: All Followers on your Field get SIZE -1/ATK +2/STA +2. A number of Followers at the bottom of your Deck equal to the number of Followers on your Field get SIZE +1/ATK -1/STA -1.
cards.text: [If you're tired and sleepy, why don't you go outside and get some fresh air?]

cards.name: Student Council President and Morals Committee Leader
cards.ability: The first and last Followers on your Field swap places. Those Followers get SIZE decreased by the difference in their Slot Numbers.
cards.text: [You haven't been by the student council room in a while. Is something going on?] [Well, that's...] [Be honest with me. Miss Layna. Could it be, a boyfriend?] [Ce, Celine Hastur!]

cards.name: Sita's Delivery
cards.ability: If the 5th and 7th cards in your Deck belong to Vita, they are copied to the first empty slots of your Field with their current SIZE/ATK/DEF/STA (each card is checked separately). If the 9th card in your Deck belongs to Vita, it is copied to the first empty Slot of your Hand.
cards.text: [... Do I have to wear this...?] [O.. Of course! Whenever you deliver something, you have to wear that!]

cards.name: Barter
cards.ability: The first Follower on your Field and a random Follower in the enemy Hand swap SIZE. If this happens, the first Follower on your Field gets ATK/STA increased by the change in SIZE.
cards.text: [Here, I'll trade you this flower for that jewel.] [That flower is from our garden!]

cards.name: Private Room
cards.ability: A random Follower on your Field gets ATK increased by twice the DEF of a random Follower on the enemy Field with at least 0 DEF.
cards.text: [There is a room in Linia's mansion that not even her servants know about.]

cards.name: Muzisitter's Song
cards.ability: If you have an Academy Character and there are any Followers on your Field, all cards on your Field whose Slot numbers are odd are sent to the enemy Field. All cards on the enemy Field whose Slot numbers are even are sent to your Field.
cards.text: [Linus's song captivated the hearts of her audience.]

cards.name: Meat Shield
cards.ability: If your Field contains at least 2 Followers, the first active Follower on the enemy Field with the highest SIZE is deactivated and gets its skills changed to "[Refresh!] ▶Turn Start: This card's original skills are restored."
cards.text: [Huhuhu. You, who still has the body of a child after all these years, behold! The ample body granted by the saint's blessing!] [Eek?! Don't say that!!]

cards.name: Youngest's Resolve
cards.ability: The first Follower on your Field with the highest DEF gets DEF decreased by twice its own DEF. A random Follower on the enemy Field gets ATK/STA decreased by the reduction in DEF (by a maximum of 5).
cards.text: [I will show you what I can do, too, Cygnus senpai.]

cards.name: Awakening
cards.ability: You get Shuffles +2. If you have a Crux Character, all Followers in your Deck get DEF increased by half your Shuffles (rounding down, by a maximum of 2).
cards.text: [An unknown power suddenly started protecting me. What on earth is this magic circle...?]

cards.name: GS Executive's Command
cards.ability: All Followers in your Deck with the same SIZE as this card get ATK +1/STA +1.
cards.text: [You. Over there. Stop standing around mindlessly and come fan me.]

cards.name: Undertaker's Visit
cards.ability: The first Follower in the enemy Deck with the highest SIZE gets ATK -3/STA -3.
cards.text: [What's so surprising? It's a nice night, isn't it?]

cards.name: I WANT YOU
cards.ability: If you have a Darklore Character and the enemy Hand contains at least 4 cards, 2 random cards on the enemy Field are sent to your Field and deactivated.
cards.text: [The Aletheian want you. You, the one reading this! Stop hesitating and come. The teachings of the God of Truth are waiting for you. Contact: XXXX-XXX] [The Aletheian advertisement with Apostle Schindler's picture]

cards.name: Loneliness
cards.ability: All Followers on your Field whose Slot number is even get DEF +2.
cards.text: [Why am I always alone? It would be nice to have some friends.]

cards.name: Waiting
cards.ability: If your Field contains a Neutral Follower and a Follower that is not Neutral, 2 random Followers on your Field get ATK +1/DEF +1/STA +3.
cards.text: [Why isn't anyone coming? It would be nice if someone came to me.]

cards.name: Isfeldt's Threat
cards.ability: 2 random Followers on the enemy Field gain the following skill: "[Terror] ▶Attack: This card is sent to the bottom of your Deck."
cards.text: [Ack... Whew. You're lucky. Look here. I don't care that you bumped into me, but if my lollipop had fallen... You wouldn't be leaving unharmed. Watch where you're walking.]

cards.name: Gauntlets of Darkness
cards.ability: The first Follower on your Field gains the following skill: "[Dark Soul Attack] ▶Attack: All Followers on the enemy Field get STA -1. This card gets ATK increased by the total amount of STA decreased."
cards.text: [This is a weapon resembling a gauntlet that the Black Lion in human form carries. The material is unknown.]

cards.name: Greaves of Darkness
cards.ability: The first Follower on your Field gains the following skill: "[Dark Soul Unleashed] ▶Defend: This card gets ATK/STA increased by the Turn Number. This skill is removed."
cards.text: [Along with the Gauntlet of Darkness, this is another weapon that the lifeform known as the Black Lion uses in human form. As expected, the material is unknown.]

cards.name: Super Strategy
cards.ability: A random active Vita Follower on your Field is deactivated. If this happens, a random Spell on the enemy Field is sent to the first empty Slot in the enemy Hand.
cards.text: [Your IQ is 150 and my IQ is 170. With our combined IQ of 320, we can solve this problem!]

cards.name: Memory Loss
cards.ability: 2 random Followers on your Field get ATK/STA increased by half the number of Followers in the bottom 4 cards of your Deck (rounding up). If the increased amount was 2, they get an additional STA +1.
cards.text: [Where am I? Why can't I remember anything?] [I was going to tell you when you fully recovered... You have amnesia.] [Huh? I have amnesia? What do you mean by that...]

cards.name: Forbidden Truth
cards.ability: All Followers get DEF +1. All Followers with at least 3 DEF, except for Vita Followers on your Field, are sent to the Grave. If this happens, your Character gets LIFE decreased by the number of sent cards. If you do not have a Vita Character, the LIFE decrease is doubled.
cards.text: [Orte Boer. Her book-finding skills can find any book in the world. Even the books that are not meant to be discovered.]

cards.name: Liberation
cards.ability: Followers on the enemy Field with a SIZE of at least 3 get SIZE -1. The enemy Character gets LIFE decreased by the total SIZE reduction.
cards.text: [I'm free!] [Wooooow!] [W... Wait!]

cards.name: Maid Part-Time Job
cards.ability: The first Follower on your Field's ATK/DEF/STA are changed to their original values if they are higher than their original values. The first Follower in your Hand gets ATK/DEF/STA increased by the respective changes in each stat.
cards.text: [Sita, look at this ad. The Pacifica house is looking for maids, and the hourly pay is the same as my allowance!] [Luxurious room and board are provided...]

cards.name: Entrapment
cards.ability: The first Academy Follower in your Deck is sent to the first empty Slot in your Field, then all cards in both Hands are sent to the bottom of the owners' Decks. That Follower gets ATK/STA increased by the number of sent Followers and gets SIZE decreased by the number of sent Spells (to a minimum of 1).
cards.text: [Huhu, as expected, you're foolishly following the clue that I gave you without knowing that you've already been captured.]

cards.name: Second Volume
cards.ability: The first Spell in your Deck with the same SIZE as this card is sent to the first empty Slot in your Field.
cards.text: [You will stay here and look for a book like this. Like this.]

cards.name: Execute the Plan
cards.ability: A random Spell in the enemy Grave with the highest SIZE is sent to the first empty Slot in your Field and deactivated.
cards.text: [At last, the Witch Queen has begun to act.]

cards.name: Sanctuary's Legacy
cards.ability: Up to 8 cards in both Graves are removed from the game. The following effects are applied depending on the number of removed cards. 1 or more: All Followers on your Field get ATK +3/STA +3. 8 or more: All cards in your Hand get SIZE -1. 16: Your Character gets LIFE +3.
cards.text: [As expected, this thing you've brought is an ancient artifact, Odien... How wonderful. With this, Crux can fight for another 10 years!]

cards.name: Dark Sword Reclamation
cards.ability: Cards on the enemy Field with the same SIZE as this card are sent to the top of the enemy Deck.
cards.text: [You were carrying such an interesting thing? Would it be alright to give this to her?]

cards.name: Helena's Contact
cards.ability: A random Follower on your Field gets ATK decreased by (30 - your Character's LIFE). That Follower gets STA increased by its ATK reduction (by a maximum of 9).
cards.text: [I finally found a clue. Schindler... What are you planning?]

cards.name: Foiled Scheme
cards.ability: If you have a Darklore Character, your Character's LIFE is halved (rounding up) and gets LIFE +5. If this happens, the following effects are applied depending on this card's SIZE. 2 or less: The first Follower on your Field gets ATK/STA increased by twice the LIFE decrease. This card gets SIZE +2 and is sent to the top of your Deck. 3 or more: The first Follower in your Grave is sent to the top of your Deck.
cards.text: [The GS is evil! I won't forgive you.] [It is evil, indeed.]

cards.name: Flashy Gift Box
cards.ability: (none)
cards.text: [A gift box with pretty packaging. It must contain something special. Just looking at it makes me excited.]

cards.name: Loan Check
cards.ability: If your Hand and Field both contain Followers, a random Follower in your Hand or Field gets ATK +4, DEF +4, or STA +4 (randomly).
cards.text: [This book was checked out 32 times, but it was returned 33 times... Was the 33rd time checked out by an invisible girl?]

cards.name: Catalyst
cards.ability: A random Follower on your Field gets ATK/DEF/STA increased by the number of other Followers on your Field without skills and gets SIZE +1.
cards.text: [Talentium is so cool... So cool... This chemical reaction is so bright...]

cards.name: Clue Discovered
cards.ability: A random Follower on your Field is reactivated, then the last Follower on the enemy Field gets STA decreased by the reactivated Follower's ATK minus 1.
cards.text: [This ribbon is the clue to the missing key. With just this, the search becomes much narrower.]

cards.name: Last Resort
cards.ability: If the last Follower in your Deck has "Lady" or "Maid" in the name, that Follower is sent to the first empty Slot in your hand and gets ATK +2/STA +2.
cards.text: [In the place of the maids who had left, the dolls of witches from the outside were used to clean the mansion.]

cards.name: Linia's Refusal
cards.ability: If you won the coin flip, all Spells on the enemy Field are deactivated. If you lost the coin flip, 2 random Followers on your Field get ATK -2/STA -2.
cards.text: [This isn't how you write to someone in a better position than you.] [Linia burned the letter from the "master".]

cards.name: Ripple
cards.ability: A random Follower on the enemy Field gets DEF=0. All Followers in the enemy Hand get DEF decreased by the change in DEF.
cards.text: [Everything is going according to plan. Like the ripples formed when a rock falls into a lake, the things that have been set in motion cannot be stopped.]

cards.name: Sincerity
cards.ability: A random Follower on the enemy Field without skills is sent to the top of the enemy Deck.
cards.text: [Luthica glared at Eisenwane, but Eisenwane didn't notice.]

cards.name: Observation
cards.ability: A random Follower on the enemy Field gets its skills removed. If this happens, a random Follower on your Field gets its original skills restored.
cards.text: [The quartermaster found the hiding person. The hiding person didn't know she had been found.]

cards.name: Demotion
cards.ability: Cards with "Blue Cross" in the name are sent from the top of your Deck to your Hand until your Hand has at least 4 cards. All Followers on your Field get ATK/STA increased by the number of sent cards.
cards.text: [Because she was deemed too dangerous, Rose and her underlings were all demoted to Blue Cross support.] [She's too dangerous...]

cards.name: Luna's Messenger
cards.ability: 2 random Followers on your Field get ATK increased by the number of cards in the enemy Hand.
cards.text: [Lady Linia. The master has a message for you.] [... Master?] [Master Luna Flina.]

cards.name: New Mission
cards.ability: Any cards with "GS", "Aletheian", or "Apostle" in the first 3 cards in your Deck get SIZE -1. A random Follower on the enemy Field gets STA decreased by the total SIZE decrease.
cards.text: [That person has been found.] [Understood. I will respectfully bring that person in.]

cards.name: A Challenger Appears
cards.ability: All Spells in your Grave are removed from the game. A number of cards named "Zombie" equal to 2 plus the number of removed cards are created at the top of your Grave. A random Follower on the enemy Field gets STA decreased by half the number of "Zombie" cards in your Grave (rounding up, by a maximum of 6).
cards.text: [The trespasser burst in with a sign with "O" written on it.]

cards.name: Prohibition
cards.ability: All cards in both Fields and Hands get SIZE=2. All Followers in your Hand get SIZE -1. 2 random Followers on the enemy Field get ATK decreased by the total number of cards in both Fields/Hands with a SIZE of 2 and get STA decreased by half as much (rounding down).
cards.text: [Listen! You hear me? I'm going to get very angry if you flip Rio's skirt again! Got it?] [It... it was wrong.] [Sniff... Sister Sage is scary.]

cards.name: Beginning of Change
cards.ability: All Followers on your Field with "Cook Club" in the name get ATK/STA increased by the difference in their current SIZE and original SIZE.
cards.text: [Were you watching over me all this time?] [Of course. I also know that you want to quit the basketball club since you're the only member. How about joining the Aletheians?]

cards.name: Master of Erasers
cards.ability: The Vita Follower on your Field with the highest SIZE gets SIZE -3/STA -1.
cards.text: [Do you want an eraser to erase your mistakes? If that's what you want, then I'll have you know that all of my erasers can do that!]

cards.name: Myo Observer
cards.ability: The card in Slot 3 of the enemy Field is sent to the bottom of the enemy Deck. The third Follower in the enemy Deck is sent to Slot 3 of the enemy Field. If you have a Vita Character, that Follower gets SIZE +3/STA -3.
cards.text: [Hehehe~ It's interesting to watch the Vita students!]

cards.name: Discovered Spy
cards.ability: 2 random Followers on the enemy Field get DEF decreased by the number of Academy Followers on your Field.
cards.text: [Shion~ forget about that! There's no way we could have seen something we weren't supposed to!] [Linia thought about it.] ['There's no need for questions. The answer is already clear. It will be my victory.']

cards.name: Mass Recall
cards.ability: A random non-Academy card in your Field or Hand is sent to the Grave. If this happens, a random Follower on the enemy Field is sent to the Grave.
cards.text: [Hey! You can't steal my sweets! Mass Recall!]

cards.name: Tighten Security
cards.ability: All Followers on the enemy Field get ATK decreased by the number of cards in your Hand. All Followers on your Field get DEF increased by the number of Academy Followers in your Hand.
cards.text: [Coordinate entry complete. Target information sent. Will we be able to protect her?]

cards.name: Shield Break
cards.ability: A random Follower on the enemy Field gets DEF -3. If that Follower's DEF is at least 0, it gets an additional DEF -2.
cards.text: [Bring me any shields that haven't been pierced yet. I'll show you how weak they are.] [Pintail seemed to have picked up the hobby of practicing her swordsmanship on equipment that was deemed unusable.]

cards.name: Entry Denied
cards.ability: A random Follower on your Field is deactivated. If this happens, a random Follower on the enemy Field is sent to the top of the enemy Deck.
cards.text: [You may not pass!] [What do you mean!] [Please refer to this attachment.]

cards.name: Sky Surprise
cards.ability: The first Follower on your Field gets SIZE=1/STA=1 and is sent to the first empty Slot of the enemy Field. All Followers on the enemy Field get STA decreased by that Follower's STA reduction (by a maximum of 5, or by a maximum of 8 if you have a Crux Character). Your Character gets LIFE decreased by that Follower's SIZE reduction.
cards.text: [The twinkle on the horizon turned out to be a flying girl.]

cards.name: Pass the Blood
cards.ability: A Darklore Follower in Slot 3 of your Field gets DEF increased by the number of Followers on your Field (by a maximum of 3).
cards.text: [Don't you think you'll regret refusing this delicious stuff later?]

cards.name: Vampiric Rites
cards.ability: All Followers on your Field except the first Darklore Follower on your Field with the highest SIZE are sent to the Grave. That Follower gets ATK/STA increased by the total SIZE of the sent Followers and gets DEF/SIZE increased by half as much (rounding up).
cards.text: [... It's weird when you stare at me like that. Stop it.]

cards.name: Devilish Girl
cards.ability: All non-Darklore Followers on your Field and all Followers on the enemy Field get ATK -2/DEF -2/STA -2. All Followers with 0 or less DEF get ATK -2/STA -1.
cards.text: [... Is, is it weird?]

cards.name: New Student Orientation
cards.ability: All Followers on the enemy Field get STA decreased by 10 divided by (1 + the number of Followers on the enemy Field) (rounding up).
cards.text: [Come in. Welcome.]

cards.name: Ascension
cards.ability: The card with the lowest SIZE in your Deck is removed from the game. Your Character gets LIFE increased by the removed card's SIZE.
cards.text: [Shion, doesn't that place look peaceful?] [What happened to us?] [I dunno? I can remember something flat and painful hitting me.]

cards.name: Blink
cards.ability: The first Follower on your Field is moved to the last empty Slot in your Field. The first 4 Followers in the enemy Deck get STA decreased by the difference between the old and new Slot numbers.
cards.text: [It happened in an instant. After a flash of light, the clothes was scattered all over the ground, and something was watching us from afar.]

cards.name: Insight
cards.ability: 2 random Followers on your Field lose all skills and gain the skill "[Return] ▶Defend: This card's original skills are restored."
cards.text: [Unlike clairvoyance from above the clouds, clairvoyance from the ground is not as easy as you think.]

cards.name: Waiting Garden
cards.ability: Spells are sent from the bottom of your Deck to your Hand until your Hand is full.
cards.text: [This place is empty... and hollow.]

cards.name: Deja Vu
cards.ability: Spells in the enemy Hand are sent to the empty Slots in the enemy Field in order. If this happens, and you do not have an Academy Character, your Character gets LIFE decreased by the number of sent cards.
cards.text: [Has this happened before?] [No.]

cards.name: Jackpot
cards.ability: 2 Followers on your Field get ATK/DEF/STA -1~+3.
cards.text: [At last, I can go there, too.]

cards.name: Wind Blade
cards.ability: If there are any Followers on your Field, a random Follower on your Field or the enemy Field gets SIZE=1/STA=1.
cards.text: [Hey, you! Do you see my power?] [Fwoooooooooo!]

cards.name: Sudden Bolt
cards.ability: If you have a Crux Character, a random card on the enemy Field is sent to the top of the enemy Deck. The following effects are applied depending on the sent card's type. ●Follower: A random Follower on your Field gets ATK +2/STA +2. ●Spell: This card is sent to the top of your Deck.
cards.text: [As I thought, this glove seems to have special powers. Am I imagining it?]

cards.name: Freezing Gale
cards.ability: All Followers on your Field get deactivated. A random Follower on the enemy Field gets ATK decreased by the number of deactivated Followers.
cards.text: [One time was enough...]

cards.name: Coin Toss
cards.ability: All Followers whose SIZE is less than or equal to this card's SIZE get STA -4.
cards.text: [Chance is always fair. Heads? Tails? Huhu...]

cards.name: Hand of Bacchus
cards.ability: 2 cards called "Zombie" are created in the empty Slots of your Field and get SIZE=1/ATK=7/DEF=0/STA=1.
cards.text: [The wine's all gone? Then I'll turn water into wine!]

cards.name: Glorious Sword of Pursuit
cards.ability: A random Follower on the enemy Field gets ATK/DEF/STA changed to their original values and sent to the top of the enemy Deck. If the enemy is a player, you get Shuffles +1.
cards.text: [With the silver moonlight pouring in like a wave and her back to the enormous sword, Jaina cried out.] [Jaina Preventer, the 1st sword of the Crux Knights, has arrived! I have the knights' vice captain!]

cards.name: Layna's Wish
cards.ability: A random Follower on the enemy Field gets its STA halved (rounding up). If that Follower's DEF is less than 3, it gets STA +3.
cards.text: [And that's why my wish is to become a magical girl that goes POW and SPARKLE!] [That's so cool, Layna!]

cards.name: Amrita's Lost Property
cards.ability: A random Follower on the enemy Field gets ATK=0 and gets the following skill: "[Comeback] ▶Turn Start: This card gets ATK set equal to 3 + its original value. This skill is removed."
cards.text: [Amrita missed Asmis after being attacked. When Asmis went to find Amrita, the only thing she found was her Talentium.]

cards.name: Midnight Attack
cards.ability: If you have a Vita Character, all Followers on the enemy Field are moved to random Slots on the enemy Field, then all Followers on the enemy Field get ATK/STA decreased by twice their own Slot numbers.
cards.text: [Huh? Who are you?] [Hand it over peacefully.]

cards.name: Iri's Whereabouts
cards.ability: All Spells in the enemy Hand get SIZE +1.
cards.text: [Linia... Where is Iri?] [Oh my, why are you asking me about the girl who went with the GS?]

cards.name: Witch, Witch Meeting
cards.ability: All Followers on the enemy Field with at least 3 DEF (at least 2 DEF if you have an Academy Character) get their skills removed. If this happens, those Followers get their DEF doubled.
cards.text: [Cinia, did Linia send you?] [I'm just following my sister's orders.]

cards.name: Dimensional Confinement
cards.ability: If you have an Academy Character, all cards on your Field are deactivated and all Followers on the enemy Field are sent to the bottom of the enemy Deck. If this happens, a number of cards called "Bondage" equal to the number of sent Followers minus 1 are created on the enemy Field, get SIZE=1, and deactivated.
cards.text: [Cinia, that power is...] [Cinia used her newly awakened powers to open a link to another dimension.]

cards.name: Office Attack
cards.ability: The Follower on your Field with the lowest STA gets ATK +2 and is sent to the first empty Slot in the enemy Field
cards.text: [Knock knock!] [Eek! We're not doing anything bad! We just want to learn about the world's secrets in peace!]

cards.name: Request
cards.ability: All Followers in the enemy Hand get STA -3.
cards.text: [Miss Rose, please protect Soma. She's the only key that can turn the current situation around.]

cards.name: The Truth Revealed
cards.ability: All Crux Followers get their ATK/DEF/STA changed to their original values plus 1. All non-Crux Followers get their ATK/DEF/STA changed to their original values minus 2.
cards.text: [In an instant, her false appearance changed. Wings appeared from her back, and both of her legs were unscathed. The current knight captain is an agent of the Empire. -Luthica's notebook]

cards.name: Attack Plans
cards.ability: A random Follower on the enemy Field gets STA decreased by 10 minus your Field SIZE (by a maximum of 5).
cards.text: [Right. We have to be the first to get our hands on the altar. This is why we are sending you to Vita Public School.]

cards.name: Unlikely Problem Solver
cards.ability: A card called "Pleased to meet you" is created in the enemy Hand.
cards.text: [I'm the logical Conundrum from the logical night! Kris has asked me to come solve your problems!]

cards.name: Duress
cards.ability: The following effects are applied depending on the enemy Character's LIFE. ●15 or more: A random Spell on the enemy Field is sent to the Grave and you get Shuffles +1. ●6 or more: All cards on the enemy Field get SIZE +1 and the enemy gets Shuffles -1. ●5 or less: The enemy Character gets LIFE=1.
cards.text: [Miss Iri, we would ne~ver think of hurting your friends. That is, if you cooperate with us.]

cards.name: Backup from another detective
cards.ability: If your Deck contains a card named "Secret Exploration", that card is sent to the top of your Deck. If this card is the only card on your Field, the first 2 cards in your Deck are sent to your Field.
cards.text: [Are you Asmis? I'm here to help you!] [How... How could this happen...]

cards.name: Asmis's Power
cards.ability: A random Follower on your Field gets ATK/STA changed to 2 plus their original values and DEF changed to its original value minus 1.
cards.text: [H... huh? Where's that ingot that she stole?] [Huhu... You didn't know about my power!]

cards.name: Second Encounter
cards.ability: If you have 1 or less Shuffles, you get Shuffles +1. The last 2 cards in your Deck are sent to the top of your Deck. Any sent Spells get SIZE -1 and any sent Followers get ATK +1/STA +1.
cards.text: [Iri... Why are you fighting...? And you...] [Si... Sita?!]

cards.name: Dimensional Counterattack
cards.ability: The first Follower on the enemy Field whose total ATK/DEF/STA is equal to its original total ATK/DEF/STA is sent to the bottom of the enemy Deck.
cards.text: [Do not open any dimensional rifts!] [Who are you?] [My name is DTD, from the space time police.]

cards.name: SHUTDOWN
cards.ability: A random Follower on the enemy Field whose ATK/DEF/STA are higher than their original values gets one of those stats changed to its original value.
cards.text: [What are you doing to my sister?!] [What a scary sister. Don't worry, I just severed her link with whatever was controlling her.]

cards.name: Disrupted Pieces
cards.ability: If you have an Academy Character, the first card in the enemy Deck that does not belong to the enemy Character's faction is removed from the game, then this card is created at the top of the enemy Deck. If you do not have an Academy Character, your Character gets LIFE +1.
cards.text: [One by one, things are falling apart. Cinia and Rose will be here soon.]

cards.name: Start the Counterattack
cards.ability: All Followers on both Fields lose all "Attack" skills.
cards.text: [Eisenwane, hurry up and return to the Empire!] [Wait! Let's talk! Let's talk!]

cards.name: Unity
cards.ability: A random Crux Follower on your Field gets its skills removed and gains the following ability: "[Extinction] ▶Defend: The attacker is removed from the game. This card is sent to the Grave."
cards.text: [We don't know what the Empire's goals are. Wouldn't the best course of action be to drive her out?]

cards.name: Sisters' Reunion
cards.ability: The following effects are applied depending on the number of Crux Followers on your Field. ●1: A random Follower on the enemy Field gets ATK/DEF/STA decreased by the number of empty Slots on your Field. ●2: All Followers on your Field get ATK +2/STA +2. ●3 or more: All Followers on your Field get ATK/STA increased by half your total Field SIZE (rounding down).
cards.text: [Cinia... Sorry I'm late. I've missed you.] [Sis...ter?]

cards.name: You have outlived your usefulness
cards.ability: A random card on the enemy Field whose SIZE is less than or equal to this card's SIZE is sent to the bottom of the enemy Deck.
cards.text: [The GS, who were unable to obtain anything in the end, became sacrifices. Sacrifices for the Mother Demon's revival...]

cards.name: Ruin's Vortex
cards.ability: All Followers get STA decreased by the number of Followers on your Field with "GS" in the name. All Followers get ATK increased by twice the STA reduction.
cards.text: [I thank you for your hard work until now, soldiers of the GS. Now, you can all rest peacefully.]

cards.name: Advent
cards.ability: If you have a Darklore Character and there are any Spells on the enemy Field, all Followers on the enemy Field get ATK -4/STA -4. If there are no Spells on the enemy Field, your Character gets LIFE -1.
cards.text: [Ah... I want you all to feel this, too. This ecstasy...]

cards.name: Linia's World
cards.ability: All cards on your Field get SIZE decreased and DEF increased by half the number of factions present on both Fields (rounding up). All Followers on your Field get ATK/STA increased by the number of factions present on both Fields. A number of cards equal to twice the number of factions present on both Fields are sent from the top of your Grave to the bottom of your Deck. This card is removed from the game.
cards.text: [Being different isn't wrong. I just want a world where everyone can coexist peacefully.]

cards.name: Witness
cards.ability: All Followers get all their skills except their first skills removed. All Followers on your Field get ATK/DEF/STA increased by the number of skills they each lost.
cards.text: [They witnessed a fight while shopping. Actually, they could have found a clue at that time.]

cards.name: Power Unleashed
cards.ability: All Followers on your Field get ATK +1/STA +1. The enemy Character gets LIFE decreased by 3 minus the number of Followers on your Field.
cards.text: [Oh! I feel like I've opened the 3rd gate! I can feel the power inside me!]

cards.name: Secret of Kana
cards.ability: The first Follower in the enemy Deck and the first card in the enemy Deck (that is not the first Follower) are sent to the enemy Field. Any sent Followers get ATK=5 and get their skills changed to the following skill: "[Escape] ▶Turn Start: This card is sent to the top of your Deck."
cards.text: [Isn't this place Kana?] [You humans keep saying Kana this and Kana that without knowing what is really is. Weren't humans supposed to learn about things properly?]

cards.name: Three Swords
cards.ability: If there are at least 3 Followers on your Field, 3 random Followers on your Field get ATK changed to half the combined ATK of the Followers out of those 3 with the highest ATK and the lowest ATK (rounding up).
cards.text: [The 3 swords passed down through the Pacifica family are not made of Talentium. They are another key to Kana. Only the ancient god knows the secret of those swords.]

cards.name: Family's Reproach
cards.ability: A random Follower in your Hand with "Maid" in the name is sent to the bottom of your Deck. If this happens, a random Follower on the enemy Field gets ATK/DEF/STA changed to the lowest ATK/DEF/STA on the enemy Field.
cards.text: [The Mother Demon opened the door to Kana. Linia, where is the sacrifice to close the door to Kana?] [Don't bother looking for Cinia. I will close the door to Kana.]

cards.name: Maid's Obstruction
cards.ability: If you have an Academy Character, Followers with "Maid" in the name are sent from the top of your Deck to your Field until there are no empty Slots left. Those Followers get SIZE=2.
cards.text: [Master Linia isn't here. Master Linia has gone to Kana in master Cinia's place to become the sacrifice.] [Sacrifice?]

cards.name: Discovery of a Gate
cards.ability: If the first card in your Deck is a Follower, it gets SIZE -1/ATK +2/STA +2 and is sent to the first empty Slot in your Hand.
cards.text: [Where could this gate lead? Could it be a gate that leads anywhere? The research possibilities are endless!]

cards.name: Enhanced Talentium
cards.ability: A random Follower on your Field gets one of the following skills randomly. "[Strong Attack] ▶Attack: This card gets ATK +3." "[Strong Attack!] ▶Attack: The defender gets ATK -1/STA -1." "[Fountain!] ▶Attack: This card gets STA +3."
cards.text: [The Talentium that we use is an imitation. As a result, it has side effects. But, I wonder what would happen if I throw this medicine in with that imitation Talentium?]

cards.name: Forced Return
cards.ability: The first Follower on your Field with skills gets its skills removed and sent to the bottom of your Deck. If this happens, all Followers on the enemy Field with skills and one random Spell on the enemy Field are sent to the bottom of the enemy Deck.
cards.text: [From now on, we will look upon the world at an even level, but is that really what you want?] [The previously closed doors to the Empire were opened.]

cards.name: Key Acquired
cards.ability: 2 random Followers on your Field get STA +4 and STA +5 respectively.
cards.text: [Can I say "Tonight, I will steal your precious thing" after I've already stolen it?]

cards.name: Relocation Recommendation
cards.ability: If there are at least 2 Spells on the enemy Field, a random card on the enemy Field is destroyed.
cards.text: [Is there really an amazing city underground?] [It's always dark and pleasant!]

cards.name: Altar's Ritual
cards.ability: A random Spell on the enemy Field is sent to the top of the enemy Deck. All cards on the enemy Field are deactivated.
cards.text: [Gem Gir Gan... The two keys will become one and purify this disrupted world.]

cards.name: Kana Unleashed
cards.ability: In order to invoke this card's power, Kana's seal must first be undone. (If there are at least 3 cards in your Grave with "Kana" in the name, 3 of those cards are copied to your Field.)
cards.text: [The Mother Demon opened the door known to everyone as the door to Kana, but it wasn't the Kana that everyone had imagined. It was a place of infinite darkness. Existences emptier than nothingness began to pour out.]

cards.name: Underground Library
cards.ability: The first Spell on the enemy Field whose SIZE is less than the number of Followers in the bottom 4 cards in your Deck is removed from the game. The first card in your Deck called "Finding Library" is sent to the top of your Deck.
cards.text: [An enormous place that exists in the basement of Vita Public School's library. The number of discovered books is in the tens of thousands, which is already more than twice as many as Vita's library. However, the end of the underground library has yet to be discovered.]

cards.name: Secret Garden
cards.ability: All Followers on your Field with "Lady" in the name get SIZE -1/ATK +1 if their SIZE is at least 3. If their SIZE is 3 or less, they get STA increased by their own SIZE. This card is deactivated and remains on the Field.
cards.text: [...Tomo] [Lily...] [You're 26 years old, Lilianna. If you've failed with Y, then you should come to the world of X.]

cards.name: Azure Cross's Power
cards.ability: All Follower's "Defend" skills become "[Zero] ▶Defend: No effect." If those Followers belong to Crux, they get ATK +1/STA +1. If they have "Blue Cross" in the name, they get DEF +1/STA +1.
cards.text: [Florence's power is amazing. The Blue Cross's influence spreads beyond Crux into other countries.]

cards.name: Star's Return
cards.ability: The last 2 cards in your Deck are sent to the Grave. The first Follower in your Deck with "GS" in the name is sent to the first empty Slot in your Field. That card gets ATK +2/STA +2.
cards.text: [When she learned of the danger, GS 1st Star hurried to make rescue preparations.]

cards.name: Hidden Power Unleashed
cards.ability: All Followers on your Field get ATK/STA increased by the number of different Seasons present on your Field. All Followers on the enemy Field get ATK/STA decreased by the number of different Seasons present on the enemy Field.
cards.text: [The abandoned princess of blood, Iri Flina, opened the gate to power for the sake of her beloved.]

cards.name: Flower Viewing
cards.ability: All Followers on your Field get STA increased by 2 plus the number of cards in your Hand.
cards.text: [My mother obtained these clothes from a gate a long time ago... They seem like they would go well with flower viewing.]

cards.name: Daydream
cards.ability: All Followers in your Deck get SIZE -1/ATK -1/STA -1.
cards.text: [You are under arrest!!] [Heh heh heh...] [What kind of dream is she having?] [No clue...]

cards.name: Nap
cards.ability: 2 random cards in the enemy Deck get their SIZE doubled. 2 random cards in your Deck get their SIZE cut in half (rounding down).
cards.text: [These clothes... are warm... I'm sleepy...]

cards.name: Delayed Wages
cards.ability: A random Follower on the enemy Field gets ATK/DEF/STA changed to their original values. A random Follower on your Field gets ATK/DEF/STA decreased by the respective increase in each stat, then a random Follower on your Field gets ATK/DEF/STA increased by the same amount.
cards.text: [If Rose isn't coming back, then who do I get my pay from?]

cards.name: Seaside Research
cards.ability: A random Academy Follower on your Field gets SIZE -1/ATK +1/DEF +1/STA +1. A random Follower on the enemy Field gets SIZE +1/ATK -1/DEF -1/STA -1.
cards.text: [I still don't know the names of those clear gems I saw that day.]

cards.name: Vengeful Curse
cards.ability: The first 5 cards in your Grave are removed from the game and the Follower on your Field with the lowest STA is deactivated. If this happens, the Follower on the enemy Field with the highest STA is deactivated. Those two Followers get STA decreased by the difference in their STA. All cards on the enemy Field get STA decreased by half the STA reduction (rounding down).
cards.text: [Only those with a strong resolve to curse someone can use curses.]

cards.name: Sword of Light
cards.ability: If the Turn Number, your Shuffles, and this card's Slot number are all odd, a random Spell in your Grave is sent to your Field. This card is removed from the game.
cards.text: [If you imbue it with magic, this hilt will create an amazing sword. According to ancient literature, this was an artifact used by a golden-haired boy.]

cards.name: Mistake
cards.ability: The last card in the enemy Deck is sent to the Grave. 2 random Followers on your Field get ATK +1/STA +2 (if the removed card was a Spell) or DEF +1 (if the removed card was a Follower).
cards.text: [One of the fundamentals for knights is to not let go of your sword.] [Ahhhh it slipped!]

cards.name: Home Remedy
cards.ability: Cards on the enemy Field in odd Slots are deactivated. Any deactivated Followers get ATK/STA decreased by the number of deactivated cards. 2 Crux Followers on your Field get ATK/STA increased by 1 plus the number of deactivated cards.
cards.text: [From ancient times, spit was used on wounds. I wonder if you could use spit on degraded Talentium as well? Huhu]

cards.name: Unwelcome Guest
cards.ability: A random Follower on your Field gets ATK=0. A random Follower on the enemy Field gets STA decreased by the ATK change.
cards.text: [Grandma always said, if you want to catch two rabbits, then catch them completely... Who should I make happy today?]

cards.name: Liberated Divinity
cards.ability: One Follower on the enemy Field whose combined ATK/DEF/STA is greater than the enemy Character's LIFE gets deactivated. That Follower gets ATK/DEF/STA changed to half your Character's LIFE (rounding down).
cards.text: [We need two keys to create the world that you wish for. Your hard work will surely be rewarded.]

cards.name: A Walk
cards.ability: If you have a Darklore Character, a random card on the enemy Field is sent to the bottom of the enemy Deck. This card gets SIZE=2 and remains on the Field deactivated. If this card's SIZE is 2 or less, 2 random cards on the enemy Field are sent to the top of the enemy Deck, then this card is removed from the game.
cards.text: [I must see with my own eyes and feel with my own body how disrupted this world is.]

cards.name: Zero Serve
cards.ability: The first 2 Followers in your Deck with "Cook Club" in the name get ATK/DEF/STA changed to equal the ATK/DEF/STA of the second Follower on your Field.
cards.text: [Senpais, my serve doesn't spin. You'll see the ball, but you won't be able to hit it.]

cards.name: Victims
cards.ability: All Followers on your Field with "Defend" skills get STA -3. All Followers on the enemy Field with skills get ATK -2/STA -2.
cards.text: [Kyaa! Our room! Our luggage! Our clothes!]

cards.name: Secret Art: Nameless Flash
cards.ability: The Follower on your Field with the lowest total DEF+STA is destroyed. If this happens, a random Follower in the enemy Field and a random Follower in the enemy Deck are removed from the game. The enemy Character gets LIFE decreased by 1/3 of the total SIZE of the removed cards (rounding down).
cards.text: [The moment Sita drew her sword, 7 beams of light flew towards the trespasser.] [Wh.. What is this, Sita?] [It's just 7 slashes...]

cards.name: Flowers of Doubt
cards.ability: All Followers in your Deck with "Lady" in the name get SIZE +2/ATK +1/DEF +1/STA +1.
cards.text: [These flowers... are beautiful. Would master Rose... like them?]

cards.name: Discovery
cards.ability: A random Follower on your Field gets its ATK halved (rounding down). If this happens, that card's DEF/STA are set equal to the highest DEF/STA values on both Fields.
cards.text: [Master, I can smell flowers from the red-haired woman!] [Since when were you a dog...]

cards.name: Homing Instinct
cards.ability: 2 random Followers on your Field get ATK/DEF/STA increased by the amount that each stat exceeds its original value.
cards.text: [Cannelle, I haven't seen you for a long time since you left the mansion, and now you're in my bamboo forest... What are you doing?] [Peni! The bamboo here is delicious!] [Aren't you a rabbit...?]

cards.name: Duty Assignment
cards.ability: All cards with an odd SIZE get SIZE +1. All cards with an even SIZE get SIZE -1.
cards.text: [Dispose of this after you read it.] [We'll burn it of course] [No let's bury it] [Don't do something weird with it]

cards.name: Migration
cards.ability: All Followers on your Field with 6 or less STA get their STA doubled.
cards.text: [Why are we riding bicycles?] [The messengers said they were very high quality] [That's not the problem!]

cards.name: Temporary Transfer
cards.ability: The first Follower on your Field with the highest total ATK+DEF+STA less than or equal to 22 gets ATK/DEF/STA increased by half its respective ATK/DEF/STA (rounding down). A random other Follower on your Field gets ATK/DEF/STA increased by half the respective increase in each stat (rounding down).
cards.text: [I can bring anyone for the test on new equipment, but the messengers are nowhere in sight.]

cards.name: Doubt Attack
cards.ability: 2 random Followers on your Field get ATK +1/STA +1. If those Followers have odd ATK, they get an additional ATK +2/STA +2.
cards.text: [Kris!] [A dark shadow flew towards Kris Flina.]

cards.name: Forced Apprehension
cards.ability: A random Follower on your Field and a random Follower on the enemy Field swap skills.
cards.text: [You're all under arrest under suspicion of being connected to the attack incident! Hurry up and come!] [Eek!]

cards.name: Inspection
cards.ability: All Darklore Followers on your Field are deactivated. If this happens, those Followers gain the following skill: "[Thorn Shield] ▶Defend: The attacker gets STA decreased by the attacker's ATK. This skill is removed."
cards.text: [Please cooperate with our investigation!] [Are you investigating my good looks~?] [Why would we investigate that!]

cards.name: Life of Study
cards.ability: Your Shuffles are changed to equal the enemy Shuffles. If this happens, a random Follower on the enemy Field gets DEF decreased by your Shuffles. If there was no change, both players get Shuffles +1. If this happens, this card is sent to the top of your Deck.
cards.text: [Sita! You stopped studying again! Are you secretly eating things while you're by yourself!?] [!!!!]

cards.name: Receipt
cards.ability: A random Follower on your Field gets ATK +3/STA +3. There is a 50% chance that a random Follower on your Field gets ATK -2/STA -2.
cards.text: [This is the receipt from when they went out to replace the damaged equipment. However, it's filled with the names of snacks that they ate.]

cards.name: Pursuit
cards.ability: All Followers on your Field without skills get SIZE -1.
cards.text: [Sita, it's up to you! Catch that person!] [Hold on...]

cards.name: Service Award
cards.ability: All Followers on your Field whose skills are not the same as their original skills get their original skills restored. If those Followers do not have "Cook Club" in the name, they get ATK -1/STA -1.
cards.text: [For your great service in catching the unidentified culprit, Royle City presents you with this award.] [Everyone except one was showered with praises.]

cards.name: Table Flip
cards.ability: All Followers on the enemy Field get STA -3. If there are any Followers on your Field with "Lady" in the name, the Followers on the enemy Field get an additional STA -1.
cards.text: [There's no bamboo! Give me bamboo!] [Kyaa!]

cards.name: Request
cards.ability: If this card's SIZE is at least 2, this card is sent to the first empty Slot in the enemy Field, gets SIZE=1, and gets deactivated. If this card's SIZE is 1, the first Follower in the enemy Hand is sent to the last empty Slot in the enemy Field.
cards.text: [Alright, Cannelle. You want your own forest like Panica?] [Yeah! Can you give me one?] [Yes. That's not hard.] [Thanks, Cinia!]

cards.name: The door to getting a job
cards.ability: The first Academy Follower in your Deck with a SIZE of 3 or less gets SIZE +1/ATK +1/STA +2 and is sent to your Hand. If that card has "Maid" in the name, it gets an additional SIZE -1/ATK +1/DEF +2.
cards.text: [The maids couldn't find a job, so they went back to Cinia's mansion with the hope of getting hired again.] [Lick my feet!] [Please spare us, master Cinia!]

cards.name: Shopping
cards.ability: All Followers on your Field in even Slots are moved to the next empty Slots. If they weren't moved, those Followers get ATK +1/STA +1.
cards.text: [This is the muffler that Swimie senpai asked for.] [Cl... o... thes...]

cards.name: Rivalry
cards.ability: A random Follower on the enemy Field gets its "Attack" skills removed. If you have a Crux Character, this effect is applied an additional time.
cards.text: [You're late, Miss Useless Knight.] [Can you still call us useless when you need our information to catch the culprit?]

cards.name: Sending Information
cards.ability: All Followers on your Field gain the skill "[Zero] ▶Attack: No effect." If you have a Crux Character, a card called "Inside Enemy" is created in the first empty Slot of your Field and at the top of your Deck.
cards.text: [Florence's new report was surprising.]

cards.name: Alibi
cards.ability: The first deactivated card on your Field gets reactivated. If that card is a Follower, it gets ATK +3/STA +3.
cards.text: [Wow... What happened here...] [After them! The culprits can't be far!]

cards.name: Still Alive
cards.ability: A random Follower on the enemy Field gets its SIZE changed to its original value. If this happens, that Follower gets ATK/STA decreased by the change in SIZE.
cards.text: [Now, regarding of the election of new executives...] [Hey! You idiots! I'm still alive!!!]

cards.name: Sherlock
cards.ability: All Followers in the enemy Field and Hand get STA -2. All Followers on your Field with "Scardel" or "Crescent" in the name get STA increased by the total STA reduction.
cards.text: [Don't move! Anyone who moves is the culprit! I swear on Kris's name that I'll definitely solve this case!]

cards.name: Maple Viewing
cards.ability: If the number of cards in your Hand is odd, a random Season 1 Spell is created in the first empty Slot of your Field. If it is even, a random Season 2 Spell is created in the first empty Slot of your Field.
cards.text: [As they looked upon the beautiful fall foliage during the autumn day, a nice breeze rustled the girls' hair.]

cards.name: Girl's Dream
cards.ability: 2 random Followers on your Field get ATK increased by the number of cards on your Field and get STA increased by the number of cards in your Hand. The first Follower on your Field is sent to the bottom of your Deck. If this happens, a random Follower on the enemy Field is sent to the bottom of the enemy Deck.
cards.text: [The souls of those girls are always so free. It's my dream to become like that, even if it's just a little bit.]

cards.name: White Whale Rush
cards.ability: A random Follower on your Field gets ATK +1/STA +1. A random Spell on the enemy Field is sent to the bottom of the enemy Deck. If this happens, that Follower gets an additional STA +1. This card is removed from the game.
cards.text: [Giant whale's clams! It's super effective!]

cards.name: Tennis Experience
cards.ability: All Followers on the enemy Field get STA +2. This card is deactivated.
cards.text: [President! Here's the ball!] [How am I supposed to return your magic shot?!]

cards.name: Sleep Club Clubroom
cards.ability: A random card on your Field is deactivated. A random Follower on the enemy Field gets STA decreased by the number of cards on your Field multiplied by the number of deactivated cards on your Field.
cards.text: [The most secret place in Vita Public School. There, a very serious, dynamic, and constructive discussion takes place.]

cards.name: Declaration of War
cards.ability: The bottom 5 cards in the enemy Grave are removed from the game. A number of cards in the enemy Grave equal to the number of removed Spells are removed from the game. 2 Followers on your Field get ATK/STA increase by half the total number of removed cards (rounding up).
cards.text: [You don't need my help? But I want to. Even if you refuse my help, I'll just refuse your refusal. I know everything anyway.]

cards.name: Maid's Psychological War
cards.ability: The following effect is applied a number of times equal to the number of cards on your Field with "Maid" in the name: "A random Follower on your Field gets ATK +1/DEF +1."
cards.text: [Miss Chess, I think you're in the wrong locker room. The leather clothes club is two blocks down.] [Oh my, Miss Fio. It seems like you've fallen into some deep, dark fantasy. Hohoho...]

cards.name: Curiosity
cards.ability: 3 cards are sent from the top of the enemy Grave to the bottom of your Grave. If this happens, a random Follower on the enemy Field gets DEF decreased by the number of sent Followers.
cards.text: [Ow! Hey you! Who are you?!] [... So cute!]

cards.name: Broken Heart
cards.ability: If this card's SIZE is at least 3, the Academy Follower on your Field with the lowest SIZE is deactivated and sent to the first emptY Slot on the enemy Field. If this happens, this card gets SIZE=1 and is deactivated. If this card's SIZE is 1 and there are any Academy Followers on the enemy Field, all Followers on the enemy Field get ATK/DEF/STA decreased by 5 minus the number of Academy Followers on the enemy Field.
cards.text: [Scary!]

cards.name: Opening the Gates
cards.ability: If there are any Followers on the enemy Field with 3 skills, a random Follower on the enemy Field gets its second skill removed.
cards.text: [The guards who watch over the Alliance gates are so diligent. They're different from our new recruits.]

cards.name: Dangerous Meeting
cards.ability: The first 2 Spells in the enemy Deck are sent to the enemy Field. Those Spells are sent to the top of the enemy Deck.
cards.text: [Ah! Sorry. I couldn't see over the things I was carrying.] [Watch where you're wal... Huh?]

cards.name: Double Dress Up
cards.ability: All Followers on your Field get their SIZE cut in half (rounding down) and gain one of the following skills: "[Strong Attack] ▶Attack: This card gets ATK +3." "[Tough Defense] ▶Defend: This card gets STA +3." "[Results of Training] ▶Turn Start: This card gets ATK +1/DEF +1/STA +1."
cards.text: [Receive Irene's big and beautiful heart! This will definitely work!]

cards.name: Gather Information
cards.ability: Your Character gets LIFE increased by the number of Followers on your Field that belong to the same faction as your Character. The enemy Character gets LIFE decreased by half the increase (rounding up).
cards.text: [Uguu~ These fish cakes look really good...] [Hey, how about you stop staring and buy one?]

cards.name: Electromaster
cards.ability: If your Field contains a Follower, a random Follower on either Field gets the following skill: "[Abandonment] ▶Turn Start: This card is destroyed."
cards.text: [It doesn't follow any laws of physics. Magic is not science!]

cards.name: Tour
cards.ability: The last card in your Grave is copied to the first empty Slot on your Field and the last card in your Deck is copied to the last empty Slot in your Hand. 2 random Followers on your Field get ATK/STA increased by half the SIZE of the card that was copied to your Hand (rounding down). This card is removed from the game. This Spell cannot be copied.
cards.text: [Watch as I reproduce the rice soup from 4000 years of Eastern legend!] [Cool!] [Wow!]

cards.name: Coin Factory
cards.ability: This card is replaced by a blue, yellow, or red coin 3 times. The following effects are applied depending on the highest number of matching colored coins. 1: All Followers on the enemy Field get STA -1. 2: All Followers on the enemy Field get ATK -2 and all Followers on your Field get STA +2. 3: A random card on the enemy Field is destroyed.
cards.text: [I've heard that there is a Crux factory that produces many different colors of coins.]

cards.name: Assistance
cards.ability: If your Grave does not contain a card with the name "Assistance", this card is removed from the game. If your Grave contains a card with the name "Assistance", all Followers on the enemy Field get ATK -2/DEF -1/STA -2.
cards.text: [Oh my, you'll catch a cold if you sleep here in this weather.]

cards.name: Dark Room
cards.ability: If there are any cards on your Field with a SIZE of at least 5, those cards get their SIZE cut in half (rounding down). If the total SIZE reduction is at least 5, the first card in your Grave is sent to the top of your Deck.
cards.text: [Ugh... What happened to sister... Please bear it a little longer, stigma...]

cards.name: Hypnotherapy
cards.ability: If you have a Vita Character, all Followers on your Field are deactivated and gain the following skill: "[Dream Alignment] ▶Defend: The attacker gets ATK/STA decreased by this card's SIZE. This skill is removed."
cards.text: [Mnya... mnya... If I do it like this, Mr. Sheep will come with me to dreamland...]

cards.name: Evangelism
cards.ability: All non-Academy cards on your Field and all cards on the enemy Field that belong to a different faction than the enemy Character are sent to the Grave.
cards.text: [Delivery.] [Hm? My Super XX Wars OG is here already?] [I'm here to deliver the teachings of the God of Truth.] [What?!]

cards.name: Muzisitter Action
cards.ability: A random Follower on your Field gets DEF=0. All Followers on the enemy Field get ATK decreased by the amount of DEF decreased.
cards.text: [Muzisitter Irea!] [Muzisitter Freesia!] [Muzisitter Linus...] [Don't underestimate the power of Muzisitter!] [So embarrassing...]

cards.name: The Real Thing
cards.ability: All Followers on the enemy Field whose STA are less than or equal to the ATK of the Follower on your Field with the highest ATK are destroyed. If this happens, you get LIFE decreased by 2 + the number of Followers destroyed.
cards.text: [Heh heh, I'm different from that imitation... Behold, the difference between you and me!] [Sniff...]

cards.name: Maintaining Power
cards.ability: A random Spell on the enemy Field is removed from the game. If this happens, the first Spell in the enemy Grave is sent to the first empty Slot on the enemy Field.
cards.text: [If another heretic dies, then we don't need that other girl.]

cards.name: Disharmony
cards.ability: All Followers on your Field get STA increased by twice the amount that their original STA exceeds their current STA. If this happens, those Followers get their skills removed.
cards.text: [Everyone changed after the GS attack on Crux. Why is everyone obsessed with power?]

cards.name: Remembrance
cards.ability: If you have a Crux Character, 2 random Followers on the enemy Field get their ATK/STA changed to a random value between 5 and each Follower's own SIZE.
cards.text: [While she couldn't see her in real life, her last memory was about her younger sister. It was a loathsome memory of leaving her younger sister behind. She could never forget it.]

cards.name: Exodus
cards.ability: 2 random Darklore Followers on your Field get ATK +2/STA +1. 2 random Followers on your Field with "Scardel" or "Crescent" in the name get STA +3.
cards.text: [Kris! Everyone is definitely going to be happy when we get to the underground city!] [Conundrum, you're still such a kid for being so excited about moving to a new home.]

cards.name: Journey
cards.ability: A random Follower on the enemy Field gets STA decreased by half the ATK of a random Follower on your Field with at least 10 STA (rounding down).
cards.text: [...] [The power you carry... Depending on how you use it, you could become a god or a demon.]

cards.name: New Full Moon
cards.ability: If you have a Darklore Character, the enemy Character gets LIFE decreased by 1 + the tens digit of the enemy Character's LIFE. All Followers in the enemy Deck get STA decreased by (3 - the tens digit of the enemy Character's LIFE). This card gets SIZE +1 and is sent to the top of your Deck. If this card's SIZE is at least 4, it is removed from the game.
cards.text: [I have become your new full moon. Obey me!]

cards.name: Snowball
cards.ability: The following effects are applied depending on the type of the card in the enemy Field with the same Slot number as this card. *Follower: That Follower is sent to the Grave. *Spell: The enemy Character gets LIFE -9. *No card: The enemy Character gets LIFE -6. This card only functions in the "Snow Fairy's Visit" dungeon.
cards.text: [If you gather snow and pack it tightly together, it will become a wonderful snowball.]

cards.name: Snowball
cards.ability: The following effects are applied depending on the type of the card in the enemy Field with the same Slot number as this card. *Follower: That Follower is sent to the Grave. *Spell: The enemy Character gets LIFE -3. *No card: The enemy Character gets LIFE -2.
cards.text: [If you put something like a rock in your snowball, there's a good chance you'll see blood when you throw it, so don't do that.]

cards.name: Sendoff
cards.ability: The first Follower on your Field and the enemy Field are moved to the Slot number equal to 1 + the number of cards in your Hand. If this happens and you have at least 4 cards in your Hand, the Follower on your Field that was moved gets ATK +1/DEF +1/STA +1.
cards.text: [Flinte, make sure you come back.] [I'll be back with my sister.]

cards.name: You can't force yourself to sleep
cards.ability: All Followers on your Field are deactivated. Those Followers get DEF increased by half the number of Followers deactivated (rounding up).
cards.text: [Get out of your deep, dark fantasy! You can't force yourself to sleep!]

cards.name: Refuge
cards.ability: The Follower in your Hand with the highest SIZE is sent to the last empty Slot on your Field. That Follower gets SIZE set equal to its original SIZE minus its Slot number. A random Spell on the enemy Field is sent to the top of the enemy Deck.
cards.text: [It's too dangerous to even open the door. I'll observe from here.]

cards.name: Bankrupt
cards.ability: 2 random Followers in the enemy Hand get STA -1.
cards.text: [Every stock that Toto bought had its value cut in half. She had the so-called Minus Hand of stocks.]

cards.name: Maid of Destruction
cards.ability: The Follower on your Field with the highest DEF and the Follower on the enemy Field with the highest DEF get their DEF swapped.
cards.text: [Breaking plates, dropping the fine china, making a mess of the mansion... I can't work with those maids any more!]

cards.name: Sweet Dreamer
cards.ability: You get Shuffles +1. This card gets SIZE +2 and is sent to the enemy Hand.
cards.text: [Huhu... heh... huhu.......] [Tomo's dreams are sweeter than chocolate.]

cards.name: Collapse
cards.ability: All Followers on both Fields whose DEF and Slot numbers are equal get DEF +2. Other Followers get DEF=0.
cards.text: [(Where am I... Who am I...)]

cards.name: Interrogation
cards.ability: The cards in your Hand with the lowest SIZE all get SIZE +1. The cards in your Hand with the highest SIZE all get SIZE -1.
cards.text: [Miss Sigma! What on earth are you doing!] [Hmm... it's Jaina. Investigate this flower for me.]

cards.name: Component Analysis
cards.ability: This card gets SIZE -1, gets moved to the first empty Slot on your Field, and is deactivated. If you have a Crux Character, it gets an additional SIZE -1. If this card's SIZE is 1, all Spells in the enemy Hand are sent to the Grave.
cards.text: [Miss Sigmund, would you investigate this flower for me?] [It's pretty... but I feel strange power from it.]

cards.name: Charming
