cards.ability: A random Darklore Follower on your Field gets STA cut in half (rounding up). That Follower gets ATK increased by the amount of STA decreased.
cards.text: [Conundrum, no matter how painful or difficult things are, never forget your smile.] [Okay, Kris!]

cards.name: Call for Help
cards.ability: All Followers on your Field with "Crescent" or "Scardel" in the name get SIZE decreased by the tens digit of their own STA.
cards.text: [I heard a rumor. Please help me!] [A rumor...? This place isn't a refugee shelter...]

cards.name: Return
cards.ability: 2 random Followers on your Field get STA +3 and get the following skill: "[Tactical Retreat!] ▶Turn Start: This card is sent to the top of your Deck. This skill is removed."
cards.text: [H... Hmph! They tried to trade me in for someone else! Did you think I would forgive you for that? Even if you try to make me happy, I... I'm not grateful at all!]

cards.name: Moonlight Waltz
cards.ability: A random Follower on the enemy Field gets its DEF and STA swapped.
cards.text: [Huhu. Not bad, Pacifica. Even with your foresight suppressed, you can dodge pretty well.] [How impertinent.]

cards.name: Pang Pang
cards.ability: A card with the name "Pang Pang" is created in all empty Slots of either your Field or the enemy Field. Afterwards, all created cards are removed from the game. All Followers on your Field get STA increased by the number of "Pang Pang" cards that were removed from your Field. All Followers on the enemy Field get STA decreased by the number of "Pang Pang" cards that were removed from the enemy Field.
cards.text: [If you collect pang pang, it will burst. The cushion doesn't burst, but it seems like it will.]

cards.name: Lucky Bag
cards.ability: (none)
cards.text: [At the beginning of the year, children are given tied pouches for good luck. By putting something inside and tying the pouch, it's like fortune is going into the pouch.]

cards.name: Wrongly Accused
cards.ability: If there is a Follower on your Field and a Follower on the enemy Field, a random Follower on your Field gets SIZE cut in half (rounding down). A random Follower on the enemy Field gets SIZE cut in half (rounding up).
cards.text: [It's not me...] [At the Vita festival, a reward was offered for Sita and Gart, who could direct birds.]

cards.name: The End of Childhood
cards.ability: A Follower on your Field whose STA is less than its original value and a Follower on the enemy Field whose ATK is less than its original value swap places.
cards.text: [Nanai, this picture is called "The End of Childhood". Do you know what it means?] [You shouldn't ask questions about things that only you know, senpai.] [You'll understand one day, too, Nanai.]

cards.name: Sense of Identity
cards.ability: Vita cards in your Hand are sent to empty Slots in your Field in sequential order until your Field is full or your Hand runs out of cards. Those cards get SIZE -1. Followers in the enemy Hand are sent to empty Slots in the enemy Field in sequential order.
cards.text: [Cat Sita with her back to the full moon. Vernika looked for her identity in her dreams.]

cards.name: Organization
cards.ability: All Followers on your Field get DEF changed to the average DEF of all Followers on your Field (rounding up).
cards.text: [Ah, master Rose, I'll just finish this and go straighten things up. Please rest and relax.]

cards.name: Interview
cards.ability: 2 random Followers on your Field get DEF +2. Academy Followers get an additional DEF +2. Those Followers get the skill "[My Liver...] ▶Defend: This card gets STA -3."
cards.text: [Miss Royetta, at our mansion, we have a scary, ferocious beast and an even scarier maid. Will that be alright?] [... Huh?]

cards.name: Chief's Rest
cards.ability: A random Follower on your Field gets SIZE -2. If that Follower's new SIZE is at least 2, it gets ATK +2/STA +2. If it is at least 4, it gets DEF +1. If it is at least 6, it gets an additional SIZE -1.
cards.text: [So hot... Even though I'm still single, lodgings like this are too much for a lady like me.]

cards.name: Cross
cards.ability: If there are Crux Followers and non-Crux Followers on your Field, those Followers get DEF doubled. Those Followers get ATK increased by the amount of DEF increased for each Follower.
cards.text: [Cannelle!] [Pintail!] [Cross!] [Senpai has lost it!]

cards.name: Burden
cards.ability: A random Follower on your Field gets ATK/DEF/STA changed to their original values if they are lower than their original values. If this happens, a random Follower on your Field gets STA increased by the total change in stats.
cards.text: [Ugh...] [What's wrong, Captain Luthica?] [Nothing. It's just my shoulders...]

cards.name: Duo
cards.ability: 2 random Followers on your Field get ATK +3/STA +3. Crux Followers also gain the skill "[Ignore Defense] ▶Attack: The defender gets STA decreased by its own DEF."
cards.text: [Rose, 10 more seconds! More seconds!] [I wonder if I could secretly use some magic?!]

cards.name: Reinstatement
cards.ability: If the total SIZE of your Field is greater than the total SIZE of the enemy Field, all cards on your Field get SIZE -1.
cards.text: [Welcome back, Miss Mon Cher.] [Didn't I tell you not to say my name in public?] [Ah, I'm sorry...] [These clothes seem like they've gotten bigger... especially around the chest...]

cards.name: Rain Light
cards.ability: The following effects are applied depending on the type of the last card in the enemy Deck. Follower: A random Follower on the enemy Field gets its skills removed. Spell: A random Spell on the enemy Field is sent to the bottom of the enemy Deck.
cards.text: [One moonlit, rainy night, Conundrum suddenly decided to go out for a walk. She didn't seem to have any particular reason for going out.]

cards.name: Pat on the head
cards.ability: All Followers on the enemy Field get STA decreased by 1 + the total number of different SIZE cards in both Graves. If the STA decrease is at least 5, those Followers get an additional ATK -2.
cards.text: [Rue is such a good girl. You always faithfully carry out my orders. Good job.]

cards.name: Holiday
cards.ability: A random Follower on your Field gets ATK/DEF/STA changed to 1 + their original values. If this happens, that Follower is deactivated.
cards.text: [This place is paradise. Even though my vacation is only 5 days long, I can forget everything while I'm here.]

cards.name: Loneliness
cards.ability: All Followers on your Field get SIZE -1. You get Shuffles +1.
cards.text: [The wind is cool... If you travel alone, you feel many things.]

cards.name: 1st Princess's Message
cards.ability: The first Empire Follower in your Deck gets ATK +2/DEF +2/STA +2 and is sent to the first empty Slot on your Field. If there are no Empire Followers in your Deck, then instead the first Neutral Follower in your Deck gets ATK -1/DEF -1/STA -1 and is sent to the first empty Slot on your Field.
cards.text: [In the hologram she held in her hand contained a message from the 1st princess with orders to personally intervene in Crux's affairs and report on any possible dangers.]

cards.name: Investigation Start
cards.ability: 2 random Followers on the enemy Field get DEF decreased by the number of Followers on your Field with "Student Council" in the name.
cards.text: [I have to look! I was a fool to think anything would happen if I waited.]

cards.name: Emergency Meeting
cards.ability: The last Follower in your Deck gets the skill "[Desertion] ▶Turn Start: This card is sent to the bottom of the enemy Deck." and is sent to the first empty Slot on the enemy Field. The enemy Character gets LIFE -1.
cards.text: [What's this? It's an emergency meeting!]

cards.name: Request for Help
cards.ability: If you have a Vita Character and this card's SIZE is 2, Followers on the enemy Field starting with the first get ATK decreased to a minimum of 0 with a total ATK decrease equal to half the total ATK of Followers on your Field (rounding up). This card gets SIZE -1 and is sent to the top of your Deck. If this card's SIZE is not 2, Followers on the enemy Field starting from the first get STA decreased to a minimum of 1 with a total STA decrease equal to the Turn Number, then this card is removed from the game.
cards.text: [Help me... I'll give you a Sita cone...]

cards.name: Confiscation
cards.ability: All Followers in the enemy Field and Hand gain the skill "[Zero] ▶Attack: No effect."
cards.text: [Sister, I'll be holding onto this sword.]

cards.name: Mysterious Dagger
cards.ability: The first Follower on your Field with "Maid" in the name is removed from the game. The first card in your Deck with the name "Dress Up Guard" is sent to the first empty Slot on your Field. If there are any cards remaining in your Deck with the name "Dress Up Guard", those cards are removed from the game. If this happens, the sent Follower gets SIZE -1/ATK +1/DEF +1/STA +1.
cards.text: [Ah, the pot from the Answers!] [What's this...?]

cards.name: Mixed Results
cards.ability: If you have an Academy Character, this card gets SIZE=1, is sent to a random empty Slot on the enemy Field, and is deactivated. If you do not have an Academy Character, your Character gets LIFE -3, Followers adjacent to this card get ATK -2/DEF -2/STA -2, and this card is removed from the game.
cards.text: [Rose thought that by confiscating Linia's sword, she wouldn't be able to do anything, but she was already the Alliance's invisible hand.]

cards.name: Honorable Discharge
cards.ability: A random Follower on your Field gets its ATK and DEF swapped (DEF capped to 5). If that Follower belongs to Crux, it gets an additional ATK +2.
cards.text: [With the quartermaster's help, Rose was able to receive an honorable discharge.] [Rose, good job.] [What about me!? Quartermaster, when will I get discharged?] [Um, I dunno?] [(What am I riding...?)]

cards.name: Teacher Disguise
cards.ability: A random non-Crux Follower on your Field is changed to "Blue Cross Linda" while retaining its current ATK/DEF/STA/SIZE and skills. That card gets ATK/STA increased by the number of cards on your Field with "Blue Cross" in the name.
cards.text: [I can't find a uniform that fits, so I'll be a teacher instead.]

cards.name: Truth Searcher
cards.ability: If you have a Crux Follower, the following effects are applied depending on this card's SIZE. 1: All Followers in your Deck with a SIZE less than or equal to 4 get ATK +1/DEF +1. This card gets SIZE=4 and is sent to the top of your Deck. 2 or more: All Spells in the enemy Deck with a SIZE less than or equal to 2 get SIZE +1.
cards.text: [The clouds have been dark in Crux lately. Is the truth we've been searching for really the answer?]

cards.name: Arrival
cards.ability: A random Follower on your Field and a random Follower on the enemy Field get their SIZE/ATK/DEF/STA swapped.
cards.text: [It was a difficult journey, but we've finally arrived at our new paradise. We can rest now.]

cards.name: Discernment
cards.ability: The first Follower on your Field gets SIZE -2. All Followers on the enemy Field with a SIZE less than or equal to the SIZE of the first Follower on your Field get ATK -2/STA -2.
cards.text: [I'll definitely be able to find the answer here. Wait for a bit. I'll turn everything back.]

cards.name: Executive Meeting
cards.ability: All Followers on the enemy Field get ATK -2/STA -2. This card gets SIZE=2~6 (randomly) and is deactivated. The following effects are applied depending on this card's SIZE. ●2~3: 2 random Followers on your Field get ATK +3/STA +3. ●4~5: The first Follower in the enemy Grave is sent to the first empty Slot on your Field and gets SIZE=3. ●6: A random Follower on the enemy Field is destroyed.
cards.text: [It's been a while, everyone.]

cards.name: Unexpected Meeting
cards.ability: 2 random Followers on the enemy Field are moved to random Slots on the enemy Field. If those Followers are now adjacent to each other, one Follower is sent to the top of the enemy Deck and the other is sent to the bottom of the enemy Deck.
cards.text: [Rose has been discharged, so it's up to me to tell you instead.] [I know. But... I feel like I've seen you before.] [Do you remember me?]

cards.name: Crackdown
cards.ability: If there are any active cards on the enemy Field, this card is moved to the last Slot on your Field and remains active. All Followers on your Field with "Sleep Club" in the name get ATK +2.
cards.text: [Recruiting members in front of the school gate is prohibited! And it's not even the recruitment period! Stop dozing off and tell me your names and years!]

cards.name: Countermeasure Meeting
cards.ability: If you have a Vita Character, 2 random Followers on your Field get ATK/STA increased by twice the number of Spells in the enemy Hand.
cards.text: [This is the reason this emergency meeting has been called!] [Wow! Who's this?] [So cute~] [Look here!]

cards.name: Permafrost
cards.ability: A Spell on the enemy Field with the same Slot number as this card is moved to the first empty Slot on your Field.
cards.text: [Uh... Coco, why is it so cold here?] [It seems that this room is where master Cinia is keeping her new pet...]

cards.name: Afternoon Tea Time
cards.ability: All Followers on the enemy Field get ATK/STA decreased by the number of cards in your Grave with the name "Afternoon Tea Time". A card with the name "Afternoon Tea Time" is created at the top of your Grave.
cards.text: [It's been so long since I've had tea with you like this.] [Hehe, yeah.]

cards.name: Camouflage
cards.ability: If you have an Academy Character, all Academy Spells in your Grave are removed from the game. If this happens, all Followers on the enemy Field get ATK/STA decreased by the number of cards removed.
cards.text: [To catch a tiger, you have to go to the tiger's den!] [It wasn't very long before Tomo realized this was a poor decision.]

cards.name: Missing Child Found
cards.ability: All Followers on both Fields whose DEF is less than or equal to the number of Followers on your Field get DEF -3.
cards.text: [Soma was found by Sunny and given protection.] [Soma, I'll protect you!]

cards.name: Imperial Emissary
cards.ability: 2 random Followers on your Field get ATK/STA increased by 4 minus the number of skills each Follower possesses respectively.
cards.text: [Those wings are pretty...] [Cygnus, who are those ladies?]

cards.name: Misery loves company
cards.ability: The Follower on your Field with the highest SIZE gets SIZE +3. If that Follower belongs to Crux, that Follower gets ATK/STA increased by half its new SIZE (rounding down). If that Follower's new SIZE is at least 9, it gets SIZE=3.
cards.text: [Lukif senpai, I wonder why we didn't receive the saint's blessing.] [You too... Sorry.] [Sniff...]

cards.name: Attack
cards.ability: This card has a 50% chance to be sent to the first empty Slot on the enemy Field and remain active.
cards.text: [So you're the only one left...!] [Who is it!? Where did everyone go?]

cards.name: Secret Agreement
cards.ability: A random Follower on the enemy Field gets SIZE increased by half that Follower's SIZE (rounding up). That Follower gets STA +3 and gains the following skill: "[Magic Candy] ▶Turn Start: This card's SIZE is changed to its original value."
cards.text: [You surprised me. I thought the GS had already broken up...] [The Aletheians took a hit, too, so I never expected to see you here unscathed.]

cards.name: Report
cards.ability: All Followers on the enemy Field get DEF decreased by your Shuffles. If there is a card in your Grave with the name "Report", a random Spell on the enemy Field is sent to the Grave. The first Follower on the enemy Field with a total ATK+STA of at least 23 gets ATK/STA set equal to the total SIZE of the enemy Field.
cards.text: [So things are already like this... I've already made my decision. I won't be afraid of anything. I won't hesitate anymore.]

cards.name: Congratulations!
cards.ability: 2 random Followers on the enemy Field get ATK=2, DEF=2, STA=2, or SIZE=2 (randomly). The last Follower in your Deck is sent to the top of your Deck.
cards.text: [Congratulations on the Sword Girls 2nd Anniversary!] [Please continue to give us much, much love~] [Thank you.]

cards.name: Festival Preparations
cards.ability: Both Decks are shuffled. Your Character gets LIFE +1. You get Shuffles=0~2. A random Follower in your Hand, a random Follower in your Deck, and a random Follower on your Field each get ATK +1~3/STA +1~3.
cards.text: [What should we call the song we're playing at the festival?] [Summer Machine Gun*!] [That's too tacky. Summer Machine Gun is better.] (*Korean words)

cards.name: Suit Asmis
cards.ability: The first two cards in your Deck with "Asmis" in the name are sent to the first two empty Slots in your Hand. A random Follower on the enemy Field with a SIZE less than or equal to the number of cards in your Hand with "Asmis" in the name is sent to the Grave.
cards.text: [This is the latest fashion from Miss Linda, but I wonder if I can pull it off?]

cards.name: Picnic Asmis
cards.ability: 2 random Followers on your Field get ATK +2/STA +2. If both of those Followers have "Asmis" in the name, a card with the name "Girl Detective Asmis" is created in the first empty Slot on your Field.
cards.text: [Perfect camouflage. For a detective, understanding the client's situation is useful research!]

cards.name: Suit Linus
cards.ability: A random Academy Follower on your Field gains the skill "[] ▶Attack: The defender gets STA -2.". If that Follower has "Linus" in the name, it gains the skill "[Sh... Sharp Lead!] ▶Attack: The defender gets STA -3." instead.
cards.text: [Sometimes I like clothes like this, too. But it's uncomfortable to wear every day.]

cards.name: Picnic Linus
cards.ability: A random Follower on the enemy Field gets its "Defend" skills changed to "[] ▶Defend: The attacker gets STA +1.". The first two cards in your Deck with "Linus" in the name are sent to the first two empty Slots in your Hand.
cards.text: [It's nice weather for a walk. Right, Brownie?] [...]

cards.name: Suit Rose
cards.ability: A random Crux Follower on your Field gains the skill "[Best Attack] ▶Attack: This card gets ATK +1.". If that Follower has "Rose" in the name, it gains the skill "[] ▶Attack: This card gets ATK +2." instead.
cards.text: [I don't know when I'd wear this, but the skirt is too short to sit in. Is there anything longer?]

cards.name: Picnic Rose
cards.ability: A random Follower on the enemy Field gets its "Attack" skills changed to "[] ▶Attack: The defender gets ATK +1.". The first two cards in your Deck with "Rose" in the name are sent to the first two empty Slots in your Hand.
cards.text: [Meow...] [Hehe, I'm in a good mood from the warm weather.]

cards.name: Suit Helena
cards.ability: The first two cards in your Deck with "Helena" in the name are sent to the first two empty Slots in your Hand. A number of cards equal to the number of cards in your Hand with "Helena" in the name are sent from the top of your Grave to the bottom of your Deck. This card is removed from the game.
cards.text: [I become more efficient if I dress the part when I do business... It feels like it becomes easier to organize data.]

cards.name: Picnic Helena
cards.ability: The first Follower on your Field with "Helena" in the name is sent to the bottom of your Deck. If this happens, the first Darklore Follower in your Deck is sent to the first empty Slot on your Field and gets SIZE -2/ATK +2/STA +2.
cards.text: [Going for a run on the night streets makes your idle thoughts and worries fade away like the cherry blossom leaves.] [It's still cold.]

cards.name: Cotton Candy
cards.ability: (none)
cards.text: [This is one of the foods often eaten at festivals. By heating up sugar and then letting it cool again, you can create the amazing cotton candy. Hoho, some people think that you can blow holes through it, but that isn't true.]

cards.name: Tardy
cards.ability: A random deactivated Follower on your Field is reactivated. If this happens, a random active Follower on the enemy Field is deactivated.
cards.text: [All the students remembered that day. The day when climbing over the wall was banned.]

cards.name: Close Encounter
cards.ability: All Followers on the enemy Field get DEF/STA decreased by twice their own DEF. If you have a Vita character, this card gets SIZE +2 and sent to the top of your Deck.
cards.text: [Is that a resident of this city?] [Go away!]

cards.name: Detected Offense
cards.ability: The first Follower in your Deck with the same SIZE as the first Follower on your Field is sent to the last empty Slot on your Field. If that Follower belongs to Academy, it gets ATK +2/STA +2.
cards.text: [This is the first time I've seen you, what's your name??] [T... Tomo.] [Oh my, I don't remember you. Huhu, why don't you come to my bedroom?]

cards.name: Captured Key
cards.ability: You get Shuffles=3. All cards on your Field/Hand are sent to the bottom of your Deck. All Followers on the enemy Field get STA decreased by the number of sent Academy cards.
cards.text: [What are you doing in a place like this, daughter of the Answer house. Ah, Rose called you Veltier?] […?] [It's alright. The eye of the storm is the safest, after all. Huhu.]

cards.name: Search
cards.ability: The card in your Deck with the highest SIZE is sent to the bottom of your Deck. If that card belongs to Crux, the card in your Deck with the lowest SIZE is sent to the top of your Deck.
cards.text: [Frett, you weren't at the morning roll call. What happened?] [Senpai... it's... the flag...] [Huh?!]

cards.name: Shaman's Revelation
cards.ability: You get Shuffles +1 and the enemy gets Shuffles -1. The following effects are applied depending on the Turn Number. Multiple of 2: All Followers on your Field get ATK +3. Multiple of 3: All Followers on the enemy Field get STA -5.
cards.text: [The light will always shine upon believers. Don't block out the light with doubt.]

cards.name: Mysterious Memo
cards.ability: The first Follower on your Field with "Crescent" or "Scardel" in the name is sent to the top of your Deck. If this happens, the first Follower in your Grave with "Crescent" or "Scardel" in the name is sent to the first empty Slot on your Field and gets STA increased by half the STA of the Follower that was sent to the top of your Deck (rounding up).
cards.text: [Iri found a mysterious memo in the library. It seemed to suggest a connection between Talentium and Kana.]

cards.name: Identity
cards.ability: If you have a Darklore Character, 2 Followers with the name "Zombie" are created on the enemy Field and get SIZE=1/ATK=0/DEF=1/STA=5. A random Follower on your Field gets ATK +5/STA +5 and gains the following skill: "[Crowbar] ▶Attack: If the defender's total DEF+STA is less than or equal to this card's ATK, the enemy Character gets LIFE -1. If the Turn Number is a multiple of 3, this skill is removed."
cards.text: [Even if you say that this is a weapon for fighting monsters...]

cards.name: Cooking Show
cards.ability: All Vita Followers on your Field get their original skills restored. Those Followers get SIZE decerased by the number of changed skills.
cards.text: [Who will be the winner of the 1st Bakery World Championship? Please try a piece of each participant's entry.]

cards.name: Necromancy
cards.ability: 2 Followers are created on your Field depending on the number of cards in your Field/Grave with "Occult" in the name. 0~4: Zombie (SIZE 1, 7/0/7), 5~8: Mist Lady (SIZE 2, 9/1/9), 9 or more: Devil (SIZE 3, 10/3/10).
cards.text: [What will we do if we really summon a devil?] [Don't worry. It's happened in the past before, and it was a really cute girl. Hehehe.]

cards.name: Ouija Board
cards.ability: The enemy Character gets LIFE -1. If there are at least 10 cards in your Grave with "Occult" in the name, the enemy Character gets an additional LIFE -3.
cards.text: [You have to be careful when using a Ouija Board. If you make a mistake, you'll lose your soul...] [Now that the fire's lit, shall we begin?] [Yes! Please tell us what today's dessert will be.] [...]

cards.name: Fortune Reading
cards.ability: The first card on your Field with "Occult" in the name is sent to the Grave. If this happens, 2 random cards on the enemy Field are sent to the Grave.
cards.text: [This card means... something extraordinary will happen.]

cards.name: Straw Doll
cards.ability: 2 random Followers on the enemy Field get STA decreased by half the number of cards in your Grave with "Occult" in the name (rounding up).
cards.text: [Today, we'll be doing a lot of good tests on straw doll curses.] [So, how about starting off by making pimples appear on someone's face?] [...]

cards.name: Impending Misfortune
cards.ability: Your Character gets LIFE -2. All Crux Followers on your Field get ATK doubled and get their original skills restored. Those Followers gain the following skill: "[Death] ▶Turn Start: This card is sent to the Grave."
cards.text: [Hehe... Nobody will find me here. Let's eat.] [Crash!] [?!]

cards.name: Crescent Ritual
cards.ability: All Followers on your Field/Deck with "Crescent" or "Scardel" in the name get STA +1. If those Followers have at least 10 STA, they get an additional ATK +1. If your Grave contains at least 8 cards, they get an additional STA +1.
cards.text: [Of course our power is at its peak during full moons, when we can draw in mana from our surroundings, but dark crescent moon nights are the most favorable for our activities.]

cards.name: Deal
cards.ability: If there are any Spells on the enemy Field, the first Spell in the enemy Hand is sent to the last empty Slot on the enemy Field.
cards.text: [Do you want to know where your underclassman Lucca is?] [!!!] [It won't be free. I want to go to the underground library.]

cards.name: 4th Period
cards.ability: If there are any Followers in your Hand whose SIZE is 4, your Character gets LIFE +2. 2 random Followers in your Hand get SIZE cut in half (rounding down). A card with the name "4 Messages" is created at the top of your Deck.
cards.text: [I see a hazy vision of the clock. It's lunch time. This is when all my friends wake up. But is that person over there still sleeping?]

cards.name: Chairman's Mystery
cards.ability: If the number of Spells on the enemy Field is greater than or equal to the number of Followers on the enemy Field, a random Spell on the enemy Field is sent to the Grave. The enemy Character gets LIFE decreased by the sent card's SIZE.
cards.text: [In the end, we were all drawn into that thing the chairman called "Kana". I should tell Asmis about it.]

cards.name: Forbidden Education
cards.ability: Followers on your Field with "Maid" in the name get their ATK/DEF/STA changed to the highest ATK/DEF/STA of any Followers on your Field with "Lady" in the name, while Followers on your Field with "Lady" in the name get their ATK/DEF/STA changed to the highest ATK/DEF/STA of any Followers on your Field with "Maid" in the name (these effects occur simultaneously).
cards.text: [The truth is, I'm not really a maid.] [Huhu... don't worry about that. Tomo, it's still not too late.] [Ahh... Miss Linia!]

cards.name: The Flower's Secret
cards.ability: A random Spell on the enemy Field that is not called "The Flower's Secret" is copied to the last empty Slot on your Field.
cards.text: [The mysterious flowers found in Royle City were discovered to have the ability to negate Talentium powers.]

cards.name: Inspection
cards.ability: All Followers on your Field get STA increased by the number of skills they each possess, then each Follower gains an additional copy of its first skill.
cards.text: [After the situation at the door to Kana, Jaina instituted an inspection of all the knights to put the knights back into order.]

cards.name: Really
cards.ability: 2 random Followers on the enemy Field get SIZE +1. If those Followers' STA are greater than their original values, they get an additional STA -5.
cards.text: [It... it was really this path...] [Is... is it okay to leave it to Conundrum?] [Eheh I think I messed up!] [All you have to say is "Eheh"!?]

cards.name: Tragedy of the Crowbar
cards.ability: If there are at least 2 cards on your Field that belong to the same faction as your Character, a random card on the enemy Field is sent to the bottom of the enemy Deck. If the sent card is a Follower, it gets STA +3. If it is a Spell, it gets SIZE -1.
cards.text: [Oh my... could it be that those monsters were actually this cute! I've made a terrible mistake!]

cards.name: Tapestry Coupon
cards.ability: (none)
cards.text: [This is a tapestry coupon for the big summer merchandise of Sword Girls.]

cards.name: Tumbler Coupon
cards.ability: (none)
cards.text: [This is a tumbler coupon for the big summer merchandise of Sword Girls.]

cards.name: Tapestry Coupon
cards.ability: (none)
cards.text: [This is a tapestry coupon for the big summer merchandise of Sword Girls.]

cards.name: Tumbler Coupon
cards.ability: (none)
cards.text: [This is a tumbler coupon for the big summer merchandise of Sword Girls.]

cards.name: Awakened Luthica
cards.ability: A number of cards with the name "Good Job" equal to the SIZE of a random Spell in the enemy Hand are created at the top of the enemy Deck.
cards.text: [Luthica recalled memories of Creuset and calmed her mind. She unlocked her true powers of Talentium.] [My will has changed. I will overwhelm you!]

cards.name: Sita r'Tha
cards.ability: All Followers on both Fields get SIZE changed to their original values.
cards.text: [A wise man called Siddhartha once lived in the far East.] [Sita? R'Tha?] [No. Siddhartha.]

cards.name: What day is today?
cards.ability: A random Spell in the enemy Hand is copied to a random location in your Deck.
cards.text: [It's the 21st. Number 21, stand up and read this.]

cards.name: Sita's Dream
cards.ability: The Follower on your Field with the highest SIZE gets SIZE -1/ATK +2/DEF +2/STA +2. If that Follower's SIZE is 2 or less, this card is sent to the top of your Deck.
cards.text: [Sita had a dream where she could summon any food she wanted. It would have been better if Vernika were there, too.]

cards.name: Requirements of a Lady
cards.ability: All Spells on the enemy Field with a SIZE less than the number of Followers on your Field with "Lady" in the name are sent to the top of the enemy Deck.
cards.text: [If you want to become a lady, you have to first change your clothes.] [Even if it's my trademark?] [... Yes.]

cards.name: Maid Education
cards.ability: The Follower on your Field with the lowest STA and "Lady" in the name is sent to the bottom of your Deck. If this happens, a random Follower in your Hand with "Maid" in the name is sent to the previous Follower's old Slot on your Field.
cards.text: [Master Cinia. You're finally ready. Go for it.] [Even so, there's no need for me to infiltrate my sister's mansion.]

cards.name: Reclaimed Peace
cards.ability: All Followers on the enemy Field get ATK/STA decreased by twice the number of cards on your Field.
cards.text: [After putting many hardships behind her, Rose finally found rest.]

cards.name: Knight Veltier
cards.ability: All Followers on your Field whose SIZE and Slot Number are both odd or both even get DEF +2.
cards.text: [This bread is mine.]

cards.name: Work
cards.ability: A Follower on your Field with 0 or less DEF gets DEF changed to half that Follower's SIZE (rounding up).
cards.text: [Work on a holiday. Pintail's melancholy deepened.]

cards.name: Frontier Luthica
cards.ability: The Follower on your Field with the lowest STA is sent to the Grave. The first Followers in your Field and Hand get STA increased by the sent Follower's original STA.
cards.text: [I have no other choice but to draw my sword.]

cards.name: Expressing Discontent
cards.ability: A random Follower on your Field gets STA +2 and is sent to the top of your Deck. If this happens, a random Follower on the enemy Field gets STA -2 and is sent to the top of the enemy Deck.
cards.text: [Seriously! Doesn't she know what it means to be a leader? While the rest of us are working hard, she just goes around and has fun. Right?] [Ahaha... That's. So. True.]

cards.name: Declaration
cards.ability: If there are any Spells on the enemy Field, a random Follower in the enemy Grave is sent to the first empty Slot on your Field and gains the following skill: "[Death] ▶Turn Start: This card is sent to the Grave."
cards.text: [Does the God that you believe in really exist? Gather before me. I will become the God of your new world.]

cards.name: Swimwear Master Vernika
cards.ability: The last Spell in the enemy Grave is copied to the top of your Deck. All Followers on your Field get ATK/STA increased by the copied card's SIZE.
cards.text: [Sita... Sorry, but I can't go to the swimming pool during the day anymore... But don't worry, the swimming pool is also very beautiful at night. Would you like to find out for yourself?]

cards.name: Shrinking Curse
cards.ability: 2 random Neutral cards in your Hand get SIZE -1. A random Neutral Follower on your Field gets ATK/STA increased by half the total SIZE of the previous 2 Neutral cards (rounding down).
cards.text: [W... Wait! Don't panic! This is clearly someone's trap! A trap!]

cards.name: Price
cards.ability: All Followers on your Field get STA +3. This card gets SIZE=8~10, is sent to the last empty Slot on your Field, and remains active. If this card's SIZE is at least 8, both players get Shuffles set equal to this card's SIZE minus 8 instead.
cards.text: [Do you desire power? Then, do you have the courage to pay the price?]

cards.name: High Sense
cards.ability: All Followers on your Field are deactivated. All Followers on the enemy Field get ATK/STA decreased by 1.5 times the number of deactivated Followers (rounding up). This card gets SIZE=1 and remains active. If this card's SIZE is 1, all Followers on your Field are reactivated instead.
cards.text: [When an almond dies, it becomes a die-mond. So, what does fire become when it dies? Take a guess.]

cards.name: Crimson God of Destruction
cards.ability: The follower on your Field with the lowest STA gains the skill "[Death] ▶Defend: This card is destroyed.". 3 random Followers in the enemy Deck gain the skill "[Death] ▶Defend: This card is destroyed.".
cards.text: [It means "Crimson light" (Rubylight) and "God of Destruction" (Shiva). Doesn't it suit me? ... Wait, why are you looking at me like that? It's not chuu2! No way!]

cards.name: In the name of the queen
cards.ability: All cards in both Fields and Hands get SIZE changed to their original values. All Followers on the enemy Field get ATK/STA decreased by the total change in SIZE (if you have an Academy Character) or half the total change in SIZE (rounding down, if you do not have an Academy Character).
cards.text: [Queen! Queen! Queen! Queen Xiaomei~~~!] [Why are so many perverted perverts gathering in this commoner cafe?!]

cards.name: One day in a class room
cards.ability: If you have a Crux Character, all Followers on the enemy Field are deactivated and gain the skill "[Wander] ▶Defend: This card is moved to a random empty Slot on either Field. This skill is removed."
cards.text: [...Idiot, I'm serious. I want to continue from that day.] [That was a dream.]

cards.name: Like the tempting shadow of the night
cards.ability: All cards in the enemy Grave that belong to a different faction than then enemy Character are removed from the game. The enemy Character gets LIFE decreased by the number of removed cards (by a maximum of 3). If the number of removed cards was 5 or less, all Followers in your Hand and Field get ATK +2/STA +2. If the number of removed cards was 5 or more, a random Spell on the enemy Field is sent to the Grave.
cards.text: [I'm not embarrassed. I just want to do fun things with you.] [That was a dream.]

cards.name: Sword
cards.ability: (none)
cards.text: [A sword made of Talentium. Everyone has forgotten where this metal came from. More importantly, it is almost frightening how obsessed people are with it. -Esprit's memo...] [Location: Season 1 dungeon clears and Fight]

cards.name: Glasses
cards.ability: (none)
cards.text: [Talentium has found its way into our everyday lives. Because the metal is easily processed, people began mixing it into all kinds of objects. -Esprit's memo...] [Location: Season 1 dungeon clears and Fight]

cards.name: Shoes
cards.ability: (none)
cards.text: [Heels are added to raise the wearer's eye level. However, it's hard to say if girls want to see higher or if they just want to have more pride. Regardless, I prefer comfortable shoes. -Esprit's memo...] [Location: Season 1 dungeon clears and Fight]

cards.name: Stockings
cards.ability: (none)
cards.text: [Socks used to be just another garment to keep oneself warm, but now they have a variety of appearances. At some point, their purpose changed. I like the overknee type with a ribbon. -Esprit's memo...] [Location: Season 1 dungeon clears and Fight]

cards.name: Ribbon
cards.ability: (none)
cards.text: [It's a long piece of cloth used to tie things. You can use it to tie a variety of things. You could wrap a package, or you could tie your hair with it. Last week, I used a ribbon to wrap a present for my neighbor's daughter's birthday. -Esprit's memo...] [Location: Season 1 dungeon clears and Fight]

cards.name: Cat Doll
cards.ability: (none)
cards.text: [It's a cat doll that looks like it's out of a fairy tale. I gave one to my neighbor's daughter for her birthday. She often talks to it, and she frequently has conversations with it over tea. -Esprit's memo...] [Location: Season 1 dungeon clears and Fight]

cards.name: Book
cards.ability: (none)
cards.text: [It's been a few years since I started writing notes so I wouldn't forget things. However, as the notes began piling up, it became difficult to organize them. These days, I don't remember where I wrote what. -Esprit's memo...] [Location: Season 1 dungeon clears and Fight]

cards.name: Red Ore
cards.ability: (none)
cards.text: [Talentium does not have a fixed color. In some places, red Talentium can be found. Some time ago, the Monster Hunter Bureau reported that some monsters carry Talentium. -Esprit's memo...]

cards.name: Green Ore
cards.ability: (none)
cards.text: [Talentium does not have a fixed color. In some places, green Talentium can be found. Some time ago, the Monster Hunter Bureau reported that some monsters carry Talentium. -Esprit's memo...]

cards.name: White Ore
cards.ability: (none)
cards.text: [Talentium does not have a fixed color. In some places, white Talentium can be found. Some time ago, the Monster Hunter Bureau reported that some monsters carry Talentium. -Esprit's memo...]

cards.name: Blue Ore
cards.ability: (none)
cards.text: [Talentium does not have a fixed color. In some places, blue Talentium can be found. Some time ago, the Monster Hunter Bureau reported that some monsters carry Talentium. -Esprit's memo...]

cards.name: Black Ore
cards.ability: (none)
cards.text: [Talentium does not have a fixed color. In some places, black Talentium can be found. Some time ago, the Monster Hunter Bureau reported that some monsters carry Talentium. -Esprit's memo...]

cards.name: Ruins Fragment
cards.ability: (none)
cards.text: [This is a strange stone fragment found at the frontier ruins. The stone's cleavage which is unlike any other on the continent and the remarkable architecture of the ruins offer evidence that these ruins are not a part of this continent's history. -Esprit's memo...] [Location: Frontier Ruins]

cards.name: Heart Stone
cards.ability: (none)
cards.text: [The mana of witches is trapped within witches. It cannot leave through the witches' own power. In order for a witch's mana to interact with the world's mana, they created this artifact, a witch's heart, or a heart stone. -Esprit's memo...] [Location: Witch's Tower, Shadowland]

cards.name: Holy Beast Tear
cards.ability: (none)
cards.text: [Holy water tears are an important material in the creation of the knights' proof of knighthood. They're called holy, but when you see "her" shed her tears, it brings doubt to whether or not "holy" is the appropriate word. -Esprit's memo...] [Location: Crux Training Camp]

cards.name: Bamboo
cards.ability: (none)
cards.text: [Bamboo Scent is famous for its abundant bamboo and exotic scenery, so it is always packed with people. However, bamboo never grew here originally, so who could have brought it here? -Esprit's memo...] [Location: Bamboo Scent]

cards.name: Lily
cards.ability: (none)
cards.text: [The symbolic flower of the Pacifica family. Every Pacifica's house is adorned with this flower. It sometimes makes me laugh a little because the flower matches their preferences. -Esprit's memo...] [Location: Linia's House]

cards.name: Blood Pack
cards.ability: (none)
cards.text: [These blood packs are the Darklore's first step toward an organized system of distributing blood. The Scardel and Crescent elders periodically make rounds to administer the flow of blood packs. -Esprit's memo...] [Location: Land of Vampires, Goddess Tower]

cards.name: Seal of Approval
cards.ability: (none)
cards.text: ["Good~ Job! -Homeroom teacher" I recall the bittersweet memories of working hard to get these stamps. -Esprit's memo...] [Location: Vita High School]

cards.name: Spiral Fragment
cards.ability: (none)
cards.text: [One of the abnormalities of the picturesque world. I don't know the reason for each world's existence, but this ore scattered here and there is evidence that this world is unusual. This world's abnormality takes the shape of a spiral ore. -DKD's report] [Location: Dream Island, Picturesque World]

cards.name: Talentium Pearl
cards.ability: (none)
cards.text: [There are many ways to refine Talentium, and there are many appearances that the refined Talentium ends up taking. One manufacturer refines Talentium into a marble shape. Ultimately, though, they all end up as cards. The consumers' tastes are important, after all. -Esprit's memo]

cards.name: Dagger
cards.ability: (none)
cards.text: [A dagger made of Talentium. Research on Talentium has been accelerating. Academics are now beginning to research methods to utilize the energy within Talentium. -Esprit's memo] [Location: Season 2 dungeon clears and Fight]

cards.name: Panda Doll
cards.ability: (none)
cards.text: [A panda doll. This animal can't be seen anywhere in the alliance. This doll is patterned after the pet of the Pacifica household. The Pacificas receive royalties for every sale of this doll. -Esprit's memo] [Location: Season 2 dungeon clears and Fight]

cards.name: Playing Cards
cards.ability: (none)
cards.text: [A 52-card set. A variety of games can be played with it. Countless tears and laughter have arisen from these paper cards. Even though I'm also human, I'm always amused at how interesting humans are. -Esprit's memo] [Location: Season 2 dungeon clears and Fight]

cards.name: Gloves
cards.ability: (none)
cards.text: [What do you suppose they were used for first? To prevent your hands from getting dirty, or for helping with work? I still don't understand the minds of those who want to wear extravagant and flashy things. -Esprit's memo] [Location: Season 2 dungeon clears and Fight]

cards.name: Perfume
cards.ability: (none)
cards.text: [Because people wanted a distinct smell from their bodies, perfume was born. I don't really understand why they would. I don't recall ever seeing Rio put perfume on herself, but for some reason, I could sense a soft scent from her. How mysterious. -Esprit's memo] [Location: Season 2 dungeon clears and Fight]

cards.name: Lipstick
cards.ability: (none)
cards.text: [This is the most troublesome tool for Rio when she goes out. She tries to get the color just right, and she fusses a lot over putting it on. -Esprit's memo] [Location: Season 2 dungeon clears and Fight]

cards.name: Pendant
cards.ability: (none)
cards.text: [A necklace. I've seen Rio wearing one before. However, it really annoys me that she usually only shows the string, and you can't see the ornament. I feel like she's doing it on purpose. -Esprit's memo] [Location: Season 2 dungeon clears and Fight]

cards.name: Aletheian Brick
cards.ability: (none)
cards.text: [A brick inscribed with the symbol of the Aletheian. It's well known that when the underground church was built, each brick was created and placed one by one. As it turns out, though, these particular bricks were made to order by the alliance's brick making industry. -Esprit's memo] [Location: Catacombs]

cards.name: Blue Coin
cards.ability: (none)
cards.text: [A blue, shiny coin. It seems like you can use this at the coin shop.]

cards.name: Yellow Coin
cards.ability: (none)
cards.text: [A yellow, shiny coin. It seems like you can use this at the coin shop.]

cards.name: Red Coin
cards.ability: (none)
cards.text: [A red, shiny coin. It seems like you can use this at the coin shop.]

cards.name: Pass
cards.ability: (none)
cards.text: [This pass certifies you to enter the ruins.] [Location: Ancient Sanctuary]

cards.name: Number Slip
cards.ability: (none)
cards.text: [A receipt from the SS Detective Agency. This thing is unique to that place. You take a receipt and leave, then you send a letter with your request to a designated address. I've also tried sending a few letters for fun, but they ignored them all... It seems like this is to keep other similar businesses in check... -Esprit's memo...] [Location: SS Detective Agency]

cards.name: Chocolate
cards.ability: (none)
cards.text: [This... Have you received it before? I have. But it didn't really make me happy. Regardless of how I felt, I discovered that the chocolate was, in fact, sweet. -Esprit's complaint...] [Location: Chocolate Factory]

cards.name: Cat Paw Stamp
cards.ability: (none)
cards.text: [A document with the paw print of a cute animal. It says that it was made by the Student Council.] [Location: Cat Pursuit]

cards.name: Candy
cards.ability: (none)
cards.text: [Delicious candy. A must-have for girls.]

cards.name: Library Index Card
cards.ability: (none)
cards.text: [This card is issued by the librarian when books are borrowed from the library.] [Location: Underground Library]

cards.name: Mystery Parchment
cards.ability: (none)
cards.text: [It's a game that's been passed down from the ancient times. This parchment is a record of the strategies that ancient mages used in their sacred battles, carried out in a certain place to ensure a fair duel. The ravine that served as the fierce battlefield has still not been located to this day. -Esprit's memo] [Location: Underground Altar]

cards.name: Police Notebook
cards.ability: (none)
cards.text: [This is the identification possessed by the members of the Royle Police Force. It is a serious problem if someone unaffiliated with the police comes into possession of one of these.] [Location: Royle City]

cards.name: Copper Talentium
cards.ability: (none)
cards.text: [A rare Talentium with a copper glow.]

cards.name: Silver Talentium
cards.ability: (none)
cards.text: [Silver Talentium can be obtained by refining copper Talentium.]

cards.name: Gold Talentium
cards.ability: (none)
cards.text: [Golden Talentium can be obtained by refining silver Talentium.]

cards.name: Black Lion's Claw
cards.ability: (none)
cards.text: [A claw from the mysterious Black Lion, who resembled Nold. Its strength exceeds that of ordinary Talentium.]

cards.name: Replica Stick
cards.ability: (none)
cards.text: [A souvenir from the Muzisitter Land. Highly recommended for girls aiming to join Muzisitter!] [Location: Muzisitter Land]

cards.name: Commemorative Medal
cards.ability: (none)
cards.text: [A medal that shines gold. Where did you get this?] [Location: Weekly the Legend]

cards.name: Dimensional Fragment
cards.ability: (none)
cards.text: [Kana's Spiral Fragments that had been discovered in various places suddenly transformed, and they began to be discovered more frequenly.] [Location: Dimensional Rift]

cards.name: Kana's Fragment
cards.ability: (none)
cards.text: [Whether this is a fragment that came out from Kana or a fragment of Kana itself, we don't know. But one thing is certain: the Kana from our imaginations does not exist.] [Location: Altar of Kana]

cards.name: Rapier
cards.ability: (none)
cards.text: [A long sword with a sharp tip. This is a weapon for quick attacks to subdue your opponent. -Esprit's notebook] [Location: Season 2 dungeon clears and Fight]

cards.name: Rabbit Doll
cards.ability: (none)
cards.text: [The most popular ragdoll among girls. However, girls are not afraid of giant rabbits. -Esprit's notebook] [Location: Season 2 dungeon clears and Fight]

cards.name: Diary
cards.ability: (none)
cards.text: [Girls write about their days and their dreams for the next day in this small notebook. They hope that tomorrow will be a little better than today. -Esprit's notebook] [Location: Season 2 dungeon clears and Fight] [Location: Season 2 dungeon clears and Fight]

cards.name: Earring
cards.ability: (none)
cards.text: [Earrings represent a sacrifice for the sake of beauty. Long-term beauty in exchange for short-term pain. -Esprit's notebook] [Location: Season 2 dungeon clears and Fight]

cards.name: Compact Powder
cards.ability: (none)
cards.text: [During the process of becoming an adult, powder is the biggest difficulty. Of course, it's best if they don't use it at the beginning, but... -Esprit's notebook] [Location: Season 2 dungeon clears and Fight]

cards.name: Mystery Flower
cards.ability: (none)
cards.text: [An unidentified breed of flower that was discovered around Royle City.] [Location: Attack on Royle]

cards.name: Pumpkin Pumpkin
cards.ability: (none)
cards.text: [Look at this Shion, it's a pumpkin!] [It's not a pumpkin, it's a pumpkin pumpkin!] [What's that?] [I dunno! You carry it]

cards.name: Tea Leaf
cards.ability: (none)
cards.text: [This is a leaf used to make tea. Depending on the way it's processed, it can be used to make green tea or black tea. You make tea by boiling the tea leaf in a teapot.] [Location: The Golden Cradle.]

cards.name: Mystery Card
cards.ability: (none)
cards.text: [This is a card possessed by those called outsiders. It can't be found anywhere in this world. In their world, this card is used in various games.] [Location: GS City]

cards.name: Bandage
cards.ability: (none)
cards.text: [This is a sterile cloth used to wrap wounds. There's a surprising amount of people who think that wounds will heal just by bandaging them.] [Location: Vengeful Journey]

cards.name: Snowman
cards.ability: (none)
cards.text: [This is one of the popular winter pastimes involving snow, alongside snowball fights. At the end of the winter, these snowmen return to the earth whence they came.] [Location: Snow Fairy's Visit]

cards.name: Boxed Chocolate
cards.ability: (none)
cards.text: [This is chocolate from Royle City, popular even in Bakery City. Just looking at the chocolate is enough to get you excited. If you were to eat it for real, the sweetness would make your heart rush.]

cards.name: Incense Burner
cards.ability: (none)
cards.text: [This is a strange incense burner found where Linia's maids reside. If you deeply take in the scent, you'll experience a wonderful feeling.] [Location: Comfort Room]

cards.name: Mileage Card
cards.ability: (none)
cards.text: [This is a mileage card awarded as a bonus for bulk purchases in the booster shop.]

cards.name: Copper Medal
cards.ability: (none)
cards.text: [This is a copper medal that went missing from the Empire's laboratories. It is bestowed upon individuals in the Empire who make great contributions.] [Location: Empire Laboratory A]

cards.name: Silver Medal
cards.ability: (none)
cards.text: [This is a silver medal that went missing from the Empire's laboratories. It is given to people who have achieved great things in the Empire, but it is unknown why there are so many of these in the laboratories.] [Location: Empire Laboratory B]

cards.name: Gold Medal
cards.ability: (none)
cards.text: [This is a gold medal that went missing from the Empire's laboratories. It is bestowed upon individuals who have performed the greatest merits for the Empire. If you gather all three types of medals, something special might happen.] [Location: Empire Laboratory C]

cards.name: Follower Upgrade Ticket
cards.ability: (none)
cards.text: [This ticket allows you to upgrade any follower from level 0 to level 1.]

cards.name: Mysterious Hairball
cards.ability: (none)
cards.text: [This is a furry hairball from the mysterious organisms living in the underground city.] [Location: Underground City]

cards.name: Cook Club Student
cards.ability: [I'll do my best!] ▶Attack: If the enemy Character is an NPC, this card gets ATK +1.
cards.text: [Hehe this apron is pretty! I've dreamt of cooking like this since I was young.]

cards.name: Cook Club Advisor
cards.ability: [Best Defense] ▶Defend: This card gets STA +2.
cards.text: [You only make bread... I'd like to eat something other than sweets sometimes.]

cards.name: New Cook Club Student
cards.ability: [Can I visit?] ▶Turn Start: A random Follower on your Field with "Cook Club" in the name gets ATK +1/STA +1.
cards.text: [Hello~. Hm? Why does it smell like baking cookies... isn't this the Cook Club?]

cards.name: Cook Club Svia
cards.ability: [Iron Saucepan] ▶Attack: This card gets ATK increased by its DEF.
cards.text: [Sita is the heroine who saved Bakery Town.]

cards.name: Cook Club Dir. Jamie
cards.ability: [Best Condition] ▶Attack: A special power is activated if the enemy Character is an NPC. (Hidden effect: This card gets ATK +1/STA +1)
cards.text: [Sita, won't you try cooking today? We are the Cook Club after all. It's important to put the effort and joy into cooking things for others to eat.]

cards.name: Cook Club Katie
cards.ability: [Best taste ever!] ▶Attack: This card gets DEF +1/STA -1 (no effect if STA=1).
cards.text: [This food is my own work. How is it? It's worthy of eating, right?]

cards.name: Cook Club Sylphie
cards.ability: [Best Attack] ▶Attack: This card gets ATK +1.
cards.text: [This isn't a bakery!!! You have to cook something else properly!!!]

cards.name: Cook Club Linfield
cards.ability: (none)
cards.text: [What's wrong with just baking sweets? Isn't it fine if others enjoy our food?]

cards.name: Latecomer
cards.ability: (none)
cards.text: [Late students always look the same. Of course, you might think it's only your imagination. In particular, holding a piece of bread in their mouths while running to school.]

cards.name: Basketball Player
cards.ability: (none)
cards.text: [Friendship! Effort! Victory! Sparkle with growth, everyone! We'll try hard today!]

cards.name: Kouhai
cards.ability: (none)
cards.text: [Vernika senpai, are you going? Can you bring me with you? I want to see those monsters with my own eyes!]

cards.name: 2S Assistant Asmis
cards.ability: [Best Attack] ▶Attack: This card gets ATK +1.
cards.text: [Talk to us whenever you want. Boys and girls, young and old, the SS detective agency will ask no questions. We will solve everything! Hehe, how is it? Interested?]

cards.name: Rainy Girl
cards.ability: (none)
cards.text: [This morning, I thought that it would definitely rain today. Bringing an umbrella was the right choice. Whenever I think it will rain, it always does.]

cards.name: Prefect Layna
cards.ability: [Proper Behavior] ▶Defend: This card gets STA increased by 1 + the number of cards in your Hand.
cards.text: [Hey! Don't mess up your skirt! Use your common sense and behave properly!]

cards.name: Lib. Lucca
cards.ability: (none)
cards.text: [Vernika senpai! Don't just read books every day! Help the Lib. sort the books, too!! How much work are you going to make for your cute underclassmen?]

cards.name: Lib. Serie
cards.ability: [Book's Wrath!] ▶Attack: This card gets ATK increased by the number of cards in your Hand with "Lib." in the name.
cards.text: [That Vernika, hasn't she been hanging out with the Cook Club too much lately? She needs to be careful...]

cards.name: Lib. Lindt
cards.ability: (none)
cards.text: [People who haven't returned their books need to be warned. Hm? What's this book?]

cards.name: Lib. Vernika
cards.ability: [Best Defense] ▶Defend: This card gets STA +2.
cards.text: [The world of books is really infinite. Do you read books, Sita?]

cards.name: Gardener Maid
cards.ability: [I'll do my best!] ▶Attack: If the enemy Character is an NPC, this card gets ATK +1.
cards.text: [Master Cinia, the head maid asked me to tell you that lunch is ready... Yes? Precious pet #2 is missing? Yes, I am in charge of the garden, but... I'm Rose's maid, so I don't really know about it. I will look for it.]

cards.name: New Maid
cards.ability: [Best Defense] ▶Defend: This card gets STA +2.
cards.text: [Um, senpai. How should I clean this? Wow~ this vase... looks expensive.]

cards.name: Guard Maid
cards.ability: [Maid Cross] ▶Turn Start: A random Follower on your Field with "Maid" in the name gets ATK +1/STA +1.
cards.text: [I will do my best for Cinia's safety. "You should also ensure the safety of my furniture and pottery!"]

cards.name: Porter Maid
cards.ability: [Maid Unity!] ▶Turn Start: A random Follower on your Field with "Maid" in the name gets SIZE -1.
cards.text: [Master Cinia! Where are you going? I will go with you! For a maid that always stays inside, there is nothing more exciting than going out with her master!]

cards.name: Head Maid
cards.ability: [Best Condition] ▶Attack: A special power is activated if the enemy Character is an NPC. (Hidden effect: This card gets ATK +1/STA +1)
cards.text: [Um... so... why should I be in charge of the vacations and salaries of Cinia's maids?]

cards.name: Chief Maid
cards.ability: [Maid's Wisdom] ▶Attack: The first Spell in your Hand is sent to the Grave. If this happens, this card gets ATK +2.
cards.text: [Senpai, don't forget that you are the leader of the maids. So, please give me a vacation next week.]

cards.name: Mop Maid
cards.ability: [Mop Slash] ▶Defend: This card and adjacent Followers get ATK +1.
cards.text: [When will I get to graduate from mopping... it'd be nice if a new maid came... but it won't happen... probably.]

cards.name: Tailor Maid
cards.ability: (none)
cards.text: [Her curtains are red, her dresses are red, her carpets are red... Aaah... For goodness sake, master Cina... save me.]

cards.name: Burning Guardian
cards.ability: (none)
cards.text: [What? I was hired to protect, but the contract doesn't say anything about being careful about the surroundings. Who cares if I burn it all.]

cards.name: Ward Caster
cards.ability: (none)
cards.text: [This magic is as firm as a shield. Step back. I will protect you.]

cards.name: Aristocrat Girl
cards.ability: [Noblesse!] ▶Attack: If the defender's DEF is at least 2, the defender gets STA -3.
cards.text: [This one is boring, too... this book is boring, why can't you write a good story? I was an idiot for expecting anything from you. You're fired, just leave.]

cards.name: Inscribing Magician
cards.ability: (none)
cards.text: [This place has been inscribed with a spell with a certain condition. When you pass, don't stop talking. Silence is the trigger.]

cards.name: Apprentice
cards.ability: (none)
cards.text: [Eh? What happened? This isn't what the book said would happen. What is this... it's scary...]

cards.name: Relena
cards.ability: (none)
cards.text: [I don't know much about the outside world... I just know you will protect me.]

cards.name: Private Maid
cards.ability: [True Caring] ▶Turn Start: A random Follower on the enemy Field gets ATK -1.
cards.text: [Why was I hired separately from the other maids? Master Rose...?] [I had... a place I had to go for a little while. That's all.]

cards.name: Senpai Maid
cards.ability: [I'll do my best] ▶Defend: This card gets ATK +1/STA +2.
cards.text: [Don't rush, take your time. If you try to learn everything about the mansion at once, you'll get dizzy. Learn everything one by one... okay?]

cards.name: Striker
cards.ability: [Fireball!] ▶Attack: The defender gets STA -1.
cards.text: [I have nothing to say to villains. Questions are useless. This heat can burn everything!]

cards.name: Inspiration Lady
cards.ability: (none)
cards.text: [I have a feeling that a sign will fall here tomorrow. A person will fall from a great height. You are clearly... a Crux knight.]

cards.name: New Knight
cards.ability: [I'll do my best!] ▶Attack: If the enemy Character is an NPC, this card gets ATK +1.
cards.text: [I'll be fighting alongside you, senpais! Pleased to meet you! This sword? It was given to me by someone I respect a lot. I treat it like I treat my own body!]

cards.name: Medic Knight Sillit
cards.ability: [Best Defense] ▶Defend: This card gets STA +2.
cards.text: [Is anyone injured? Let's take a break here for a while. The injured should wait here to rejoin the second group!]

cards.name: Flag Knight Frett
cards.ability: [Flag Return] ▶Attack: The Follower in Slot 3 of your Field gets ATK +1/STA +1.
cards.text: [Is this place fine? Ah~ No matter how you look at it, the emblem of the knights is so cool, Luthica senpai!]

cards.name: Knight Adjt. Sarisen
cards.ability: [Sisters in Arms] ▶Turn Start: All Followers on your Field with "Knight" in the name except this one get ATK +1/STA +1.
cards.text: [Don't think of weakening the vampires as difficult. Eliminate the leader. Focus on finding the leader, Luthica.]

cards.name: Crux Knight Mytyl
cards.ability: [Best Condition] ▶Attack: A special power is activated if the enemy Character is an NPC. (Hidden effect: This card gets ATK +1/STA +1)
cards.text: [Nobody had interest in where I was or what I did. It was like they couldn't see me. I never thought my thin existence would help anyone, Luthica.]

cards.name: Crux Knight Pintail
cards.ability: [Overpower!] ▶Defend: If the attacker's SIZE is less than this card's SIZE, this card gets ATK +1/DEF +1.
cards.text: [You who wander through the sacred night and desire blood... cannot be forgiven!]

cards.name: Guard Knight
cards.ability: (none)
cards.text: [Whew... when will someone take over my post...]

cards.name: Crux Knight Terra
cards.ability: [Knight's Will!] ▶Turn Start: A random Follower on your Field with "Knight" in the name gets ATK +2/STA +2. This skill is removed.
cards.text: [I hate it... I can't fight anymore... I just want peace...]

cards.name: Saint Sword Girl
cards.ability: (none)
cards.text: [Protecting the seminarian cadets is my duty.]

cards.name: Messenger Knight
cards.ability: (none)
cards.text: [I just have to deliver this letter to the empire? Hehe, piece of cake! Is this really all you have for me? I'll be back, Jaina!]

cards.name: Priestess
cards.ability: [Healing Prayer] ▶Defend: Your Character gets LIFE +1.
cards.text: [The belief in the same thing is what ties us all together. Never forget the conviction of your belief.]

cards.name: Seminarian
cards.ability: (none)
cards.text: [We start each day with the hope that our faith does not waver. If I grasp this cross tightly, I feel something in my heart growing.]

cards.name: Apprentice Nun
cards.ability: (none)
cards.text: [When I see a clean church, for some reason my heart also feels clean. As I sweep away the dust, I feel the dust in my heart also get swept away.]

cards.name: Seeker Sienfield
cards.ability: (none)
cards.text: [Are you interested? This is magic paid for by blood. Can you use it anyway, even though it's human blood?]

cards.name: Seeker Amethystar
cards.ability: [Holy Heal] ▶Defend: If the Turn Number is odd, this card gets STA +3.
cards.text: [Lydia, why are you like that? I'm also interested. This is worth investigating. It just happens to be raining, too.]

cards.name: Seeker Lydia
cards.ability: [Cross] ▶Attack: If there are at least 2 Crux cards on your Field, the defender gets ATK -1/DEF -2/ATK -1.
cards.text: [It is not the time to be hasty. First is investigating the knights. Moving will come afterwards.]

cards.name: Acolyte
cards.ability: [Holy Peace] ▶Turn Start: If the Turn Number is even, all Crux Followers on your Field get ATK +2/STA +2.
cards.text: [It isn't time for Mass yet. Could you come back again when the church bell rings?]

cards.name: Crux Faithful
cards.ability: (none)
cards.text: [I wanted to think by myself, so I came but... unfortunately, I was too early. I wonder why I came so early...?]

cards.name: Crescent Conundrum
cards.ability: [I'll do my best!] ▶Attack: If the enemy Character is an NPC, this card gets ATK +1.
cards.text: [It's the long-awaited Flina's quiz game! Who will be the one to unravel these riddles! I, Conundrum, will represent the Crescents!!]

cards.name: Scardel Chardonnay
cards.ability: [Best Defense] ▶Defend: This card gets STA +2.
cards.text: [Special wine can be your best friend during the night. Isn't there a wine that you like? Of course, I don't drink wine.]

cards.name: Scardel Sion Flina
cards.ability: [Shion Attack!] ▶Attack: All Followers on your Field with "Shion Flina" or "Rion Flina" in the name get ATK +1.
cards.text: [Listen, I don't want to get caught up in your tasteless pranks. If you want to play pranks, then scare people along the night road.]

cards.name: Scardel Rion Flina
cards.ability: [Rion Defense!] ▶Defend: All Followers on your Field with "Shion Flina" or "Rion Flina" in the name get STA +1.
cards.text: [Shion! Shion! I just thought of a really awesome prank! How is it? How is it?]

cards.name: Scardel Pinot Noir
cards.ability: [Best Condition] ▶Attack: A special power is activated if the enemy Character is an NPC. (Hidden effect: This card gets ATK +1/STA +1)
cards.text: [An aged smell, a unique taste, this wine is perfect in every way. Of course, humans don't call it wine. This is wine to us. It flows through your body. Sweet wine...]

cards.name: Moondancer Kata Flina
cards.ability: [Moonlight Dancer!] ▶Turn Start: 2 random Followers on the enemy Field get ATK -1/STA -1.
cards.text: [To the audience, with your eyes sparkling in the moonlight, how is it? Won't you do it as well? You will be wonderful props on this stage, your blood... hehe.]

cards.name: Crescent Kris Flina
cards.ability: (none)
cards.text: [Conundrum, when will you stop talking to yourself? You should try going to the quiz game with everyone. How about it?]

cards.name: Crescent Nyetimber
cards.ability: [Heavy Burden] ▶Attack: The defender gets SIZE +1. This skill is removed.
cards.text: [Conundrum is still young, if she goes to the night quiz game, I'm 100% sure she'll fail. She's still a little shorty... hmph.]

cards.name: Scardel Merlot
cards.ability: (none)
cards.text: [Tell me anything. I will listen to your worries, too. Of course, I can't always guarantee a solution. Hehehe.]

cards.name: Scardel Carmenere
cards.ability: (none)
cards.text: [It's not good to keep worries to yourself. Have you tried talking to Merlot?]

cards.name: Scardel Shiraz
cards.ability: [Night's Domain] ▶Turn Start: If there are at least 2 Darklore Followers on your Field, a random Follower on the enemy Field gets STA -2.

From the beginning, this "Glass Library" publisher was suspicious. I'm going to reject all of these cobalt books. Come on, you're the assistant librarian!]

cards.text: [Oh, are you the new transfer student? Do you like spicy food?]

cards.ability: [Awakening of Power!] ▶Attack: This card gets ATK +2.
