cards.text: [We are the Lib. Rangers who uphold the justice of the library! Even though we can't shoot beams, we're still strong!]

cards.name: Rich Lady
cards.ability: [Hire Maids!] ▶Defend: A random Follower in your Grave with "Maid" in the name is sent to the first empty Slot of your Hand. If this happens, this skill is changed to "[Refresh!] ▶Turn Start: This card's original skills are restored.".
cards.text: [Now I'm also a full-fledged lady... I'm starting to tear up a little.]

cards.name: Broker Lady
cards.ability: [Breach of Contract] ▶Attack: If your Character's LIFE is 8 or less, the defender and this card are sent to the Grave.
cards.text: [Do you require my aid? We can discuss the work after the payment is settled.]

cards.name: Dress Up Lady Linus
cards.ability: [Dress Up Time~] ▶Defend: The last card in your Hand with "Dress Up" in the name is sent to the bottom of your Deck. A number of cards on both Fields without "Dress Up" in the name equal to the sent card's SIZE are deactivated. This skill is changed to "[Refresh!] ▶Turn Start: This card's original skills are restored.".
cards.text: [Muzisitter? Okay. I can listen to what you have to say. I'm in a really good mood right now.]

cards.name: Lancer Knight Shane
cards.ability: [Power Thrust] ▶Attack: If the defender's SIZE is less than this card's SIZE, the defender is sent to the Grave. Otherwise, this card is sent to the Grave. This skill is removed.
cards.text: [I told you. The outcome has already been decided.]

cards.name: Seeker Melissa
cards.ability: [Attack Stance] ▶Attack: This card gets ATK +1/STA -1. // [Defensive Stance] ▶Defend: This card gets ATK -1/DEF +1.
cards.text: [How do I feel? Great. I need a place where I can release all of this power overflowing within me.]

cards.name: Head Knight Eisenwane
cards.ability: [Assimilate!] ▶Attack: This card gets ATK set equal to 1 + the ATK of a random Follower on your Field. // [Assimilate!] ▶Defend: This card gets DEF set equal to the DEF of a random Follower on your Field.
cards.text: [I will show no mercy to anyone who opposes me. I consider anyone who wishes to protect the witches my opposition.]

cards.name: Apostle Red Sun
cards.ability: [Doubt] ▶Attack: If there are no active cards on the enemy Field, this card gets ATK/STA increased by 1 + the number of empty Slots on the enemy Field. If this happens, this skill is changed to "[Refresh!] ▶Turn Start: This card's original skills are restored.".
cards.text: [Lately, Miss Helena has been participating in activities with other people. She's been listening to the reformist views of that Schindler...]

cards.name: Witch Herionne
cards.ability: [Control Time] ▶Attack: If the defender and the enemy Character belong to the same faction, the defender gets ATK/STA decreased by this card's SIZE. This card gets ATK/STA increased by half this card's SIZE (rounding down). This skill is changed to "[Refresh!] ▶Turn Start: This card's original skills are restored.".
cards.text: [Parfunte. Time is on your side.]

cards.name: Head Luna Flina
cards.ability: [Master's Resolve] ▶Defend: If there are any Darklore cards on your Field other than this one, this card is moved to a random empty Slot on your Field. If this happens, the attacker gets ATK decreased by this card's Slot Number. This card gets STA increased by the amount of ATK decreased. This skill is changed to "[Refresh!] ▶Turn Start: This card's original skills are restored.".
cards.text: [According to Cabernet, the most important thing right now is the family's safety.]

cards.name: Cook Club Sylphie
cards.ability: [Neutralize Defense] ▶Attack: The defender gets DEF=0. This skill is changed to "[Refresh!] ▶Turn Start: This card's original skills are restored.".
cards.text: [Sita in her everyday clothes is some nice eye candy! But the new member is a formidable opponent, too!]

cards.name: Council Helper Weekly
cards.ability: [Terror] ▶Defend: The attacker gets ATK -1.
cards.text: [Seriously... Are they just trading me in like I'm part of the inventory? I'm the ace of the weekly duties members! This is a comeback.]

cards.name: Council Kingmakers
cards.ability: [Trial of Strength] ▶Attack: This card gets ATK set equal to the defender's DEF. // [Student Council's Potential] ▶Attack: The defender gets STA decreased by 3 + half the ATK of the first Vita Follower in your Hand (rounding up). // [Rest] ▶Defend: This card gets STA +1.
cards.text: [Tieria and Amy are the core of the student council's management. Although Celine's solid approval ratings are in part due to her charisma, it would be impossible without the outstanding business skills of these two.]

cards.name: Maid Lesnoa
cards.ability: [Maid Knowledge] ▶Attack: This card gets ATK increased by the number of cards in your Hand with "Maid" in the name.
cards.text: [Ever since that day, you've been obsessed with some kind of power... you haven't laid a finger on me, either. So... you won't be doing it anymore? Lady?]

cards.name: Maid Fio
cards.ability: [Maintain Stamina] ▶Defend: This card gets STA increased by the number of empty Slots in your Hand, then cards are sent from the top of your Deck to your Hand until your Hand contains at least 4 cards.
cards.text: [Being one minute, or even one second behind is unacceptable. The basic principle of all duties is to perform efficiently in order to stay on schedule.]

cards.name: Musiciter Lady Sevia
cards.ability: [Emergency Recovery] ▶Attack: If this card's ATK is less than or equal to the defender's total DEF+STA, the defender gets SIZE=1. Your Character gets LIFE increased by the change in SIZE and this card gets ATK/STA increased by half the change in SIZE (rounding up).
cards.text: [Welcome to Muzisitter, Miss Linus. First, we should choose a codename for you.]

cards.name: Marksman Knight
cards.ability: [Knight's Lesson] ▶Defend: All Followers on your Field with "Knight" in the name get STA +2. This skill is removed.
cards.text: [Maintaining superior equipment over the enemy is a fundamental strategy.]

cards.name: Crux Knight Sillit
cards.ability: [Counterattack] ▶Defend: If this card is deactivated, this card is reactivated and gets STA +3. This skill is removed.
cards.text: [Have you heard of a medic who wears clothes unbefitting of a doctor?]

cards.name: Crux Knight Lukif
cards.ability: [Fine Tuning] ▶Defend: If the attacker's ATK is at least 1, this card gets STA set equal to the attacker's ATK.
cards.text: [Carry a sword. Lame magic doesn't belong in a fight for your life.]

cards.name: Aletheian G-NUSA
cards.ability: [Seeds of Misfortune] ▶Defend: If the attacker's STA is greater than or equal to its original value and the attacker does not possess the skill "[Misfortune] ▶Attack: This card gets ATK -1/STA -1.", the attacker gains that skill.
cards.text: [Miss Helena and the God of Truth speak the same words. They have my complete trust.]

cards.name: GS 7th Star
cards.ability: [Restrained Fury] ▶Attack: If the defender's STA is greater than this card's ATK, this card gets STA decreased by 1 + the difference between this card's ATK and the defender's STA and gains an equal amount of ATK. This skill is removed.
cards.text: [Is Crux after the same thing as our leader? More importantly, that person... is the new captain of the knights.]

cards.name: Dark Sword Master A-GA
cards.ability: [Dark Sword] ▶Attack: All Followers on the enemy Field get ATK -1. This card gets ATK increased by the total amount of ATK decreased. All Followers on your Field get STA increased by the tens digit of this card's ATK.
cards.text: [There is no need to be curious about me. Just don't get in my way.]

cards.name: Tigress Felpix
cards.ability: [I'm on your side.] ▶Attack: If this card's SIZE is 4 or less, this card gets SIZE=7/STA+2 and is moved to the first empty Slot on the enemy Field and deactivated. // [Sorry. That was a mistake.] ▶Defend: If this card's SIZE is at least 5, all Followers on your Field except this one get ATK -2/STA -2 and this card gets SIZE=3 and is moved to the first empty Slot on the enemy Field and deactivated.
cards.text: [What? A fox? Don't I look like a tiger to you? Hm, well, believe it or not~]

cards.name: L. Sita Vilosa
cards.ability: [Cocoon] ▶Defend: If this card and your Character belong to the same faction and the attacker possesses an "Attack" skill, this card gets STA increased by the attacker's ATK.
cards.text: [One of the fundamentals of survival is being prepared to be hungry again, even if you're full.]

cards.name: L. Cinia Pacifica
cards.ability: [Cocoon] ▶Defend: If this card and your Character belong to the same faction and the attacker possesses an "Attack" skill, this card gets STA increased by the attacker's ATK.
cards.text: [It's been a while since I've left the house, but going out is good, too. I heard that cute animals can be found at some place... Maybe I'll try going there?]

cards.name: L. Luthica Preventer
cards.ability: [Cocoon] ▶Defend: If this card and your Character belong to the same faction and the attacker possesses an "Attack" skill, this card gets STA increased by the attacker's ATK.
cards.text: [If you call yourself a knight, you must work hard at all times. However, it can be difficult to suppress the urge to eat some snacks.]

cards.name: L. Iri Flina
cards.ability: [Cocoon] ▶Defend: If this card and your Character belong to the same faction and the attacker possesses an "Attack" skill, this card gets STA increased by the attacker's ATK.
cards.text: [Going out in the morning isn't bad, but going out at night is still better.]

cards.name: Girls' Harmony
cards.ability: [Chrysalis] ▶Defend: If the attacker possesses a skill, this card gets STA increased by the attacker's ATK.
cards.text: [If destiny exists, the girls will meet again. They have no say in it.]

cards.name: Lib. Snowty
cards.ability: [Forgetfulness] ▶Defend: The attacker's skills are removed. If this happens, this skill is removed.
cards.text: [The Lib. members all went to the underground library. It feels lonely here when we don't get many visitors.]

cards.name: Cook Club Devourer
cards.ability: [Cook Club Summon] ▶Defend: The first card in your Hand with "Cook Club" in the name is sent to the top of your Deck. If this happens, this card gets ATK +1/STA +2.
cards.text: [An outside sponsor of the Cook Club. This young lady from a wealthy family loves the snacks that the Cook Club makes.]

cards.name: Girl Detective Asmis
cards.ability: [Begin the deduction] ▶Defend: All Followers on your Field get the following effects depending on what they have in their names. ●Lib.: ATK +1. ●Student Council: DEF +1. ●Cook Club: SIZE -1. ●Asmis: ATK +1/STA +1. ●No other conditions met: STA +2.
cards.text: [In order to solve this case, you need courage. The courage to lie to your lover, the courage to admit defeat... you need at least this much courage.]

cards.name: Paladin Lady
cards.ability: [Defense Technique] ▶Defend: If this card is active, this card gets DEF +1/STA +2 and is deactivated.
cards.text: [We cooperate with the police for the sake of the public order of Royle City.]

cards.name: Lady Elberto
cards.ability: [Reverse Attack!] ▶Attack: The defender's ATK and STA are swapped. This skill is changed to "[Refresh!] ▶Turn Start: This card's original skills are restored.".
cards.text: [Linia is a difficult lady to understand. I have been hired by her as an agent.]

cards.name: Guitar Witch Maid
cards.ability: [Maid's Performance] ▶Defend: The first card in your Grave is removed from the game. If this happens, this card gets STA +2. If the removed card has "Maid" in the name, this card gets an additional ATK +1/STA +1.
cards.text: [I don't have any hopes or dreams. I only have my guitar, now. Please listen to my "Soul".] [Her performance of "Guitar for your soul" resounded everywhere.]

cards.name: Knight's Parrot Kocchan
cards.ability: [Messenger] ▶Defend: The attacker's STA is cut in half (rounding up). The attacker gets ATK increased by the amount of STA decreased. This skill is removed.
cards.text: [Drill! This is a drill for a level 2 security breach!]

cards.name: Knight Manager
cards.ability: [Management] ▶Attack: If this card's ATK is less than the defender's total DEF+STA, this card gets ATK increased by the defender's DEF.
cards.text: [Please let me know in advance if you plan to take a leave next month.]

cards.name: Seeker Beryl
cards.ability: [Artifact Use] ▶Defend: If you have a Crux Character, the first card in the enemy Deck is sent to the first empty Slot in the enemy Hand. If the sent card is a Follower, it gets DEF -1. If it is a spell, your Character gets LIFE +1. // [Best Attack] ▶Attack: This card gets ATK +1.
cards.text: [Hold on... That's a beautiful crystal you have there. Will you lend it to me for a bit?]

cards.name: Scardel Unit Tyrfing
cards.ability: [Restlessness] ▶Attack: This card and adjacent Followers get ATK +1.
cards.text: [This is one of the Scardel's covert fighters. During emergencies, she independently carries out her mission.]

cards.name: Apostle Reshuri
cards.ability: [Aletheian Deployment] ▶Turn Start: A card with the name "Aletheian G-NUSA" is created in the first empty Slot of your Field and gets SIZE -1.
cards.text: [According to Schindler, I can use this. A miracle, huh... The traditionalists are better than I thought.]

cards.name: Apostle Red Sun
cards.ability: [Proof of Miracles] ▶Attack: If the defender is active, the defender gets ATK -1/STA -1. If it is deactivated, this card gets ATK +1/STA +1. // [Best Defense] ▶Defend: This card gets STA +2.
cards.text: [It left a scar, but I can walk without a cane now. Miss Helena...]

cards.name: 5th Witness Kana. DDD
cards.ability: [I will eliminate you.] ▶Attack: The defender is sent to the bottom of the enemy Deck. This card gets STA increased by the sent card's SIZE. This skill is changed to "[Refresh!] ▶Turn Start: This card's original skills are restored.".
cards.text: [Yes. Yes. Understood. Please continue observing for now. It's still too early to make a decision.]

cards.name: Hecate M. Jane
cards.ability: (none)
cards.text: [Layna, is there something troubling you that you can't tell me about? I won't ask you about it, but you can always come to me if you have any worries.]

cards.name: Lib. Researcher Albert
cards.ability: [Relativity Impetus!] ▶Defend: All Followers in your Deck with "Lib." in the name get ATK +1/STA +1. This skill is removed.
cards.text: [I believe that the power of Talentium is absolute. For example, if a person uses it while in a moving frame of reference, it will appear the same to an outside observer. I wonder if my theory is correct?]

cards.name: Lib. Research Head Von
cards.ability: [Book Search] ▶Attack: The last Spell in your Deck is sent to the top of your Deck. This card gets ATK increased by the sent card's SIZE (by a maximum of 3). // [Book Return] ▶Defend: The first Follower in your Deck is sent to the top of your Deck. This card gets STA increased by half the sent card's SIZE (rounding up).
cards.text: [What's going on in the back room of the library? Talentium smelting? Eh~ Hm? I should try wearing glasses? Nope~ it would overlap with a different character type.]

cards.name: Arctic Lady
cards.ability: [Liberation] ▶Defend: If the attacker's ATK is greater than or equal to this card's total DEF+STA, your Character gets LIFE -1, this card gets SIZE=1/ATK -1/STA -1, and this card is moved to the first empty Slot in the enemy Field. This skill is removed.
cards.text: [It's hot. How can people live in a place like this?] [Lady, please take off your coat...]

cards.name: Liberated Maid
cards.ability: [Waiting] ▶Defend: All Followers on your Field get ATK +1/STA +1. This skill is changed to "[Refresh!] ▶Turn Start: This card's original skills are restored.".
cards.text: [I'm finally liberated from that crimson past! I'm free now. I can do whatever I want!]

cards.name: Maid Scientist
cards.ability: [Eye Level] ▶Attack: This card gets ATK increased by the defender's DEF. // [Division] ▶Defend: A random Follower on your Field other than this one gets STA decreased by half the attacker's ATK (rounding down). If this happens, this card gets STA increased by half the attacker's ATK (rounding up).
cards.text: [The world moves by the power of science. Do the higher ups understand this?]

cards.name: Youngest Knight Rotori
cards.ability: [Stamina Distribution] ▶Defend: If this card's ATK is greater than its STA, this card gets its ATK cut in half (rounding up) and gets STA increased by twice the amount of ATK decreased. If this happens, this skill is removed.
cards.text: [I have to become stronger! I will grow like Cygnus senpai did!]

cards.name: Supplier Knight
cards.ability: [Change Self] ▶Attack: If this card's STA is greater than its ATK, this card's STA and ATK are swapped. This skill is removed.
cards.text: [Yes, I'm on my... kya?!]

cards.name: Seeker Odien
cards.ability: [Research Start] ▶Attack: The first card in the enemy Hand is sent to the bottom of the enemy Deck. If the sent card is a Follower, this card gets ATK +2. If it is a Spell, this card gets STA +3. // [Don't get in my way.] ▶Defend: If there are 1 or fewer cards in the enemy Hand, this card gets DEF +2. If this happens, this skill is changed to "[Refresh!] ▶Turn Start: This card's original skills are restored.".
cards.text: [I don't have time to talk to you here. Get out of my way!]

cards.name: Witch Palomporom
cards.ability: [Shock Change] ▶Attack: The defender's DEF and this card's DEF are swapped. This skill is removed. // [Lightning Curse] ▶Defend: The attacker gets STA increased by its own DEF.
cards.text: [After hearing what Herionne said, I can't allow things to go on like this any longer. I will find the deadly witch and that girl.]

cards.name: GS Agent
cards.ability: [GS Comeback] ▶Attack: A random card in your Grave with "GS" in the name is sent to the bottom of your Deck.
cards.text: [5th Star mentioned someone with a strange sword... Who could it be? There's one or two people it could be. More importantly, did the Aletheians have that kind of power? They aren't the pushover sponsors we thought they were. First, I'll get in contact...]

cards.name: Helena's Right Hand Rue
cards.ability: [Domination] ▶Attack: If you have a Darklore Character and the difference between this card's SIZE and the defender's SIZE is at least 3, the defender is sent to the Grave. If this happens, this card gets ATK +1/STA +1. If the defender is not sent to the Grave, this card gets STA increased by 1 + the difference between this card's SIZE and the defender's SIZE.
cards.text: [Don't worry about who I am. I merely convey Miss Helena's will. Just obey my words.]

cards.name: Riftwatcher Schrodinger
cards.ability: [Reflection] ▶Attack: This Follower swaps its ATK/DEF/STA with the Follower on the enemy Field with the greatest ATK/DEF/STA. This Follower loses all skills, and all skills of the swapped Follower are moved to this Follower.
cards.text: [Let's see, let's see. Oh~ This place looks interesting. Shall I pay it a visit?] [Hovering within the space between spaces, outside of the space time continuum, the very existence of this mysterious existence is a mystery.]

cards.name: Infiltrator Witch Parfunte
cards.ability: [Deliver Knowledge] ▶Defend: The first Follower in your Deck gets ATK +1/DEF +1/STA +1. This skill is removed.
cards.text: [I came here to follow the Witch Queen's tracks, but this uniform is way too tight. Were kids always this underdeveloped?]

cards.name: Animal Suit Layna
cards.ability: [Animal Regeneration] ▶Defend: This card gets its STA doubled. This skill is changed to "[Refresh!] ▶Turn Start: This card's original skills are restored.".
cards.text: [P... Press member!] [This is also for the benefit of the school~]

cards.name: Cafe Sita
cards.ability: [Rest Time] ▶Defend: The attacker's first skill is changed to "[Let's take a break] ▶Defend: This card gets STA -2. If there are any Followers on your Field other than this one, this skill is moved to a random Follower on your Field other than this one.".
cards.text: [This place... is nice...] [Isn't it? The atmosphere is really nice, right?] [No... parfait]

cards.name: Garden Lady
cards.ability: [Appreciation] ▶Attack: A random active Follower on the enemy Field is deactivated. This skill is changed to "[Refresh!] ▶Turn Start: This card's original skills are restored.".
cards.text: [Watch your step. These are small and fragile children.]

cards.name: Bamboo Scent Lady Panica
cards.ability: [Grow!] ▶Attack: If this card's ATK is greater than or equal to the defender's total DEF+STA, this card gets SIZE +1. // [Fattened Up!] ▶Defend: This card gets ATK/STA increased by half this card's SIZE (rounding down).
cards.text: [So boring. Where'd my master go? She hasn't taken me for a walk.]

cards.name: Cinia-cherishing Linia
cards.ability: [Secret Sharing] ▶Attack: A random Follower on your Field gets SIZE -1. This card gets ATK/STA increased by that card's SIZE (by a maximum of 2).
cards.text: [It's been a while, but I tried making an apple pie. Isn't it delicious?]

cards.name: Seeker Odien
cards.ability: [Seeker Summon] ▶Attack: A random card in your Grave with "Seeker" in the name is sent to the bottom of your Deck.
cards.text: [Naturally, the pursuit of mysteries is lonely.]

cards.name: Knight Pintail
cards.ability: [Decoy] ▶Defend: A random card on your Field other than this one is sent to the bottom of your Deck. The attacker and a random Follower on the enemy Field other than the Follower gets ATK/STA decreased by half the sent card's SIZE (rounding up).
cards.text: [I wonder how long you can hide.]

cards.name: Luthica of Crux
cards.ability: [Attack Preparation] ▶Attack: If this card is in Slot 1, 3, or 5, this card gets ATK +2/STA +2. // [Defense Preparation] ▶Defend: If this card is in Slot 2, 4, or 5, the attacker gets ATK -2/STA -2. // [Tactical Movement] ▶Turn Start: This card is moved to a random Slot on your Field.
cards.text: [As expected, the air of Crux is refreshing.]

cards.name: Crescent Conundrum
cards.ability: [Sky Broom] ▶Defend: This card is moved to the first empty Slot on your Field (40% chance).
cards.text: [Yahoo! I got my hands on the latest model of witch brooms. This speed! This feeling! It's the best~]

cards.name: Shaman Helena
cards.ability: [Shaman's Cheer] ▶Defend: A random Follower on your Field gets ATK +1/STA +1. If this card is in Slot 2, this effect is applied again.
cards.text: [I love how simple humans are. That fool has also come. Shall I try moving a little, now?]

cards.name: Trainer Iri
cards.ability: [Training Start] ▶Attack: The last Follower in your Deck is sent to the first empty Slot on your Field and deactivated. This card gets ATK/STA increased by the number of deactivated cards on your Field. This skill is changed to "[Refresh!] ▶Turn Start: This card's original skills are restored.". // [Best Defense] ▶Defend: This card gets STA +2.
cards.text: [This whip is nice. It would be good to use. Should I buy one?]

cards.name: Swimming Pool Cannelle
cards.ability: [Invigorate] ▶Attack: If this card's STA is less than or equal to its original value, this card is sent to the first empty Slot on your Field, deactivated, and gets STA changed to its original value.
cards.text: [Do you have a problem with this tube? What are you staring at?]

cards.name: Senpai Muzisitter
cards.ability: [Senpai's Summon] ▶Attack: A random Follower in your Deck gets SIZE +2. If that card's SIZE is at least 10, that card gets ATK +3/STA +3, gets SIZE set equal to this card's SIZE, and is sent to the first empty Slot on your Field.
cards.text: [Does it still feel weird? Don't worry. Nobody can do everything at the beginning. I'll teach you one step at a time.]

cards.name: Smiling Vernika
cards.ability: [Balance] ▶Attack: If there are at least 2 Neutral cards on your Field, the defender gets DEF=0. All Followers on your Field get ATK/STA increased by the change in DEF. This skill is changed to "[Refresh!] ▶Turn Start: This card's original skills are restored.".
cards.text: [Vernika smiled as she looked upon the butterflies fluttering around her.]

cards.name: Nold of Darkness
cards.ability: [Dark Soul Attack] ▶Attack: If the defender's SIZE is at least 6, the defender is sent to the bottom of the enemy Deck. // [Dark Soul Unleashed] ▶Defend: The attacker gets SIZE +1.
cards.text: [This is the human form of the enormous Black Lion.]

cards.name: Dark Soul Nold
cards.ability: [Dark Soul Attack] ▶Attack: If the defender's SIZE is at least 6, the defender is sent to the Grave. This card gets ATK/STA increased by half the Turn Number (rounding up). // [Dark Soul Unleashed] ▶Defend: A random Follower on your Field gets SIZE -1. The attacker gets SIZE +1.
cards.text: [This is the human form of the Black Lion with her power unleashed.]

cards.name: Alchemist Yi Ensan
cards.ability: [Poison Attack] ▶Before this Follower is attacked, it gets STA +1 and the attacker gets STA -1.
cards.text: [One person only needs a teaspoon of love potion, so why in the world would anyone need a whole gallon? Well, that's none of my business. I just need to deliver it to... What was her name? Linia?]

cards.name: Musiciter Fan Layna
cards.ability: [Fireball!] ▶Attack: The defender gets STA -1. // [Deadly Charm] ▶Defend: The attacker gets STA -1.
cards.text: [And that spirit is what's so charming about Muzisitter!] [I don't know!]

cards.name: Lib. Assistant Jin
cards.ability: [Storage] ▶Turn Start: 2 random Followers on your Field with "Lib." in the name get SIZE -1.
cards.text: [Senpai is so cruel to give me this much work. I don't think I'm ready to give my life to this...]

cards.name: Council Casey
cards.ability: [Heavy Strike] ▶Attack: If there are any Followers on your Field other than this one, the enemy Character gets LIFE -3. If this happens, this skill is removed.
cards.text: [Great concentration, mental revolution, a single slash of the sword. The thing that the sword cuts is an object, but the thing that the heart cuts is your soul. Understand, Sita?]

cards.name: Lady Twins Sion and Rion
cards.ability: [Chaos] ▶Turn Start: A random card in the enemy Hand is sent to the bottom of the enemy Deck.
cards.text: [How is it? I can be elegant when I'm dressed like this, too.] [Shion, you're weird.]

cards.name: Lady Cox
cards.ability: [Equip Dress] ▶Defend: All Academy Followers on your Field get DEF +1. This skill is removed.
cards.text: [I enjoy investigating the Royle Academy students, but I like this dress, too. I will remember it.]

cards.name: Musiciter Lady Irea
cards.ability: [HP Drain] ▶Defend: If the attacker's STA is greater than its original value, the attacker's STA is changed to its original value. If this happens, this card gets STA increased by the change in STA. This skill is changed to "[Refresh!] ▶Turn Start: This card's original skills are restored.".
cards.text: [I, Muzisitter Irea, have appeared to stop the evil deeds of the witches!]

cards.name: Seeker Kano
cards.ability: [Report Results] ▶Defend: If this card's total DEF+STA is less than or equal to the attacker's ATK, the first Follower in your Hand gets ATK +3/STA +3.
cards.text: [Here is the thing you asked for. What's it for, anyway?]

cards.name: Silent Knight
cards.ability: [Silent Pressure] ▶Attack: The defender's skills are removed. This card gets SIZE +1. If this card's SIZE is at least 5, this card is sent to the Grave.
cards.text: [After the incident at the underground library, there was a knight that hadn't been there before. She didn't speak to anyone except Veltier. Oddly enough, nobody questioned her existence, and thus she silently blended in.]

cards.name: Double Agent Luthica
cards.ability: [Attack] ▶Attack: This card gets ATK +1/STA +1. // [Defend] ▶Defend: The attacker gets ATK -1/STA -1. This skill is changed to "[Refresh!] ▶Turn Start: This card's original skills are restored.".
cards.text: [The rumors that you were in league with the outsiders were true! Were true!] [It's pointless for me to try to resolve any misunderstandings. First, I have some very valuable information. How about it? Fallen bird.]

cards.name: 2S Informant
cards.ability: [Timing] ▶Attack: If your Character's LIFE is at least 15, this card gets ATK -1/STA -1. If it is less than 15, this card gets ATK +2.
cards.text: [It's simply business! I have the information you wanted.]

cards.name: Aletheian Hania
cards.ability: [Sacrifice] ▶Defend: The attacker gets STA/SIZE decreased by the difference between this card's total ATK+DEF+STA and the attacker's total ATK+DEF+STA. If this happens, this card is destroyed.
cards.text: [Whatever the shaman requests... even if it is to destroy my own body, I will carry it out.] [The Aletheians would eventually become blindly devoted.]

cards.name: GS Leader Schindler
cards.ability: [GS Command] ▶Attack: A random card in your Hand with "GS" in the name gets SIZE -1. If this happens, this card gets ATK +1/STA +1.
cards.text: [How much is this worth? There's nothing more we can obtain from within the Aletheians. It's a shame that we barely lost the Dark Sword.]

cards.name: Sionrion Extreme
cards.ability: [Transformation Expired] ▶Defend: If the attacker's ATK is greater than this card's total DEF+STA, this card is removed from the game and two cards with the names "Dress Up Shion" and "Dress Up Rion" are created in the first empty Slots of your Field and get SIZE=2.
cards.text: [The strange bird that sister Sage sent flying gave us new powers. Shall we count your crimes?] [Shion!] [Rion!] [Maximum Drive!] [Extreme!]

cards.name: Dress Up Sion
cards.ability: [Twin Attack!] ▶Attack: All cards on your Field with the names "Dress Up Shion" and "Dress Up Rion" get ATK +2.
cards.text: [Ack, there was a time limit? Hmph. We're still not finished yet! Rion!]

cards.name: Dress Up Rion
cards.ability: [Twin Defense!] ▶Defend: All cards on your Field with the names "Dress Up Shion" and "Dress Up Rion" get STA +2.
cards.text: [Of course! Shion, let's go!]

cards.name: Cook Club Baker Svia
cards.ability: [Strike Weakness] ▶Attack: The defender gets ATK -2/DEF -2. This skill is removed.
cards.text: [Finally, the greatest whipped cream GET! You're mine, whipped cream! This whipped's name will use my family name so everyone knows it's the greatest whipped cream!]

cards.name: Cook Club Coordinator
cards.ability: (none)
cards.text: [The last part of cooking is the decoration. However, in order to achieve the perfect decoration, you must put yourself in the food's shoes.]

cards.name: Summer Council Susie
cards.ability: [Pilfer] ▶Attack: This card's "Defend" skills are moved to the defender. The defender's "Attack" skills are moved to this Follower. // [Enemy Cheer] ▶Defend: If this card does not belong to Vita, the attacker gets ATK +2/STA +2.
cards.text: [I'm not always cold. I always get happy around flowers like these. Hm? My face isn't pale, and I don't have a major wound!]

cards.name: Part-Time Maid
cards.ability: [Recover] ▶Defend: If the attacker's ATK is greater than or equal to this card's total DEF+STA, a random Follower on your Field gets STA increased by this card's STA. If this happens, this skill is removed.
cards.text: [This is a great place for a part-time job.]

cards.name: Marionette Witch
cards.ability: [Confidence] ▶Defend: If this card possesses any skills other than this skill, this card's original skills are restored. If this happens, this card gets ATK +1/STA +1.
cards.text: [The Pacifica family immediately required her power to freely manipulate dolls.]

cards.name: Musiciter Lady Linus
cards.ability: [Shockwave] ▶Attack: The defender gets STA decreased by half the ATK of a random Follower on the enemy Field other than the defender (rounding up). If there are no other Followers, the defender gets STA -3. // [Energy Drain] ▶Defend: The attacker gets ATK decreased by this card's DEF.
cards.text: [Alright. I can do it! Arise, power of justice!]

cards.name: Blue Cross Scribe
cards.ability: [Life or Death] ▶Defend: If there are at least 4 cards in your Hand, the attacker is sent to the top of the enemy Deck and this skill is removed. If there are 2 or fewer cards in your Hand, this card is sent to the Grave.
cards.text: [From this point on, the Blue Cross will support Rose.]

cards.name: Crux Knight Sophia
cards.ability: [Abandonment] ▶Turn Start: This card is destroyed. // [Defiance] ▶Defend: If this card and your Character belong to the same faction, this card gets STA increased by the attacker's ATK.
cards.text: [I will begin the search for the dark sword.]

cards.name: Blue Cross Rose
cards.ability: [Comparison] ▶Attack: If this card's DEF is at least 0, the defender gets DEF decreased by this card's DEF. This skill is removed. // [Comparison] ▶Defend: If this card's DEF is at least 0, the attacker gets ATK/STA decreased by this card's DEF. This skill is removed. // [Restore Confidence] ▶Turn Start: This card gets its DEF changed to its original value. This card's original skills are restored.
cards.text: [This, too, is what I foresaw. However, these clothes aren't what I foresaw.]

cards.name: Wise Witch
cards.ability: [Reaper] ▶Attack: If the total number of cards in both Graves is at least 15, this card gets ATK +2/STA +2.
cards.text: [Oho~ this isn't good. The negative energy is getting stronger. We can't just wait around for an opportunity...]

cards.name: Aletheian Sous-Chef
cards.ability: [Cooking Preparations] ▶Defend: If this card's STA is greater than its original value, this card gets STA=5. Your Character gets LIFE increased by half the amount of STA decreased (rounding down, by a maximum of 9).
cards.text: [Schindler gave me an unknown ingredient that's supposedly good for the body and told me to put it in the food. But she told me to do it without anyone finding out. It feels like I'm doing something bad.]

cards.name: Fugitive Aletheian A-GA
cards.ability: [Natural Selection] ▶Attack: If the defender's SIZE is greater than or equal to this card's SIZE, this card gets ATK +2/STA +2. Otherwise, this card gets ATK +1/STA +1.
cards.text: [Can I survive on my own?] [...]

cards.name: Summer Tesla
cards.ability: [Book's Wisdom] ▶Defend: All Vita Followers on your Field get ATK/STA increased by this card's SIZE. This skill is changed to "[Refresh!] ▶Turn Start: This card's original skills are restored.".
cards.text: [It's true that I can't swim, but... you didn't have to penalize me by making me wear something like this... what do I do if someone sees me...]

cards.name: Summer Linia
cards.ability: [Master's Command] ▶Defend: This card and adjacent Followers get ATK/STA increased by half this card's SIZE (rounding up). This skill is changed to "[Refresh!] ▶Turn Start: This card's original skills are restored.".
cards.text: [Master Linia, is something bothering you?] [It's just... hot. It's just the heat.]

cards.name: Summer Vanguard
cards.ability: [Orders From Above] ▶Defend: Cards are sent from the top of your Deck to your Hand until your Hand contains at least 4 cards. This card gets ATK/STA increased by the number of Crux cards in your Hand. This skill is changed to "[Refresh!] ▶Turn Start: This card's original skills are restored.".
cards.text: [Whew. Water after training is like honey.]

cards.name: Summer Cabernet
cards.ability: [Two and One] ▶Defend: All Darklore Followers on your Field get ATK +2/STA +2. This skill is changed to "[Refresh!] ▶Turn Start: This card's original skills are restored.".
cards.text: [This is the recommended style for summer, but... why does it feel even hotter?]

cards.name: Basketball Club Member
cards.ability: (none)
cards.text: [I want to show everyone the value of sports at the Vita culture festival! I can't rebound by myself any longer!]

cards.name: Cook Club Advisor
cards.ability: [Show Leadership] ▶Attack: The defender gets STA decreased by the sum of the changes in SIZE of all cards on your Field from their original SIZES.
cards.text: [That new girl? I never turn away new members. Besides, I'll never say no to someone cute.]

cards.name: Cook Club Member
cards.ability: [Fruits of Research] ▶Defend: All Followers on your Field get DEF increased by the number of Followers on your Field with "Cook Club" in the name, ATK increased by half the number of Vita Followers on your Field (rounding up), and STA increased by the number of Followers on your Field. This skill is removed.
cards.text: [I want to show off my cooking skills at the next culture festival! Don't worry about other places, make sure you definitely stop by the Cook Club!]

cards.name: Mop Maid
cards.ability: [Defense Ward] ▶Attack: This card gets DEF +1/STA -1 (no effect if STA=1).
cards.text: [Why am I still carrying this mop? Someone please free me from this mopping hell.]

cards.name: Inspiration Lady
cards.ability: [Lady Meeting] ▶Attack: All Followers on your Field get ATK +1/STA +1. If there are any Followers on your Field other than this one with "Lady" in the name, all Followers on your Field get ATK +1/STA +2 instead. This skill is changed to "[Refresh!] ▶Turn Start: This card's original skills are restored.".
cards.text: [That lady looks like she was met with misfortune. As usual, my feelings were correct.]

cards.name: Senpai Maid
cards.ability: [Call me Senpai] ▶Attack: If this card's ATK is less than the defender's ATK, they get their ATK swapped. If this happens, this skill is changed to "[Refresh!] ▶Turn Start: This card's original skills are restored.".
cards.text: [It's been a while since I've worn a traditional maid uniform. How is it, master Linia?]

cards.name: Crux Knight Pintail
cards.ability: [Threat] ▶Defend: If the attacker's SIZE is less than or equal to this card's SIZE, the attacker gets ATK -1/DEF -1.
cards.text: [The greatest swordsmen will treat even the worst weapons as if they were the finest swords.]

cards.name: Saint Sword Girl
cards.ability: [Fireball!] ▶Attack: The defender gets STA -1.
cards.text: [I'm looking for the seminarians. Have you seen them?]

cards.name: Seeker Lydia
cards.ability: [Record Observations] ▶Attack: The following effects are applied depending on the defender's state. Active: This card gets STA +2. Deactivated: The defender gets DEF=0, then this card gets STA increased by the change in DEF.
cards.text: [I can't deal with this anymore.] [Melissa, have you ever seen this before?] [No, don't go over there.] [I wonder, will we ever be able to break free from the fighting?]

cards.name: Vampire Cultist
cards.ability: (none)
cards.text: [I'm sorry, miss, but I'm busy right now. Please don't disturb me until I've finished my experiments.] [The power of vampires is amazing.]

cards.name: Crescent Conundrum
cards.ability: [Vampirism] ▶Attack: If the defender's total DEF+STA is less than or equal to this card's ATK, this card gets DEF +1.
cards.text: [The truth is over there. Conundrum's logic can never be stopped.]

cards.name: Iri Flina
cards.ability: [Dignity] ▶Attack: If the defender's SIZE is less than or equal to this card's SIZE, the defender gets ATK -0~-4/STA -0~-4.
cards.text: [The radiance of the sunlight sometimes feels so dazzling that it could be fatal...] [Do you remember?]

cards.name: Badminton Sita
cards.ability: [Sita Smash] ▶Attack: If the defender's STA is even, the defender gets STA -1. If this happens and you have a Vita Character, the defender's skills are changed to "[Refresh!] ▶Turn Start: This card's original skills are restored.".
cards.text: [This is a racket...?] [That's right, Sita. You just take it and "bounce" the ball back.] [... Do I have to bounce it...?]

cards.name: Archery Cinia
cards.ability: [200% Accuracy] ▶Attack: A random active Follower on the enemy Field gets STA -2. If this happens and you have an Academy Character, a random Follower on the enemy Field gets STA -2.
cards.text: [I was slightly worried that I would miss if the wind blew. However, I focused everything into my own hands and shot with confidence.]

cards.name: Judo Luthica
cards.ability: [Judo Throw] ▶Attack: The defender gets DEF decreased by the number of Followers on your Field (by a maximum of 2 if you do not have a Crux Character).
cards.text: [I will end this in in a single match.]

cards.name: Ping Pong Iri
cards.ability: [Serve of Victory] ▶Attack: If the defender's total DEF+STA is 7 or less, the defender is destroyed. If you have a Darklore Character, a random Follower on the enemy Field gets STA decreased by the destroyed card's SIZE.
cards.text: [That ball. It will return to me.] [Th-that's! That's the "Flina Zone"!]

cards.name: Wind Girl Hu
cards.ability: [Medicine-rabi!] ▶Defend: Your Character gets LIFE +1. This card gets STA +2. // [It's good for you-rabi!] ▶Turn Start: This card gets ATK +2/DEF +2/STA +2.
cards.text: [I have to find the master. I've brought all of the master's favorite things in order to bring her back.]

cards.name: Visiting Alumnus Pintail
cards.ability: [Overpower!] ▶Defend: If the attacker's SIZE is less than this card's SIZE, this card gets ATK +1/DEF +1.
cards.text: [Oh my, what are you doing here, Pintail? It's been a long time! That uniform still fits you after all this time?] [Teacher!]

cards.name: Maid Sita
cards.ability: [Panda Kick!] ▶Attack: If this card's ATK is odd, this card gets ATK -1. If it is even, this card gets ATK +3.
cards.text: [Am I working here now?] [In a little bit.]

cards.name: Clothes Thieves Shion and Rion
cards.ability: [Mutual Destruction] ▶Defend: The attacker gains the skill "[Self-Destruct] ▶Defend: If the attacker's ATK is greater than or equal to this card's total DEF+STA, a random Follower on your Field other than this card gets STA=0.". This card's skills are removed.
cards.text: [Is this Iri's uniform?] [This is the summer uniform!] [Isn't it a little big?] [Wouldn't it seem bigger on you, Shion?]

cards.name: Lady Lig Nijes
cards.ability: [Total Recall] ▶Defend: This card gets its STA changed to its original value.
cards.text: [It tastes bad... And it's boring. Is there nobody who can entertain me?]

cards.name: Witch Rianna
cards.ability: [Equalize] ▶Defend: If you have an Academy Character and the attacker's ATK is higher than its original value, this card's ATK and the attacker's ATK are set equal to the average of their ATK (rounding up). This skill is removed.
cards.text: [When I wear these clothes, I feel like I can fly across the sky on a broom!]

cards.name: Lady Nexia
cards.ability: [We are the one] ▶Attack: Academy Followers adjacent to this card get STA +1. This card gets ATK/STA increased by 1 + the total amount of STA increased.
cards.text: [I only wear clothes for a shaman, so wearing a dress like this feels uncomfortable. Does this dress suit me?]

cards.name: Blue Cross Sunny
cards.ability: [Will of the Gloves] ▶Attack: If there are at least 4 cards in your Hand, this skill is removed. If there are 2 or fewer cards in your Hand, this card gets ATK -0~-3/STA -0~-3.
cards.text: [What? The Blue Cross can't relax right now? I already know that...]

cards.name: Blue Cross Gart
cards.ability: [Wings of the Gloves] ▶Attack: If there are at least 4 cards in your Hand, this skill is removed. If there are 2 or fewer cards in your Hand, the first 4 cards in your Grave are removed from the game.
cards.text: [Ack, there are too many girls here who have received the saint's blessing. Hm? I've seen those girls before... is it my imagination?]

cards.name: Blue Cross Parfunte
cards.ability: [Witch's Gloves] ▶Attack: This card and a random Follower on your Field other than this one get ATK/STA increased by half the number of cards in your Hand (rounding down). // [Witch's Overcoat] ▶Defend: If there are 2 or fewer cards in your Hand, cards are sent from the top of your Deck to your Hand until your hand contains at least 4 cards. This skill is changed to "[Refresh!] ▶Turn Start: This card's original skills are restored.".
cards.text: [This is an amazing glove.]

cards.name: Dark Sword's Spirit Menelgart
cards.ability: [Handstand] ▶Attack: If this card's STA is greater than its ATK, this card's ATK and STA are swapped.
cards.text: [I'm not scared. I'm not scared. I'm not scared. I'm not scared.] [You're the scariest one!]

cards.name: GS 7th Star
cards.ability: [Dignity!] ▶Defend: If the attacker's ATK is lower than this card's SIZE, the attacker gets ATK decreased by this card's ATK.
cards.text: [8 o' clock on the night where people are the most defenseless... Walking this path isn't too bad.]

cards.name: Night's Holy Guardian Sigma
cards.ability: [Reverse Power] ▶Defend: This card gets STA increased by the amount that the attacker's original STA exceeds its current STA. This card gets ATK increased by half the amount of STA increased (rounding down).
cards.text: [Did you come to handle the alcohol? Well, let's see how this wine tastes.]

cards.name: Master of Games
cards.ability: [Game Mastery] ▶Attack: A random Season 1 Follower is created in the first empty Slot of your Field and gets SIZE=1. This skill is removed. // [Game Mastery] ▶Defend: A random Season 1 Follower is created in the first empty Slot of your Field and gets SIZE=1. This skill is removed.
cards.text: [I've already tried all of the games... I'm tired of this! What do I do now...]

cards.name: Cook Club Linfield
cards.ability: [Cold] ▶Defend: This card gets ATK -1/DEF -1/STA -1. This skill is changed to "[Refresh!] ▶Turn Start: This card's original skills are restored."
cards.text: [Oh? Why's the door open? Is someone in there?]

cards.name: L. Hanbok Cinia
cards.ability: [New Year's Bow] ▶Defend: This card is removed from the game. If this happens, 3 copies of this card with its original ATK/DEF/STA and without skills are created in the first 3 empty Slots on your Field and get SIZE=1.
cards.text: [Hm? I don't really have anything in particular to wish for. After all, there's nothing I can't obtain with just a simple gesture, right? Well, if you insist...]

cards.name: L. Hanbok Luthica
cards.ability: [New Year's Bow] ▶Defend: This card is removed from the game. If this happens, 3 copies of this card with its original ATK/DEF/STA and without skills are created in the first 3 empty Slots on your Field and get SIZE=1.
cards.text: [I hope the atmosphere of the knights and Crux improves. I want everyone to be able to relax and perform their duties.]

cards.name: L. Hanbok Iri
cards.ability: [New Year's Bow] ▶Defend: This card is removed from the game. If this happens, 3 copies of this card with its original ATK/DEF/STA and without skills are created in the first 3 empty Slots on your Field and get SIZE=1.

cards.name: Serpent Incarnation
cards.ability: [Evil Eye] ▶Attack: If the defender's DEF is 3 or less, the defender's "Defend" skills are removed and the defender gains the skill "[Venom] ▶Defend: This card gets STA -2~-6.".

cards.name: Eixir L'Teft
cards.ability: [Show Skill] ▶Attack: This card gets ATK +1/DEF +1/STA +1. This skill is removed. // [Dimensional Power] ▶Defend: This card gets ATK/DEF/STA increased by the amount that each stat exceeds their original values respectively (by a maximum of 5). This skill is removed.
cards.text: [The sole survivor of the battle was the sister of Eixir L'Teft. It's unknown if Eixir L'Teft is her real name.]

cards.ability: [Cacao's Blessing] ▶Turn Start: This card gets ATK +2/STA +2. // [Cacao 100%] ▶Defend: If this card's STA is lower than its original value, this card gets STA +2. If it is higher, this card gets ATK +1 and is reactivated.

cards.ability: [Cacao's Blessing] ▶Turn Start: This card gets ATK +4/STA +4. // [Cacao 100%] ▶Defend: If this card's STA is loewr than its original value, this card gets STA +3. If it is higher, this card gets ATK +2 and is reactivated.
cards.text: [Tada! What do you think? I tried to look like a valley squirrel. I don't have any acorns to nibble on, but don't I look cute? I like how fluffy this tail feels, too.]

cards.name: HH Linus
cards.ability: [Cacao's Blessing] ▶Turn Start: This card gets ATK +1/STA +1. // [Cacao 100%] ▶Defend: If this card's STA is lower than its original value, this card gets STA +1. If it is higher, this card is reactivated.
cards.text: [It's... it's not like I like these clothes or anything! I just had the courtesy to wear them at least once since they were handmade.]

cards.name: MH Linus
cards.ability: [Cacao's Blessing] ▶Turn Start: This card gets ATK +2/STA +2. // [Cacao 100%] ▶Defend: If this card's STA is lower than its original value, this card gets STA +2. If it is higher, this card gets ATK +1 and is reactivated.
cards.text: [Muzisitters have a really tough job... there are always troublemakers around at night and during the day... I can't show them this weak appearance.]

cards.name: RH Linus
cards.ability: [Cacao's Blessing] ▶Turn Start: This card gets ATK +4/STA +4. // [Cacao 100%] ▶Defend: If this card's STA is loewr than its original value, this card gets STA +3. If it is higher, this card gets ATK +2 and is reactivated.
